GE09ram_02_u:0: kasyacit tv atha kālasya rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
GE09ram_02_u:3: tvāṃ netum āgato vīra yudhājin mātulas tava // Ram_2,1.2
GE09ram_02_u:7: mātṝṃś cāpi naraśreṣṭhaḥ śatrughnasahito yayau // Ram_2,1.4
GE09ram_02_u:9: svapuraṃ prāviśad vīraḥ pitā tasya tutoṣa ha // Ram_2,1.5
GE09ram_02_u:10: sa tatra nyavasad bhrātrā saha satkārasatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12: tatrāpi nivasantau tau tarpyamāṇau ca kāmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13: bhrātarau smaratāṃ vīrau vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // Ram_2,1.7
GE09ram_02_u:14: rājāpi tau mahātejāḥ sasmāra proṣitau sutau
GE09ram_02_u:16: sarva eva tu tasyeṣṭāś catvāraḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:17: svaśarīrād vinirvṛttāś catvāra iva bāhavaḥ // Ram_2,1.9
GE09ram_02_u:18: teṣām api mahātejā rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:19: svayambhūr iva bhūtānāṃ babhūva guṇavattaraḥ // Ram_2,1.10
GE09ram_02_u:20: gate ca bharate rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:23: cakāra rāmo dharmātmā priyāṇi ca hitāni ca // Ram_2,1.12
GE09ram_02_u:26: evaṃ daśarathaḥ prīto brāhmaṇā naigamās tathā
GE09ram_02_u:28: sa hi nityaṃ praśāntātmā mṛdupūrvaṃ ca bhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:31: na smaraty apakārāṇāṃ śatam apy ātmavattayā // Ram_2,1.16
GE09ram_02_u:33: kathayann āsta vai nityam astrayogyāntareṣv api // Ram_2,1.17
GE09ram_02_u:35: vṛddhair abhivinītaś ca dvijair dharmārthadarśibhiḥ // Ram_2,1.18
GE09ram_02_u:41: śraiṣṭhyaṃ śāstrasamūheṣu prāpto vyāmiśrakeṣv api // Ram_2,1.21
GE09ram_02_u:42: arthadharmau ca saṃgṛhya sukhatantro na cālasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:47: apradhṛṣyaś ca saṃgrāme kruddhair api surāsuraiḥ // Ram_2,1.24
GE09ram_02_u:48: anasūyo jitakrodho na dṛpto na ca matsarī
GE09ram_02_u:49: na cāvamantā bhūtānāṃ na ca kālavaśānugaḥ // Ram_2,1.25
GE09ram_02_u:50: evaṃ śreṣṭhair guṇair yuktaḥ prajānāṃ pārthivātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:52: buddhyā bṛhaspates tulyo vīryeṇāpi śacīpateḥ // Ram_2,1.26
GE09ram_02_u:54: guṇair viruruce rāmo dīptaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ // Ram_2,1.27
GE09ram_02_u:57: etais tu bahubhir yuktaṃ guṇair anupamaiḥ sutam
GE09ram_02_u:58: dṛṣṭvā daśaratho rājā cakre cintāṃ paraṃtapaḥ // Ram_2,1.29
GE09ram_02_u:59: eṣā hy asya parā prītir hṛdi samparivartate
GE09ram_02_u:60: kadā nāma sutaṃ drakṣyāmy abhiṣiktam ahaṃ priyam // Ram_2,1.30
GE09ram_02_u:62: mattaḥ priyataro loke parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // Ram_2,1.31
GE09ram_02_u:64: mahīdharasamo dhṛtyāṃ mattaś ca guṇavattaraḥ // Ram_2,1.32
GE09ram_02_u:65: mahīm aham imāṃ kṛtsnām adhitiṣṭhantam ātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:66: anena vayasā dṛṣṭvā yathā svargam avāpnuyām // Ram_2,1.33
GE09ram_02_u:67: taṃ samīkṣya mahārājo yuktaṃ samuditair guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:68: niścitya sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ yuvarājam amanyata // Ram_2,1.34
GE09ram_02_u:72: rājānam evābhimukhā niṣedur niyatā nṛpāḥ // Ram_2,1.36
GE09ram_02_u:73: sa labdhamānair vinayānvitair nṛpaiḥ purālayair jānapadaiś ca mānavaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:74: upopaviṣṭair nṛpatir vṛto babhau sahasracakṣur bhagavān ivāmaraiḥ // Ram_2,1.37
GE09ram_02_u:76: hitam uddharṣaṇaṃ cedam uvācāpratimaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,2.1
GE09ram_02_u:78: svareṇa mahatā rājā jīmūta iva nādayan // Ram_2,2.2
GE09ram_02_u:80: śreyasā yoktukāmo 'smi sukhārham akhilaṃ jagat // Ram_2,2.3
GE09ram_02_u:82: prajā nityam atandreṇa yathāśakty abhirakṣatā // Ram_2,2.4
GE09ram_02_u:83: idaṃ śarīraṃ kṛtsnasya lokasya caratā hitam
GE09ram_02_u:84: pāṇḍur asyātapatrasya chāyāyāṃ jaritaṃ mayā // Ram_2,2.5
GE09ram_02_u:88: pariśrānto 'smi lokasya gurvīṃ dharmadhuraṃ vahan // Ram_2,2.7
GE09ram_02_u:89: so 'haṃ viśramam icchāmi putraṃ kṛtvā prajāhite
GE09ram_02_u:90: saṃnikṛṣṭān imān sarvān anumānya dvijarṣabhān // Ram_2,2.8
GE09ram_02_u:91: anujāto hi me sarvair guṇair jyeṣṭho mamātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:93: taṃ candram iva puṣyeṇa yuktaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:95: anurūpaḥ sa vo nātho lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:96: trailokyam api nāthena yena syān nāthavattaram // Ram_2,2.11
GE09ram_02_u:97: anena śreyasā sadyaḥ saṃyojyāham imāṃ mahīm
GE09ram_02_u:98: gatakleśo bhaviṣyāmi sute tasmin niveśya vai // Ram_2,2.12
GE09ram_02_u:99: iti bruvantaṃ muditāḥ pratyanandan nṛpā nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:100: vṛṣṭimantaṃ mahāmeghaṃ nardantam iva barhiṇaḥ // Ram_2,2.13
GE09ram_02_u:102: ūcuś ca manasā jñātvā vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // Ram_2,2.14
GE09ram_02_u:104: sa rāmaṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣiñcasva pārthivam // Ram_2,2.15
GE09ram_02_u:105: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā teṣāṃ manaḥpriyam
GE09ram_02_u:106: ajānann iva jijñāsur idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,2.16
GE09ram_02_u:107: kathaṃ nu mayi dharmeṇa pṛthivīm anuśāsati
GE09ram_02_u:108: bhavanto draṣṭum icchanti yuvarājaṃ mamātmajam // Ram_2,2.17
GE09ram_02_u:109: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadaiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:110: bahavo nṛpa kalyāṇā guṇāḥ putrasya santi te // Ram_2,2.18
GE09ram_02_u:112: ikṣvākubhyo hi sarvebhyo 'py atirakto viśāmpate // Ram_2,2.19
GE09ram_02_u:114: dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca śīlavān anasūyakaḥ // Ram_2,2.20
GE09ram_02_u:116: mṛduś ca sthiracittaś ca sadā bhavyo 'nasūyakaḥ // Ram_2,2.21
GE09ram_02_u:117: priyavādī ca bhūtānāṃ satyavādī ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:119: tenāsyehātulā kīrtir yaśas tejaś ca vardhate
GE09ram_02_u:121: yadā vrajati saṃgrāmaṃ grāmārthe nagarasya vā
GE09ram_02_u:123: saṃgrāmāt punar āgamya kuñjareṇa rathena vā
GE09ram_02_u:124: paurān svajanavan nityaṃ kuśalaṃ paripṛcchati // Ram_2,2.25
GE09ram_02_u:126: nikhilenānupūrvyā ca pitā putrān ivaurasān // Ram_2,2.26
GE09ram_02_u:127: śuśrūṣante ca vaḥ śiṣyāḥ kaccit karmasu daṃśitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:128: iti naḥ puruṣavyāghraḥ sadā rāmo 'bhibhāṣate // Ram_2,2.27
GE09ram_02_u:130: utsaveṣu ca sarveṣu piteva parituṣyati // Ram_2,2.28
GE09ram_02_u:132: vatsaḥ śreyasi jātas te diṣṭyāsau tava rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:133: diṣṭyā putraguṇair yukto mārīca iva kaśyapaḥ // Ram_2,2.29
GE09ram_02_u:134: balam ārogyam āyuś ca rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:135: āśaṃsate janaḥ sarvo rāṣṭre puravare tathā // Ram_2,2.30
GE09ram_02_u:136: abhyantaraś ca bāhyaś ca paurajānapado janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:137: striyo vṛddhās taruṇyaś ca sāyamprātaḥ samāhitāḥ // Ram_2,2.31
GE09ram_02_u:139: teṣām āyācitaṃ deva tvatprasādāt samṛdhyatām // Ram_2,2.32
GE09ram_02_u:142: taṃ devadevopamam ātmajaṃ te sarvasya lokasya hite niviṣṭam
GE09ram_02_u:143: hitāya naḥ kṣipram udārajuṣṭaṃ mudābhiṣektuṃ varada tvam arhasi // Ram_2,2.34
GE09ram_02_u:145: pratigṛhyābravīd rājā tebhyaḥ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,3.1
GE09ram_02_u:147: yan me jyeṣṭhaṃ priyaṃ putraṃ yauvarājyastham icchatha // Ram_2,3.2
GE09ram_02_u:148: iti pratyarcya tān rājā brāhmaṇān idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:149: vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca teṣām evopaśṛṇvatām // Ram_2,3.3
GE09ram_02_u:150: caitraḥ śrīmān ayaṃ māsaḥ puṇyaḥ puṣpitakānanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:152: kṛtam ity eva cābrūtām abhigamya jagatpatim
GE09ram_02_u:154: tataḥ sumantraṃ dyutimān rājā vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:155: rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bhavatā śīghram ānīyatām iti // Ram_2,3.6
GE09ram_02_u:157: rāmaṃ tatrānayāṃcakre rathena rathināṃ varam // Ram_2,3.7
GE09ram_02_u:158: atha tatra samāsīnās tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:159: prācyodīcyāḥ pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca bhūmipāḥ // Ram_2,3.8
GE09ram_02_u:160: mlecchāś cāryāś ca ye cānye vanaśailāntavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:161: upāsāṃcakrire sarve taṃ devā iva vāsavam // Ram_2,3.9
GE09ram_02_u:162: teṣāṃ madhye sa rājarṣir marutām iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:169: na tatarpa samāyāntaṃ paśyamāno narādhipaḥ // Ram_2,3.13
GE09ram_02_u:171: pituḥ samīpaṃ gacchantaṃ prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt // Ram_2,3.14
GE09ram_02_u:173: āruroha nṛpaṃ draṣṭuṃ saha sūtena rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,3.15
GE09ram_02_u:174: sa prāñjalir abhipretya praṇataḥ pitur antike
GE09ram_02_u:175: nāma svaṃ śrāvayan rāmo vavande caraṇau pituḥ // Ram_2,3.16
GE09ram_02_u:176: taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ pārśve kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:177: gṛhyāñjalau samākṛṣya sasvaje priyam ātmajam // Ram_2,3.17
GE09ram_02_u:179: dideśa rājā ruciraṃ rāmāya paramāsanam // Ram_2,3.18
GE09ram_02_u:181: svayeva prabhayā merum udaye vimalo raviḥ // Ram_2,3.19
GE09ram_02_u:184: taṃ paśyamāno nṛpatis tutoṣa priyam ātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:186: sa taṃ sasmitam ābhāṣya putraṃ putravatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:187: uvācedaṃ vaco rājā devendram iva kaśyapaḥ // Ram_2,3.22
GE09ram_02_u:188: jyeṣṭhāyām asi me patnyāṃ sadṛśyāṃ sadṛśaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:189: utpannas tvaṃ guṇaśreṣṭho mama rāmātmajaḥ priyaḥ // Ram_2,3.23
GE09ram_02_u:190: tvayā yataḥ prajāś cemāḥ svaguṇair anurañjitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:191: tasmāt tvaṃ puṣyayogena yauvarājyam avāpnuhi // Ram_2,3.24
GE09ram_02_u:192: kāmatas tvaṃ prakṛtyaiva vinīto guṇavān asi
GE09ram_02_u:193: guṇavaty api tu snehāt putra vakṣyāmi te hitam // Ram_2,3.25
GE09ram_02_u:194: bhūyo vinayam āsthāya bhava nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:200: tasmāt putra tvam ātmānaṃ niyamyaiva samācara // Ram_2,3.28
GE09ram_02_u:201: tac chrutvā suhṛdas tasya rāmasya priyakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:202: tvaritāḥ śīghram abhyetya kausalyāyai nyavedayan // Ram_2,3.29
GE09ram_02_u:203: sā hiraṇyaṃ ca gāś caiva ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:206: yayau svaṃ dyutimad veśma janaughaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ // Ram_2,3.31
GE09ram_02_u:207: te cāpi paurā nṛpater vacas tac chrutvā tadā lābham iveṣṭam āpya
GE09ram_02_u:208: narendram āmantrya gṛhāṇi gatvā devān samānarcur atīva hṛṣṭāḥ // Ram_2,3.32
GE09ram_02_u:209: gateṣv atha nṛpo bhūyaḥ paureṣu saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:210: mantrayitvā tataś cakre niścayajñaḥ sa niścayam // Ram_2,4.1
GE09ram_02_u:211: śva eva puṣyo bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣecyas tu me sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:212: rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo yauvarājya iti prabhuḥ // Ram_2,4.2
GE09ram_02_u:214: sūtam ājñāpayāmāsa rāmaṃ punar ihānaya // Ram_2,4.3
GE09ram_02_u:215: pratigṛhya sa tadvākyaṃ sūtaḥ punar upāyayau
GE09ram_02_u:216: rāmasya bhavanaṃ śīghraṃ rāmam ānayituṃ punaḥ // Ram_2,4.4
GE09ram_02_u:218: śrutvaiva cāpi rāmas taṃ prāptaṃ śaṅkānvito 'bhavat // Ram_2,4.5
GE09ram_02_u:219: praveśya cainaṃ tvaritaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:220: yad āgamanakṛtyaṃ te bhūyas tad brūhy aśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,4.6
GE09ram_02_u:221: tam uvāca tataḥ sūto rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:222: śrutvā pramāṇam atra tvaṃ gamanāyetarāya vā // Ram_2,4.7
GE09ram_02_u:224: prayayau rājabhavanaṃ punar draṣṭuṃ nareśvaram // Ram_2,4.8
GE09ram_02_u:225: taṃ śrutvā samanuprāptaṃ rāmaṃ daśaratho nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:226: praveśayāmāsa gṛhaṃ vivikṣuḥ priyam uttamam // Ram_2,4.9
GE09ram_02_u:227: praviśann eva ca śrīmān rāghavo bhavanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:228: dadarśa pitaraṃ dūrāt praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ // Ram_2,4.10
GE09ram_02_u:230: pradiśya cāsmai ruciram āsanaṃ punar abravīt // Ram_2,4.11
GE09ram_02_u:231: rāma vṛddho 'smi dīrghāyur bhuktā bhogā mayepsitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:233: jātam iṣṭam apatyaṃ me tvam adyānupamaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:234: dattam iṣṭam adhītaṃ ca mayā puruṣasattama // Ram_2,4.13
GE09ram_02_u:235: anubhūtāni ceṣṭāni mayā vīra sukhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:238: ato yat tvām ahaṃ brūyāṃ tan me tvaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_2,4.15
GE09ram_02_u:239: adya prakṛtayaḥ sarvās tvām icchanti narādhipam
GE09ram_02_u:240: atas tvāṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣekṣyāmi putraka // Ram_2,4.16
GE09ram_02_u:241: api cādyāśubhān rāma svapnān paśyāmi dāruṇān
GE09ram_02_u:242: sanirghātā maholkāś ca patantīha mahāsvanāḥ // Ram_2,4.17
GE09ram_02_u:243: avaṣṭabdhaṃ ca me rāma nakṣatraṃ dāruṇair grahaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:246: rājā vā mṛtyum āpnoti ghorāṃ vāpadam ṛcchati // Ram_2,4.19
GE09ram_02_u:247: tad yāvad eva me ceto na vimuhyati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:248: tāvad evābhiṣiñcasva calā hi prāṇināṃ matiḥ // Ram_2,4.20
GE09ram_02_u:249: adya candro 'bhyupagataḥ puṣyāt pūrvaṃ punar vasum
GE09ram_02_u:250: śvaḥ puṣyayogaṃ niyataṃ vakṣyante daivacintakāḥ // Ram_2,4.21
GE09ram_02_u:252: śvas tvāham abhiṣekṣyāmi yauvarājye paraṃtapa // Ram_2,4.22
GE09ram_02_u:255: suhṛdaś cāpramattās tvāṃ rakṣantv adya samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:256: bhavanti bahuvighnāni kāryāṇy evaṃvidhāni hi // Ram_2,4.24
GE09ram_02_u:257: viproṣitaś ca bharato yāvad eva purād itaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:258: tāvad evābhiṣekas te prāptakālo mato mama // Ram_2,4.25
GE09ram_02_u:259: kāmaṃ khalu satāṃ vṛtte bhrātā te bharataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:261: kiṃ tu cittaṃ manuṣyāṇām anityam iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:262: satāṃ ca dharmanityānāṃ kṛtaśobhi ca rāghava // Ram_2,4.27
GE09ram_02_u:264: vrajeti rāmaḥ pitaram abhivādyābhyayād gṛham // Ram_2,4.28
GE09ram_02_u:266: tasmin kṣaṇe vinirgatya mātur antaḥpuraṃ yayau // Ram_2,4.29
GE09ram_02_u:267: tatra tāṃ pravaṇām eva mātaraṃ kṣaumavāsinīm
GE09ram_02_u:268: vāgyatāṃ devatāgāre dadarśa yācatīṃ śriyam // Ram_2,4.30
GE09ram_02_u:269: prāg eva cāgatā tatra sumitrā lakṣmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:270: sītā cānāyitā śrutvā priyaṃ rāmābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,4.31
GE09ram_02_u:271: tasmin kāle hi kausalyā tasthāv āmīlitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:276: uvāca vacanaṃ rāmo harṣayaṃs tām idaṃ tadā // Ram_2,4.34
GE09ram_02_u:278: bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣeko me yathā me śāsanaṃ pituḥ // Ram_2,4.35
GE09ram_02_u:280: evam ṛtvigupādhyāyaiḥ saha mām uktavān pitā // Ram_2,4.36
GE09ram_02_u:281: yāni yāny atra yogyāni śvobhāviny abhiṣecane
GE09ram_02_u:282: tāni me maṅgalāny adya vaidehyāś caiva kāraya // Ram_2,4.37
GE09ram_02_u:284: harṣabāṣpakalaṃ vākyam idaṃ rāmam abhāṣata // Ram_2,4.38
GE09ram_02_u:285: vatsa rāma ciraṃ jīva hatās te paripanthinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:286: jñātīn me tvaṃ śriyā yuktaḥ sumitrāyāś ca nandaya // Ram_2,4.39
GE09ram_02_u:287: kalyāṇe bata nakṣatre mayi jāto 'si putraka
GE09ram_02_u:288: yena tvayā daśaratho guṇair ārādhitaḥ pitā // Ram_2,4.40
GE09ram_02_u:289: amoghaṃ bata me kṣāntaṃ puruṣe puṣkarekṣaṇe
GE09ram_02_u:290: yeyam ikṣvākurājyaśrīḥ putra tvāṃ saṃśrayiṣyati // Ram_2,4.41
GE09ram_02_u:291: ity evam ukto mātredaṃ rāmo bhrātaram abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:292: prāñjaliṃ prahvam āsīnam abhivīkṣya smayann iva // Ram_2,4.42
GE09ram_02_u:293: lakṣmaṇemāṃ mayā sārdhaṃ praśādhi tvaṃ vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:294: dvitīyaṃ me 'ntarātmānaṃ tvām iyaṃ śrīr upasthitā // Ram_2,4.43
GE09ram_02_u:295: saumitre bhuṅkṣva bhogāṃs tvam iṣṭān rājyaphalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:296: jīvitaṃ ca hi rājyaṃ ca tvadartham abhikāmaye // Ram_2,4.44
GE09ram_02_u:297: ity uktvā lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mātarāv abhivādya ca
GE09ram_02_u:298: abhyanujñāpya sītāṃ ca jagāma svaṃ niveśanam // Ram_2,4.45
GE09ram_02_u:300: purohitaṃ samāhūya vasiṣṭham idam abravīt // Ram_2,5.1
GE09ram_02_u:303: tatheti ca sa rājānam uktvā vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:304: svayaṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavān yayau rāmaniveśanam // Ram_2,5.3
GE09ram_02_u:306: tisraḥ kakṣyā rathenaiva viveśa munisattamaḥ // Ram_2,5.4
GE09ram_02_u:307: tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ rāmas tvarann iva sasaṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:308: mānayiṣyan sa mānārhaṃ niścakrāma niveśanāt // Ram_2,5.5
GE09ram_02_u:311: sa cainaṃ praśritaṃ dṛṣṭvā sambhāṣyābhiprasādya ca
GE09ram_02_u:312: priyārhaṃ harṣayan rāmam ity uvāca purohitaḥ // Ram_2,5.7
GE09ram_02_u:313: prasannas te pitā rāma yauvarājyam avāpsyasi
GE09ram_02_u:314: upavāsaṃ bhavān adya karotu saha sītayā // Ram_2,5.8
GE09ram_02_u:315: prātas tvām abhiṣektā hi yauvarājye narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:316: pitā daśarathaḥ prītyā yayātiṃ nahuṣo yathā // Ram_2,5.9
GE09ram_02_u:317: ity uktvā sa tadā rāmam upavāsaṃ yatavratam
GE09ram_02_u:318: mantravat kārayāmāsa vaidehyā sahitaṃ muniḥ // Ram_2,5.10
GE09ram_02_u:319: tato yathāvad rāmeṇa sa rājño gurur arcitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:321: suhṛdbhis tatra rāmo 'pi tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:322: sabhājito viveśātha tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,5.12
GE09ram_02_u:326: nirgatya dadṛśe mārgaṃ vasiṣṭho janasaṃvṛtam // Ram_2,5.14
GE09ram_02_u:334: rāmābhiṣekam ākāṅkṣann ākāṅkṣann udayaṃ raveḥ // Ram_2,5.18
GE09ram_02_u:336: utsuko 'bhūj jano draṣṭuṃ tam ayodhyāmahotsavam // Ram_2,5.19
GE09ram_02_u:338: vyūhann iva janaughaṃ taṃ śanai rājakulaṃ yayau // Ram_2,5.20
GE09ram_02_u:341: tam āgatam abhiprekṣya hitvā rājāsanaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:342: papraccha sa ca tasmai tat kṛtam ity abhyavedayat // Ram_2,5.22
GE09ram_02_u:343: guruṇā tv abhyanujñāto manujaughaṃ visṛjya tam
GE09ram_02_u:344: viveśāntaḥpuraṃ rājā siṃho giriguhām iva // Ram_2,5.23
GE09ram_02_u:346: vidīpayaṃś cāru viveśa pārthivaḥ śaśīva tārāgaṇasaṃkulaṃ nabhaḥ // Ram_2,5.24
GE09ram_02_u:348: saha patnyā viśālākṣyā nārāyaṇam upāgamat // Ram_2,6.1
GE09ram_02_u:349: pragṛhya śirasā pātrīṃ haviṣo vidhivat tadā
GE09ram_02_u:351: śeṣaṃ ca haviṣas tasya prāśyāśāsyātmanaḥ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:352: dhyāyan nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ svāstīrṇe kuśasaṃstare // Ram_2,6.3
GE09ram_02_u:354: śrīmaty āyatane viṣṇoḥ śiśye naravarātmajaḥ // Ram_2,6.4
GE09ram_02_u:358: pūrvāṃ saṃdhyām upāsīno jajāpa yatamānasaḥ // Ram_2,6.6
GE09ram_02_u:363: kṛtopavāsaṃ tu tadā vaidehyā saha rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:364: ayodhyānilayaḥ śrutvā sarvaḥ pramudito janaḥ // Ram_2,6.9
GE09ram_02_u:366: prabhātāṃ rajanīṃ dṛṣṭvā cakre śobhāṃ parāṃ punaḥ // Ram_2,6.10
GE09ram_02_u:368: catuṣpatheṣu rathyāsu caityeṣv aṭṭālakeṣu ca // Ram_2,6.11
GE09ram_02_u:370: kuṭumbināṃ samṛddheṣu śrīmatsu bhavaneṣu ca // Ram_2,6.12
GE09ram_02_u:371: sabhāsu caiva sarvāsu vṛkṣeṣv ālakṣiteṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:372: dhvajāḥ samucchritāś citrāḥ patākāś cābhavaṃs tadā // Ram_2,6.13
GE09ram_02_u:374: manaḥkarṇasukhā vācaḥ śuśruvuś ca tatas tataḥ // Ram_2,6.14
GE09ram_02_u:375: rāmābhiṣekayuktāś ca kathāś cakrur mitho janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:376: rāmābhiṣeke samprāpte catvareṣu gṛheṣu ca // Ram_2,6.15
GE09ram_02_u:378: rāmābhiṣekasaṃyuktāś cakrur eva mithaḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,6.16
GE09ram_02_u:380: rājamārgaḥ kṛtaḥ śrīmān paurai rāmābhiṣecane // Ram_2,6.17
GE09ram_02_u:382: dīpavṛkṣāṃs tathā cakrur anu rathyāsu sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,6.18
GE09ram_02_u:385: sametya saṃghaśaḥ sarve catvareṣu sabhāsu ca
GE09ram_02_u:386: kathayanto mithas tatra praśaśaṃsur janādhipam // Ram_2,6.20
GE09ram_02_u:388: jñātvā yo vṛddham ātmānaṃ rāmaṃ rājye 'hbiṣekṣyati // Ram_2,6.21
GE09ram_02_u:389: sarve hy anugṛhītāḥ sma yan no rāmo mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:392: yathā ca bhrātṛṣu snigdhas tathāsmāsv api rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,6.23
GE09ram_02_u:396: digbhyo 'pi śrutavṛttāntāḥ prāptā jānapadā janāḥ // Ram_2,6.25
GE09ram_02_u:397: te tu digbhyaḥ purīṃ prāptā draṣṭuṃ rāmābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:398: rāmasya pūrayāmāsuḥ purīṃ jānapadā janāḥ // Ram_2,6.26
GE09ram_02_u:399: janaughais tair visarpadbhiḥ śuśruve tatra nisvanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:401: tatas tad indrakṣayasaṃnibhaṃ puraṃ didṛkṣubhir jānapadair upāgataiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:402: samantataḥ sasvanam ākulaṃ babhau samudrayādobhir ivārṇavodakam // Ram_2,6.28
GE09ram_02_u:403: jñātidāsī yato jātā kaikeyyās tu sahoṣitā
GE09ram_02_u:406: ayodhyāṃ mantharā tasmāt prāsādād anvavaikṣata // Ram_2,7.2
GE09ram_02_u:408: siktāṃ candanatoyaiś ca śiraḥsnātajanair vṛtām // Ram_2,7.3
GE09ram_02_u:409: avidūre sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhātrīṃ papraccha mantharā
GE09ram_02_u:411: rāmamātā dhanaṃ kiṃ nu janebhyaḥ samprayacchati
GE09ram_02_u:412: atimātraṃ praharṣo 'yaṃ kiṃ janasya ca śaṃsa me
GE09ram_02_u:413: kārayiṣyati kiṃ vāpi samprahṛṣṭo mahīpatiḥ // Ram_2,7.5
GE09ram_02_u:415: ācacakṣe 'tha kubjāyai bhūyasīṃ rāghave śriyam // Ram_2,7.6
GE09ram_02_u:418: dhātryās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā kubjā kṣipram amarṣitā
GE09ram_02_u:421: śayānām etya kaikeyīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,7.9
GE09ram_02_u:422: uttiṣṭha mūḍhe kiṃ śeṣe bhayaṃ tvām abhivartate
GE09ram_02_u:423: upaplutamahaughena kim ātmānaṃ na budhyase // Ram_2,7.10
GE09ram_02_u:425: calaṃ hi tava saubhāgyaṃ nadyāḥ srota ivoṣṇage // Ram_2,7.11
GE09ram_02_u:426: evam uktā tu kaikeyī ruṣṭayā paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:427: kubjayā pāpadarśinyā viṣādam agamat param // Ram_2,7.12
GE09ram_02_u:428: kaikeyī tv abravīt kubjāṃ kaccit kṣemaṃ na manthare
GE09ram_02_u:429: viṣaṇṇavadanāṃ hi tvāṃ lakṣaye bhṛśaduḥkhitām // Ram_2,7.13
GE09ram_02_u:430: mantharā tu vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyyā madhurākṣaram
GE09ram_02_u:432: sā viṣaṇṇatarā bhūtvā kubjā tasyā hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:433: viṣādayantī provāca bhedayantī ca rāghavam // Ram_2,7.15
GE09ram_02_u:438: tava duḥkhena kaikeyi mama duḥkhaṃ mahad bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:439: tvadvṛddhau mama vṛddhiś ca bhaved atra na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,7.18
GE09ram_02_u:441: ugratvaṃ rājadharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ devi na budhyase // Ram_2,7.19
GE09ram_02_u:442: dharmavādī śaṭho bhartā ślakṣṇavādī ca dāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:443: śuddhabhāve na jānīṣe tenaivam atisaṃdhitā // Ram_2,7.20
GE09ram_02_u:445: arthenaivādya te bhartā kausalyāṃ yojayiṣyati // Ram_2,7.21
GE09ram_02_u:446: apavāhya sa duṣṭātmā bharataṃ tava bandhuṣu
GE09ram_02_u:447: kālyaṃ sthāpayitā rāmaṃ rājye nihatakaṇṭake // Ram_2,7.22
GE09ram_02_u:449: āśīviṣa ivāṅkena bāle paridhṛtas tvayā // Ram_2,7.23
GE09ram_02_u:450: yathā hi kuryāt sarpo vā śatrur vā pratyupekṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:451: rājñā daśarathenādya saputrā tvaṃ tathā kṛtā // Ram_2,7.24
GE09ram_02_u:453: rāmaṃ sthāpayatā rājye sānubandhā hatā hy asi // Ram_2,7.25
GE09ram_02_u:454: sā prāptakālaṃ kaikeyi kṣipraṃ kuru hitaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:455: trāyasva putram ātmānaṃ māṃ ca vismayadarśane // Ram_2,7.26
GE09ram_02_u:456: mantharāyā vacaḥ śrutvā śayanāt sa śubhānanā
GE09ram_02_u:457: evam ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pradadau śubham // Ram_2,7.27
GE09ram_02_u:458: dattvā tv ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pramadottamā
GE09ram_02_u:459: kaikeyī mantharāṃ hṛṣṭā punar evābravīd idam // Ram_2,7.28
GE09ram_02_u:460: idaṃ tu manthare mahyam ākhyāsi paramaṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:461: etan me priyam ākhyātuḥ kiṃ vā bhūyaḥ karomi te // Ram_2,7.29
GE09ram_02_u:462: rāme vā bharate vāhaṃ viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:463: tasmāt tuṣṭāsmi yad rājā rāmaṃ rājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // Ram_2,7.30
GE09ram_02_u:464: na me paraṃ kiṃcid itas tvayā punaḥ priyaṃ priyārhe suvacaṃ vaco varam
GE09ram_02_u:465: tathā hy avocas tvam ataḥ priyottaraṃ varaṃ paraṃ te pradadāmi taṃ vṛṇu // Ram_2,7.31
GE09ram_02_u:466: mantharā tv abhyasūyyainām utsṛjyābharaṇaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_02_u:468: harṣaṃ kim idam asthāne kṛtavaty asi bāliśe
GE09ram_02_u:471: yauvarājyena mahatā śvaḥ puṣyeṇa dvijottamaiḥ // Ram_2,8.3
GE09ram_02_u:472: prāptāṃ sumahatīṃ prītiṃ pratītāṃ tāṃ hatadviṣam
GE09ram_02_u:473: upasthāsyasi kausalyāṃ dāsīva tvaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // Ram_2,8.4
GE09ram_02_u:474: hṛṣṭāḥ khalu bhaviṣyanti rāmasya paramāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:475: aprahṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti snuṣās te bharatakṣaye // Ram_2,8.5
GE09ram_02_u:476: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītāṃ bruvantīṃ mantharāṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:477: rāmasyaiva guṇān devī kaikeyī praśaśaṃsa ha // Ram_2,8.6
GE09ram_02_u:478: dharmajño gurubhir dāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:479: rāmo rājñaḥ suto jyeṣṭho yauvarājyam ato 'rhati // Ram_2,8.7
GE09ram_02_u:480: bhrātṝn bhṛtyāṃś ca dīrghāyuḥ pitṛvat pālayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:481: saṃtapyase kathaṃ kubje śrutvā rāmābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,8.8
GE09ram_02_u:482: bharataś cāpi rāmasya dhruvaṃ varṣaśatāt param
GE09ram_02_u:484: sā tvam abhyudaye prāpte vartamāne ca manthare
GE09ram_02_u:486: kausalyāto 'tiriktaṃ ca sa tu śuśrūṣate hi mām // Ram_2,8.10
GE09ram_02_u:488: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,8.11
GE09ram_02_u:491: bhavitā rāghavo rājā rāghavasya ca yaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:492: rājavaṃśāt tu bharataḥ kaikeyi parihāsyate // Ram_2,8.13
GE09ram_02_u:493: na hi rājñaḥ sutāḥ sarve rājye tiṣṭhanti bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:494: sthāpyamāneṣu sarveṣu sumahān anayo bhavet // Ram_2,8.14
GE09ram_02_u:495: tasmāj jyeṣṭhe hi kaikeyi rājyatantrāṇi pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:496: sthāpayanty anavadyāṅgi guṇavatsv itareṣv api // Ram_2,8.15
GE09ram_02_u:498: anāthavat sukhebhyaś ca rājavaṃśāc ca vatsale // Ram_2,8.16
GE09ram_02_u:499: sāhaṃ tvadarthe samprāptā tvaṃ tu māṃ nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_02_u:500: sapatnivṛddhau yā me tvaṃ pradeyaṃ dātum icchasi // Ram_2,8.17
GE09ram_02_u:501: dhruvaṃ tu bharataṃ rāmaḥ prāpya rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:502: deśāntaraṃ nāyayitvā lokāntaram athāpi vā // Ram_2,8.18
GE09ram_02_u:503: bāla eva hi mātulyaṃ bharato nāyitas tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:504: saṃnikarṣāc ca sauhārdaṃ jāyate sthāvareṣv api // Ram_2,8.19
GE09ram_02_u:505: goptā hi rāmaṃ saumitrir lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:506: aśvinor iva saubhrātraṃ tayor lokeṣu viśrutam // Ram_2,8.20
GE09ram_02_u:507: tasmān na lakṣmaṇe rāmaḥ pāpaṃ kiṃcit kariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:508: rāmas tu bharate pāpaṃ kuryād iti na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,8.21
GE09ram_02_u:509: tasmād rājagṛhād eva vanaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:510: etaddhi rocate mahyaṃ bhṛśaṃ cāpi hitaṃ tava // Ram_2,8.22
GE09ram_02_u:511: evaṃ te jñātipakṣasya śreyaś caiva bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:512: yadi ced bharato dharmāt pitryaṃ rājyam avāpsyati // Ram_2,8.23
GE09ram_02_u:513: sa te sukhocito bālo rāmasya sahajo ripuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:514: samṛddhārthasya naṣṭārtho jīviṣyati kathaṃ vaśe // Ram_2,8.24
GE09ram_02_u:516: pracchādyamānaṃ rāmeṇa bharataṃ trātum arhasi // Ram_2,8.25
GE09ram_02_u:518: rāmamātā sapatnī te kathaṃ vairaṃ na yātayet // Ram_2,8.26
GE09ram_02_u:519: yadā hi rāmaḥ pṛthivīm avāpsyati dhruvaṃ pranaṣṭo bharato bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:520: ato hi saṃcintaya rājyam ātmaje parasya cādyaiva vivāsakāraṇam // Ram_2,8.27
GE09ram_02_u:521: evam uktā tu kaikeyī krodhena jvalitānanā
GE09ram_02_u:522: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya mantharām idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.1
GE09ram_02_u:523: adya rāmam itaḥ kṣipraṃ vanaṃ prasthāpayāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:525: idaṃ tv idānīṃ saṃpaśya kenopāyena manthare
GE09ram_02_u:526: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃcana // Ram_2,9.3
GE09ram_02_u:527: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:528: rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.4
GE09ram_02_u:529: hantedānīṃ pravakṣyāmi kaikeyi śrūyatāṃ ca me
GE09ram_02_u:530: yathā te bharato rājyaṃ putraḥ prāpsyati kevalam // Ram_2,9.5
GE09ram_02_u:531: śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasyā mantharāyās tu kaikayī
GE09ram_02_u:532: kiṃcid utthāya śayanāt svāstīrṇād idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.6
GE09ram_02_u:534: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃcana // Ram_2,9.7
GE09ram_02_u:535: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:536: rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kubjā vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,9.8
GE09ram_02_u:537: tava devāsure yuddhe saha rājarṣibhiḥ patiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:538: agacchat tvām upādāya devarājasya sāhyakṛt // Ram_2,9.9
GE09ram_02_u:539: diśam āsthāya kaikeyi dakṣiṇāṃ daṇḍakān prati
GE09ram_02_u:540: vaijayantam iti khyātaṃ puraṃ yatra timidhvajaḥ // Ram_2,9.10
GE09ram_02_u:541: sa śambara iti khyātaḥ śatamāyo mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:542: dadau śakrasya saṃgrāmaṃ devasaṃghair anirjitaḥ // Ram_2,9.11
GE09ram_02_u:543: tasmin mahati saṃgrāme rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:544: apavāhya tvayā devi saṃgrāmān naṣṭacetanaḥ // Ram_2,9.12
GE09ram_02_u:545: tatrāpi vikṣataḥ śastraiḥ patis te rakṣitas tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:546: tuṣṭena tena dattau te dvau varau śubhadarśane // Ram_2,9.13
GE09ram_02_u:547: sa tvayoktaḥ patir devi yadeccheyaṃ tadā varau
GE09ram_02_u:548: gṛhṇīyām iti tat tena tathety uktaṃ mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:549: anabhijñā hy ahaṃ devi tvayaiva kathitaṃ purā // Ram_2,9.14
GE09ram_02_u:551: pravrājanaṃ ca rāmasya tvaṃ varṣāṇi caturdaśa // Ram_2,9.15
GE09ram_02_u:554: mā smainaṃ pratyudīkṣethā mā cainam abhibhāṣathāḥ // Ram_2,9.16
GE09ram_02_u:555: dayitā tvaṃ sadā bhartur atra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:556: tvatkṛte ca mahārājo viśed api hutāśanam // Ram_2,9.17
GE09ram_02_u:557: na tvāṃ krodhayituṃ śakto na kruddhāṃ pratyudīkṣitum
GE09ram_02_u:558: tava priyārthaṃ rājā hi prāṇān api parityajet // Ram_2,9.18
GE09ram_02_u:559: na hy atikramituṃ śaktas tava vākyaṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:562: dadyād daśaratho rājā mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ // Ram_2,9.20
GE09ram_02_u:563: yau tau devāsure yuddhe varau daśaratho 'dadāt
GE09ram_02_u:564: tau smāraya mahābhāge so 'rtho mā tvām atikramet // Ram_2,9.21
GE09ram_02_u:565: yadā tu te varaṃ dadyāt svayam utthāpya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:566: vyavasthāpya mahārājaṃ tvam imaṃ vṛṇuyā varam // Ram_2,9.22
GE09ram_02_u:567: rāmaṃ pravrājayāraṇye nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:568: bharataḥ kriyatāṃ rājā pṛthivyāṃ pārthivarṣabhaḥ // Ram_2,9.23
GE09ram_02_u:570: bharataś ca hatāmitras tava rājā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,9.24
GE09ram_02_u:571: yena kālena rāmaś ca vanāt pratyāgamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:572: tena kālena putras te kṛtamūlo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:573: saṃgṛhītamanuṣyaś ca suhṛdbhiḥ sārdham ātmavān // Ram_2,9.25
GE09ram_02_u:574: prāptakālaṃ tu te manye rājānaṃ vītasādhvasā
GE09ram_02_u:576: anartham artharūpeṇa grāhitā sā tatas tayā
GE09ram_02_u:577: hṛṣṭā pratītā kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.27
GE09ram_02_u:579: pṛthivyām asi kubjānām uttamā buddhiniścaye // Ram_2,9.28
GE09ram_02_u:580: tvam eva tu mamārtheṣu nityayuktā hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:581: nāhaṃ samavabudhyeyaṃ kubje rājñaś cikīrṣitam // Ram_2,9.29
GE09ram_02_u:583: tvaṃ padmam iva vātena saṃnatā priyadarśanā // Ram_2,9.30
GE09ram_02_u:584: uras te 'bhiniviṣṭaṃ vai yāvat skandhāt samunnatam
GE09ram_02_u:585: adhastāc codaraṃ śāntaṃ sunābham iva lajjitam // Ram_2,9.31
GE09ram_02_u:587: jaṅghe bhṛśam upanyaste pādau cāpy āyatāv ubhau // Ram_2,9.32
GE09ram_02_u:589: agrato mama gacchantī rājahaṃsīva rājase // Ram_2,9.33
GE09ram_02_u:590: tavedaṃ sthagu yad dīrghaṃ rathaghoṇam ivāyatam
GE09ram_02_u:591: matayaḥ kṣatravidyāś ca māyāś cātra vasanti te // Ram_2,9.34
GE09ram_02_u:592: atra te pratimokṣyāmi mālāṃ kubje hiraṇmayīm
GE09ram_02_u:593: abhiṣikte ca bharate rāghave ca vanaṃ gate // Ram_2,9.35
GE09ram_02_u:595: labdhārthā ca pratītā ca lepayiṣyāmi te sthagu // Ram_2,9.36
GE09ram_02_u:596: mukhe ca tilakaṃ citraṃ jātarūpamayaṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:597: kārayiṣyāmi te kubje śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // Ram_2,9.37
GE09ram_02_u:600: gamiṣyasi gatiṃ mukhyāṃ garvayantī dviṣajjanam // Ram_2,9.38
GE09ram_02_u:602: pādau paricariṣyanti yathaiva tvaṃ sadā mama // Ram_2,9.39
GE09ram_02_u:603: iti praśasyamānā sā kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:604: śayānāṃ śayane śubhre vedyām agniśikhām iva // Ram_2,9.40
GE09ram_02_u:606: uttiṣṭha kuru kalyāṇaṃ rājānam anudarśaya // Ram_2,9.41
GE09ram_02_u:607: tathā protsāhitā devī gatvā mantharayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:610: avamucya varārhāṇi śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // Ram_2,9.43
GE09ram_02_u:611: tato hemopamā tatra kubjā vākyavaśaṃ gatā
GE09ram_02_u:612: saṃviśya bhūmau kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.44
GE09ram_02_u:613: iha vā māṃ mṛtāṃ kubje nṛpāyāvedayiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:614: vanaṃ tu rāghave prāpte bharataḥ prāpsyati kṣitim // Ram_2,9.45
GE09ram_02_u:615: athaitad uktvā vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ nidhāya sarvābharaṇāni bhāminī
GE09ram_02_u:616: asaṃvṛtām āstaraṇena medinīṃ tadādhiśiśye patiteva kiṃnarī // Ram_2,9.46
GE09ram_02_u:618: narendrapatnī vimanā babhūva sā tamovṛtā dyaur iva magnatārakā // Ram_2,9.47
GE09ram_02_u:620: priyārhāṃ priyam ākhyātuṃ viveśāntaḥpuraṃ vaśī // Ram_2,10.1
GE09ram_02_u:621: tāṃ tatra patitāṃ bhūmau śayānām atathocitām
GE09ram_02_u:622: pratapta iva duḥkhena so 'paśyaj jagatīpatiḥ // Ram_2,10.2
GE09ram_02_u:623: sa vṛddhas taruṇīṃ bhāryāṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
GE09ram_02_u:625: kareṇum iva digdhena viddhāṃ mṛgayuṇā vane
GE09ram_02_u:626: mahāgaja ivāraṇye snehāt parimamarśa tām // Ram_2,10.4
GE09ram_02_u:628: kāmī kamalapattrākṣīm uvāca vanitām idam // Ram_2,10.5
GE09ram_02_u:629: na te 'ham abhijānāmi krodham ātmani saṃśritam
GE09ram_02_u:630: devi kenābhiyuktāsi kena vāsi vimānitā // Ram_2,10.6
GE09ram_02_u:631: yad idaṃ mama duḥkhāya śeṣe kalyāṇi pāṃsuṣu
GE09ram_02_u:632: bhūmau śeṣe kimarthaṃ tvaṃ mayi kalyāṇacetasi
GE09ram_02_u:634: santi me kuśalā vaidyā abhituṣṭāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:635: sukhitāṃ tvāṃ kariṣyanti vyādhim ācakṣva bhāmini // Ram_2,10.8
GE09ram_02_u:636: kasya vā te priyaṃ kāryaṃ kena vā vipriyaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:637: kaḥ priyaṃ labhatām adya ko vā sumahad apriyam // Ram_2,10.9
GE09ram_02_u:638: avadhyo vadhyatāṃ ko vā vadhyaḥ ko vā vimucyatām
GE09ram_02_u:639: daridraḥ ko bhavatv āḍhyo dravyavān vāpy akiñcanaḥ // Ram_2,10.10
GE09ram_02_u:640: ahaṃ caiva madīyāś ca sarve tava vaśānugāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:641: na te kaṃcid abhiprāyaṃ vyāhantum aham utsahe // Ram_2,10.11
GE09ram_02_u:643: yāvad āvartate cakraṃ tāvatī me vasuṃdharā // Ram_2,10.12
GE09ram_02_u:644: tathoktā sā samāśvastā vaktukāmā tad apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:646: nāsmi viprakṛtā deva kenacin na vimānitā
GE09ram_02_u:647: abhiprāyas tu me kaścit tam icchāmi tvayā kṛtam // Ram_2,10.14
GE09ram_02_u:648: pratijñāṃ pratijānīṣva yadi tvaṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:649: atha tad vyāhariṣyāmi yad abhiprārthitaṃ mayā // Ram_2,10.15
GE09ram_02_u:650: evam uktas tayā rājā priyayā strīvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:651: tām uvāca mahātejāḥ kaikeyīm īṣadutsmitaḥ // Ram_2,10.16
GE09ram_02_u:652: avalipte na jānāsi tvattaḥ priyataro mama
GE09ram_02_u:653: manujo manujavyāghrād rāmād anyo na vidyate // Ram_2,10.17
GE09ram_02_u:654: bhadre hṛdayam apy etad anumṛśyoddharasva me
GE09ram_02_u:655: etat samīkṣya kaikeyi brūhi yat sādhu manyase // Ram_2,10.18
GE09ram_02_u:656: balam ātmani paśyantī na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:657: kariṣyāmi tava prītiṃ sukṛtenāpi te śape // Ram_2,10.19
GE09ram_02_u:658: tena vākyena saṃhṛṣṭā tam abhiprāyam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:660: yathākrameṇa śapasi varaṃ mama dadāsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:661: tac chṛṇvantu trayastriṃśad devāḥ sendrapurogamāḥ // Ram_2,10.21
GE09ram_02_u:662: candrādityau nabhaś caiva grahā rātryahanī diśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:663: jagac ca pṛthivī caiva sagandharvā sarākṣasā // Ram_2,10.22
GE09ram_02_u:665: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni jānīyur bhāṣitaṃ tava // Ram_2,10.23
GE09ram_02_u:667: varaṃ mama dadāty eṣa tan me śṛṇvantu devatāḥ // Ram_2,10.24
GE09ram_02_u:669: tataḥ param uvācedaṃ varadaṃ kāmamohitam // Ram_2,10.25
GE09ram_02_u:670: varau yau me tvayā deva tadā dattau mahīpate
GE09ram_02_u:671: tau tāvad aham adyaiva vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me vacaḥ // Ram_2,10.26
GE09ram_02_u:674: nava pañca ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:677: adya caiva hi paśyeyaṃ prayāntaṃ rāghavaṃ vane // Ram_2,10.29
GE09ram_02_u:678: tataḥ śrutvā mahārāja kaikeyyā dāruṇaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:679: vyathito vilavaś caiva vyāghrīṃ dṛṣṭvā yathā mṛgaḥ // Ram_2,10.30
GE09ram_02_u:681: aho dhig iti sāmarṣo vācam uktvā narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:683: cireṇa tu nṛpaḥ saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:684: kaikeyīm abravīt kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣā // Ram_2,10.32
GE09ram_02_u:686: kiṃ kṛtaṃ tava rāmeṇa pāpe pāpaṃ mayāpi vā // Ram_2,10.33
GE09ram_02_u:687: sadā te jananītulyāṃ vṛttiṃ vahati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:688: tasyaiva tvam anarthāya kiṃnimittam ihodyatā // Ram_2,10.34
GE09ram_02_u:690: avijñānān nṛpasutā vyālī tīkṣṇaviṣā yathā // Ram_2,10.35
GE09ram_02_u:692: aparādhaṃ kam uddiśya tyakṣyāmīṣṭam ahaṃ sutam // Ram_2,10.36
GE09ram_02_u:693: kausalyāṃ vā sumitrāṃ vā tyajeyam api vā śriyam
GE09ram_02_u:694: jīvitaṃ vātmano rāmaṃ na tv eva pitṛvatsalam // Ram_2,10.37
GE09ram_02_u:695: parā bhavati me prītir dṛṣṭvā tanayam agrajam
GE09ram_02_u:696: apaśyatas tu me rāmaṃ naṣṭā bhavati cetanā // Ram_2,10.38
GE09ram_02_u:697: tiṣṭhel loko vinā sūryaṃ sasyaṃ vā salilaṃ vinā
GE09ram_02_u:698: na tu rāmaṃ vinā dehe tiṣṭhet tu mama jīvitam // Ram_2,10.39
GE09ram_02_u:699: tad alaṃ tyajyatām eṣa niścayaḥ pāpaniścaye
GE09ram_02_u:700: api te caraṇau mūrdhnā spṛśāmy eṣa prasīda me // Ram_2,10.40
GE09ram_02_u:701: sa bhūmipālo vilapann anāthavat striyā gṛhīto hṛdaye 'timātrayā
GE09ram_02_u:702: papāta devyāś caraṇau prasāritāv ubhāv asaṃspṛśya yathāturas tathā // Ram_2,10.41
GE09ram_02_u:704: yayātim iva puṇyānte devalokāt paricyutam // Ram_2,11.1
GE09ram_02_u:706: punar ākārayāmāsa tam eva varam aṅganā // Ram_2,11.2
GE09ram_02_u:708: mama cemaṃ varaṃ kasmād vidhārayitum icchasi // Ram_2,11.3
GE09ram_02_u:709: evam uktas tu kaikeyyā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:710: pratyuvāca tataḥ kruddho muhūrtaṃ vihvalann iva // Ram_2,11.4
GE09ram_02_u:711: mṛte mayi gate rāme vanaṃ manujapuṃgave
GE09ram_02_u:712: hantānārye mamāmitre rāmaḥ pravrājito vanam // Ram_2,11.5
GE09ram_02_u:713: yadi satyaṃ bravīmy etat tad asatyaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:714: akīrtir atulā loke dhruvaṃ paribhavaś ca me // Ram_2,11.6
GE09ram_02_u:716: astam abhyagamat sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata // Ram_2,11.7
GE09ram_02_u:718: rājño vilapamānasya na vyabhāsata śarvarī // Ram_2,11.8
GE09ram_02_u:722: atha vā gamyatāṃ śīghraṃ nāham icchāmi nirghṛṇām
GE09ram_02_u:723: nṛśaṃsāṃ kaikeyīṃ draṣṭuṃ yat kṛte vyasanaṃ mahat // Ram_2,11.10
GE09ram_02_u:724: evam uktvā tato rājā kaikeyīṃ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:725: prasādayāmāsa punaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,11.11
GE09ram_02_u:727: prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ devi bhadre rājño viśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,11.12
GE09ram_02_u:729: kuru sādhu prasādaṃ me bāle sahṛdayā hy asi // Ram_2,11.13
GE09ram_02_u:731: śrutvā vicitraṃ karuṇaṃ vilāpaṃ bhartur nṛśaṃsā na cakāra vākyam // Ram_2,11.14
GE09ram_02_u:732: tataḥ sa rājā punar eva mūrchitaḥ priyām atuṣṭāṃ pratikūlabhāṣiṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:733: samīkṣya putrasya vivāsanaṃ prati kṣitau visaṃjño nipapāta duḥkhitaḥ // Ram_2,11.15
GE09ram_02_u:735: viveṣṭamānam udīkṣya saikṣvākam idam abravīt // Ram_2,12.1
GE09ram_02_u:736: pāpaṃ kṛtveva kim idaṃ mama saṃśrutya saṃśravam
GE09ram_02_u:737: śeṣe kṣititale sannaḥ sthityāṃ sthātuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_2,12.2
GE09ram_02_u:738: āhuḥ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ dharmavido janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:739: satyam āśritya hi mayā tvaṃ ca dharmaṃ pracoditaḥ // Ram_2,12.3
GE09ram_02_u:740: saṃśrutya śaibyaḥ śyenāya svāṃ tanuṃ jagatīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:741: pradāya pakṣiṇo rājañ jagāma gatim uttamām // Ram_2,12.4
GE09ram_02_u:742: tathā hy alarkas tejasvī brāhmaṇe vedapārage
GE09ram_02_u:743: yācamāne svake netre uddhṛtyāvimanā dadau // Ram_2,12.5
GE09ram_02_u:744: saritāṃ tu patiḥ svalpāṃ maryādāṃ satyam anvitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:745: satyānurodhāt samaye velāṃ svāṃ nātivartate // Ram_2,12.6
GE09ram_02_u:746: samayaṃ ca mamāryemaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:747: agratas te parityaktā parityakṣyāmi jīvitam // Ram_2,12.7
GE09ram_02_u:749: nāśakat pāśam unmoktuṃ balir indrakṛtaṃ yathā // Ram_2,12.8
GE09ram_02_u:751: sa dhuryo vai parispandan yugacakrāntaraṃ yathā // Ram_2,12.9
GE09ram_02_u:752: vihvalābhyāṃ ca netrābhyām apaśyann iva bhūmipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:753: kṛcchrād dhairyeṇa saṃstabhya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,12.10
GE09ram_02_u:754: yas te mantrakṛtaḥ pāṇir agnau pāpe mayā dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:755: taṃ tyajāmi svajaṃ caiva tava putraṃ saha tvayā // Ram_2,12.11
GE09ram_02_u:757: uvāca paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ vākyajñā roṣamūrchitā // Ram_2,12.12
GE09ram_02_u:758: kim idaṃ bhāṣase rājan vākyaṃ gararujopamam
GE09ram_02_u:759: ānāyayitum akliṣṭaṃ putraṃ rāmam ihārhasi // Ram_2,12.13
GE09ram_02_u:760: sthāpya rājye mama sutaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ vanecaram
GE09ram_02_u:761: niḥsapatnāṃ ca māṃ kṛtvā kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi // Ram_2,12.14
GE09ram_02_u:762: sa nunna iva tīkṣṇeṇa pratodena hayottamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:763: rājā pracodito 'bhīkṣṇaṃ kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,12.15
GE09ram_02_u:764: dharmabandhena baddho 'smi naṣṭā ca mama cetanā
GE09ram_02_u:765: jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ priyaṃ rāmaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi dhārmikam // Ram_2,12.16
GE09ram_02_u:766: iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyī tadanantaram
GE09ram_02_u:767: svayam evābravīt sūtaṃ gaccha tvaṃ rāmam ānaya // Ram_2,12.17
GE09ram_02_u:768: tataḥ sa rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sannaharṣaḥ sutaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:770: sumantraḥ karuṇaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā dīnaṃ ca pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:771: pragṛhītāñjaliḥ kiṃcit tasmād deśād apākraman // Ram_2,12.19
GE09ram_02_u:772: yadā vaktuṃ svayaṃ dainyān na śaśāka mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:773: tadā sumantraṃ mantrajñā kaikeyī pratyuvāca ha // Ram_2,12.20
GE09ram_02_u:774: sumantra rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi śīghram ānaya sundaram
GE09ram_02_u:775: sa manyamānaḥ kalyāṇaṃ hṛdayena nananda ca // Ram_2,12.21
GE09ram_02_u:778: iti sūto matiṃ kṛtvā harṣeṇa mahatā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:780: tataḥ purastāt sahasā vinirgato mahīpatīn dvāragatān vilokayan
GE09ram_02_u:781: dadarśa paurān vividhān mahādhanān upasthitān dvāram upetya viṣṭhitān // Ram_2,12.24
GE09ram_02_u:782: te tu tāṃ rajanīm uṣya brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:784: amātyā balamukhyāś ca mukhyā ye nigamasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:789: rāmaś ca samyagāstīrṇo bhāsvatā vyāghracarmaṇā // Ram_2,13.4
GE09ram_02_u:791: yāś cānyāḥ saritaḥ puṇyā hradāḥ kūpāḥ sarāṃsi ca // Ram_2,13.5
GE09ram_02_u:793: tābhyaś caivāhṛtaṃ toyaṃ samudrebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,13.6
GE09ram_02_u:794: kṣaudraṃ dadhighṛtaṃ lājā darbhāḥ sumanasaḥ payaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:798: sajjaṃ tiṣṭhati rāmasya vālavyajanam uttamam // Ram_2,13.8
GE09ram_02_u:801: pāṇḍuraś ca vṛṣaḥ sajjaḥ pāṇḍurāśvaś ca susthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:802: prasrutaś ca gajaḥ śrīmān aupavāhyaḥ pratīkṣate // Ram_2,13.10
GE09ram_02_u:804: vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi bandinaś ca tathāpare // Ram_2,13.11
GE09ram_02_u:808: apaśyanto 'bruvan ko nu rājño naḥ prativedayet // Ram_2,13.13
GE09ram_02_u:809: na paśyāmaś ca rājānam uditaś ca divākaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:810: yauvarājyābhiṣekaś ca sajjo rāmasya dhīmataḥ // Ram_2,13.14
GE09ram_02_u:812: abravīt tān idaṃ sarvān sumantro rājasatkṛtaḥ // Ram_2,13.15
GE09ram_02_u:813: ayaṃ pṛcchāmi vacanāt sukham āyuṣmatām aham
GE09ram_02_u:817: gatā bhagavatī rātrir ahaḥ śivam upasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:818: budhyasva nṛpaśārdūla kuru kāryam anantaram // Ram_2,13.18
GE09ram_02_u:819: brāhmaṇā balamukhyāś ca naigamāś cāgatā nṛpa
GE09ram_02_u:821: stuvantaṃ taṃ tadā sūtaṃ sumantraṃ mantrakovidam
GE09ram_02_u:822: pratibudhya tato rājā idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,13.20
GE09ram_02_u:823: na caiva saṃprasupto 'ham ānayed āśu rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:824: iti rājā daśarathaḥ sūtaṃ tatrānvaśāt punaḥ // Ram_2,13.21
GE09ram_02_u:825: sa rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śirasā pratipūjya tam
GE09ram_02_u:826: nirjagāma nṛpāvāsān manyamānaḥ priyaṃ mahat // Ram_2,13.22
GE09ram_02_u:828: sa sūtas tatra śuśrāva rāmādhikaraṇāḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,13.23
GE09ram_02_u:835: sa vājiyuktena rathena sārathir narākulaṃ rājakulaṃ vilokayan
GE09ram_02_u:836: tataḥ samāsādya mahādhanaṃ mahat prahṛṣṭaromā sa babhūva sārathiḥ // Ram_2,13.27
GE09ram_02_u:838: avāryamāṇaḥ praviveśa sārathiḥ prabhūtaratnaṃ makaro yathārṇavam // Ram_2,13.28
GE09ram_02_u:840: praviviktāṃ tataḥ kakṣyām āsasāda purāṇavit // Ram_2,14.1
GE09ram_02_u:844: dadarśa viṣṭhitān dvāri stryadhyakṣān susamāhitān // Ram_2,14.3
GE09ram_02_u:850: dadarśa sūtaḥ paryaṅke sauvarṇe sottaracchade // Ram_2,14.6
GE09ram_02_u:854: upetaṃ sītayā bhūyaś citrayā śaśinaṃ yathā // Ram_2,14.8
GE09ram_02_u:856: vavande varadaṃ bandī niyamajño vinītavat // Ram_2,14.9
GE09ram_02_u:859: kausalyā suprabhā deva pitā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:860: mahiṣyā saha kaikeyyā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // Ram_2,14.11
GE09ram_02_u:861: evam uktas tu saṃhṛṣṭo narasiṃho mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:862: tataḥ saṃmānayāmāsa sītām idam uvāca ha // Ram_2,14.12
GE09ram_02_u:863: devi devaś ca devī ca samāgamya madantare
GE09ram_02_u:867: yādṛśī pariṣat tatra tādṛśo dūta āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:868: dhruvam adyaiva māṃ rājā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // Ram_2,14.15
GE09ram_02_u:869: hanta śīghram ito gatvā drakṣyāmi ca mahīpatim
GE09ram_02_u:870: saha tvaṃ parivāreṇa sukham āsva ramasva ca // Ram_2,14.16
GE09ram_02_u:873: sa sarvān arthino dṛṣṭvā sametya pratinandya ca
GE09ram_02_u:878: prayayau tūrṇam āsthāya rāghavo jvalitaḥ śriyā // Ram_2,14.20
GE09ram_02_u:880: niketān niryayau śrīmān mahābhrād iva candramāḥ // Ram_2,14.21
GE09ram_02_u:882: jugopa bhrātaraṃ bhrātā ratham āsthāya pṛṣṭhataḥ // Ram_2,14.22
GE09ram_02_u:885: sa rāghavas tatra kathāpralāpaṃ śuśrāva lokasya samāgatasya
GE09ram_02_u:886: ātmādhikārā vividhāś ca vācaḥ prahṛṣṭarūpasya pure janasya // Ram_2,14.24
GE09ram_02_u:887: eṣa śriyaṃ gacchati rāghavo 'dya rājaprasādād vipulāṅgam iṣyan
GE09ram_02_u:888: ete vayaṃ sarvasamṛddhakāmā yeṣām ayaṃ no bhavitā praśāstā
GE09ram_02_u:889: lābho janasyāsya yad eṣa sarvaṃ prapatsyate rāṣṭram idaṃ cirāya // Ram_2,14.25
GE09ram_02_u:890: sa ghoṣavadbhiś ca hayaiḥ sanāgaiḥ puraḥsaraiḥ svastikasūtamāgadhaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:891: mahīyamānaḥ pravaraiś ca vādakair abhiṣṭuto vaiśravaṇo yathā yayau // Ram_2,14.26
GE09ram_02_u:893: prabhūtaratnaṃ bahupaṇyasaṃcayaṃ dadarśa rāmo ruciraṃ mahāpatham // Ram_2,14.27
GE09ram_02_u:899: saṃvṛtaṃ vividhaiḥ paṇyair bhakṣyair uccāvacair api // Ram_2,15.3
GE09ram_02_u:901: yathārhaṃ cāpi sampūjya sarvān eva narān yayau // Ram_2,15.4
GE09ram_02_u:904: yathā sma lālitāḥ pitrā yathā pūrvaiḥ pitāmahaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:905: tataḥ sukhataraṃ sarve rāme vatsyāma rājani // Ram_2,15.6
GE09ram_02_u:906: alam adya hi bhuktena paramārthair alaṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:907: yathā paśyāma niryāntaṃ rāmaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhitam // Ram_2,15.7
GE09ram_02_u:908: ato hi na priyataraṃ nānyat kiṃcid bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:910: etāś cānyāś ca suhṛdām udāsīnaḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:911: ātmasaṃpūjanīḥ śṛṇvan yayau rāmo mahāpatham // Ram_2,15.9
GE09ram_02_u:912: na hi tasmān manaḥ kaścic cakṣuṣī vā narottamāt
GE09ram_02_u:913: naraḥ śaknoty apākraṣṭum atikrānte 'pi rāghave // Ram_2,15.10
GE09ram_02_u:914: sarveṣāṃ sa hi dharmātmā varṇānāṃ kurute dayām
GE09ram_02_u:915: caturṇāṃ hi vayaḥsthānāṃ tena te tam anuvratāḥ // Ram_2,15.11
GE09ram_02_u:917: rājaputraḥ pitur veśma praviveśa śriyā jvalan // Ram_2,15.12
GE09ram_02_u:919: saṃnivartya janaṃ sarvaṃ śuddhāntaḥpuram abhyagāt // Ram_2,15.13
GE09ram_02_u:920: tataḥ praviṣṭe pitur antikaṃ tadā janaḥ sa sarvo mudito nṛpātmaje
GE09ram_02_u:921: pratīkṣate tasya punaḥ sma nirgamaṃ yathodayaṃ candramasaḥ saritpatiḥ // Ram_2,15.14
GE09ram_02_u:922: sa dadarśāsane rāmo niṣaṇṇaṃ pitaraṃ śubhe
GE09ram_02_u:924: sa pituś caraṇau pūrvam abhivādya vinītavat
GE09ram_02_u:925: tato vavande caraṇau kaikeyyāḥ susamāhitaḥ // Ram_2,16.2
GE09ram_02_u:927: śaśāka nṛpatir dīno nekṣituṃ nābhibhāṣitum // Ram_2,16.3
GE09ram_02_u:928: tad apūrvaṃ narapater dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ bhayāvaham
GE09ram_02_u:929: rāmo 'pi bhayam āpannaḥ padā spṛṣṭveva pannagam // Ram_2,16.4
GE09ram_02_u:933: upaplutam ivādityam uktānṛtam ṛṣiṃ yathā // Ram_2,16.6
GE09ram_02_u:934: acintyakalpaṃ hi pitus taṃ śokam upadhārayan
GE09ram_02_u:935: babhūva saṃrabdhataraḥ samudra iva parvaṇi // Ram_2,16.7
GE09ram_02_u:936: cintayāmāsa ca tadā rāmaḥ pitṛhite rataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:937: kiṃsvid adyaiva nṛpatir na māṃ pratyabhinandati // Ram_2,16.8
GE09ram_02_u:938: anyadā māṃ pitā dṛṣṭvā kupito 'pi prasīdati
GE09ram_02_u:939: tasya mām adya samprekṣya kimāyāsaḥ pravartate // Ram_2,16.9
GE09ram_02_u:941: kaikeyīm abhivādyaiva rāmo vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,16.10
GE09ram_02_u:942: kaccin mayā nāparādham ajñānād yena me pitā
GE09ram_02_u:943: kupitas tan mamācakṣva tvaṃ caivainaṃ prasādaya // Ram_2,16.11
GE09ram_02_u:944: vivarṇavadano dīno na hi mām abhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:945: śārīro mānaso vāpi kaccid enaṃ na bādhate
GE09ram_02_u:946: saṃtāpo vābhitāpo vā durlabhaṃ hi sadā sukham // Ram_2,16.12
GE09ram_02_u:947: kaccin na kiṃcid bharate kumāre priyadarśane
GE09ram_02_u:948: śatrughne vā mahāsattve mātṝṇāṃ vā mamāśubham // Ram_2,16.13
GE09ram_02_u:949: atoṣayan mahārājam akurvan vā pitur vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:950: muhūrtam api neccheyaṃ jīvituṃ kupite nṛpe // Ram_2,16.14
GE09ram_02_u:952: kathaṃ tasmin na varteta pratyakṣe sati daivate // Ram_2,16.15
GE09ram_02_u:953: kaccit te paruṣaṃ kiṃcid abhimānāt pitā mama
GE09ram_02_u:954: ukto bhavatyā kopena yatrāsya lulitaṃ manaḥ // Ram_2,16.16
GE09ram_02_u:955: etad ācakṣva me devi tattvena paripṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:957: ahaṃ hi vacanād rājñaḥ pateyam api pāvake
GE09ram_02_u:958: bhakṣayeyaṃ viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ majjeyam api cārṇave
GE09ram_02_u:959: niyukto guruṇā pitrā nṛpeṇa ca hitena ca // Ram_2,16.18
GE09ram_02_u:960: tad brūhi vacanaṃ devi rājño yad abhikāṅkṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:961: kariṣye pratijāne ca rāmo dvir nābhibhāṣate // Ram_2,16.19
GE09ram_02_u:963: uvāca rāmaṃ kaikeyī vacanaṃ bhṛśadāruṇam // Ram_2,16.20
GE09ram_02_u:964: purā devāsure yuddhe pitrā te mama rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:965: rakṣitena varau dattau saśalyena mahāraṇe // Ram_2,16.21
GE09ram_02_u:967: gamanaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye tava cādyaiva rāghava // Ram_2,16.22
GE09ram_02_u:968: yadi satyapratijñaṃ tvaṃ pitaraṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:969: ātmānaṃ ca naraśreṣṭha mama vākyam idaṃ śṛṇu // Ram_2,16.23
GE09ram_02_u:970: sa nideśe pitus tiṣṭha yathā tena pratiśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:971: tvayāraṇyaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca // Ram_2,16.24
GE09ram_02_u:972: sapta sapta ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:973: abhiṣekam imaṃ tyaktvā jaṭācīradharo vasa // Ram_2,16.25
GE09ram_02_u:977: śrutvā na vivyathe rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,16.27
GE09ram_02_u:978: evam astu gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ vastum ahaṃ tv ataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:980: idaṃ tu jñātum icchāmi kimarthaṃ māṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:982: manyur na ca tvayā kāryo devi brūhi tavāgrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:983: yāsyāmi bhava suprītā vanaṃ cīrajaṭādharaḥ // Ram_2,16.30
GE09ram_02_u:984: hitena guruṇā pitrā kṛtajñena nṛpeṇa ca
GE09ram_02_u:985: niyujyamāno viśrabdhaṃ kiṃ na kuryād ahaṃ priyam // Ram_2,16.31
GE09ram_02_u:986: alīkaṃ mānasaṃ tv ekaṃ hṛdayaṃ dahatīva me
GE09ram_02_u:987: svayaṃ yan nāha māṃ rājā bharatasyābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,16.32
GE09ram_02_u:988: ahaṃ hi sītāṃ rājyaṃ ca prāṇān iṣṭān dhanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:989: hṛṣṭo bhrātre svayaṃ dadyāṃ bharatāyāpracoditaḥ // Ram_2,16.33
GE09ram_02_u:990: kiṃ punar manujendreṇa svayaṃ pitrā pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:991: tava ca priyakāmārthaṃ pratijñām anupālayan // Ram_2,16.34
GE09ram_02_u:992: tad āśvāsaya hīmaṃ tvaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ yan mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:997: avicārya pitur vākyaṃ samāvastuṃ caturdaśa // Ram_2,16.37
GE09ram_02_u:998: sā hṛṣṭā tasya tadvākyaṃ śrutvā rāmasya kaikeyī
GE09ram_02_u:999: prasthānaṃ śraddadhānā hi tvarayāmāsa rāghavam // Ram_2,16.38
GE09ram_02_u:1000: evaṃ bhavatu yāsyanti dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1002: tava tv ahaṃ kṣamaṃ manye notsukasya vilambanam
GE09ram_02_u:1003: rāma tasmād itaḥ śīghraṃ vanaṃ tvaṃ gantum arhasi // Ram_2,16.40
GE09ram_02_u:1004: vrīḍānvitaḥ svayaṃ yac ca nṛpas tvāṃ nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:1005: naitat kiṃcin naraśreṣṭha manyur eṣo 'panīyatām // Ram_2,16.41
GE09ram_02_u:1006: yāvat tvaṃ na vanaṃ yātaḥ purād asmād abhitvaran
GE09ram_02_u:1007: pitā tāvan na te rāma snāsyate bhokṣyate 'pi vā // Ram_2,16.42
GE09ram_02_u:1008: dhik kaṣṭam iti niḥśvasya rājā śokapariplutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1009: mūrchito nyapatat tasmin paryaṅke hemabhūṣite // Ram_2,16.43
GE09ram_02_u:1011: kaśayevāhato vājī vanaṃ gantuṃ kṛtatvaraḥ // Ram_2,16.44
GE09ram_02_u:1013: śrutvā gatavyatho rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,16.45
GE09ram_02_u:1014: nāham arthaparo devi lokam āvastum utsahe
GE09ram_02_u:1015: viddhi mām ṛṣibhis tulyaṃ kevalaṃ dharmam āsthitam // Ram_2,16.46
GE09ram_02_u:1016: yad atrabhavataḥ kiṃcic chakyaṃ kartuṃ priyaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:1017: prāṇān api parityajya sarvathā kṛtam eva tat // Ram_2,16.47
GE09ram_02_u:1018: na hy ato dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃcid asti mahattaram
GE09ram_02_u:1019: yathā pitari śuśrūṣā tasya vā vacanakriyā // Ram_2,16.48
GE09ram_02_u:1021: vane vatsyāmi vijane varṣāṇīha caturdaśa // Ram_2,16.49
GE09ram_02_u:1022: na nūnaṃ mayi kaikeyi kiṃcid āśaṃsase guṇam
GE09ram_02_u:1023: yad rājānam avocas tvaṃ mameśvaratarā satī // Ram_2,16.50
GE09ram_02_u:1024: yāvan mātaram āpṛcche sītāṃ cānunayāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:1025: tato 'dyaiva gamiṣyāmi daṇḍakānāṃ mahad vanam // Ram_2,16.51
GE09ram_02_u:1026: bharataḥ pālayed rājyaṃ śuśrūṣec ca pitur yathā
GE09ram_02_u:1027: tathā bhavatyā kartavyaṃ sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // Ram_2,16.52
GE09ram_02_u:1028: sa rāmasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ duḥkhahataḥ pitā
GE09ram_02_u:1029: śokād aśaknuvan bāṣpaṃ praruroda mahāsvanam // Ram_2,16.53
GE09ram_02_u:1030: vanditvā caraṇau rāmo visaṃjñasya pitus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:1031: kaikeyyāś cāpy anāryāyā niṣpapāta mahādyutiḥ // Ram_2,16.54
GE09ram_02_u:1032: sa rāmaḥ pitaraṃ kṛtvā kaikeyīṃ ca pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:1033: niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt svaṃ dadarśa suhṛjjanam // Ram_2,16.55
GE09ram_02_u:1037: śanair jagāma sāpekṣo dṛṣṭiṃ tatrāvicālayan // Ram_2,16.57
GE09ram_02_u:1039: lokakāntasya kāntatvaṃ śītaraśmer iva kṣapā // Ram_2,16.58
GE09ram_02_u:1040: na vanaṃ gantukāmasya tyajataś ca vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:1042: dhārayan manasā duḥkham indriyāṇi nigṛhya ca
GE09ram_02_u:1044: praviśya veśmātibhṛśaṃ mudānvitaṃ samīkṣya tāṃ cārthavipattim āgatām
GE09ram_02_u:1045: na caiva rāmo 'tra jagāma vikriyāṃ suhṛjjanasyātmavipattiśaṅkayā // Ram_2,16.61
GE09ram_02_u:1046: rāmas tu bhṛśam āyasto niḥśvasann iva kuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1047: jagāma sahito bhrātrā mātur antaḥpuraṃ vaśī // Ram_2,17.1
GE09ram_02_u:1049: upaviṣṭaṃ gṛhadvāri tiṣṭhataś cāparān bahūn // Ram_2,17.2
GE09ram_02_u:1050: praviśya prathamāṃ kakṣyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1052: praṇamya rāmas tān vṛddhāṃs tṛtīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1053: striyo vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca dvārarakṣaṇatatparāḥ // Ram_2,17.4
GE09ram_02_u:1054: vardhayitvā prahṛṣṭās tāḥ praviśya ca gṛhaṃ striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1055: nyavedayanta tvaritā rāmamātuḥ priyaṃ tadā // Ram_2,17.5
GE09ram_02_u:1056: kausalyāpi tadā devī rātriṃ sthitvā samāhitā
GE09ram_02_u:1057: prabhāte tv akarot pūjāṃ viṣṇoḥ putrahitaiṣiṇī // Ram_2,17.6
GE09ram_02_u:1059: agniṃ juhoti sma tadā mantravat kṛtamaṅgalā // Ram_2,17.7
GE09ram_02_u:1060: praviśya ca tadā rāmo mātur antaḥpuraṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:1061: dadarśa mātaraṃ tatra hāvayantīṃ hutāśanam // Ram_2,17.8
GE09ram_02_u:1063: abhicakrāma saṃhṛṣṭā kiśoraṃ vaḍabā yathā // Ram_2,17.9
GE09ram_02_u:1064: tam uvāca durādharṣaṃ rāghavaṃ sutam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1065: kausalyā putravātsalyād idaṃ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,17.10
GE09ram_02_u:1067: prāpnuhy āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca dharmaṃ copahitaṃ kule // Ram_2,17.11
GE09ram_02_u:1069: adyaiva hi tvāṃ dharmātmā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // Ram_2,17.12
GE09ram_02_u:1071: sa svabhāvavinītaś ca gauravāc ca tadānataḥ // Ram_2,17.13
GE09ram_02_u:1072: devi nūnaṃ na jānīṣe mahad bhayam upasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:1073: idaṃ tava ca duḥkhāya vaidehyā lakṣmaṇasya ca // Ram_2,17.14
GE09ram_02_u:1074: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vatsyāmi vijane vane
GE09ram_02_u:1075: madhumūlaphalair jīvan hitvā munivad āmiṣam // Ram_2,17.15
GE09ram_02_u:1077: māṃ punar daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ vivāsayati tāpasam // Ram_2,17.16
GE09ram_02_u:1078: tām aduḥkhocitāṃ dṛṣṭvā patitāṃ kadalīm iva
GE09ram_02_u:1084: yadi putra na jāyethā mama śokāya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1085: na sma duḥkham ato bhūyaḥ paśyeyam aham aprajā // Ram_2,17.20
GE09ram_02_u:1086: eka eva hi vandhyāyāḥ śoko bhavati mānavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1087: aprajāsmīti saṃtāpo na hy anyaḥ putra vidyate // Ram_2,17.21
GE09ram_02_u:1088: na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kalyāṇaṃ sukhaṃ vā patipauruṣe
GE09ram_02_u:1089: api putre vipaśyeyam iti rāmāsthitaṃ mayā // Ram_2,17.22
GE09ram_02_u:1091: ahaṃ śroṣye sapatnīnām avarāṇāṃ varā satī
GE09ram_02_u:1092: ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu pramadānāṃ bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,17.23
GE09ram_02_u:1093: tvayi saṃnihite 'py evam aham āsaṃ nirākṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:1094: kiṃ punaḥ proṣite tāta dhruvaṃ maraṇam eva me // Ram_2,17.24
GE09ram_02_u:1095: yo hi māṃ sevate kaścid atha vāpy anuvartate
GE09ram_02_u:1096: kaikeyyāḥ putram anvīkṣya sa jano nābhibhāṣate // Ram_2,17.25
GE09ram_02_u:1097: daśa sapta ca varṣāṇi tava jātasya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1099: upavāsaiś ca yogaiś ca bahubhiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1100: duḥkhaṃ saṃvardhito moghaṃ tvaṃ hi durgatayā mayā // Ram_2,17.27
GE09ram_02_u:1101: sthiraṃ tu hṛdayaṃ manye mamedaṃ yan na dīryate
GE09ram_02_u:1102: prāvṛṣīva mahānadyāḥ spṛṣṭaṃ kūlaṃ navāmbhasā // Ram_2,17.28
GE09ram_02_u:1103: mamaiva nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ na vidyate na cāvakāśo 'sti yamakṣaye mama
GE09ram_02_u:1104: yad antako 'dyaiva na māṃ jihīrṣati prasahya siṃho rudatīṃ mṛgīm iva // Ram_2,17.29
GE09ram_02_u:1105: sthiraṃ hi nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ mamāyasaṃ na bhidyate yad bhuvi nāvadīryate
GE09ram_02_u:1106: anena duḥkhena ca deham arpitaṃ dhruvaṃ hy akāle maraṇaṃ na vidyate // Ram_2,17.30
GE09ram_02_u:1107: idaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ yad anarthakāni me vratāni dānāni ca saṃyamāś ca hi
GE09ram_02_u:1108: tapaś ca taptaṃ yad apatyakāraṇāt suniṣphalaṃ bījam ivoptam ūṣare // Ram_2,17.31
GE09ram_02_u:1109: yadi hy akāle maraṇaṃ svayecchayā labheta kaścid guruduḥkhakarśitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1110: gatāham adyaiva paretasaṃsadaṃ vinā tvayā dhenur ivātmajena vai // Ram_2,17.32
GE09ram_02_u:1111: bhṛśam asukham amarṣitā tadā bahu vilalāpa samīkṣya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:1112: vyasanam upaniśāmya sā mahat sutam iva baddham avekṣya kiṃnarī // Ram_2,17.33
GE09ram_02_u:1113: tathā tu vilapantīṃ tāṃ kausalyāṃ rāmamātaram
GE09ram_02_u:1114: uvāca lakṣmaṇo dīnas tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,18.1
GE09ram_02_u:1115: na rocate mamāpy etad ārye yad rāghavo vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1116: tyaktvā rājyaśriyaṃ gacchet striyā vākyavaśaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,18.2
GE09ram_02_u:1117: viparītaś ca vṛddhaś ca viṣayaiś ca pradharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1118: nṛpaḥ kim iva na brūyāc codyamānaḥ samanmathaḥ // Ram_2,18.3
GE09ram_02_u:1120: yena nirvāsyate rāṣṭrād vanavāsāya rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,18.4
GE09ram_02_u:1121: na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ loke parokṣam api yo naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1122: amitro 'pi nirasto 'pi yo 'sya doṣam udāharet // Ram_2,18.5
GE09ram_02_u:1123: devakalpam ṛjuṃ dāntaṃ ripūṇām api vatsalam
GE09ram_02_u:1124: avekṣamāṇaḥ ko dharmaṃ tyajet putram akāraṇāt // Ram_2,18.6
GE09ram_02_u:1125: tad idaṃ vacanaṃ rājñaḥ punar bālyam upeyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1126: putraḥ ko hṛdaye kuryād rājavṛttam anusmaran // Ram_2,18.7
GE09ram_02_u:1127: yāvad eva na jānāti kaścid artham imaṃ naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1128: tāvad eva mayā sārdham ātmasthaṃ kuru śāsanam // Ram_2,18.8
GE09ram_02_u:1129: mayā pārśve sadhanuṣā tava guptasya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1130: kaḥ samartho 'dhikaṃ kartuṃ kṛtāntasyeva tiṣṭhataḥ // Ram_2,18.9
GE09ram_02_u:1132: kariṣyāmi śarais tīkṣṇair yadi sthāsyati vipriye // Ram_2,18.10
GE09ram_02_u:1133: bharatasyātha pakṣyo vā yo vāsya hitam icchati
GE09ram_02_u:1134: sarvān etān vadhiṣyāmi mṛdur hi paribhūyate // Ram_2,18.11
GE09ram_02_u:1135: tvayā caiva mayā caiva kṛtvā vairam anuttamam
GE09ram_02_u:1136: kasya śaktiḥ śriyaṃ dātuṃ bharatāyāriśāsana // Ram_2,18.12
GE09ram_02_u:1138: satyena dhanuṣā caiva datteneṣṭena te śape // Ram_2,18.13
GE09ram_02_u:1139: dīptam agnim araṇyaṃ vā yadi rāmaḥ pravekṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:1140: praviṣṭaṃ tatra māṃ devi tvaṃ pūrvam avadhāraya // Ram_2,18.14
GE09ram_02_u:1141: harāmi vīryād duḥkhaṃ te tamaḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1142: devī paśyatu me vīryaṃ rāghavaś caiva paśyatu // Ram_2,18.15
GE09ram_02_u:1143: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1144: uvāca rāmaṃ kausalyā rudantī śokalālasā // Ram_2,18.16
GE09ram_02_u:1145: bhrātus te vadataḥ putra lakṣmaṇasya śrutaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:1146: yad atrānantaraṃ tat tvaṃ kuruṣva yadi rocate // Ram_2,18.17
GE09ram_02_u:1147: na cādharmyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sapatnyā mama bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:1148: vihāya śokasaṃtaptāṃ gantum arhasi mām itaḥ // Ram_2,18.18
GE09ram_02_u:1149: dharmajña yadi dharmiṣṭho dharmaṃ caritum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:1150: śuśrūṣa mām ihasthas tvaṃ cara dharmam anuttamam // Ram_2,18.19
GE09ram_02_u:1151: śuśrūṣur jananīṃ putra svagṛhe niyato vasan
GE09ram_02_u:1152: pareṇa tapasā yuktaḥ kāśyapas tridivaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,18.20
GE09ram_02_u:1153: yathaiva rājā pūjyas te gauraveṇa tathā hy aham
GE09ram_02_u:1154: tvāṃ nāham anujānāmi na gantavyam ito vanam // Ram_2,18.21
GE09ram_02_u:1155: tvadviyogān na me kāryaṃ jīvitena sukhena vā
GE09ram_02_u:1156: tvayā saha mama śreyas tṛṇānām api bhakṣaṇam // Ram_2,18.22
GE09ram_02_u:1157: yadi tvaṃ yāsyasi vanaṃ tyaktvā māṃ śokalālasām
GE09ram_02_u:1158: ahaṃ prāyam ihāsiṣye na hi śakṣyāmi jīvitum // Ram_2,18.23
GE09ram_02_u:1159: tatas tvaṃ prāpsyase putra nirayaṃ lokaviśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:1160: brahmahatyām ivādharmāt samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // Ram_2,18.24
GE09ram_02_u:1161: vilapantīṃ tathā dīnāṃ kausalyāṃ jananīṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1162: uvāca rāmo dharmātmā vacanaṃ dharmasaṃhitam // Ram_2,18.25
GE09ram_02_u:1163: nāsti śaktiḥ pitur vākyaṃ samatikramituṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:1164: prasādaye tvāṃ śirasā gantum icchāmy ahaṃ vanam // Ram_2,18.26
GE09ram_02_u:1165: ṛṣiṇā ca pitur vākyaṃ kurvatā vratacāriṇā
GE09ram_02_u:1166: gaur hatā jānatā dharmaṃ kaṇḍunāpi vipaścitā // Ram_2,18.27
GE09ram_02_u:1167: asmākaṃ ca kule pūrvaṃ sagarasyājñayā pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1168: khanadbhiḥ sāgarair bhūtim avāptaḥ sumahān vadhaḥ // Ram_2,18.28
GE09ram_02_u:1171: na khalv etan mayaikena kriyate pitṛśāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:1172: pūrvair ayam abhipreto gato mārgo 'nugamyate // Ram_2,18.30
GE09ram_02_u:1173: tad etat tu mayā kāryaṃ kriyate bhuvi nānyathā
GE09ram_02_u:1174: pitur hi vacanaṃ kurvan na kaścin nāma hīyate // Ram_2,18.31
GE09ram_02_u:1175: tām evam uktvā jananīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1176: tava lakṣmaṇa jānāmi mayi sneham anuttamam
GE09ram_02_u:1177: abhiprāyam avijñāya satyasya ca śamasya ca // Ram_2,18.32
GE09ram_02_u:1178: dharmo hi paramo loke dharme satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_02_u:1179: dharmasaṃśritam etac ca pitur vacanam uttamam // Ram_2,18.33
GE09ram_02_u:1180: saṃśrutya ca pitur vākyaṃ mātur vā brāhmaṇasya vā
GE09ram_02_u:1181: na kartavyaṃ vṛthā vīra dharmam āśritya tiṣṭhatā // Ram_2,18.34
GE09ram_02_u:1182: so 'haṃ na śakṣyāmi pitur niyogam ativartitum
GE09ram_02_u:1183: pitur hi vacanād vīra kaikeyyāhaṃ pracoditaḥ // Ram_2,18.35
GE09ram_02_u:1185: dharmam āśraya mā taikṣṇyaṃ madbuddhir anugamyatām // Ram_2,18.36
GE09ram_02_u:1186: tam evam uktvā sauhārdād bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1187: uvāca bhūyaḥ kausalyāṃ prāñjaliḥ śirasānataḥ // Ram_2,18.37
GE09ram_02_u:1188: anumanyasva māṃ devi gamiṣyantam ito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1189: śāpitāsi mama prāṇaiḥ kuru svastyayanāni me
GE09ram_02_u:1190: tīrṇapratijñaś ca vanāt punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm // Ram_2,18.38
GE09ram_02_u:1191: yaśo hy ahaṃ kevalarājyakāraṇān na pṛṣṭhataḥ kartum alaṃ mahodayam
GE09ram_02_u:1192: adīrghakāle na tu devi jīvite vṛṇe 'varām adya mahīm adharmataḥ // Ram_2,18.39
GE09ram_02_u:1193: prasādayan naravṛṣabhaḥ sa mātaraṃ parākramāj jigamiṣur eva daṇḍakān
GE09ram_02_u:1194: athānujaṃ bhṛśam anuśāsya darśanaṃ cakāra tāṃ hṛdi jananīṃ pradakṣiṇam // Ram_2,18.40
GE09ram_02_u:1195: atha taṃ vyathayā dīnaṃ saviśeṣam amarṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:1197: āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṃ suhṛdaṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:1198: uvācedaṃ sa dhairyeṇa dhārayan sattvam ātmavān // Ram_2,19.2
GE09ram_02_u:1202: mātā naḥ sā yathā na syāt saviśaṅkā tathā kuru // Ram_2,19.4
GE09ram_02_u:1203: tasyāḥ śaṅkāmayaṃ duḥkhaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe
GE09ram_02_u:1206: mātṝṇāṃ vā pitur vāhaṃ kṛtam alpaṃ ca vipriyam // Ram_2,19.6
GE09ram_02_u:1208: paralokabhayād bhīto nirbhayo 'stu pitā mama // Ram_2,19.7
GE09ram_02_u:1209: tasyāpi hi bhaved asmin karmaṇy apratisaṃhṛte
GE09ram_02_u:1210: satyaṃ neti manastāpas tasya tāpas tapec ca mām // Ram_2,19.8
GE09ram_02_u:1212: anvag evāham icchāmi vanaṃ gantum itaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,19.9
GE09ram_02_u:1214: sutaṃ bharatam avyagram abhiṣecayitā tataḥ // Ram_2,19.10
GE09ram_02_u:1216: gate 'raṇyaṃ ca kaikeyyā bhaviṣyati manaḥsukham // Ram_2,19.11
GE09ram_02_u:1217: buddhiḥ praṇītā yeneyaṃ manaś ca susamāhitam
GE09ram_02_u:1218: tat tu nārhāmi saṃkleṣṭuṃ pravrajiṣyāmi māciram // Ram_2,19.12
GE09ram_02_u:1219: kṛtāntas tv eva saumitre draṣṭavyo matpravāsane
GE09ram_02_u:1220: rājyasya ca vitīrṇasya punar eva nivartane // Ram_2,19.13
GE09ram_02_u:1221: kaikeyyāḥ pratipattir hi kathaṃ syān mama pīḍane
GE09ram_02_u:1222: yadi bhāvo na daivo 'yaṃ kṛtāntavihito bhavet // Ram_2,19.14
GE09ram_02_u:1223: jānāsi hi yathā saumya na mātṛṣu mamāntaram
GE09ram_02_u:1224: bhūtapūrvaṃ viśeṣo vā tasyā mayi sute 'pi vā // Ram_2,19.15
GE09ram_02_u:1226: ugrair vākyair ahaṃ tasyā nānyad daivāt samarthaye // Ram_2,19.16
GE09ram_02_u:1228: brūyāt sā prākṛteva strī matpīḍāṃ bhartṛsaṃnidhau // Ram_2,19.17
GE09ram_02_u:1229: yad acintyaṃ tu tad daivaṃ bhūteṣv api na hanyate
GE09ram_02_u:1230: vyaktaṃ mayi ca tasyāṃ ca patito hi viparyayaḥ // Ram_2,19.18
GE09ram_02_u:1231: kaścid daivena saumitre yoddhum utsahate pumān
GE09ram_02_u:1232: yasya na grahaṇaṃ kiṃcit karmaṇo 'nyatra dṛśyate // Ram_2,19.19
GE09ram_02_u:1234: yasya kiṃcit tathā bhūtaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat // Ram_2,19.20
GE09ram_02_u:1235: vyāhate 'py abhiṣeke me paritāpo na vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:1236: tasmād aparitāpaḥ saṃs tvam apy anuvidhāya mām
GE09ram_02_u:1238: na lakṣmaṇāsmin mama rājyavighne mātā yavīyasy atiśaṅkanīyā
GE09ram_02_u:1239: daivābhipannā hi vadanty aniṣṭaṃ jānāsi daivaṃ ca tathā prabhāvam // Ram_2,19.22
GE09ram_02_u:1240: iti bruvati rāme tu lakṣmaṇo 'dhaḥśirā muhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1241: śrutvā madhyaṃ jagāmeva manasā duḥkhaharṣayoḥ // Ram_2,20.1
GE09ram_02_u:1242: tadā tu baddhvā bhrukuṭīṃ bhruvor madhye nararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1243: niśaśvāsa mahāsarpo bilastha iva roṣitaḥ // Ram_2,20.2
GE09ram_02_u:1245: babhau kruddhasya siṃhasya mukhasya sadṛśaṃ mukham // Ram_2,20.3
GE09ram_02_u:1246: agrahas taṃ vidhunvaṃs tu hastī hastam ivātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1247: tiryag ūrdhvaṃ śarīre ca pātayitvā śirodharām // Ram_2,20.4
GE09ram_02_u:1248: agrākṣṇā vīkṣamāṇas tu tiryag bhrātaram abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1249: asthāne sambhramo yasya jāto vai sumahān ayam // Ram_2,20.5
GE09ram_02_u:1251: kathaṃ hy etad asambhrāntas tvadvidho vaktum arhati // Ram_2,20.6
GE09ram_02_u:1253: kiṃ nāma kṛpaṇaṃ daivam aśaktam abhiśaṃsasi // Ram_2,20.7
GE09ram_02_u:1254: pāpayos tu kathaṃ nāma tayoḥ śaṅkā na vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:1255: santi dharmopadhāḥ ślakṣṇā dharmātman kiṃ na budhyase // Ram_2,20.8
GE09ram_02_u:1257: yeneyam āgatā dvaidhaṃ tava buddhir mahīpate
GE09ram_02_u:1258: sa hi dharmo mama dveṣyaḥ prasaṅgād yasya muhyasi // Ram_2,20.9
GE09ram_02_u:1259: yady api pratipattis te daivī cāpi tayor matam
GE09ram_02_u:1260: tathāpy upekṣaṇīyaṃ te na me tad api rocate // Ram_2,20.10
GE09ram_02_u:1261: viklavo vīryahīno yaḥ sa daivam anuvartate
GE09ram_02_u:1262: vīrāḥ saṃbhāvitātmāno na daivaṃ paryupāsate // Ram_2,20.11
GE09ram_02_u:1264: na daivena vipannārthaḥ puruṣaḥ so 'vasīdati // Ram_2,20.12
GE09ram_02_u:1265: drakṣyanti tv adya daivasya pauruṣaṃ puruṣasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:1266: daivamānuṣayor adya vyaktā vyaktir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,20.13
GE09ram_02_u:1267: adya matpauruṣahataṃ daivaṃ drakṣyanti vai janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1268: yad daivād āhataṃ te 'dya dṛṣṭaṃ rājyābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,20.14
GE09ram_02_u:1270: pradhāvitam ahaṃ daivaṃ pauruṣeṇa nivartaye // Ram_2,20.15
GE09ram_02_u:1272: na ca kṛtsnās trayo lokā vihanyuḥ kiṃ punaḥ pitā // Ram_2,20.16
GE09ram_02_u:1273: yair vivāsas tavāraṇye mitho rājan samarthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1274: araṇye te vivatsyanti caturdaśa samās tathā // Ram_2,20.17
GE09ram_02_u:1275: ahaṃ tadāśāṃ chetsyāmi pitus tasyāś ca yā tava
GE09ram_02_u:1277: madbalena viruddhāya na syād daivabalaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:1278: prabhaviṣyati duḥkhāya yathograṃ pauruṣaṃ mama // Ram_2,20.19
GE09ram_02_u:1280: āryaputrāḥ kariṣyanti vanavāsaṃ gate tvayi // Ram_2,20.20
GE09ram_02_u:1282: prajā nikṣipya putreṣu putravat paripālane // Ram_2,20.21
GE09ram_02_u:1284: naivam icchasi dharmātman rājyaṃ rāma tvam ātmani // Ram_2,20.22
GE09ram_02_u:1285: pratijāne ca te vīra mā bhūvaṃ vīralokabhāk
GE09ram_02_u:1286: rājyaṃ ca tava rakṣeyam ahaṃ veleva sāgaram // Ram_2,20.23
GE09ram_02_u:1287: maṅgalair abhiṣiñcasva tatra tvaṃ vyāpṛto bhava
GE09ram_02_u:1288: aham eko mahīpālān alaṃ vārayituṃ balāt // Ram_2,20.24
GE09ram_02_u:1289: na śobhārthāv imau bāhū na dhanur bhūṣaṇāya me
GE09ram_02_u:1292: na cāhaṃ kāmaye 'tyarthaṃ yaḥ syāc chatrur mato mama // Ram_2,20.26
GE09ram_02_u:1294: pragṛhītena vai śatruṃ vajriṇaṃ vā na kalpaye // Ram_2,20.27
GE09ram_02_u:1298: patiṣyanti dvipā bhūmau meghā iva savidyutaḥ // Ram_2,20.29
GE09ram_02_u:1300: kathaṃ puruṣamānī syāt puruṣāṇāṃ mayi sthite // Ram_2,20.30
GE09ram_02_u:1301: bahubhiś caikam atyasyann ekena ca bahūñ janān
GE09ram_02_u:1304: rājñaś cāprabhutāṃ kartuṃ prabhutvaṃ ca tava prabho // Ram_2,20.32
GE09ram_02_u:1306: vasūnāṃ ca vimokṣasya suhṛdāṃ pālanasya ca // Ram_2,20.33
GE09ram_02_u:1307: anurūpāv imau bāhū rāma karma kariṣyataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1309: bravīhi ko 'dyaiva mayā viyujyatāṃ tavāsuhṛt prāṇayaśaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1310: yathā taveyaṃ vasudhā vaśe bhavet tathaiva māṃ śādhi tavāsmi kiṃkaraḥ // Ram_2,20.35
GE09ram_02_u:1311: vimṛjya bāṣpaṃ parisāntvya cāsakṛt sa lakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1312: uvāca pitrye vacane vyavasthitaṃ nibodha mām eṣa hi saumya satpathaḥ // Ram_2,20.36
GE09ram_02_u:1313: taṃ samīkṣya tv avahitaṃ pitur nirdeśapālane
GE09ram_02_u:1314: kausalyā bāṣpasaṃruddhā vaco dharmiṣṭham abravīt // Ram_2,21.1
GE09ram_02_u:1316: mayi jāto daśarathāt katham uñchena vartayet // Ram_2,21.2
GE09ram_02_u:1317: yasya bhṛtyāś ca dāsāś ca mṛṣṭāny annāni bhuñjate
GE09ram_02_u:1318: kathaṃ sa bhokṣyate nātho vane mūlaphalāny ayam // Ram_2,21.3
GE09ram_02_u:1319: ka etacchraddadhecchrutvā kasya vā na bhaved bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:1320: guṇavān dayito rājño rāghavo yad vivāsyate // Ram_2,21.4
GE09ram_02_u:1321: tvayā vihīnām iha māṃ śokāgnir atulo mahān
GE09ram_02_u:1322: pradhakṣyati yathā kakṣaṃ citrabhānur himātyaye // Ram_2,21.5
GE09ram_02_u:1323: kathaṃ hi dhenuḥ svaṃ vatsaṃ gacchantaṃ nānugacchati
GE09ram_02_u:1324: ahaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmi yatra putra gamiṣyasi // Ram_2,21.6
GE09ram_02_u:1325: tathā nigaditaṃ mātrā tad vākyaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1326: śrutvā rāmo 'bravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // Ram_2,21.7
GE09ram_02_u:1327: kaikeyyā vañcito rājā mayi cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:1328: bhavatyā ca parityakto na nūnaṃ vartayiṣyati // Ram_2,21.8
GE09ram_02_u:1329: bhartuḥ kila parityāgo nṛśaṃsaḥ kevalaṃ striyāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1330: sa bhavatyā na kartavyo manasāpi vigarhitaḥ // Ram_2,21.9
GE09ram_02_u:1331: yāvaj jīvati kākutsthaḥ pitā me jagatīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1332: śuśrūṣā kriyatāṃ tāvat sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // Ram_2,21.10
GE09ram_02_u:1333: evam uktā tu rāmeṇa kausalyā śubhadarśanā
GE09ram_02_u:1334: tathety uvāca suprītā rāmam akliṣṭakāriṇam // Ram_2,21.11
GE09ram_02_u:1335: evam uktas tu vacanaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1336: bhūyas tām abravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // Ram_2,21.12
GE09ram_02_u:1337: mayā caiva bhavatyā ca kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1338: rājā bhartā guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ // Ram_2,21.13
GE09ram_02_u:1339: imāni tu mahāraṇye vihṛtya nava pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:1340: varṣāṇi paramaprītaḥ sthāsyāmi vacane tava // Ram_2,21.14
GE09ram_02_u:1341: evam uktā priyaṃ putraṃ bāṣpapūrṇānanā tadā
GE09ram_02_u:1342: uvāca paramārtā tu kausalyā putravatsalā // Ram_2,21.15
GE09ram_02_u:1343: āsāṃ rāma sapatnīnāṃ vastuṃ madhye na me kṣamam
GE09ram_02_u:1344: naya mām api kākutstha vanaṃ vanyāṃ mṛgīṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:1345: yadi te gamane buddhiḥ kṛtā pitur apekṣayā // Ram_2,21.16
GE09ram_02_u:1346: tāṃ tathā rudatīṃ rāmo rudan vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1347: jīvantyā hi striyā bhartā daivataṃ prabhur eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:1348: bhavatyā mama caivādya rājā prabhavati prabhuḥ // Ram_2,21.17
GE09ram_02_u:1350: bhavatīm anuvarteta sa hi dharmarataḥ sadā // Ram_2,21.18
GE09ram_02_u:1351: yathā mayi tu niṣkrānte putraśokena pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1352: śramaṃ nāvāpnuyāt kiṃcid apramattā tathā kuru // Ram_2,21.19
GE09ram_02_u:1354: bhartāraṃ nānuvarteta sā ca pāpagatir bhavet // Ram_2,21.20
GE09ram_02_u:1355: śuśrūṣām eva kurvīta bhartuḥ priyahite ratā
GE09ram_02_u:1356: eṣa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭo loke vede śrutaḥ smṛtaḥ // Ram_2,21.21
GE09ram_02_u:1357: pūjyās te matkṛte devi brāhmaṇāś caiva suvratāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1359: prāpsyase paramaṃ kāmaṃ mayi pratyāgate sati
GE09ram_02_u:1360: yadi dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho dhārayiṣyati jīvitam // Ram_2,21.23
GE09ram_02_u:1363: gaccha putra tvam ekāgro bhadraṃ te 'stu sadā vibho // Ram_2,21.24
GE09ram_02_u:1364: tathā hi rāmaṃ vanavāsaniścitaṃ samīkṣya devī parameṇa cetasā
GE09ram_02_u:1365: uvāca rāmaṃ śubhalakṣaṇaṃ vaco babhūva ca svastyayanābhikāṅkṣiṇī // Ram_2,21.25
GE09ram_02_u:1366: sāpanīya tam āyāsam upaspṛśya jalaṃ śuci
GE09ram_02_u:1367: cakāra mātā rāmasya maṅgalāni manasvinī // Ram_2,22.1
GE09ram_02_u:1368: svasti sādhyāś ca viśve ca marutaś ca maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1369: svasti dhātā vidhātā ca svasti pūṣā bhago 'ryamā // Ram_2,22.2
GE09ram_02_u:1370: ṛtavaś caiva pakṣāś ca māsāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ kṣapāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1371: dināni ca muhūrtāś ca svasti kurvantu te sadā // Ram_2,22.3
GE09ram_02_u:1372: smṛtir dhṛtiś ca dharmaś ca pāntu tvāṃ putra sarvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1373: skandaś ca bhagavān devaḥ somaś ca sabṛhaspatiḥ // Ram_2,22.4
GE09ram_02_u:1374: saptarṣayo nāradaś ca te tvāṃ rakṣantu sarvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1375: nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi grahāś ca sahadevatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1377: plavagā vṛścikā daṃśā maśakāś caiva kānane
GE09ram_02_u:1378: sarīsṛpāś ca kīṭāś ca mā bhūvan gahane tava // Ram_2,22.6
GE09ram_02_u:1379: mahādvipāś ca siṃhāś ca vyāghrā ṛkṣāś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1380: mahiṣāḥ śṛṅgiṇo raudrā na te druhyantu putraka // Ram_2,22.7
GE09ram_02_u:1382: mā ca tvāṃ hiṃsiṣuḥ putra mayā sampūjitās tv iha // Ram_2,22.8
GE09ram_02_u:1383: āgamās te śivāḥ santu sidhyantu ca parākramāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1384: sarvasampattayo rāma svastimān gaccha putraka // Ram_2,22.9
GE09ram_02_u:1385: svasti te 'stv āntarikṣebhyaḥ pārthivebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1386: sarvebhyaś caiva devebhyo ye ca te paripanthinaḥ // Ram_2,22.10
GE09ram_02_u:1388: ye ca śeṣāḥ surās te tvāṃ rakṣantu vanavāsinam // Ram_2,22.11
GE09ram_02_u:1389: iti mālyaiḥ suragaṇān gandhaiś cāpi yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:1392: vṛtranāśe samabhavat tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // Ram_2,22.13
GE09ram_02_u:1394: amṛtaṃ prārthayānasya tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // Ram_2,22.14
GE09ram_02_u:1396: cakāra rakṣāṃ kausalyā mantrair abhijajāpa ca // Ram_2,22.15
GE09ram_02_u:1398: avadat putra siddhārtho gaccha rāma yathāsukham // Ram_2,22.16
GE09ram_02_u:1400: paśyāmi tvāṃ sukhaṃ vatsa susthitaṃ rājaveśmani // Ram_2,22.17
GE09ram_02_u:1402: abhiprayātasya vanaṃ cirāya te hitāni kāṅkṣantu diśaś ca rāghava // Ram_2,22.18
GE09ram_02_u:1403: itīva cāśrupratipūrṇalocanā samāpya ca svastyayanaṃ yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:1404: pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ punaḥ punaś cāpi nipīḍya sasvaje // Ram_2,22.19
GE09ram_02_u:1405: tathā tu devyā sa kṛtapradakṣiṇo nipīḍya mātuś caraṇau punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1406: jagāma sītānilayaṃ mahāyaśāḥ sa rāghavaḥ prajvalitaḥ svayā śriyā // Ram_2,22.20
GE09ram_02_u:1407: abhivādya tu kausalyāṃ rāmaḥ samprasthito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1408: kṛtasvastyayano mātrā dharmiṣṭhe vartmani sthitaḥ // Ram_2,23.1
GE09ram_02_u:1411: vaidehī cāpi tat sarvaṃ na śuśrāva tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:1412: tad eva hṛdi tasyāś ca yauvarājyābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,23.3
GE09ram_02_u:1413: devakāryaṃ sma sā kṛtvā kṛtajñā hṛṣṭacetanā
GE09ram_02_u:1417: atha sītā samutpatya vepamānā ca taṃ patim
GE09ram_02_u:1420: āha duḥkhābhisaṃtaptā kim idānīm idaṃ prabho // Ram_2,23.7
GE09ram_02_u:1421: adya bārhaspataḥ śrīmān yuktaḥ puṣyo na rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1422: procyate brāhmaṇaiḥ prājñaiḥ kena tvam asi durmanāḥ // Ram_2,23.8
GE09ram_02_u:1427: vāgmino bandinaś cāpi prahṛṣṭās tvāṃ nararṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:1428: stuvanto nādya dṛśyante maṅgalaiḥ sūtamāgadhāḥ // Ram_2,23.11
GE09ram_02_u:1429: na te kṣaudraṃ ca dadhi ca brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1430: mūrdhni mūrdhāvasiktasya dadhati sma vidhānataḥ // Ram_2,23.12
GE09ram_02_u:1431: na tvāṃ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā śreṇīmukhyāś ca bhūṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1434: mukhyaḥ puṣyaratho yuktaḥ kiṃ na gacchati te 'grataḥ // Ram_2,23.14
GE09ram_02_u:1435: na hastī cāgrataḥ śrīmāṃs tava lakṣaṇapūjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1437: na ca kāñcanacitraṃ te paśyāmi priyadarśana
GE09ram_02_u:1439: abhiṣeko yadā sajjaḥ kim idānīm idaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:1440: apūrvo mukhavarṇaś ca na praharṣaś ca lakṣyate // Ram_2,23.17
GE09ram_02_u:1442: sīte tatrabhavāṃs tātaḥ pravrājayati māṃ vanam // Ram_2,23.18
GE09ram_02_u:1444: śṛṇu jānaki yenedaṃ krameṇābhyāgataṃ mama // Ram_2,23.19
GE09ram_02_u:1446: kaikeyyai prītamanasā purā dattau mahāvarau // Ram_2,23.20
GE09ram_02_u:1448: pracoditaḥ sa samayo dharmeṇa pratinirjitaḥ // Ram_2,23.21
GE09ram_02_u:1449: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyaṃ daṇḍake mayā
GE09ram_02_u:1450: pitrā me bharataś cāpi yauvarājye niyojitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1451: so 'haṃ tvām āgato draṣṭuṃ prasthito vijanaṃ vanam // Ram_2,23.22
GE09ram_02_u:1452: bharatasya samīpe te nāhaṃ kathyaḥ kadācana
GE09ram_02_u:1453: ṛddhiyuktā hi puruṣā na sahante parastavam
GE09ram_02_u:1454: tasmān na te guṇāḥ kathyā bharatasyāgrato mama // Ram_2,23.23
GE09ram_02_u:1455: nāpi tvaṃ tena bhartavyā viśeṣeṇa kadācana
GE09ram_02_u:1456: anukūlatayā śakyaṃ samīpe tasya vartitum // Ram_2,23.24
GE09ram_02_u:1457: ahaṃ cāpi pratijñāṃ tāṃ guroḥ samanupālayan
GE09ram_02_u:1458: vanam adyaiva yāsyāmi sthirā bhava manasvini // Ram_2,23.25
GE09ram_02_u:1459: yāte ca mayi kalyāṇi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam
GE09ram_02_u:1461: kālyam utthāya devānāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:1462: vanditavyo daśarathaḥ pitā mama nareśvaraḥ // Ram_2,23.27
GE09ram_02_u:1463: mātā ca mama kausalyā vṛddhā saṃtāpakarśitā
GE09ram_02_u:1464: dharmam evāgrataḥ kṛtvā tvattaḥ sammānam arhati // Ram_2,23.28
GE09ram_02_u:1465: vanditavyāś ca te nityaṃ yāḥ śeṣā mama mātaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1466: snehapraṇayasambhogaiḥ samā hi mama mātaraḥ // Ram_2,23.29
GE09ram_02_u:1468: tvayā lakṣmaṇaśatrughnau prāṇaiḥ priyatarau mama // Ram_2,23.30
GE09ram_02_u:1469: vipriyaṃ na ca kartavyaṃ bharatasya kadācana
GE09ram_02_u:1470: sa hi rājā prabhuś caiva deśasya ca kulasya ca // Ram_2,23.31
GE09ram_02_u:1473: aurasān api putrān hi tyajanty ahitakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1474: samarthān sampragṛhṇanti janān api narādhipāḥ // Ram_2,23.33
GE09ram_02_u:1475: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi mahāvanaṃ priye tvayā hi vastavyam ihaiva bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:1476: yathā vyalīkaṃ kuruṣe na kasyacit tathā tvayā kāryam idaṃ vaco mama // Ram_2,23.34
GE09ram_02_u:1477: evam uktā tu vaidehī priyārhā priyavādinī
GE09ram_02_u:1478: praṇayād eva saṃkruddhā bhartāram idam abravīt // Ram_2,24.1
GE09ram_02_u:1479: āryaputra pitā mātā bhrātā putras tathā snuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:1480: svāni puṇyāni bhuñjānāḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhāgyam upāsate // Ram_2,24.2
GE09ram_02_u:1481: bhartur bhāgyaṃ tu bhāryaikā prāpnoti puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:1482: ataś caivāham ādiṣṭā vane vastavyam ity api // Ram_2,24.3
GE09ram_02_u:1483: na pitā nātmajo nātmā na mātā na sakhījanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1484: iha pretya ca nārīṇāṃ patir eko gatiḥ sadā // Ram_2,24.4
GE09ram_02_u:1485: yadi tvaṃ prasthito durgaṃ vanam adyaiva rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1486: agratas te gamiṣyāmi mṛdnantī kuśakaṇṭakān // Ram_2,24.5
GE09ram_02_u:1488: naya māṃ vīra viśrabdhaḥ pāpaṃ mayi na vidyate // Ram_2,24.6
GE09ram_02_u:1491: anuśiṣṭāsmi mātrā ca pitrā ca vividhāśrayam
GE09ram_02_u:1492: nāsmi samprati vaktavyā vartitavyaṃ yathā mayā // Ram_2,24.8
GE09ram_02_u:1493: sukhaṃ vane nivatsyāmi yathaiva bhavane pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1494: acintayantī trīṃl lokāṃś cintayantī pativratam // Ram_2,24.9
GE09ram_02_u:1496: saha raṃsye tvayā vīra vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu // Ram_2,24.10
GE09ram_02_u:1497: tvaṃ hi kartuṃ vane śakto rāma samparipālanam
GE09ram_02_u:1498: anyasyāpi janasyeha kiṃ punar mama mānada // Ram_2,24.11
GE09ram_02_u:1500: na te duḥkhaṃ kariṣyāmi nivasantī saha tvayā // Ram_2,24.12
GE09ram_02_u:1501: icchāmi saritaḥ śailān palvalāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:1502: draṣṭuṃ sarvatra nirbhītā tvayā nāthena dhīmatā // Ram_2,24.13
GE09ram_02_u:1504: iccheyaṃ sukhinī draṣṭuṃ tvayā vīreṇa saṃgatā // Ram_2,24.14
GE09ram_02_u:1506: evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ vāhaṃ tvayā saha // Ram_2,24.15
GE09ram_02_u:1507: svarge 'pi ca vinā vāso bhavitā yadi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1508: tvayā mama naravyāghra nāhaṃ tam api rocaye // Ram_2,24.16
GE09ram_02_u:1509: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ sudurgamaṃ mṛgāyutaṃ vānaravāraṇair yutam
GE09ram_02_u:1510: vane nivatsyāmi yathā pitur gṛhe tavaiva pādāv upagṛhya saṃmatā // Ram_2,24.17
GE09ram_02_u:1511: ananyabhāvām anuraktacetasaṃ tvayā viyuktāṃ maraṇāya niścitām
GE09ram_02_u:1512: nayasva māṃ sādhu kuruṣva yācanāṃ na te mayāto gurutā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,24.18
GE09ram_02_u:1513: tathā bruvāṇām api dharmavatsalo na ca sma sītāṃ nṛvaro ninīṣati
GE09ram_02_u:1514: uvāca caināṃ bahu saṃnivartane vane nivāsasya ca duḥkhitāṃ prati // Ram_2,24.19
GE09ram_02_u:1515: sa evaṃ bruvatīṃ sītāṃ dharmajño dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1516: nivartanārthe dharmātmā vākyam etad uvāca ha // Ram_2,25.1
GE09ram_02_u:1517: sīte mahākulīnāsi dharme ca niratā sadā
GE09ram_02_u:1518: ihācara svadharmaṃ tvaṃ mā yathā manasaḥ sukham // Ram_2,25.2
GE09ram_02_u:1519: sīte yathā tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tathā kāryaṃ tvayābale
GE09ram_02_u:1520: vane doṣā hi bahavo vadatas tān nibodha me // Ram_2,25.3
GE09ram_02_u:1522: bahudoṣaṃ hi kāntāraṃ vanam ity abhidhīyate // Ram_2,25.4
GE09ram_02_u:1524: sadā sukhaṃ na jānāmi duḥkham eva sadā vanam // Ram_2,25.5
GE09ram_02_u:1526: siṃhānāṃ ninadā duḥkhāḥ śrotuṃ duḥkham ato vanam // Ram_2,25.6
GE09ram_02_u:1528: rātriṣu śramakhinnena tasmād duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.7
GE09ram_02_u:1531: atīva vātas timiraṃ bubhukṣā cātra nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1532: bhayāni ca mahānty atra tato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.9
GE09ram_02_u:1533: sarīsṛpāś ca bahavo bahurūpāś ca bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:1534: caranti pṛthivīṃ darpād ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.10
GE09ram_02_u:1536: tiṣṭhanty āvṛtya panthānam ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.11
