GE09ram_02_u:1537: pataṃgā vṛścikāḥ kīṭā daṃśāś ca maśakaiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:1538: bādhante nityam abale sarvaṃ duḥkham ato vanam // Ram_2,25.12
GE09ram_02_u:1539: drumāḥ kaṇṭakinaś caiva kuśakāśāś ca bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:1540: vane vyākulaśākhāgrās tena duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.13
GE09ram_02_u:1541: tad alaṃ te vanaṃ gatvā kṣamaṃ na hi vanaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:1542: vimṛśann iha paśyāmi bahudoṣataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.14
GE09ram_02_u:1543: vanaṃ tu netuṃ na kṛtā matis tadā babhūva rāmeṇa yadā mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:1544: na tasya sītā vacanaṃ cakāra tat tato 'bravīd rāmam idaṃ suduḥkhitā // Ram_2,25.15
GE09ram_02_u:1545: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sītā rāmasya duḥkhitā
GE09ram_02_u:1546: prasaktāśrumukhī mandam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,26.1
GE09ram_02_u:1547: ye tvayā kīrtitā doṣā vane vastavyatāṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:1548: guṇān ity eva tān viddhi tava snehapuraskṛtān // Ram_2,26.2
GE09ram_02_u:1549: tvayā ca saha gantavyaṃ mayā gurujanājñayā
GE09ram_02_u:1550: tvadviyogena me rāma tyaktavyam iha jīvitam // Ram_2,26.3
GE09ram_02_u:1551: na ca māṃ tvatsamīpasthām api śaknoti rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1552: surāṇām īśvaraḥ śakraḥ pradharṣayitum ojasā // Ram_2,26.4
GE09ram_02_u:1553: patihīnā tu yā nārī na sā śakṣyati jīvitum
GE09ram_02_u:1554: kāmam evaṃvidhaṃ rāma tvayā mama vidarśitam // Ram_2,26.5
GE09ram_02_u:1555: atha cāpi mahāprājña brāhmaṇānāṃ mayā śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:1556: purā pitṛgṛhe satyaṃ vastavyaṃ kila me vane // Ram_2,26.6
GE09ram_02_u:1559: ādeśo vanavāsasya prāptavyaḥ sa mayā kila
GE09ram_02_u:1560: sā tvayā saha tatrāhaṃ yāsyāmi priya nānyathā // Ram_2,26.8
GE09ram_02_u:1562: kālaś cāyaṃ samutpannaḥ satyavāg bhavatu dvijaḥ // Ram_2,26.9
GE09ram_02_u:1563: vanavāse hi jānāmi duḥkhāni bahudhā kila
GE09ram_02_u:1564: prāpyante niyataṃ vīra puruṣair akṛtātmabhiḥ // Ram_2,26.10
GE09ram_02_u:1565: kanyayā ca pitur gehe vanavāsaḥ śruto mayā
GE09ram_02_u:1566: bhikṣiṇyāḥ sādhuvṛttāyā mama mātur ihāgrataḥ // Ram_2,26.11
GE09ram_02_u:1567: prasāditaś ca vai pūrvaṃ tvaṃ vai bahuvidhaṃ prabho
GE09ram_02_u:1568: gamanaṃ vanavāsasya kāṅkṣitaṃ hi saha tvayā // Ram_2,26.12
GE09ram_02_u:1569: kṛtakṣaṇāhaṃ bhadraṃ te gamanaṃ prati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1570: vanavāsasya śūrasya caryā hi mama rocate // Ram_2,26.13
GE09ram_02_u:1572: bhartāram anugacchantī bhartā hi mama daivatam // Ram_2,26.14
GE09ram_02_u:1573: pretyabhāve 'pi kalyāṇaḥ saṃgamo me saha tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:1574: śrutir hi śrūyate puṇyā brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśasvinām // Ram_2,26.15
GE09ram_02_u:1575: iha loke ca pitṛbhir yā strī yasya mahāmate
GE09ram_02_u:1576: adbhir dattā svadharmeṇa pretyabhāve 'pi tasya sā // Ram_2,26.16
GE09ram_02_u:1577: evam asmāt svakāṃ nārīṃ suvṛttāṃ hi pativratām
GE09ram_02_u:1578: nābhirocayase netuṃ tvaṃ māṃ keneha hetunā // Ram_2,26.17
GE09ram_02_u:1579: bhaktāṃ pativratāṃ dīnāṃ māṃ samāṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1581: yadi māṃ duḥkhitām evaṃ vanaṃ netuṃ na cecchasi
GE09ram_02_u:1582: viṣam agniṃ jalaṃ vāham āsthāsye mṛtyukāraṇāt // Ram_2,26.19
GE09ram_02_u:1583: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ taṃ sā yācate gamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:1584: nānumene mahābāhus tāṃ netuṃ vijanaṃ vanam // Ram_2,26.20
GE09ram_02_u:1585: evam uktā tu sā cintāṃ maithilī samupāgatā
GE09ram_02_u:1586: snāpayantīva gām uṣṇair aśrubhir nayanacyutaiḥ // Ram_2,26.21
GE09ram_02_u:1587: cintayantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu nivartayitum ātmavān
GE09ram_02_u:1588: krodhāviṣṭāṃ tu vaidehīṃ kākutstho bahv asāntvayat // Ram_2,26.22
GE09ram_02_u:1592: praṇayāc cābhimānāc ca paricikṣepa rāghavam // Ram_2,27.2
GE09ram_02_u:1593: kiṃ tvāmanyata vaidehaḥ pitā me mithilādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1594: rāma jāmātaraṃ prāpya striyaṃ puruṣavigraham // Ram_2,27.3
GE09ram_02_u:1596: tejo nāsti paraṃ rāme tapatīva divākare // Ram_2,27.4
GE09ram_02_u:1597: kiṃ hi kṛtvā viṣaṇṇas tvaṃ kuto vā bhayam asti te
GE09ram_02_u:1598: yat parityaktukāmas tvaṃ mām ananyaparāyaṇām // Ram_2,27.5
GE09ram_02_u:1600: sāvitrīm iva māṃ viddhi tvam ātmavaśavartinīm // Ram_2,27.6
GE09ram_02_u:1601: na tv ahaṃ manasāpy anyaṃ draṣṭāsmi tvadṛte 'nagha
GE09ram_02_u:1602: tvayā rāghava gaccheyaṃ yathānyā kulapāṃsanī // Ram_2,27.7
GE09ram_02_u:1603: svayaṃ tu bhāryāṃ kaumārīṃ ciram adhyuṣitāṃ satīm
GE09ram_02_u:1604: śailūṣa iva māṃ rāma parebhyo dātum icchasi // Ram_2,27.8
GE09ram_02_u:1605: sa mām anādāya vanaṃ na tvaṃ prasthātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:1606: tapo vā yadi vāraṇyaṃ svargo vā syāt saha tvayā // Ram_2,27.9
GE09ram_02_u:1607: na ca me bhavitā tatra kaścit pathi pariśramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1608: pṛṣṭhatas tava gacchantyā vihāraśayaneṣv api // Ram_2,27.10
GE09ram_02_u:1610: tūlājinasamasparśā mārge mama saha tvayā // Ram_2,27.11
GE09ram_02_u:1612: rajo ramaṇa tan manye parārdhyam iva candanam // Ram_2,27.12
GE09ram_02_u:1614: kuthāstaraṇatalpeṣu kiṃ syāt sukhataraṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,27.13
GE09ram_02_u:1615: pattraṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ yat tvam alpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu
GE09ram_02_u:1616: dāsyasi svayam āhṛtya tan me 'mṛtarasopamam // Ram_2,27.14
GE09ram_02_u:1617: na mātur na pitus tatra smariṣyāmi na veśmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1618: ārtavāny upabhuñjānā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca // Ram_2,27.15
GE09ram_02_u:1619: na ca tatra gataḥ kiṃcid draṣṭum arhasi vipriyam
GE09ram_02_u:1620: matkṛte na ca te śoko na bhaviṣyāmi durbharā // Ram_2,27.16
GE09ram_02_u:1621: yas tvayā saha sa svargo nirayo yas tvayā vinā
GE09ram_02_u:1622: iti jānan parāṃ prītiṃ gaccha rāma mayā saha // Ram_2,27.17
GE09ram_02_u:1623: atha mām evam avyagrāṃ vanaṃ naiva nayiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:1624: viṣam adyaiva pāsyāmi mā viśaṃ dviṣatāṃ vaśam // Ram_2,27.18
GE09ram_02_u:1625: paścād api hi duḥkhena mama naivāsti jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:1626: ujjhitāyās tvayā nātha tadaiva maraṇaṃ varam // Ram_2,27.19
GE09ram_02_u:1627: idaṃ hi sahituṃ śokaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe
GE09ram_02_u:1628: kiṃ punar daśavarṣāṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca duḥkhitā // Ram_2,27.20
GE09ram_02_u:1629: iti sā śokasaṃtaptā vilapya karuṇaṃ bahu
GE09ram_02_u:1630: cukrośa patim āyastā bhṛśam āliṅgya sasvaram // Ram_2,27.21
GE09ram_02_u:1631: sā viddhā bahubhir vākyair digdhair iva gajāṅganā
GE09ram_02_u:1635: tāṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ visaṃjñām iva duḥkhitām
GE09ram_02_u:1636: uvāca vacanaṃ rāmaḥ pariviśvāsayaṃs tadā // Ram_2,27.24
GE09ram_02_u:1637: na devi tava duḥkhena svargam apy abhirocaye
GE09ram_02_u:1638: na hi me 'sti bhayaṃ kiṃcit svayambhor iva sarvataḥ // Ram_2,27.25
GE09ram_02_u:1640: vāsaṃ na rocaye 'raṇye śaktimān api rakṣaṇe // Ram_2,27.26
GE09ram_02_u:1641: yat sṛṣṭāsi mayā sārdhaṃ vanavāsāya maithili
GE09ram_02_u:1642: na vihātuṃ mayā śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā // Ram_2,27.27
GE09ram_02_u:1643: dharmas tu gajanāsoru sadbhir ācaritaḥ purā
GE09ram_02_u:1644: taṃ cāham anuvarte 'dya yathā sūryaṃ suvarcalā // Ram_2,27.28
GE09ram_02_u:1645: eṣa dharmas tu suśroṇi pitur mātuś ca vaśyatā
GE09ram_02_u:1646: ataś cājñāṃ vyatikramya nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe // Ram_2,27.29
GE09ram_02_u:1647: sa māṃ pitā yathā śāsti satyadharmapathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1648: tathā vartitum icchāmi sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1649: anugacchasva māṃ bhīru sahadharmacarī bhava // Ram_2,27.30
GE09ram_02_u:1650: brāhmaṇebhyaś ca ratnāni bhikṣukebhyaś ca bhojanam
GE09ram_02_u:1651: dehi cāśaṃsamānebhyaḥ saṃtvarasva ca māciram // Ram_2,27.31
GE09ram_02_u:1652: anukūlaṃ tu sā bhartur jñātvā gamanam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1653: kṣipraṃ pramuditā devī dātum evopacakrame // Ram_2,27.32
GE09ram_02_u:1654: tataḥ prahṛṣṭā paripūrṇamānasā yaśasvinī bhartur avekṣya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:1655: dhanāni ratnāni ca dātum aṅganā pracakrame dharmabhṛtāṃ manasvinī // Ram_2,27.33
GE09ram_02_u:1657: sthitaṃ prāggāminaṃ vīraṃ yācamānaṃ kṛtāñjalim // Ram_2,28.1
GE09ram_02_u:1658: mayādya saha saumitre tvayi gacchati tad vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1659: ko bhariṣyati kausalyāṃ sumitrāṃ vā yaśasvinīm // Ram_2,28.2
GE09ram_02_u:1660: abhivarṣati kāmair yaḥ parjanyaḥ pṛthivīm iva
GE09ram_02_u:1662: sā hi rājyam idaṃ prāpya nṛpasyāśvapateḥ sutā
GE09ram_02_u:1663: duḥkhitānāṃ sapatnīnāṃ na kariṣyati śobhanam // Ram_2,28.4
GE09ram_02_u:1664: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā
GE09ram_02_u:1665: pratyuvāca tadā rāmaṃ vākyajño vākyakovidam // Ram_2,28.5
GE09ram_02_u:1667: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca prayato nātra saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,28.6
GE09ram_02_u:1668: kausalyā bibhṛyād āryā sahasram api madvidhān
GE09ram_02_u:1669: yasyāḥ sahasraṃ grāmāṇāṃ samprāptam upajīvanam // Ram_2,28.7
GE09ram_02_u:1671: agratas te gamiṣyāmi panthānam anudarśayan // Ram_2,28.8
GE09ram_02_u:1672: āhariṣyāmi te nityaṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:1673: vanyāni yāni cānyāni svāhārāṇi tapasvinām // Ram_2,28.9
GE09ram_02_u:1674: bhavāṃs tu saha vaidehyā girisānuṣu raṃsyate
GE09ram_02_u:1675: ahaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi jāgrataḥ svapataś ca te // Ram_2,28.10
GE09ram_02_u:1676: rāmas tv anena vākyena suprītaḥ pratyuvāca tam
GE09ram_02_u:1677: vrajāpṛcchasva saumitre sarvam eva suhṛjjanam // Ram_2,28.11
GE09ram_02_u:1678: ye ca rājño dadau divye mahātmā varuṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:1683: sa tvam āyudham ādāya kṣipram āvraja lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,28.14
GE09ram_02_u:1687: rāmāya darśayāmāsa saumitriḥ sarvam āyudham // Ram_2,28.16
GE09ram_02_u:1688: tam uvācātmavān rāmaḥ prītyā lakṣmaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:1689: kāle tvam āgataḥ saumya kāṅkṣite mama lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,28.17
GE09ram_02_u:1690: ahaṃ pradātum icchāmi yad idaṃ māmakaṃ dhanam
GE09ram_02_u:1691: brāhmaṇebhyas tapasvibhyas tvayā saha paraṃtapa // Ram_2,28.18
GE09ram_02_u:1693: teṣām api ca me bhūyaḥ sarveṣāṃ copajīvinām // Ram_2,28.19
GE09ram_02_u:1694: vasiṣṭhaputraṃ tu suyajñam āryaṃ tvam ānayāśu pravaraṃ dvijānām
GE09ram_02_u:1695: abhiprayāsyāmi vanaṃ samastān abhyarcya śiṣṭān aparān dvijātīn // Ram_2,28.20
GE09ram_02_u:1696: tataḥ śāsanam ājñāya bhrātuḥ śubhataraṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:1697: gatvā sa praviveśāśu suyajñasya niveśanam // Ram_2,29.1
GE09ram_02_u:1699: sakhe 'bhyāgaccha paśya tvaṃ veśma duṣkarakāriṇaḥ // Ram_2,29.2
GE09ram_02_u:1700: tataḥ saṃdhyām upāsyāśu gatvā saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:1701: juṣṭaṃ tat prāviśal lakṣmyā ramyaṃ rāmaniveśanam // Ram_2,29.3
GE09ram_02_u:1702: tam āgataṃ vedavidaṃ prāñjaliḥ sītayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:1705: sahemasūtrair maṇibhiḥ keyūrair valayair api // Ram_2,29.5
GE09ram_02_u:1706: anyaiś ca ratnair bahubhiḥ kākutsthaḥ pratyapūjayat
GE09ram_02_u:1707: suyajñaṃ sa tadovāca rāmaḥ sītāpracoditaḥ // Ram_2,29.6
GE09ram_02_u:1708: hāraṃ ca hemasūtraṃ ca bhāryāyai saumya hāraya
GE09ram_02_u:1709: raśanāṃ cādhunā sītā dātum icchati te sakhe // Ram_2,29.7
GE09ram_02_u:1711: tam apīcchati vaidehī pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ tvayi // Ram_2,29.8
GE09ram_02_u:1712: nāgaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma mātulo yaṃ dadau mama
GE09ram_02_u:1713: taṃ te gajasahasreṇa dadāmi dvijapuṃgava // Ram_2,29.9
GE09ram_02_u:1714: ity uktaḥ sa hi rāmeṇa suyajñaḥ pratigṛhya tat
GE09ram_02_u:1716: atha bhrātaram avyagraṃ priyaṃ rāmaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1717: saumitriṃ tam uvācedaṃ brahmeva tridaśeśvaram // Ram_2,29.11
GE09ram_02_u:1718: agastyaṃ kauśikaṃ caiva tāv ubhau brāhmaṇottamau
GE09ram_02_u:1719: arcayāhūya saumitre ratnaiḥ sasyam ivāmbubhiḥ // Ram_2,29.12
GE09ram_02_u:1720: kausalyāṃ ca ya āśīrbhir bhaktaḥ paryupatiṣṭhati
GE09ram_02_u:1721: ācāryas taittirīyāṇām abhirūpaś ca vedavit // Ram_2,29.13
GE09ram_02_u:1722: tasya yānaṃ ca dāsīś ca saumitre saṃpradāpaya
GE09ram_02_u:1723: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi yāvat tuṣyati sa dvijaḥ // Ram_2,29.14
GE09ram_02_u:1725: toṣayainaṃ mahārhaiś ca ratnair vastrair dhanais tathā // Ram_2,29.15
GE09ram_02_u:1726: śālivāhasahasraṃ ca dve śate bhadrakāṃs tathā
GE09ram_02_u:1727: vyañjanārthaṃ ca saumitre gosahasram upākuru // Ram_2,29.16
GE09ram_02_u:1728: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:1729: yathoktaṃ brāhmaṇendrāṇām adadād dhanado yathā // Ram_2,29.17
GE09ram_02_u:1732: lakṣmaṇasya ca yad veśma gṛhaṃ ca yad idaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:1733: aśūnyaṃ kāryam ekaikaṃ yāvadāgamanaṃ mama // Ram_2,29.19
GE09ram_02_u:1734: ity uktvā duḥkhitaṃ sarvaṃ janaṃ tam upajīvinam
GE09ram_02_u:1736: tato 'sya dhanam ājahruḥ sarvam evopajīvinaḥ // Ram_2,29.20
GE09ram_02_u:1737: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1739: tatrāsīt piṅgalo gārgyas trijaṭo nāma vai dvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1740: ā pañcamāyāḥ kakṣyāyā nainaṃ kaścid avārayat // Ram_2,29.22
GE09ram_02_u:1741: sa rājaputram āsādya trijaṭo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1743: uñchavṛttir vane nityaṃ pratyavekṣasva mām iti // Ram_2,29.23
GE09ram_02_u:1745: gavāṃ sahasram apy ekaṃ na tu viśrāṇitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:1746: parikṣipasi daṇḍena yāvat tāvad avāpsyasi // Ram_2,29.24
GE09ram_02_u:1747: sa śāṭīṃ tvaritaḥ kaṭyāṃ saṃbhrāntaḥ pariveṣṭya tām
GE09ram_02_u:1748: āvidhya daṇḍaṃ cikṣepa sarvaprāṇena vegitaḥ // Ram_2,29.25
GE09ram_02_u:1749: uvāca ca tato rāmas taṃ gārgyam abhisāntvayan
GE09ram_02_u:1750: manyur na khalu kartavyaḥ parihāso hy ayaṃ mama // Ram_2,29.26
GE09ram_02_u:1751: tataḥ sabhāryas trijaṭo mahāmunir gavām anīkaṃ pratigṛhya moditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1752: yaśobalaprītisukhopabṛṃhiṇīs tad āśiṣaḥ pratyavadan mahātmanaḥ // Ram_2,29.27
GE09ram_02_u:1753: dattvā tu saha vaidehyā brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ bahu
GE09ram_02_u:1754: jagmatuḥ pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ sītayā saha rāghavau // Ram_2,30.1
GE09ram_02_u:1758: adhiruhya janaḥ śrīmān udāsīno vyalokayat // Ram_2,30.3
GE09ram_02_u:1759: na hi rathyāḥ sma śakyante gantuṃ bahujanākulāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1760: āruhya tasmāt prāsādān dīnāḥ paśyanti rāghavam // Ram_2,30.4
GE09ram_02_u:1761: padātiṃ varjitacchattraṃ rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1763: yaṃ yāntam anuyāti sma caturaṅgabalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:1764: tam ekaṃ sītayā sārdham anuyāti sma lakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,30.6
GE09ram_02_u:1765: aiśvaryasya rasajñaḥ san kāmināṃ caiva kāmadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1766: necchaty evānṛtaṃ kartuṃ pitaraṃ dharmagauravāt // Ram_2,30.7
GE09ram_02_u:1767: yā na śakyā purā draṣṭuṃ bhūtair ākāśagair api
GE09ram_02_u:1768: tām adya sītāṃ paśyanti rājamārgagatā janāḥ // Ram_2,30.8
GE09ram_02_u:1770: varṣam uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca neṣyaty āśu vivarṇatām // Ram_2,30.9
GE09ram_02_u:1771: adya nūnaṃ daśarathaḥ sattvam āviśya bhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:1772: na hi rājā priyaṃ putraṃ vivāsayitum arhati // Ram_2,30.10
GE09ram_02_u:1774: kiṃ punar yasya loko 'yaṃ jito vṛttena kevalam // Ram_2,30.11
GE09ram_02_u:1775: ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ śrutaṃ śīlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1776: rāghavaṃ śobhayanty ete ṣaḍguṇāḥ puruṣottamam // Ram_2,30.12
GE09ram_02_u:1779: pīḍayā pīḍitaṃ sarvaṃ jagad asya jagatpateḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1781: te lakṣmaṇa iva kṣipraṃ sapatnyaḥ sahabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1782: gacchantam anugacchāmo yena gacchati rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,30.15
GE09ram_02_u:1783: udyānāni parityajya kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:1789: vanaṃ nagaram evāstu yena gacchati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1790: asmābhiś ca parityaktaṃ puraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ vanam // Ram_2,30.19
GE09ram_02_u:1792: asmattyaktaṃ prapadyantāṃ sevyamānaṃ tyajantu ca // Ram_2,30.20
GE09ram_02_u:1794: śuśrāva rāmaḥ śrutvā ca na vicakre 'sya mānasam // Ram_2,30.21
GE09ram_02_u:1796: jagāma rāmaḥ pitaraṃ didṛkṣuḥ pitur nideśaṃ vidhivac cikīrṣuḥ // Ram_2,30.22
GE09ram_02_u:1797: tat pūrvam aikṣvākasuto mahātmā rāmo gamiṣyan vanam ārtarūpam
GE09ram_02_u:1798: vyatiṣṭhata prekṣya tadā sumantraṃ pitur mahātmā pratihāraṇārtham // Ram_2,30.23
GE09ram_02_u:1799: pitur nideśena tu dharmavatsalo vanapraveśe kṛtabuddhiniścayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1800: sa rāghavaḥ prekṣya sumantram abravīn nivedayasvāgamanaṃ nṛpāya me // Ram_2,30.24
GE09ram_02_u:1802: praviśya nṛpatiṃ sūto niḥśvasantaṃ dadarśa ha // Ram_2,31.1
GE09ram_02_u:1804: rāmam evānuśocantaṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir āsadat // Ram_2,31.2
GE09ram_02_u:1805: ayaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra dvāri tiṣṭhati te sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1806: brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā sarvaṃ caivopajīvinām // Ram_2,31.3
GE09ram_02_u:1807: sa tvā paśyatu bhadraṃ te rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1808: sarvān suhṛda āpṛcchya tvām idānīṃ didṛkṣate // Ram_2,31.4
GE09ram_02_u:1810: vṛtaṃ rājaguṇaiḥ sarvair ādityam iva raśmibhiḥ // Ram_2,31.5
GE09ram_02_u:1812: ākāśa iva niṣpaṅko narendraḥ pratyuvāca tam // Ram_2,31.6
GE09ram_02_u:1813: sumantrānaya me dārān ye kecid iha māmakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1814: dāraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvair draṣṭum icchāmi rāghavam // Ram_2,31.7
GE09ram_02_u:1815: so 'ntaḥpuram atītyaiva striyas tā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1816: āryo hvayati vo rājā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // Ram_2,31.8
GE09ram_02_u:1817: evam uktāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ sumantreṇa nṛpājñayā
GE09ram_02_u:1818: pracakramus tad bhavanaṃ bhartur ājñāya śāsanam // Ram_2,31.9
GE09ram_02_u:1820: kausalyāṃ parivāryātha śanair jagmur dhṛtavratāḥ // Ram_2,31.10
GE09ram_02_u:1822: uvāca rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sumantrānaya me sutam // Ram_2,31.11
GE09ram_02_u:1823: sa sūto rāmam ādāya lakṣmaṇaṃ maithilīṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:1825: sa rājā putram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrāt kṛtāñjalim
GE09ram_02_u:1828: tam asaṃprāpya duḥkhārtaḥ papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ // Ram_2,31.14
GE09ram_02_u:1829: taṃ rāmo 'bhyapatat kṣipraṃ lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1830: visaṃjñam iva duḥkhena saśokaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā // Ram_2,31.15
GE09ram_02_u:1832: hā hā rāmeti sahasā bhūṣaṇadhvanimūrchitaḥ // Ram_2,31.16
GE09ram_02_u:1833: taṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:1834: paryaṅke sītayā sārdhaṃ rudantaḥ samaveśayan // Ram_2,31.17
GE09ram_02_u:1837: āpṛcche tvāṃ mahārāja sarveṣām īśvaro 'si naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1838: prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ paśya tvaṃ kuśalena mām // Ram_2,31.19
GE09ram_02_u:1839: lakṣmaṇaṃ cānujānīhi sītā cānveti māṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1840: kāraṇair bahubhis tathyair vāryamāṇau na cecchataḥ // Ram_2,31.20
GE09ram_02_u:1841: anujānīhi sarvān naḥ śokam utsṛjya mānada
GE09ram_02_u:1842: lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca prajāpatir iva prajāḥ // Ram_2,31.21
GE09ram_02_u:1844: uvāca rājā samprekṣya vanavāsāya rāghavam // Ram_2,31.22
GE09ram_02_u:1846: ayodhyāyās tvam evādya bhava rājā nigṛhya mām // Ram_2,31.23
GE09ram_02_u:1847: evam ukto nṛpatinā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1850: ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi na me kāryaṃ tvayānṛtam // Ram_2,31.25
GE09ram_02_u:1853: adya tv idānīṃ rajanīṃ putra mā gaccha sarvathā
GE09ram_02_u:1854: mātaraṃ māṃ ca saṃpaśyan vasemām adya śarvarīm
GE09ram_02_u:1855: tarpitaḥ sarvakāmais tvaṃ śvaḥkāle sādhayiṣyasi // Ram_2,31.27
GE09ram_02_u:1856: atha rāmas tathā śrutvā pitur ārtasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:1857: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dīno vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,31.28
GE09ram_02_u:1858: prāpsyāmi yān adya guṇān ko me śvastān pradāsyati
GE09ram_02_u:1859: apakramaṇam evātaḥ sarvakāmair ahaṃ vṛṇe // Ram_2,31.29
GE09ram_02_u:1861: mayā visṛṣṭā vasudhā bharatāya pradīyatām // Ram_2,31.30
GE09ram_02_u:1862: apagacchatu te duḥkhaṃ mā bhūr bāṣpapariplutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1863: na hi kṣubhyati durdharṣaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // Ram_2,31.31
GE09ram_02_u:1864: naivāhaṃ rājyam icchāmi na sukhaṃ na ca maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:1865: tvām ahaṃ satyam icchāmi nānṛtaṃ puruṣarṣabha // Ram_2,31.32
GE09ram_02_u:1866: puraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca mahī ca kevalā mayā nisṛṣṭā bharatāya dīyatām
GE09ram_02_u:1867: ahaṃ nideśaṃ bhavato 'nupālayan vanaṃ gamiṣyāmi cirāya sevitum // Ram_2,31.33
GE09ram_02_u:1868: mayā nisṛṣṭāṃ bharato mahīm imāṃ saśailakhaṇḍāṃ sapurāṃ sakānanām
GE09ram_02_u:1869: śivāṃ susīmām anuśāstu kevalaṃ tvayā yad uktaṃ nṛpate yathāstu tat // Ram_2,31.34
GE09ram_02_u:1870: na me tathā pārthiva dhīyate mano mahatsu kāmeṣu na cātmanaḥ priye
GE09ram_02_u:1871: yathā nideśe tava śiṣṭasaṃmate vyapaitu duḥkhaṃ tava matkṛte 'nagha // Ram_2,31.35
GE09ram_02_u:1872: tad adya naivānagha rājyam avyayaṃ na sarvakāmān na sukhaṃ na maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:1873: na jīvitaṃ tvām anṛtena yojayan vṛṇīya satyaṃ vratam astu te tathā // Ram_2,31.36
GE09ram_02_u:1874: phalāni mūlāni ca bhakṣayan vane girīṃś ca paśyan saritaḥ sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:1875: vanaṃ praviśyaiva vicitrapādapaṃ sukhī bhaviṣyāmi tavāstu nirvṛtiḥ // Ram_2,31.37
GE09ram_02_u:1877: sabāṣpam atiniḥśvasya jagādedaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,32.1
GE09ram_02_u:1882: ye cainam upajīvanti ramate yaiś ca vīryataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1883: teṣāṃ bahuvidhaṃ dattvā tān apy atra niyojaya // Ram_2,32.4
GE09ram_02_u:1884: nighnan mṛgān kuñjarāṃś ca pibaṃś cāraṇyakaṃ madhu
GE09ram_02_u:1885: nadīś ca vividhāḥ paśyan na rājyaṃ saṃsmariṣyati // Ram_2,32.5
GE09ram_02_u:1886: dhānyakośaś ca yaḥ kaścid dhanakośaś ca māmakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1887: tau rāmam anugacchetāṃ vasantaṃ nirjane vane // Ram_2,32.6
GE09ram_02_u:1889: ṛṣibhiś ca samāgamya pravatsyati sukhaṃ vane // Ram_2,32.7
GE09ram_02_u:1891: sarvakāmaiḥ punaḥ śrīmān rāmaḥ saṃsādhyatām iti // Ram_2,32.8
GE09ram_02_u:1892: evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe kaikeyyā bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:1893: mukhaṃ cāpy agamacchoṣaṃ svaraś cāpi nyarudhyata // Ram_2,32.9
GE09ram_02_u:1894: sā viṣaṇṇā ca saṃtrastā kaikeyī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1895: rājyaṃ gatajanaṃ sādho pītamaṇḍāṃ surām iva
GE09ram_02_u:1899: vahantaṃ kiṃ tudasi māṃ niyujya dhuri māhite // Ram_2,32.11
GE09ram_02_u:1900: kaikeyī dviguṇaṃ kruddhā rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1901: tavaiva vaṃśe sagaro jyeṣṭhaṃ putram upārudhat
GE09ram_02_u:1902: asamañja iti khyātaṃ tathāyaṃ gantum arhati // Ram_2,32.12
GE09ram_02_u:1903: evam ukto dhig ity eva rājā daśaratho 'bravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1904: vrīḍitaś ca janaḥ sarvaḥ sā ca tan nāvabudhyata // Ram_2,32.13
GE09ram_02_u:1905: tatra vṛddho mahāmātraḥ siddhārtho nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1906: śucir bahumato rājñaḥ kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,32.14
GE09ram_02_u:1907: asamañjo gṛhītvā tu krīḍitaḥ pathi dārakān
GE09ram_02_u:1908: sarayvāḥ prakṣipann apsu ramate tena durmatiḥ // Ram_2,32.15
GE09ram_02_u:1909: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāgarāḥ sarve kruddhā rājānam abruvan
GE09ram_02_u:1910: asamañjaṃ vṛṇīṣvaikam asmān vā rāṣṭravardhana // Ram_2,32.16
GE09ram_02_u:1911: tān uvāca tato rājā kiṃnimittam idaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:1912: tāś cāpi rājñā saṃpṛṣṭā vākyaṃ prakṛtayo 'bruvan // Ram_2,32.17
GE09ram_02_u:1913: krīḍitas tv eṣa naḥ putrān bālān udbhrāntacetanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1914: sarayvāṃ prakṣipan maurkhyād atulāṃ prītim aśnute // Ram_2,32.18
GE09ram_02_u:1915: sa tāsāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā prakṛtīnāṃ narādhipa
GE09ram_02_u:1916: taṃ tatyājāhitaṃ putraṃ tāsāṃ priyacikīrṣayā // Ram_2,32.19
GE09ram_02_u:1917: ity evam atyajad rājā sagaro vai sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1918: rāmaḥ kim akarot pāpaṃ yenaivam uparudhyate // Ram_2,32.20
GE09ram_02_u:1920: śokopahatayā vācā kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,32.21
GE09ram_02_u:1921: anuvrajiṣyāmy aham adya rāmaṃ rājyaṃ parityajya sukhaṃ dhanaṃ ca
GE09ram_02_u:1922: sahaiva rājñā bharatena ca tvaṃ yathā sukhaṃ bhuṅkṣva cirāya rājyam // Ram_2,32.22
GE09ram_02_u:1924: anvabhāṣata vākyaṃ tu vinayajño vinītavat // Ram_2,33.1
GE09ram_02_u:1925: tyaktabhogasya me rājan vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1926: kiṃ kāryam anuyātreṇa tyaktasaṅgasya sarvataḥ // Ram_2,33.2
GE09ram_02_u:1927: yo hi dattvā dvipaśreṣṭhaṃ kakṣyāyāṃ kurute manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1928: rajjusnehena kiṃ tasya tyajataḥ kuñjarottamam // Ram_2,33.3
GE09ram_02_u:1929: tathā mama satāṃ śreṣṭha kiṃ dhvajinyā jagatpate
GE09ram_02_u:1930: sarvāṇy evānujānāmi cīrāṇy evānayantu me // Ram_2,33.4
GE09ram_02_u:1932: caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi vasato mama // Ram_2,33.5
GE09ram_02_u:1933: atha cīrāṇi kaikeyī svayam āhṛtya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:1935: sa cīre puruṣavyāghraḥ kaikeyyāḥ pratigṛhya te
GE09ram_02_u:1936: sūkṣmavastram avakṣipya munivastrāṇy avasta ha // Ram_2,33.7
GE09ram_02_u:1937: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tatraiva vihāya vasane śubhe
GE09ram_02_u:1938: tāpasāc chādane caiva jagrāha pitur agrataḥ // Ram_2,33.8
GE09ram_02_u:1940: samīkṣya cīraṃ saṃtrastā pṛṣatī vāgurām iva // Ram_2,33.9
GE09ram_02_u:1943: kathaṃ nu cīraṃ badhnanti munayo vanavāsinaḥ // Ram_2,33.10
GE09ram_02_u:1944: kṛtvā kaṇṭhe ca sā cīram ekam ādāya pāṇinā
GE09ram_02_u:1945: tasthau hy akuśalā tatra vrīḍitā janakātmajā // Ram_2,33.11
GE09ram_02_u:1946: tasyās tat kṣipram āgamya rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1947: cīraṃ babandha sītāyāḥ kauśeyasyopari svayam // Ram_2,33.12
GE09ram_02_u:1949: pracukrośa janaḥ sarvo dhik tvāṃ daśarathaṃ tv iti // Ram_2,33.13
GE09ram_02_u:1950: sa niḥśvasyoṣṇam aikṣvākas tāṃ bhāryām idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1951: kaikeyi kuśacīreṇa na sītā gantum arhati // Ram_2,33.14
GE09ram_02_u:1952: nanu paryāptam etat te pāpe rāmavivāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:1953: kim ebhiḥ kṛpaṇair bhūyaḥ pātakair api te kṛtaiḥ // Ram_2,33.15
GE09ram_02_u:1954: evaṃ bruvantaṃ pitaraṃ rāmaḥ samprasthito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1955: avākśirasam āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,33.16
GE09ram_02_u:1956: iyaṃ dhārmika kausalyā mama mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:1957: vṛddhā cākṣudraśīlā ca na ca tvāṃ devagarhite // Ram_2,33.17
GE09ram_02_u:1960: imāṃ mahendropamajātagarbhiṇīṃ tathā vidhātuṃ jananīṃ mamārhasi
GE09ram_02_u:1961: yathā vanasthe mayi śokakarśitā na jīvitaṃ nyasya yamakṣayaṃ vrajet // Ram_2,33.19
GE09ram_02_u:1962: rāmasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā muniveṣadharaṃ ca tam
GE09ram_02_u:1963: samīkṣya saha bhāryābhī rājā vigatacetanaḥ // Ram_2,34.1
GE09ram_02_u:1965: na cainam abhisamprekṣya pratyabhāṣata durmanāḥ // Ram_2,34.2
GE09ram_02_u:1966: sa muhūrtam ivāsaṃjño duḥkhitaś ca mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1968: manye khalu mayā pūrvaṃ vivatsā bahavaḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1969: prāṇino hiṃsitā vāpi tasmād idam upasthitam // Ram_2,34.4
GE09ram_02_u:1970: na tv evānāgate kāle dehāc cyavati jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:1971: kaikeyyā kliśyamānasya mṛtyur mama na vidyate // Ram_2,34.5
GE09ram_02_u:1973: vihāya vasane sūkṣme tāpasācchādam ātmajam // Ram_2,34.6
GE09ram_02_u:1974: ekasyāḥ khalu kaikeyyāḥ kṛte 'yaṃ kliśyate janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1975: svārthe prayatamānāyāḥ saṃśritya nikṛtiṃ tv imām // Ram_2,34.7
GE09ram_02_u:1976: evam uktvā tu vacanaṃ bāṣpeṇa pihitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1977: rāmeti sakṛd evoktvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha // Ram_2,34.8
GE09ram_02_u:1978: saṃjñāṃ tu pratilabhyaiva muhūrtāt sa mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1979: netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ sumantram idam abravīt // Ram_2,34.9
GE09ram_02_u:1980: aupavāhyaṃ rathaṃ yuktvā tvam āyāhi hayottamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1981: prāpayainaṃ mahābhāgam ito janapadāt param // Ram_2,34.10
GE09ram_02_u:1982: evaṃ manye guṇavatāṃ guṇānāṃ phalam ucyate
GE09ram_02_u:1983: pitrā mātrā ca yat sādhur vīro nirvāsyate vanam // Ram_2,34.11
GE09ram_02_u:1985: yojayitvāyayau tatra ratham aśvair alaṃkṛtam // Ram_2,34.12
GE09ram_02_u:1989: uvāca deśakālajño niścitaṃ sarvataḥ śuci // Ram_2,34.14
GE09ram_02_u:1990: vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:1991: varṣāṇy etāni saṃkhyāya vaidehyāḥ kṣipram ānaya // Ram_2,34.15
GE09ram_02_u:1992: narendreṇaivam uktas tu gatvā kośagṛhaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1993: prāyacchat sarvam āhṛtya sītāyai kṣipram eva tat // Ram_2,34.16
GE09ram_02_u:1994: sā sujātā sujātāni vaidehī prasthitā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1995: bhūṣayāmāsa gātrāṇi tair vicitrair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ // Ram_2,34.17
GE09ram_02_u:1997: udyato 'ṃśumataḥ kāle khaṃ prabheva vivasvataḥ // Ram_2,34.18
GE09ram_02_u:1998: tāṃ bhujābhyāṃ pariṣvajya śvaśrūr vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1999: anācarantīṃ kṛpaṇaṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya maithilīm // Ram_2,34.19
GE09ram_02_u:2002: sa tvayā nāvamantavyaḥ putraḥ pravrājito mama
GE09ram_02_u:2003: tava daivatam astv eṣa nirdhanaḥ sadhano 'pi vā // Ram_2,34.21
GE09ram_02_u:2005: kṛtāñjalir uvācedaṃ śvaśrūm abhimukhe sthitā // Ram_2,34.22
GE09ram_02_u:2006: kariṣye sarvam evāham āryā yad anuśāsti mām
GE09ram_02_u:2007: abhijñāsmi yathā bhartur vartitavyaṃ śrutaṃ ca me // Ram_2,34.23
GE09ram_02_u:2009: dharmād vicalituṃ nāham alaṃ candrād iva prabhā // Ram_2,34.24
GE09ram_02_u:2010: nātantrī vādyate vīṇā nācakro vartate rathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2011: nāpatiḥ sukham edhate yā syād api śatātmajā // Ram_2,34.25
GE09ram_02_u:2012: mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ mātā mitaṃ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2013: amitasya hi dātāraṃ bhartāraṃ kā na pūjayet // Ram_2,34.26
GE09ram_02_u:2015: ārye kim avamanyeyaṃ strīṇāṃ bhartā hi daivatam // Ram_2,34.27
GE09ram_02_u:2019: rāmaḥ paramadharmajño mātaraṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,34.29
GE09ram_02_u:2020: amba mā duḥkhitā bhūs tvaṃ paśya tvaṃ pitaraṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:2021: kṣayo hi vanavāsasya kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,34.30
GE09ram_02_u:2022: suptāyās te gamiṣyanti navavarṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:2023: sā samagram iha prāptaṃ māṃ drakṣyasi suhṛdvṛtam // Ram_2,34.31
GE09ram_02_u:2024: etāvad abhinītārtham uktvā sa jananīṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2025: trayaḥ śataśatārdhā hi dadarśāvekṣya mātaraḥ // Ram_2,34.32
GE09ram_02_u:2026: tāś cāpi sa tathaivārtā mātṝn daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2027: dharmayuktam idaṃ vākyaṃ nijagāda kṛtāñjaliḥ // Ram_2,34.33
GE09ram_02_u:2028: saṃvāsāt paruṣaṃ kiṃcid ajñānād vāpi yat kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:2029: tan me samanujānīta sarvāś cāmantrayāmi vaḥ // Ram_2,34.34
GE09ram_02_u:2030: jajñe 'tha tāsāṃ saṃnādaḥ krauñcīnām iva niḥsvanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2031: mānavendrasya bhāryāṇām evaṃ vadati rāghave // Ram_2,34.35
GE09ram_02_u:2033: vilapitaparidevanākulaṃ vyasanagataṃ tad abhūt suduḥkhitam // Ram_2,34.36
GE09ram_02_u:2034: atha rāmaś ca sītā ca lakṣmaṇaś ca kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2035: upasaṃgṛhya rājānaṃ cakrur dīnāḥ pradakṣiṇam // Ram_2,35.1
GE09ram_02_u:2036: taṃ cāpi samanujñāpya dharmajñaḥ sītayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:2039: atha mātuḥ sumitrāyā jagrāha caraṇau punaḥ // Ram_2,35.3
GE09ram_02_u:2040: taṃ vandamānaṃ rudatī mātā saumitrim abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2041: hitakāmā mahābāhuṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya lakṣmaṇam // Ram_2,35.4
GE09ram_02_u:2043: rāme pramādaṃ mā kārṣīḥ putra bhrātari gacchati // Ram_2,35.5
GE09ram_02_u:2044: vyasanī vā samṛddho vā gatir eṣa tavānagha
GE09ram_02_u:2045: eṣa loke satāṃ dharmo yaj jyeṣṭhavaśago bhavet // Ram_2,35.6
GE09ram_02_u:2046: idaṃ hi vṛttam ucitaṃ kulasyāsya sanātanam
GE09ram_02_u:2047: dānaṃ dīkṣā ca yajñeṣu tanutyāgo mṛdheṣu ca // Ram_2,35.7
GE09ram_02_u:2048: rāmaṃ daśarathaṃ viddhi māṃ viddhi janakātmajām
GE09ram_02_u:2049: ayodhyām aṭavīṃ viddhi gaccha tāta yathāsukham // Ram_2,35.8
GE09ram_02_u:2050: tataḥ sumantraḥ kākutsthaṃ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2051: vinīto vinayajñaś ca mātalir vāsavaṃ yathā // Ram_2,35.9
GE09ram_02_u:2052: ratham āroha bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2053: kṣipraṃ tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi yatra māṃ rāma vakṣyasi // Ram_2,35.10
GE09ram_02_u:2054: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyāni vane tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:2055: tāny upakramitavyāni yāni devyāsi coditaḥ // Ram_2,35.11
GE09ram_02_u:2056: taṃ rathaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ sītā hṛṣṭena cetasā
GE09ram_02_u:2059: rathopasthe pratinyasya sacarmakaṭhinaṃ ca tat // Ram_2,35.13
GE09ram_02_u:2061: sumantraḥ saṃmatān aśvān vāyuvegasamāñ jave // Ram_2,35.14
GE09ram_02_u:2063: babhūva nagare mūrchā balamūrchā janasya ca // Ram_2,35.15
GE09ram_02_u:2067: rāmam evābhidudrāva gharmārtaḥ salilaṃ yathā // Ram_2,35.17
GE09ram_02_u:2069: bāṣpapūrṇamukhāḥ sarve tam ūcur bhṛśaduḥkhitāḥ // Ram_2,35.18
GE09ram_02_u:2070: saṃyaccha vājināṃ raśmīn sūta yāhi śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2071: mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi rāmasya durdarśaṃ no bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,35.19
GE09ram_02_u:2073: yad devagarbhapratime vanaṃ yāti na bhidyate // Ram_2,35.20
GE09ram_02_u:2075: na jahāti ratā dharme merum arkaprabhā yathā // Ram_2,35.21
GE09ram_02_u:2077: bhrātaraṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ yas tvaṃ paricariṣyasi // Ram_2,35.22
GE09ram_02_u:2078: mahaty eṣā hi te siddhir eṣa cābhyudayo mahān
GE09ram_02_u:2079: eṣa svargasya mārgaś ca yad enam anugacchasi
GE09ram_02_u:2080: evaṃ vadantas te soḍhuṃ na śekur bāṣpam āgatam // Ram_2,35.23
GE09ram_02_u:2081: atha rājā vṛtaḥ strībhir dīnābhir dīnacetanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2082: nirjagāma priyaṃ putraṃ drakṣyāmīti bruvan gṛhāt // Ram_2,35.24
GE09ram_02_u:2084: yathā nādaḥ kareṇūnāṃ baddhe mahati kuñjare // Ram_2,35.25
GE09ram_02_u:2085: pitā ca rājā kākutsthaḥ śrīmān sannas tadā babhau
GE09ram_02_u:2086: paripūrṇaḥ śaśī kāle graheṇopapluto yathā // Ram_2,35.26
GE09ram_02_u:2088: narāṇāṃ prekṣya rājānaṃ sīdantaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitam // Ram_2,35.27
GE09ram_02_u:2089: hā rāmeti janāḥ kecid rāmamāteti cāpare
GE09ram_02_u:2090: antaḥpuraṃ samṛddhaṃ ca krośantaṃ paryadevayan // Ram_2,35.28
GE09ram_02_u:2095: dṛṣṭvā saṃcodayāmāsa śīghraṃ yāhīti sārathim // Ram_2,35.30
GE09ram_02_u:2096: na hi tat puruṣavyāghro duḥkhadaṃ darśanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2097: mātuś ca sahituṃ śaktas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ // Ram_2,35.31
GE09ram_02_u:2098: tathā rudantīṃ kausalyāṃ rathaṃ tam anudhāvatīm
GE09ram_02_u:2099: krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_02_u:2100: asakṛt praikṣata tadā nṛtyantīm iva mātaram // Ram_2,35.32
GE09ram_02_u:2101: tiṣṭheti rājā cukrośa yāhi yāhīti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2102: sumantrasya babhūvātmā cakrayor iva cāntarā // Ram_2,35.33
GE09ram_02_u:2104: ciraṃ duḥkhasya pāpiṣṭham iti rāmas tam abravīt // Ram_2,35.34
GE09ram_02_u:2105: rāmasya sa vacaḥ kurvann anujñāpya ca taṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:2106: vrajato 'pi hayāñ śīghraṃ codayāmāsa sārathiḥ // Ram_2,35.35
GE09ram_02_u:2107: nyavartata jano rājño rāmaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:2108: manasāpy aśruvegaiś ca na nyavartata mānuṣam // Ram_2,35.36
GE09ram_02_u:2109: yam icchet punar āyāntaṃ nainaṃ dūram anuvrajet
GE09ram_02_u:2110: ity amātyā mahārājam ūcur daśarathaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,35.37
GE09ram_02_u:2112: niśamya rājā kṛpaṇaḥ sabhāryo vyavasthitas taṃ sutam īkṣamāṇaḥ // Ram_2,35.38
GE09ram_02_u:2114: ārtaśabdo hi saṃjajñe strīṇām antaḥpure mahān // Ram_2,36.1
GE09ram_02_u:2116: yo gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ cāsīt sa nāthaḥ kva nu gacchati // Ram_2,36.2
GE09ram_02_u:2118: kruddhān prasādayan sarvān samaduḥkhaḥ kva gacchati // Ram_2,36.3
GE09ram_02_u:2120: tathā yo vartate 'smāsu mahātmā kva nu gacchati // Ram_2,36.4
GE09ram_02_u:2122: paritrātā janasyāsya jagataḥ kva nu gacchati // Ram_2,36.5
GE09ram_02_u:2124: dharmyaṃ satyavrataṃ rāmaṃ vanavāse pravatsyati // Ram_2,36.6
GE09ram_02_u:2125: iti sarvā mahiṣyas tā vivatsā iva dhenavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2126: ruruduś caiva duḥkhārtāḥ sasvaraṃ ca vicukruśuḥ // Ram_2,36.7
GE09ram_02_u:2127: sa tam antaḥpure ghoram ārtaśabdaṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2130: vyasṛjan kavalān nāgā gāvo vatsān na pāyayan // Ram_2,36.9
GE09ram_02_u:2132: dāruṇāḥ somam abhyetya grahāḥ sarve vyavasthitāḥ // Ram_2,36.10
GE09ram_02_u:2134: viśākhāś ca sadhūmāś ca nabhasi pracakāśire // Ram_2,36.11
GE09ram_02_u:2135: akasmān nāgaraḥ sarvo jano dainyam upāgamat
GE09ram_02_u:2136: āhāre vā vihāre vā na kaścid akaron manaḥ // Ram_2,36.12
GE09ram_02_u:2138: na hṛṣṭo lakṣyate kaścit sarvaḥ śokaparāyaṇaḥ // Ram_2,36.13
GE09ram_02_u:2139: na vāti pavanaḥ śīto na śaśī saumyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2140: na sūryas tapate lokaṃ sarvaṃ paryākulaṃ jagat // Ram_2,36.14
GE09ram_02_u:2141: anarthinaḥ sutāḥ strīṇāṃ bhartāro bhrātaras tathā
GE09ram_02_u:2142: sarve sarvaṃ parityajya rāmam evānvacintayan // Ram_2,36.15
GE09ram_02_u:2143: ye tu rāmasya suhṛdaḥ sarve te mūḍhacetasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2144: śokabhāreṇa cākrāntāḥ śayanaṃ na jahus tadā // Ram_2,36.16
GE09ram_02_u:2145: tatas tv ayodhyā rahitā mahātmanā puraṃdareṇeva mahī saparvatā
GE09ram_02_u:2146: cacāla ghoraṃ bhayabhārapīḍitā sanāgayodhāśvagaṇā nanāda ca // Ram_2,36.17
GE09ram_02_u:2147: yāvat tu niryatas tasya rajorūpam adṛśyata
GE09ram_02_u:2149: yāvad rājā priyaṃ putraṃ paśyaty atyantadhārmikam
GE09ram_02_u:2151: na paśyati rajo 'py asya yadā rāmasya bhūmipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2152: tadārtaś ca viṣaṇṇaś ca papāta dharaṇītale // Ram_2,37.3
GE09ram_02_u:2153: tasya dakṣiṇam anvagāt kausalyā bāhum aṅganā
GE09ram_02_u:2154: vāmaṃ cāsyānvagāt pārśvaṃ kaikeyī bharatapriyā // Ram_2,37.4
GE09ram_02_u:2155: tāṃ nayena ca sampanno dharmeṇa vinayena ca
GE09ram_02_u:2156: uvāca rājā kaikeyīṃ samīkṣya vyathitendriyaḥ // Ram_2,37.5
GE09ram_02_u:2157: kaikeyi mā mamāṅgāni sprākṣīs tvaṃ duṣṭacāriṇī
GE09ram_02_u:2158: na hi tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi na bhāryā na ca bāndhavī // Ram_2,37.6
GE09ram_02_u:2159: ye ca tvām upajīvanti nāhaṃ teṣāṃ na te mama
GE09ram_02_u:2160: kevalārthaparāṃ hi tvāṃ tyaktadharmāṃ tyajāmy aham // Ram_2,37.7
GE09ram_02_u:2161: agṛhṇāṃ yac ca te pāṇim agniṃ paryaṇayaṃ ca yat
GE09ram_02_u:2162: anujānāmi tat sarvam asmiṃl loke paratra ca // Ram_2,37.8
GE09ram_02_u:2163: bharataś cet pratītaḥ syād rājyaṃ prāpyedam avyayam
GE09ram_02_u:2164: yan me sa dadyāt pitrarthaṃ mā mā tad dattam āgamat // Ram_2,37.9
GE09ram_02_u:2166: nyavartata tadā devī kausalyā śokakarśitā // Ram_2,37.10
GE09ram_02_u:2167: hatveva brāhmaṇaṃ kāmāt spṛṣṭvāgnim iva pāṇinā
GE09ram_02_u:2168: anvatapyata dharmātmā putraṃ saṃcintya tāpasam // Ram_2,37.11
GE09ram_02_u:2170: rājño nātibabhau rūpaṃ grastasyāṃśumato yathā // Ram_2,37.12
GE09ram_02_u:2171: vilalāpa ca duḥkhārtaḥ priyaṃ putram anusmaran
GE09ram_02_u:2172: nagarāntam anuprāptaṃ buddhvā putram athābravīt // Ram_2,37.13
GE09ram_02_u:2173: vāhanānāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vahatāṃ taṃ mamātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:2174: padāni pathi dṛśyante sa mahātmā na dṛśyate // Ram_2,37.14
GE09ram_02_u:2175: sa nūnaṃ kvacid evādya vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2176: kāṣṭhaṃ vā yadi vāśmānam upadhāya śayiṣyate // Ram_2,37.15
GE09ram_02_u:2180: rāmam utthāya gacchantaṃ lokanātham anāthavat // Ram_2,37.17
GE09ram_02_u:2181: sakāmā bhava kaikeyi vidhavā rājyam āvasa
GE09ram_02_u:2182: na hi taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ vinā jīvitum utsahe // Ram_2,37.18
GE09ram_02_u:2187: tām avekṣya purīṃ sarvāṃ rāmam evānucintayan
GE09ram_02_u:2188: vilapan prāviśad rājā gṛhaṃ sūrya ivāmbudam // Ram_2,37.21
GE09ram_02_u:2190: rāmeṇa rahitaṃ veśma vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // Ram_2,37.22
GE09ram_02_u:2191: kausalyāyā gṛhaṃ śīghraṃ rāmamātur nayantu mām
GE09ram_02_u:2192: iti bruvantaṃ rājānam anayan dvāradarśinaḥ // Ram_2,37.23
GE09ram_02_u:2194: adhiruhyāpi śayanaṃ babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ // Ram_2,37.24
GE09ram_02_u:2195: tac ca dṛṣṭvā mahārājo bhujam udyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:2196: uccaiḥ svareṇa cukrośa hā rāghava jahāsi mām // Ram_2,37.25
GE09ram_02_u:2197: sukhitā bata taṃ kālaṃ jīviṣyanti narottamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2198: pariṣvajanto ye rāmaṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam // Ram_2,37.26
GE09ram_02_u:2199: na tvāṃ paśyāmi kausalye sādhu māṃ pāṇinā spṛśa
GE09ram_02_u:2200: rāmaṃ me 'nugatā dṛṣṭir adyāpi na nivartate // Ram_2,37.27
GE09ram_02_u:2201: taṃ rāmam evānuvicintayantaṃ samīkṣya devī śayane narendram
GE09ram_02_u:2202: upopaviśyādhikam ārtarūpā viniḥśvasantī vilalāpa kṛcchram // Ram_2,37.28
GE09ram_02_u:2203: tataḥ samīkṣya śayane sannaṃ śokena pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:2204: kausalyā putraśokārtā tam uvāca mahīpatim // Ram_2,38.1
GE09ram_02_u:2206: vicariṣyati kaikeyī nirmukteva hi pannagī // Ram_2,38.2
GE09ram_02_u:2208: trāsayiṣyati māṃ bhūyo duṣṭāhir iva veśmani // Ram_2,38.3
GE09ram_02_u:2209: atha sma nagare rāmaś caran bhaikṣaṃ gṛhe vaset
GE09ram_02_u:2210: kāmakāro varaṃ dātum api dāsaṃ mamātmajam // Ram_2,38.4
GE09ram_02_u:2211: pātayitvā tu kaikeyyā rāmaṃ sthānād yatheṣṭataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2214: vanam āviśate nūnaṃ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,38.6
GE09ram_02_u:2216: tyaktānāṃ vanavāsāya kā nv avasthā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,38.7
GE09ram_02_u:2218: kathaṃ vatsyanti kṛpaṇāḥ phalamūlaiḥ kṛtāśanāḥ // Ram_2,38.8
GE09ram_02_u:2219: apīdānīṃ sa kālaḥ syān mama śokakṣayaḥ śivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2220: sabhāryaṃ yat saha bhrātrā paśyeyam iha rāghavam // Ram_2,38.9
GE09ram_02_u:2224: nandiṣyati purī hṛṣṭā samudra iva parvaṇi // Ram_2,38.11
GE09ram_02_u:2226: puraskṛtya rathe sītāṃ vṛṣabho govadhūm iva // Ram_2,38.12
GE09ram_02_u:2229: kadā sumanasaḥ kanyā dvijātīnāṃ phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:2230: pradiśantyaḥ purīṃ hṛṣṭāḥ kariṣyanti pradakṣiṇam // Ram_2,38.14
GE09ram_02_u:2232: abhyupaiṣyati dharmajñas trivarṣa iva māṃ lalan // Ram_2,38.15
GE09ram_02_u:2233: niḥsaṃśayaṃ mayā manye purā vīra kadaryayā
GE09ram_02_u:2234: pātu kāmeṣu vatseṣu mātṝṇāṃ śātitāḥ stanāḥ // Ram_2,38.16
GE09ram_02_u:2235: sāhaṃ gaur iva siṃhena vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:2236: kaikeyyā puruṣavyāghra bālavatseva gaur balāt // Ram_2,38.17
GE09ram_02_u:2237: na hi tāvad guṇair juṣṭaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam
GE09ram_02_u:2238: ekaputrā vinā putram ahaṃ jīvitum utsahe // Ram_2,38.18
GE09ram_02_u:2239: na hi me jīvite kiṃcit sāmarthyam iha kalpyate
GE09ram_02_u:2240: apaśyantyāḥ priyaṃ putraṃ mahābāhuṃ mahābalam // Ram_2,38.19
GE09ram_02_u:2241: ayaṃ hi māṃ dīpayate samutthitas tanūjaśokaprabhavo hutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2242: mahīm imāṃ raśmibhir uttamaprabho yathā nidāghe bhagavān divākaraḥ // Ram_2,38.20
GE09ram_02_u:2243: vilapantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu kausalyāṃ pramadottamām
GE09ram_02_u:2244: idaṃ dharme sthitā dharmyaṃ sumitrā vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,39.1
GE09ram_02_u:2245: tavārye sadguṇair yuktaḥ putraḥ sa puruṣottamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2246: kiṃ te vilapitenaivaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ ruditena vā // Ram_2,39.2
GE09ram_02_u:2247: yas tavārye gataḥ putras tyaktvā rājyaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2248: sādhu kurvan mahātmānaṃ pitaraṃ satyavādinām // Ram_2,39.3
GE09ram_02_u:2249: śiṣṭair ācarite samyak śaśvat pretya phalodaye
GE09ram_02_u:2250: rāmo dharme sthitaḥ śreṣṭho na sa śocyaḥ kadācana // Ram_2,39.4
GE09ram_02_u:2252: dayāvān sarvabhūteṣu lābhas tasya mahātmanaḥ // Ram_2,39.5
GE09ram_02_u:2253: araṇyavāse yad duḥkhaṃ jānatī vai sukhocitā
GE09ram_02_u:2255: kīrtibhūtāṃ patākāṃ yo loke bhrāmayati prabhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2256: damasatyavrataparaḥ kiṃ na prāptas tavātmajaḥ // Ram_2,39.7
GE09ram_02_u:2257: vyaktaṃ rāmasya vijñāya śaucaṃ māhātmyam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:2258: na gātram aṃśubhiḥ sūryaḥ saṃtāpayitum arhati // Ram_2,39.8
GE09ram_02_u:2262: raśmibhiḥ saṃspṛśañ śītaiś candramā hlādayiṣyati // Ram_2,39.10
GE09ram_02_u:2263: dadau cāstrāṇi divyāni yasmai brahmā mahaujase
GE09ram_02_u:2264: dānavendraṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā timidhvajasutaṃ raṇe // Ram_2,39.11
GE09ram_02_u:2265: pṛthivyā saha vaidehyā śriyā ca puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2266: kṣipraṃ tisṛbhir etābhiḥ saha rāmo 'bhiṣekṣyate // Ram_2,39.12
GE09ram_02_u:2267: duḥkhajaṃ visṛjanty asraṃ niṣkrāmantam udīkṣya yam
GE09ram_02_u:2268: samutsrakṣyasi netrābhyāṃ kṣipram ānandajaṃ payaḥ // Ram_2,39.13
GE09ram_02_u:2270: mudāśru mokṣyase kṣipraṃ meghalekheva vārṣikī // Ram_2,39.14
GE09ram_02_u:2271: putras te varadaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2273: niśamya tal lakṣmaṇamātṛvākyaṃ rāmasya mātur naradevapatnyāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2274: sadyaḥ śarīre vinanāśa śokaḥ śaradgato megha ivālpatoyaḥ // Ram_2,39.16
GE09ram_02_u:2276: anujagmuḥ prayāntaṃ taṃ vanavāsāya mānavāḥ // Ram_2,40.1
GE09ram_02_u:2277: nivartite 'pi ca balāt suhṛdvarge ca rājani
GE09ram_02_u:2278: naiva te saṃnyavartanta rāmasyānugatā ratham // Ram_2,40.2
GE09ram_02_u:2280: babhūva guṇasampannaḥ pūrṇacandra iva priyaḥ // Ram_2,40.3
GE09ram_02_u:2281: sa yācyamānaḥ kākutsthaḥ svābhiḥ prakṛtibhis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:2282: kurvāṇaḥ pitaraṃ satyaṃ vanam evānvapadyata // Ram_2,40.4
GE09ram_02_u:2284: uvāca rāmaḥ snehena tāḥ prajāḥ svāḥ prajā iva // Ram_2,40.5
GE09ram_02_u:2285: yā prītir bahumānaś ca mayy ayodhyānivāsinām
GE09ram_02_u:2286: matpriyārthaṃ viśeṣeṇa bharate sā niveśyatām // Ram_2,40.6
GE09ram_02_u:2288: kariṣyati yathāvad vaḥ priyāṇi ca hitāni ca // Ram_2,40.7
GE09ram_02_u:2290: anurūpaḥ sa vo bhartā bhaviṣyati bhayāpahaḥ // Ram_2,40.8
GE09ram_02_u:2291: sa hi rājaguṇair yukto yuvarājaḥ samīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2292: api cāpi mayā śiṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ vo bhartṛśāsanam // Ram_2,40.9
GE09ram_02_u:2293: na ca tapyed yathā cāsau vanavāsaṃ gate mayi
GE09ram_02_u:2294: mahārājas tathā kāryo mama priyacikīrṣayā // Ram_2,40.10
GE09ram_02_u:2296: tathā tathā prakṛtayo rāmaṃ patim akāmayan // Ram_2,40.11
GE09ram_02_u:2297: bāṣpeṇa pihitaṃ dīnaṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:2298: cakarṣeva guṇair baddhvā janaṃ punar ivāsanam // Ram_2,40.12
GE09ram_02_u:2299: te dvijās trividhaṃ vṛddhā jñānena vayasaujasā
GE09ram_02_u:2300: vayaḥprakampaśiraso dūrād ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,40.13
GE09ram_02_u:2301: vahanto javanā rāmaṃ bho bho jātyās turaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2302: nivartadhvaṃ na gantavyaṃ hitā bhavata bhartari
GE09ram_02_u:2303: upavāhyas tu vo bhartā nāpavāhyaḥ purād vanam // Ram_2,40.14
GE09ram_02_u:2304: evam ārtapralāpāṃs tān vṛddhān pralapato dvijān
GE09ram_02_u:2305: avekṣya sahasā rāmo rathād avatatāra ha // Ram_2,40.15
GE09ram_02_u:2308: dvijātīṃs tu padātīṃs tān rāmaś cāritravatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2309: na śaśāka ghṛṇācakṣuḥ parimoktuṃ rathena saḥ // Ram_2,40.17
GE09ram_02_u:2310: gacchantam eva taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ saṃbhrāntamānasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2311: ūcuḥ paramasaṃtaptā rāmaṃ vākyam idaṃ dvijāḥ // Ram_2,40.18
GE09ram_02_u:2312: brāhmaṇyaṃ kṛtsnam etat tvāṃ brahmaṇyam anugacchati
GE09ram_02_u:2313: dvijaskandhādhirūḍhās tvām agnayo 'py anuyānty amī // Ram_2,40.19
GE09ram_02_u:2317: ebhiś chāyāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ svaiś chattrair vājapeyikaiḥ // Ram_2,40.21
GE09ram_02_u:2318: yā hi naḥ satataṃ buddhir vedamantrānusāriṇī
GE09ram_02_u:2319: tvatkṛte sā kṛtā vatsa vanavāsānusāriṇī // Ram_2,40.22
GE09ram_02_u:2320: hṛdayeṣv avatiṣṭhante vedā ye naḥ paraṃ dhanam
GE09ram_02_u:2321: vatsyanty api gṛheṣv eva dārāś cāritrarakṣitāḥ // Ram_2,40.23
GE09ram_02_u:2322: na punar niścayaḥ kāryas tvadgatau sukṛtā matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2323: tvayi dharmavyapekṣe tu kiṃ syād dharmam avekṣitum // Ram_2,40.24
GE09ram_02_u:2326: bahūnāṃ vitatā yajñā dvijānāṃ ya ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2327: teṣāṃ samāptir āyattā tava vatsa nivartane // Ram_2,40.26
GE09ram_02_u:2329: yācamāneṣu teṣu tvaṃ bhaktiṃ bhakteṣu darśaya // Ram_2,40.27
GE09ram_02_u:2335: dadṛśe tamasā tatra vārayantīva rāghavam // Ram_2,40.30
GE09ram_02_u:2336: tatas tu tamasā tīraṃ ramyam āśritya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2337: sītām udvīkṣya saumitrim idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,41.1
GE09ram_02_u:2338: iyam adya niśā pūrvā saumitre prasthitā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:2339: vanavāsasya bhadraṃ te sa notkaṇṭhitum arhasi // Ram_2,41.2
GE09ram_02_u:2342: adyāyodhyā tu nagarī rājadhānī pitur mama
GE09ram_02_u:2343: sastrīpuṃsā gatān asmāñ śociṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,41.4
GE09ram_02_u:2344: bharataḥ khalu dharmātmā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca me
GE09ram_02_u:2347: nānuśocāmi pitaraṃ mātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,41.6
GE09ram_02_u:2348: tvayā kāryaṃ naravyāghra mām anuvrajatā kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:2349: anveṣṭavyā hi vaidehyā rakṣaṇārthe sahāyatā // Ram_2,41.7
GE09ram_02_u:2350: adbhir eva tu saumitre vatsyāmy adya niśām imām
GE09ram_02_u:2351: etaddhi rocate mahyaṃ vanye 'pi vividhe sati // Ram_2,41.8
GE09ram_02_u:2352: evam uktvā tu saumitraṃ sumantram api rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2353: apramattas tvam aśveṣu bhava saumyety uvāca ha // Ram_2,41.9
GE09ram_02_u:2356: upāsyatu śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā rātrim upasthitām
GE09ram_02_u:2357: rāmasya śayanaṃ cakre sūtaḥ saumitriṇā saha // Ram_2,41.11
GE09ram_02_u:2358: tāṃ śayyāṃ tamasātīre vīkṣya vṛkṣadalaiḥ kṛtām
GE09ram_02_u:2359: rāmaḥ saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sabhāryaḥ saṃviveśa ha // Ram_2,41.12
GE09ram_02_u:2360: sabhāryaṃ saṃprasuptaṃ taṃ bhrātaraṃ vīkṣya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2361: kathayāmāsa sūtāya rāmasya vividhān guṇān // Ram_2,41.13
GE09ram_02_u:2362: jāgrato hy eva tāṃ rātriṃ saumitrer udito raviḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2363: sūtasya tamasātīre rāmasya bruvato guṇān // Ram_2,41.14
GE09ram_02_u:2365: avasat tatra tāṃ rātriṃ rāmaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ saha // Ram_2,41.15
GE09ram_02_u:2366: utthāya tu mahātejāḥ prakṛtīs tā niśāmya ca
GE09ram_02_u:2367: abravīd bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ puṇyalakṣaṇam // Ram_2,41.16
GE09ram_02_u:2369: vṛkṣamūleṣu saṃsuptān paśya lakṣmaṇa sāmpratam // Ram_2,41.17
GE09ram_02_u:2371: api prāṇān asiṣyanti na tu tyakṣyanti niścayam // Ram_2,41.18
GE09ram_02_u:2372: yāvad eva tu saṃsuptās tāvad eva vayaṃ laghu
GE09ram_02_u:2373: ratham āruhya gacchāmaḥ panthānam akutobhayam // Ram_2,41.19
GE09ram_02_u:2375: svapeyur anuraktā māṃ vṛkṣamūlāni saṃśritāḥ // Ram_2,41.20
GE09ram_02_u:2376: paurā hy ātmakṛtād duḥkhād vipramocyā nṛpātmajaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2377: na tu khalv ātmanā yojyā duḥkhena puravāsinaḥ // Ram_2,41.21
GE09ram_02_u:2378: abravīl lakṣmaṇo rāmaṃ sākṣād dharmam iva sthitam
GE09ram_02_u:2379: rocate me mahāprājña kṣipram āruhyatām iti // Ram_2,41.22
GE09ram_02_u:2380: sūtas tataḥ saṃtvaritaḥ syandanaṃ tair hayottamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2382: mohanārthaṃ tu paurāṇāṃ sūtaṃ rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2383: udaṅmukhaḥ prayāhi tvaṃ ratham āsthāya sārathe // Ram_2,41.24
GE09ram_02_u:2384: muhūrtaṃ tvaritaṃ gatvā nirvartaya rathaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2385: yathā na vidyuḥ paurā māṃ tathā kuru samāhitaḥ // Ram_2,41.25
GE09ram_02_u:2386: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tathā cakre sa sārathiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2387: pratyāgamya ca rāmasya syandanaṃ pratyavedayat // Ram_2,41.26
GE09ram_02_u:2389: śīghragām ākulāvartāṃ tamasām ataran nadīm // Ram_2,41.27
GE09ram_02_u:2390: sa saṃtīrya mahābāhuḥ śrīmāñ śivam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:2392: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ paurās te rāghavaṃ vinā
GE09ram_02_u:2395: ālokam api rāmasya na paśyanti sma duḥkhitāḥ // Ram_2,41.30
GE09ram_02_u:2396: tato mārgānusāreṇa gatvā kiṃcit kṣaṇaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2399: kim idaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmo daivenopahatā iti // Ram_2,41.32
GE09ram_02_u:2401: ayodhyām agaman sarve purīṃ vyathitasajjanām // Ram_2,41.33
GE09ram_02_u:2404: svaṃ svaṃ nilayam āgamya putradāraiḥ samāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2405: aśrūṇi mumucuḥ sarve bāṣpeṇa pihitānanāḥ // Ram_2,42.2
GE09ram_02_u:2406: na cāhṛṣyan na cāmodan vaṇijo na prasārayan
GE09ram_02_u:2407: na cāśobhanta paṇyāni nāpacan gṛhamedhinaḥ // Ram_2,42.3
GE09ram_02_u:2408: naṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā nābhyanandan vipulaṃ vā dhanāgamam
GE09ram_02_u:2409: putraṃ prathamajaṃ labdhvā jananī nābhyanandata // Ram_2,42.4
GE09ram_02_u:2410: gṛhe gṛhe rudantyaś ca bhartāraṃ gṛham āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:2411: vyagarhayanta duḥkhārtā vāgbhis totrair iva dvipān // Ram_2,42.5
GE09ram_02_u:2412: kiṃ nu teṣāṃ gṛhaiḥ kāryaṃ kiṃ dāraiḥ kiṃ dhanena vā
GE09ram_02_u:2413: putrair vā kiṃ sukhair vāpi ye na paśyanti rāghavam // Ram_2,42.6
GE09ram_02_u:2414: ekaḥ satpuruṣo loke lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:2415: yo 'nugacchati kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ paricaran vane // Ram_2,42.7
GE09ram_02_u:2416: āpagāḥ kṛtapuṇyās tāḥ padminyaś ca sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:2417: yeṣu snāsyati kākutstho vigāhya salilaṃ śuci // Ram_2,42.8
GE09ram_02_u:2419: āpagāś ca mahānūpāḥ sānumantaś ca parvatāḥ // Ram_2,42.9
GE09ram_02_u:2420: kānanaṃ vāpi śailaṃ vā yaṃ rāmo 'bhigamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:2421: priyātithim iva prāptaṃ nainaṃ śakṣyanty anarcitum // Ram_2,42.10
GE09ram_02_u:2423: akāle cāpi mukhyāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:2424: darśayiṣyanty anukrośād girayo rāmam āgatam // Ram_2,42.11
GE09ram_02_u:2425: vidarśayanto vividhān bhūyaś citrāṃś ca nirjharān
GE09ram_02_u:2427: yatra rāmo bhayaṃ nātra nāsti tatra parābhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2428: sa hi śūro mahābāhuḥ putro daśarathasya ca // Ram_2,42.13
GE09ram_02_u:2429: purā bhavati no dūrād anugacchāma rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:2431: sa hi nātho janasyāsya sa gatiḥ sa parāyaṇam // Ram_2,42.14
GE09ram_02_u:2432: vayaṃ paricariṣyāmaḥ sītāṃ yūyaṃ tu rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:2433: iti paurastriyo bhartṝn duḥkhārtās tat tad abruvan // Ram_2,42.15
GE09ram_02_u:2438: kaikeyyā yadi ced rājyaṃ syād adharmyam anāthavat
GE09ram_02_u:2439: na hi no jīvitenārthaḥ kutaḥ putraiḥ kuto dhanaiḥ // Ram_2,42.18
GE09ram_02_u:2440: yayā putraś ca bhartā ca tyaktāv aiśvaryakāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:2441: kaṃ sā parihared anyaṃ kaikeyī kulapāṃsanī // Ram_2,42.19
GE09ram_02_u:2442: kaikeyyā na vayaṃ rājye bhṛtakā nivasema hi
GE09ram_02_u:2443: jīvantyā jātu jīvantyaḥ putrair api śapāmahe // Ram_2,42.20
GE09ram_02_u:2445: kas tāṃ prāpya sukhaṃ jīved adharmyāṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm // Ram_2,42.21
GE09ram_02_u:2446: na hi pravrajite rāme jīviṣyati mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2447: mṛte daśarathe vyaktaṃ vilopas tadanantaram // Ram_2,42.22
GE09ram_02_u:2449: rāghavaṃ vānugacchadhvam aśrutiṃ vāpi gacchata // Ram_2,42.23
GE09ram_02_u:2451: bharate saṃnisṛṣṭāḥ smaḥ saunike paśavo yathā // Ram_2,42.24
GE09ram_02_u:2452: tās tathā vilapantyas tu nagare nāgarastriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2453: cukruśur bhṛśasaṃtaptā mṛtyor iva bhayāgame // Ram_2,42.25
GE09ram_02_u:2454: tathā striyo rāmanimittam āturā yathā sute bhrātari vā vivāsite
GE09ram_02_u:2455: vilapya dīnā rurudur vicetasaḥ sutair hi tāsām adhiko hi so 'bhavat // Ram_2,42.26
GE09ram_02_u:2457: jagāma puruṣavyāghraḥ pitur ājñām anusmaran // Ram_2,43.1
GE09ram_02_u:2458: tathaiva gacchatas tasya vyapāyād rajanī śivā
GE09ram_02_u:2459: upāsya sa śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ viṣayāntaṃ vyagāhata // Ram_2,43.2
GE09ram_02_u:2460: grāmān vikṛṣṭasīmāṃs tān puṣpitāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:2461: paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ śarair iva hayottamaiḥ // Ram_2,43.3
GE09ram_02_u:2463: rājānaṃ dhig daśarathaṃ kāmasya vaśam āgatam // Ram_2,43.4
GE09ram_02_u:2465: tīkṣṇā saṃbhinnamaryādā tīkṣṇe karmaṇi vartate // Ram_2,43.5
GE09ram_02_u:2466: yā putram īdṛśaṃ rājñaḥ pravāsayati dhārmikam
GE09ram_02_u:2469: śṛṇvann atiyayau vīraḥ kosalān kosaleśvaraḥ // Ram_2,43.7
GE09ram_02_u:2472: gatvā tu suciraṃ kālaṃ tataḥ śītajalāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:2474: gomatīṃ cāpy atikramya rāghavaḥ śīghragair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2476: sa mahīṃ manunā rājñā dattām ikṣvākave purā
GE09ram_02_u:2477: sphītāṃ rāṣṭrāvṛtāṃ rāmo vaidehīm anvadarśayat // Ram_2,43.11
GE09ram_02_u:2478: sūta ity eva cābhāṣya sārathiṃ tam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2480: kadāhaṃ punar āgamya sarayvāḥ puṣpite vane
GE09ram_02_u:2481: mṛgayāṃ paryaṭiṣyāmi mātrā pitrā ca saṃgataḥ // Ram_2,43.13
GE09ram_02_u:2483: ratir hy eṣātulā loke rājarṣigaṇasaṃmatā // Ram_2,43.14
GE09ram_02_u:2484: sa tam adhvānam aikṣvākaḥ sūtaṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_02_u:2485: taṃ tam artham abhipretya yayau vākyam udīrayan // Ram_2,43.15
GE09ram_02_u:2489: dadarśa rāghavo gaṅgāṃ puṇyām ṛṣiniṣevitām // Ram_2,44.2
GE09ram_02_u:2491: śiśumāraiś ca nakraiś ca bhujaṃgaiś ca niṣevitām // Ram_2,44.3
GE09ram_02_u:2493: sumantram abravīt sūtam ihaivādya vasāmahe // Ram_2,44.4
GE09ram_02_u:2496: lakṣaṇaś ca sumantraś ca bāḍham ity eva rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:2497: uktvā tam iṅgudīvṛkṣaṃ tadopayayatur hayaiḥ // Ram_2,44.6
GE09ram_02_u:2499: rathād avātarat tasmāt sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,44.7
GE09ram_02_u:2502: tatra rājā guho nāma rāmasyātmasamaḥ sakhā
GE09ram_02_u:2503: niṣādajātyo balavān sthapatiś ceti viśrutaḥ // Ram_2,44.9
GE09ram_02_u:2504: sa śrutvā puruṣavyāghraṃ rāmaṃ viṣayam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:2505: vṛddhaiḥ parivṛto 'mātyair jñātibhiś cāpy upāgataḥ // Ram_2,44.10
GE09ram_02_u:2507: saha saumitriṇā rāmaḥ samāgacchad guhena saḥ // Ram_2,44.11
GE09ram_02_u:2508: tam ārtaḥ sampariṣvajya guho rāghavam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2509: yathāyodhyā tathedaṃ te rāma kiṃ karavāṇi te // Ram_2,44.12
GE09ram_02_u:2511: arghyaṃ copānayat kṣipraṃ vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha // Ram_2,44.13
GE09ram_02_u:2512: svāgataṃ te mahābāho taveyam akhilā mahī
GE09ram_02_u:2513: vayaṃ preṣyā bhavān bhartā sādhu rājyaṃ praśādhi naḥ // Ram_2,44.14
GE09ram_02_u:2514: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca lehyaṃ cedam upasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:2515: śayanāni ca mukhyāni vājināṃ khādanaṃ ca te // Ram_2,44.15
GE09ram_02_u:2516: guham eva bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:2517: arcitāś caiva hṛṣṭāś ca bhavatā sarvathā vayam // Ram_2,44.16
GE09ram_02_u:2519: bhujābhyāṃ sādhuvṛttābhyāṃ pīḍayan vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,44.17
GE09ram_02_u:2520: diṣṭyā tvāṃ guha paśyāmi arogaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2521: api te kuśalaṃ rāṣṭre mitreṣu ca dhaneṣu ca // Ram_2,44.18
GE09ram_02_u:2522: yat tv idaṃ bhavatā kiṃcit prītyā samupakalpitam
GE09ram_02_u:2523: sarvaṃ tad anujānāmi na hi varte pratigrahe // Ram_2,44.19
GE09ram_02_u:2525: viddhi praṇihitaṃ dharme tāpasaṃ vanagocaram // Ram_2,44.20
GE09ram_02_u:2528: ete hi dayitā rājñaḥ pitur daśarathasya me
GE09ram_02_u:2529: etaiḥ suvihitair aśvair bhaviṣyāmy aham arcitaḥ // Ram_2,44.22
GE09ram_02_u:2530: aśvānāṃ pratipānaṃ ca khādanaṃ caiva so 'nvaśāt
GE09ram_02_u:2531: guhas tatraiva puruṣāṃs tvaritaṃ dīyatām iti // Ram_2,44.23
GE09ram_02_u:2533: jalam evādade bhojyaṃ lakṣmaṇenāhṛtaṃ svayam // Ram_2,44.24
GE09ram_02_u:2534: tasya bhūmau śayānasya pādau prakṣālya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2535: sabhāryasya tato 'bhyetya tasthau vṛkṣam upāśritaḥ // Ram_2,44.25
GE09ram_02_u:2537: anvajāgrat tato rāmam apramatto dhanurdharaḥ // Ram_2,44.26
GE09ram_02_u:2538: tathā śayānasya tato 'sya dhīmato yaśasvino dāśarather mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2539: adṛṣṭaduḥkhasya sukhocitasya sā tadā vyatīyāya cireṇa śarvarī // Ram_2,44.27
GE09ram_02_u:2540: taṃ jāgratam adambhena bhrātur arthāya lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:2541: guhaḥ saṃtāpasaṃtapto rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,45.1
GE09ram_02_u:2542: iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā
GE09ram_02_u:2543: pratyāśvasihi sādhv asyāṃ rājaputra yathāsukham // Ram_2,45.2
GE09ram_02_u:2544: ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ kleśānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2545: guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmaḥ kākutsthasya vayaṃ niśām // Ram_2,45.3
GE09ram_02_u:2546: na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaścana
GE09ram_02_u:2547: bravīmy etad ahaṃ satyaṃ satyenaiva ca te śape // Ram_2,45.4
GE09ram_02_u:2548: asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2549: dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām // Ram_2,45.5
GE09ram_02_u:2550: so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:2551: rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvato jñātibhiḥ saha // Ram_2,45.6
GE09ram_02_u:2552: na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃcid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:2553: caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ sumahat prasahemahi // Ram_2,45.7
GE09ram_02_u:2555: nātra bhītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā // Ram_2,45.8
GE09ram_02_u:2556: kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:2557: śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā // Ram_2,45.9
GE09ram_02_u:2558: yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi
GE09ram_02_u:2559: taṃ paśya sukhasaṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā // Ram_2,45.10
GE09ram_02_u:2560: yo mantratapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2562: asmin pravrajito rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:2563: vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,45.12
GE09ram_02_u:2566: kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama
GE09ram_02_u:2567: nāśaṃse yadi jīvanti sarve te śarvarīm imām // Ram_2,45.14
GE09ram_02_u:2568: jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā
GE09ram_02_u:2569: tad duḥkhaṃ yat tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati // Ram_2,45.15
GE09ram_02_u:2573: rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati // Ram_2,45.17
GE09ram_02_u:2574: siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite
GE09ram_02_u:2581: sukhitā vicariṣyanti rājadhānīṃ pitur mama // Ram_2,45.21
GE09ram_02_u:2586: tathā hi satyaṃ bruvati prajāhite narendraputre gurusauhṛdād guhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2587: mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyasanābhipīḍito jvarāturo nāga iva vyathāturaḥ // Ram_2,45.24
GE09ram_02_u:2589: uvāca rāmaḥ saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam // Ram_2,46.1
GE09ram_02_u:2591: asau sukṛṣṇo vihagaḥ kokilas tāta kūjati // Ram_2,46.2
GE09ram_02_u:2592: barhiṇānāṃ ca nirghoṣaḥ śrūyate nadatāṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:2593: tarāma jāhnavīṃ saumya śīghragāṃ sāgaraṃgamām // Ram_2,46.3
GE09ram_02_u:2595: guham āmantrya sūtaṃ ca so 'tiṣṭhad bhrātur agrataḥ // Ram_2,46.4
GE09ram_02_u:2596: tataḥ kalāpān saṃnahya khaḍgau baddhvā ca dhanvinau
GE09ram_02_u:2597: jagmatur yena tau gaṅgāṃ sītayā saha rāghavau // Ram_2,46.5
GE09ram_02_u:2598: rāmam eva tu dharmajñam upagamya vinītavat
GE09ram_02_u:2599: kim ahaṃ karavāṇīti sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // Ram_2,46.6
GE09ram_02_u:2601: yānaṃ vihāya padbhyāṃ tu gamiṣyāmo mahāvanam // Ram_2,46.7
GE09ram_02_u:2602: ātmānaṃ tv abhyanujñātam avekṣyārtaḥ sa sārathiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2603: sumantraḥ puruṣavyāghram aikṣvākam idam abravīt // Ram_2,46.8
GE09ram_02_u:2605: tava sabhrātṛbhāryasya vāsaḥ prākṛtavad vane // Ram_2,46.9
GE09ram_02_u:2606: na manye brahmacarye 'sti svadhīte vā phalodayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2607: mārdavārjavayor vāpi tvāṃ ced vyasanam āgatam // Ram_2,46.10
GE09ram_02_u:2608: saha rāghava vaidehyā bhrātrā caiva vane vasan
GE09ram_02_u:2609: tvaṃ gatiṃ prāpsyase vīra trīṃl lokāṃs tu jayann iva // Ram_2,46.11
GE09ram_02_u:2610: vayaṃ khalu hatā rāma ye tayāpy upavañcitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2611: kaikeyyā vaśam eṣyāmaḥ pāpāyā duḥkhabhāginaḥ // Ram_2,46.12
GE09ram_02_u:2612: iti bruvann ātmasamaṃ sumantraḥ sārathis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:2613: dṛṣṭvā dūragataṃ rāmaṃ duḥkhārto rurude ciram // Ram_2,46.13
GE09ram_02_u:2614: tatas tu vigate bāṣpe sūtaṃ spṛṣṭodakaṃ śucim
GE09ram_02_u:2615: rāmas tu madhuraṃ vākyaṃ punaḥ punar uvāca tam // Ram_2,46.14
GE09ram_02_u:2617: yathā daśaratho rājā māṃ na śocet tathā kuru // Ram_2,46.15
GE09ram_02_u:2619: kāmabhārāvasannaś ca tasmād etad bravīmi te // Ram_2,46.16
GE09ram_02_u:2620: yad yad ājñāpayet kiṃcit sa mahātmā mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2621: kaikeyyāḥ priyakāmārthaṃ kāryaṃ tad avikāṅkṣayā // Ram_2,46.17
GE09ram_02_u:2623: yad eṣāṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu mano na pratihanyate // Ram_2,46.18
GE09ram_02_u:2624: tad yathā sa mahārājo nālīkam adhigacchati
GE09ram_02_u:2625: na ca tāmyati duḥkhena sumantra kuru tat tathā // Ram_2,46.19
GE09ram_02_u:2627: brūyās tvam abhivādyaiva mama hetor idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,46.20
GE09ram_02_u:2628: naivāham anuśocāmi lakṣmaṇo na ca maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:2629: ayodhyāyāś cyutāś ceti vane vatsyāmaheti vā // Ram_2,46.21
GE09ram_02_u:2631: lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca drakṣyasi kṣipram āgatān // Ram_2,46.22
GE09ram_02_u:2632: evam uktvā tu rājānaṃ mātaraṃ ca sumantra me
GE09ram_02_u:2633: anyāś ca devīḥ sahitāḥ kaikeyīṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,46.23
GE09ram_02_u:2635: sītāyā mama cāryasya vacanāl lakṣmaṇasya ca // Ram_2,46.24
GE09ram_02_u:2636: brūyāś ca hi mahārājaṃ bharataṃ kṣipram ānaya
GE09ram_02_u:2637: āgataś cāpi bharataḥ sthāpyo nṛpamate pade // Ram_2,46.25
GE09ram_02_u:2639: asmatsaṃtāpajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na tvām abhibhaviṣyati // Ram_2,46.26
GE09ram_02_u:2640: bharataś cāpi vaktavyo yathā rājani vartase
GE09ram_02_u:2641: tathā mātṛṣu vartethāḥ sarvāsv evāviśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,46.27
GE09ram_02_u:2642: yathā ca tava kaikeyī sumitrā cāviśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2643: tathaiva devī kausalyā mama mātā viśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,46.28
GE09ram_02_u:2645: tat sarvaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā snehāt kākutstham abravīt // Ram_2,46.29
GE09ram_02_u:2646: yad ahaṃ nopacāreṇa brūyāṃ snehād aviklavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2647: bhaktimān iti tat tāvad vākyaṃ tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi // Ram_2,46.30
GE09ram_02_u:2648: kathaṃ hi tvadvihīno 'haṃ pratiyāsyāmi tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:2649: tava tāta viyogena putraśokākulām iva // Ram_2,46.31
GE09ram_02_u:2650: sarāmam api tāvan me rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2651: vinā rāmaṃ rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidīryetāpi sā purī // Ram_2,46.32
GE09ram_02_u:2652: dainyaṃ hi nagarī gacched dṛṣṭvā śūnyam imaṃ ratham
GE09ram_02_u:2653: sūtāvaśeṣaṃ svaṃ sainyaṃ hatavīram ivāhave // Ram_2,46.33
GE09ram_02_u:2655: cintayantyo 'dya nūnaṃ tvāṃ nirāhārāḥ kṛtāḥ prajāḥ // Ram_2,46.34
GE09ram_02_u:2656: ārtanādo hi yaḥ paurair muktas tadvipravāsane
GE09ram_02_u:2657: rathasthaṃ māṃ niśāmyaiva kuryuḥ śataguṇaṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,46.35
GE09ram_02_u:2658: ahaṃ kiṃ cāpi vakṣyāmi devīṃ tava suto mayā
GE09ram_02_u:2659: nīto 'sau mātulakulaṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kṛthā iti // Ram_2,46.36
GE09ram_02_u:2660: asatyam api naivāhaṃ brūyāṃ vacanam īdṛśam
GE09ram_02_u:2661: katham apriyam evāhaṃ brūyāṃ satyam idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,46.37
GE09ram_02_u:2663: kathaṃ rathaṃ tvayā hīnaṃ pravakṣyanti hayottamāḥ // Ram_2,46.38
GE09ram_02_u:2664: yadi me yācamānasya tyāgam eva kariṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:2665: saratho 'gniṃ pravekṣyāmi tyaktamātra iha tvayā // Ram_2,46.39
GE09ram_02_u:2667: rathena pratibādhiṣye tāni sattvāni rāghava // Ram_2,46.40
GE09ram_02_u:2668: tvatkṛte na mayā prāptaṃ rathacaryākṛtaṃ sukham
GE09ram_02_u:2671: prītyābhihitam icchāmi bhava me patyanantaraḥ // Ram_2,46.42
GE09ram_02_u:2672: tava śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mūrdhnā kariṣyāmi vane vasan
GE09ram_02_u:2673: ayodhyāṃ devalokaṃ vā sarvathā prajahāmy aham // Ram_2,46.43
GE09ram_02_u:2674: na hi śakyā praveṣṭuṃ sā mayāyodhyā tvayā vinā
GE09ram_02_u:2676: ime cāpi hayā vīra yadi te vanavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2677: paricaryāṃ kariṣyanti prāpsyanti paramāṃ gatim // Ram_2,46.45
GE09ram_02_u:2678: vanavāse kṣayaṃ prāpte mamaiṣa hi manorathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2679: yad anena rathenaiva tvāṃ vaheyaṃ purīṃ punaḥ // Ram_2,46.46
GE09ram_02_u:2680: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi sahitasya tvayā vane
GE09ram_02_u:2681: kṣaṇabhūtāni yāsyanti śataśas tu tato 'nyathā // Ram_2,46.47
GE09ram_02_u:2683: bhaktaṃ bhṛtyaṃ sthitaṃ sthityāṃ tvaṃ na māṃ hātum arhasi // Ram_2,46.48
GE09ram_02_u:2684: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dīnaṃ yācamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2685: rāmo bhṛtyānukampī tu sumantram idam abravīt // Ram_2,46.49
GE09ram_02_u:2686: jānāmi paramāṃ bhaktiṃ mayi te bhartṛvatsala
GE09ram_02_u:2687: śṛṇu cāpi yadarthaṃ tvāṃ preṣayāmi purīm itaḥ // Ram_2,46.50
GE09ram_02_u:2688: nagarīṃ tvāṃ gataṃ dṛṣṭvā jananī me yavīyasī
GE09ram_02_u:2689: kaikeyī pratyayaṃ gacched iti rāmo vanaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,46.51
GE09ram_02_u:2690: parituṣṭā hi sā devī vanavāsaṃ gate mayi
GE09ram_02_u:2692: eṣa me prathamaḥ kalpo yad ambā me yavīyasī
GE09ram_02_u:2694: mama priyārthaṃ rājñaś ca sarathas tvaṃ purīṃ vraja
GE09ram_02_u:2695: saṃdiṣṭaś cāsi yānarthāṃs tāṃs tān brūyās tathātathā // Ram_2,46.54
GE09ram_02_u:2696: ity uktvā vacanaṃ sūtaṃ sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2697: guhaṃ vacanam aklībaṃ rāmo hetumad abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2698: jaṭāḥ kṛtvā gamiṣyāmi nyagrodhakṣīram ānaya // Ram_2,46.55
GE09ram_02_u:2699: tat kṣīraṃ rājaputrāya guhaḥ kṣipram upāharat
GE09ram_02_u:2700: lakṣmaṇasyātmanaś caiva rāmas tenākaroj jaṭāḥ // Ram_2,46.56
GE09ram_02_u:2704: vratam ādiṣṭavān rāmaḥ sahāyaṃ guham abravīt // Ram_2,46.58
GE09ram_02_u:2705: apramatto bale kośe durge janapade tathā
GE09ram_02_u:2706: bhavethā guha rājyaṃ hi durārakṣatamaṃ matam // Ram_2,46.59
GE09ram_02_u:2708: jagāma tūrṇam avyagraḥ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,46.60
GE09ram_02_u:2709: sa tu dṛṣṭvā nadītīre nāvam ikṣvākunandanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2710: titīrṣuḥ śīghragāṃ gaṅgām idaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_2,46.61
GE09ram_02_u:2711: āroha tvaṃ naravyāghra sthitāṃ nāvam imāṃ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2713: sa bhrātuḥ śāsanaṃ śrutvā sarvam apratikūlayan
GE09ram_02_u:2714: āropya maithilīṃ pūrvam ārurohātmavāṃs tataḥ // Ram_2,46.63
GE09ram_02_u:2716: tato niṣādādhipatir guho jñātīn acodayat // Ram_2,46.64
GE09ram_02_u:2717: anujñāya sumantraṃ ca sabalaṃ caiva taṃ guham
GE09ram_02_u:2718: āsthāya nāvaṃ rāmas tu codayāmāsa nāvikān // Ram_2,46.65
GE09ram_02_u:2719: tatas taiś coditā sā nauḥ karṇadhārasamāhitā
GE09ram_02_u:2721: madhyaṃ tu samanuprāpya bhāgīrathyās tv aninditā
GE09ram_02_u:2722: vaidehī prāñjalir bhūtvā tāṃ nadīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,46.67
GE09ram_02_u:2724: nideśaṃ pālayatv enaṃ gaṅge tvadabhirakṣitaḥ // Ram_2,46.68
GE09ram_02_u:2725: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi samagrāṇy uṣya kānane
GE09ram_02_u:2726: bhrātrā saha mayā caiva punaḥ pratyāgamiṣyati // Ram_2,46.69
GE09ram_02_u:2727: tatas tvāṃ devi subhage kṣemeṇa punar āgatā
GE09ram_02_u:2729: tvaṃ hi tripathagā devi brahmalokaṃ samīkṣase
GE09ram_02_u:2731: sā tvāṃ devi namasyāmi praśaṃsāmi ca śobhane
GE09ram_02_u:2732: prāptarājye naravyāghre śivena punar āgate // Ram_2,46.72
GE09ram_02_u:2733: gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi vastrāṇy annaṃ ca peśalam
GE09ram_02_u:2735: tathā saṃbhāṣamāṇā sā sītā gaṅgām aninditā
GE09ram_02_u:2736: dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇaṃ tīraṃ kṣipram evābhyupāgamat // Ram_2,46.74
GE09ram_02_u:2737: tīraṃ tu samanuprāpya nāvaṃ hitvā nararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2738: prātiṣṭhata saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca paraṃtapaḥ // Ram_2,46.75
GE09ram_02_u:2740: agrato gaccha saumitre sītā tvām anugacchatu // Ram_2,46.76
GE09ram_02_u:2741: pṛṣṭhato 'haṃ gamiṣyāmi tvāṃ ca sītāṃ ca pālayan
GE09ram_02_u:2742: adya duḥkhaṃ tu vaidehī vanavāsasya vetsyati // Ram_2,46.77
GE09ram_02_u:2743: gataṃ tu gaṅgāparapāram āśu rāmaṃ sumantraḥ pratataṃ nirīkṣya
GE09ram_02_u:2744: adhvaprakarṣād vinivṛttadṛṣṭir mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyathitas tapasvī // Ram_2,46.78
GE09ram_02_u:2745: tau tatra hatvā caturo mahāmṛgān varāham ṛśyaṃ pṛṣataṃ mahārurum
GE09ram_02_u:2746: ādāya medhyaṃ tvaritaṃ bubhukṣitau vāsāya kāle yayatur vanaspatim // Ram_2,46.79
GE09ram_02_u:2747: sa taṃ vṛkṣaṃ samāsādya saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām
GE09ram_02_u:2748: rāmo ramayatāṃ śreṣṭha iti hovāca lakṣmaṇam // Ram_2,47.1
GE09ram_02_u:2749: adyeyaṃ prathamā rātrir yātā janapadād bahiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2750: yā sumantreṇa rahitā tāṃ notkaṇṭhitum arhasi // Ram_2,47.2
GE09ram_02_u:2752: yogakṣemo hi sītāyā vartate lakṣmaṇāvayoḥ // Ram_2,47.3
GE09ram_02_u:2754: upāvartāmahe bhūmāv āstīrya svayam ārjitaiḥ // Ram_2,47.4
GE09ram_02_u:2756: imāḥ saumitraye rāmo vyājahāra kathāḥ śubhāḥ // Ram_2,47.5
GE09ram_02_u:2757: dhruvam adya mahārājo duḥkhaṃ svapiti lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:2758: kṛtakāmā tu kaikeyī tuṣṭā bhavitum arhati // Ram_2,47.6
GE09ram_02_u:2759: sā hi devī mahārājaṃ kaikeyī rājyakāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:2760: api na cyāvayet prāṇān dṛṣṭvā bharatam āgatam // Ram_2,47.7
GE09ram_02_u:2761: anāthaś caiva vṛddhaś ca mayā caiva vinākṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2762: kiṃ kariṣyati kāmātmā kaikeyyā vaśam āgataḥ // Ram_2,47.8
GE09ram_02_u:2763: idaṃ vyasanam ālokya rājñaś ca mativibhramam
GE09ram_02_u:2764: kāma evārdhadharmābhyāṃ garīyān iti me matiḥ // Ram_2,47.9
GE09ram_02_u:2765: ko hy avidvān api pumān pramadāyāḥ kṛte tyajet
GE09ram_02_u:2766: chandānuvartinaṃ putraṃ tāto mām iva lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,47.10
GE09ram_02_u:2767: sukhī bata sabhāryaś ca bharataḥ kekayīsutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2768: muditān kosalān eko yo bhokṣyaty adhirājavat // Ram_2,47.11
GE09ram_02_u:2769: sa hi sarvasya rājyasya mukham ekaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:2770: tāte ca vayasātīte mayi cāraṇyam āśrite // Ram_2,47.12
GE09ram_02_u:2772: evam āpadyate kṣipraṃ rājā daśaratho yathā // Ram_2,47.13
GE09ram_02_u:2774: kaikeyī saumya samprāptā rājyāya bharatasya ca // Ram_2,47.14
GE09ram_02_u:2776: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca samprabādheta matkṛte // Ram_2,47.15
GE09ram_02_u:2777: mā sma matkāraṇād devī sumitrā duḥkham āvaset
GE09ram_02_u:2778: ayodhyām ita eva tvaṃ kāle praviśa lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,47.16
GE09ram_02_u:2779: aham eko gamiṣyāmi sītayā saha daṇḍakān
GE09ram_02_u:2780: anāthāyā hi nāthas tvaṃ kausalyāyā bhaviṣyasi // Ram_2,47.17
GE09ram_02_u:2781: kṣudrakarmā hi kaikeyī dveṣād anyāyyam ācaret
GE09ram_02_u:2782: paridadyā hi dharmajñe bharate mama mātaram // Ram_2,47.18
GE09ram_02_u:2783: nūnaṃ jātyantare kasmin striyaḥ putrair viyojitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2784: jananyā mama saumitre tad apy etad upasthitam // Ram_2,47.19
GE09ram_02_u:2786: viprāyujyata kausalyā phalakāle dhig astu mām // Ram_2,47.20
GE09ram_02_u:2787: mā sma sīmantinī kācij janayet putram īdṛśam
GE09ram_02_u:2788: saumitre yo 'ham ambāyā dadmi śokam anantakam // Ram_2,47.21
GE09ram_02_u:2789: manye prītiviśiṣṭā sā matto lakṣmaṇa śārikā
GE09ram_02_u:2790: yasyās tac chrūyate vākyaṃ śuka pādam arer daśa // Ram_2,47.22
GE09ram_02_u:2792: putreṇa kim aputrāyā mayā kāryam ariṃdama // Ram_2,47.23
GE09ram_02_u:2793: alpabhāgyā hi me mātā kausalyā rahitā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:2795: eko hy aham ayodhyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:2796: tareyam iṣubhiḥ kruddho nanu vīryam akāraṇam // Ram_2,47.25
GE09ram_02_u:2798: tena lakṣmaṇa nādyāham ātmānam abhiṣecaye // Ram_2,47.26
GE09ram_02_u:2799: etad anyac ca karuṇaṃ vilapya vijane bahu
GE09ram_02_u:2800: aśrupūrṇamukho rāmo niśi tūṣṇīm upāviśat // Ram_2,47.27
GE09ram_02_u:2802: samudram iva nirvegam āśvāsayata lakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,47.28
GE09ram_02_u:2803: dhruvam adya purī rāma ayodhyāyudhināṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:2804: niṣprabhā tvayi niṣkrānte gatacandreva śarvarī // Ram_2,47.29
GE09ram_02_u:2805: naitad aupayikaṃ rāma yad idaṃ paritapyase
GE09ram_02_u:2806: viṣādayasi sītāṃ ca māṃ caiva puruṣarṣabha // Ram_2,47.30
GE09ram_02_u:2807: na ca sītā tvayā hīnā na cāham api rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:2808: muhūrtam api jīvāvo jalān matsyāv ivoddhṛtau // Ram_2,47.31
GE09ram_02_u:2809: na hi tātaṃ na śatrughnaṃ na sumitrāṃ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_02_u:2810: draṣṭum iccheyam adyāhaṃ svargaṃ vāpi tvayā vinā // Ram_2,47.32
GE09ram_02_u:2811: sa lakṣmaṇasyottamapuṣkalaṃ vaco niśamya caivaṃ vanavāsam ādarāt
GE09ram_02_u:2812: samāḥ samastā vidadhe paraṃtapaḥ prapadya dharmaṃ sucirāya rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,47.33
GE09ram_02_u:2813: te tu tasmin mahāvṛkṣa uṣitvā rajanīṃ śivām
GE09ram_02_u:2814: vimale 'bhyudite sūrye tasmād deśāt pratasthire // Ram_2,48.1
GE09ram_02_u:2816: jagmus taṃ deśam uddiśya vigāhya sumahad vanam // Ram_2,48.2
GE09ram_02_u:2817: te bhūmim āgān vividhān deśāṃś cāpi manoramān
GE09ram_02_u:2818: adṛṣṭapūrvān paśyantas tatra tatra yaśasvinaḥ // Ram_2,48.3
GE09ram_02_u:2819: yathākṣemeṇa gacchan sa paśyaṃś ca vividhān drumān
GE09ram_02_u:2820: nivṛttamātre divase rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt // Ram_2,48.4
GE09ram_02_u:2821: prayāgam abhitaḥ paśya saumitre dhūmam unnatam
GE09ram_02_u:2822: agner bhagavataḥ ketuṃ manye saṃnihito muniḥ // Ram_2,48.5
GE09ram_02_u:2823: nūnaṃ prāptāḥ sma sambhedaṃ gaṅgāyamunayor vayam
GE09ram_02_u:2824: tathā hi śrūyate śabdo vāriṇo vārighaṭṭitaḥ // Ram_2,48.6
GE09ram_02_u:2826: bharadvājāśrame caite dṛśyante vividhā drumāḥ // Ram_2,48.7
GE09ram_02_u:2827: dhanvinau tau sukhaṃ gatvā lambamāne divākare
GE09ram_02_u:2828: gaṅgāyamunayoḥ saṃdhau prāpatur nilayaṃ muneḥ // Ram_2,48.8
GE09ram_02_u:2829: rāmas tv āśramam āsādya trāsayan mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2830: gatvā muhūrtam adhvānaṃ bharadvājam upāgamat // Ram_2,48.9
GE09ram_02_u:2831: tatas tv āśramam āsādya muner darśanakāṅkṣiṇau
GE09ram_02_u:2834: rāmaḥ saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sītayā cābhyavādayat // Ram_2,48.11
GE09ram_02_u:2838: māṃ cānuyātā vijanaṃ tapovanam aninditā // Ram_2,48.13
GE09ram_02_u:2839: pitrā pravrājyamānaṃ māṃ saumitrir anujaḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2840: ayam anvagamad bhrātā vanam eva dṛḍhavrataḥ // Ram_2,48.14
GE09ram_02_u:2844: upānayata dharmātmā gām arghyam udakaṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,48.16
GE09ram_02_u:2846: rāmam āgatam abhyarcya svāgatenāha taṃ muniḥ // Ram_2,48.17
GE09ram_02_u:2847: pratigṛhya ca tām arcām upaviṣṭaṃ sarāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:2848: bharadvājo 'bravīd vākyaṃ dharmayuktam idaṃ tadā // Ram_2,48.18
GE09ram_02_u:2849: cirasya khalu kākutstha paśyāmi tvām ihāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:2850: śrutaṃ tava mayā cedaṃ vivāsanam akāraṇam // Ram_2,48.19
GE09ram_02_u:2852: puṇyaś ca ramaṇīyaś ca vasatv iha bhavān sukham // Ram_2,48.20
GE09ram_02_u:2853: evam uktas tu vacanaṃ bharadvājena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2854: pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāmaḥ sarvahite rataḥ // Ram_2,48.21
GE09ram_02_u:2856: āgamiṣyati vaidehīṃ māṃ cāpi prekṣako janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2857: anena kāraṇenāham iha vāsaṃ na rocaye // Ram_2,48.22
GE09ram_02_u:2859: ramate yatra vaidehī sukhārhā janakātmajā // Ram_2,48.23
GE09ram_02_u:2860: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2861: rāghavasya tato vākyam arthagrāhakam abravīt // Ram_2,48.24
GE09ram_02_u:2862: daśakrośa itas tāta girir yasmin nivatsyasi
GE09ram_02_u:2867: kalyāṇāni samādhatte na pāpe kurute manaḥ // Ram_2,48.27
GE09ram_02_u:2868: ṛṣayas tatra bahavo vihṛtya śaradāṃ śatam
GE09ram_02_u:2869: tapasā divam ārūḍhāḥ kapālaśirasā saha // Ram_2,48.28
GE09ram_02_u:2870: praviviktam ahaṃ manye taṃ vāsaṃ bhavataḥ sukham
GE09ram_02_u:2871: iha vā vanavāsāya vasa rāma mayā saha // Ram_2,48.29
GE09ram_02_u:2872: sa rāmaṃ sarvakāmais taṃ bharadvājaḥ priyātithim
GE09ram_02_u:2873: sabhāryaṃ saha ca bhrātrā pratijagrāha dharmavit // Ram_2,48.30
GE09ram_02_u:2874: tasya prayāge rāmasya taṃ maharṣim upeyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2875: prapannā rajanī puṇyā citrāḥ kathayataḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,48.31
GE09ram_02_u:2879: uṣitāḥ smeha vasatim anujānātu no bhavān // Ram_2,48.33
GE09ram_02_u:2880: rātryāṃ tu tasyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ bharadvājo 'bravīd idam
GE09ram_02_u:2883: vicaranti vanānteṣu tāni drakṣyasi rāghava // Ram_2,48.35
GE09ram_02_u:2885: mṛgaiś ca mattair bahubhiś ca kuñjaraiḥ suramyam āsādya samāvasāśramam // Ram_2,48.36
GE09ram_02_u:2887: maharṣim abhivādyātha jagmatus taṃ giriṃ prati // Ram_2,49.1
GE09ram_02_u:2888: prasthitāṃś caiva tān prekṣya pitā putrān ivānvagāt
GE09ram_02_u:2889: tataḥ pracakrame vaktuṃ vacanaṃ sa mahāmuniḥ // Ram_2,49.2
GE09ram_02_u:2891: tatra yūyaṃ plavaṃ kṛtvā taratāṃśumatīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,49.3
GE09ram_02_u:2893: vivṛddhaṃ bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ śyāmaṃ siddhopasevitam // Ram_2,49.4
GE09ram_02_u:2894: krośamātraṃ tato gatvā nīlaṃ drakṣyatha kānanam
GE09ram_02_u:2895: palāśabadarīmiśraṃ rāma vaṃśaiś ca yāmunaiḥ // Ram_2,49.5
GE09ram_02_u:2896: sa panthāś citrakūṭasya gataḥ subahuśo mayā
GE09ram_02_u:2898: iti panthānam āvedya maharṣiḥ sa nyavartata // Ram_2,49.6
GE09ram_02_u:2899: upāvṛtte munau tasmin rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2900: kṛtapuṇyāḥ sma saumitre munir yan no 'nukampate // Ram_2,49.7
GE09ram_02_u:2902: sītām evāgrataḥ kṛtvā kālindīṃ jagmatur nadīm // Ram_2,49.8
GE09ram_02_u:2904: cakāra lakṣmaṇaś chittvā sītāyāḥ sukham āsanam // Ram_2,49.9
GE09ram_02_u:2905: tatra śriyam ivācintyāṃ rāmo dāśarathiḥ priyām
GE09ram_02_u:2906: īṣat saṃlajjamānāṃ tām adhyāropayata plavam // Ram_2,49.10
GE09ram_02_u:2908: tīrajair bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ saṃterur yamunāṃ nadīm // Ram_2,49.11
GE09ram_02_u:2909: te tīrṇāḥ plavam utsṛjya prasthāya yamunāvanāt
GE09ram_02_u:2910: śyāmaṃ nyagrodham āseduḥ śītalaṃ haritacchadam // Ram_2,49.12
GE09ram_02_u:2911: kausalyāṃ caiva paśyeyaṃ sumitrāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:2912: iti sītāñjaliṃ kṛtvā paryagacchad vanaspatim // Ram_2,49.13
GE09ram_02_u:2914: bahūn medhyān mṛgān hatvā ceratur yamunāvane // Ram_2,49.14
GE09ram_02_u:2915: vihṛtya te barhiṇapūganādite śubhe vane vāraṇavānarāyute
GE09ram_02_u:2916: samaṃ nadīvapram upetya saṃmataṃ nivāsam ājagmur adīnadarśanāḥ // Ram_2,49.15
GE09ram_02_u:2919: saumitre śṛṇu vanyānāṃ valgu vyāharatāṃ svanam
GE09ram_02_u:2921: sa suptaḥ samaye bhrātrā lakṣmaṇaḥ pratibodhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2922: jahau nidrāṃ ca tandrīṃ ca prasaktaṃ ca pathi śramam // Ram_2,50.3
GE09ram_02_u:2923: tata utthāya te sarve spṛṣṭvā nadyāḥ śivaṃ jalam
GE09ram_02_u:2924: panthānam ṛṣiṇoddiṣṭaṃ citrakūṭasya taṃ yayuḥ // Ram_2,50.4
GE09ram_02_u:2925: tataḥ samprasthitaḥ kāle rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:2926: sītāṃ kamalapattrākṣīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,50.5
GE09ram_02_u:2927: ādīptān iva vaidehi sarvataḥ puṣpitān nagān
GE09ram_02_u:2928: svaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kiṃśukān paśya mālinaḥ śiśirātyaye // Ram_2,50.6
GE09ram_02_u:2930: phalapattrair avanatān nūnaṃ śakṣyāmi jīvitum // Ram_2,50.7
GE09ram_02_u:2932: madhūni madhukārībhiḥ saṃbhṛtāni nage nage // Ram_2,50.8
GE09ram_02_u:2933: eṣa krośati natyūhas taṃ śikhī pratikūjati
GE09ram_02_u:2936: citrakūṭam imaṃ paśya pravṛddhaśikharaṃ girim // Ram_2,50.10
GE09ram_02_u:2937: tatas tau pādacāreṇa gacchantau saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:2938: ramyam āsedatuḥ śailaṃ citrakūṭaṃ manoramam // Ram_2,50.11
GE09ram_02_u:2940: ayaṃ vāso bhavet tāvad atra saumya ramemahi // Ram_2,50.12
GE09ram_02_u:2941: lakṣmaṇānaya dārūṇi dṛḍhāni ca varāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:2942: kuruṣvāvasathaṃ saumya vāse me 'bhirataṃ manaḥ // Ram_2,50.13
GE09ram_02_u:2943: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitrir vividhān drumān
GE09ram_02_u:2944: ājahāra tataś cakre parṇaśālām ariṃdamaḥ // Ram_2,50.14
GE09ram_02_u:2946: aiṇeyaṃ māṃsam āhṛtya śālāṃ yakṣyāmahe vayam // Ram_2,50.15
GE09ram_02_u:2947: sa lakṣmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgaṃ hatvā medhyaṃ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:2948: atha cikṣepa saumitriḥ samiddhe jātavedasi // Ram_2,50.16
GE09ram_02_u:2949: taṃ tu pakvaṃ samājñāya niṣṭaptaṃ chinnaśoṇitam
GE09ram_02_u:2950: lakṣmaṇaḥ puruṣavyāghram atha rāghavam abravīt // Ram_2,50.17
GE09ram_02_u:2951: ayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ samāptāṅgaḥ śṛtaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgo yathā
GE09ram_02_u:2952: devatā devasaṃkāśa yajasva kuśalo hy asi // Ram_2,50.18
GE09ram_02_u:2953: rāmaḥ snātvā tu niyato guṇavāñ japyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2954: pāpasaṃśamanaṃ rāmaś cakāra balim uttamam // Ram_2,50.19
GE09ram_02_u:2955: tāṃ vṛkṣaparṇacchadanāṃ manojñāṃ yathāpradeśaṃ sukṛtāṃ nivātām
GE09ram_02_u:2956: vāsāya sarve viviśuḥ sametāḥ sabhāṃ yathā devagaṇāḥ sudharmām // Ram_2,50.20
GE09ram_02_u:2958: vanottame vyālamṛgānunādite tathā vijahruḥ susukhaṃ jitendriyāḥ // Ram_2,50.21
GE09ram_02_u:2959: suramyam āsādya tu citrakūṭaṃ nadīṃ ca tāṃ mālyavatīṃ sutīrthām
GE09ram_02_u:2960: nananda hṛṣṭo mṛgapakṣijuṣṭāṃ jahau ca duḥkhaṃ puravipravāsāt // Ram_2,50.22
GE09ram_02_u:2962: rāme dakṣiṇakūlasthe jagāma svagṛhaṃ guhaḥ // Ram_2,51.1
GE09ram_02_u:2964: ayodhyām eva nagarīṃ prayayau gāḍhadurmanāḥ // Ram_2,51.2
GE09ram_02_u:2965: sa vanāni sugandhīni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:2966: paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ grāmāṇi nagarāṇi ca // Ram_2,51.3
GE09ram_02_u:2968: ayodhyāṃ samanuprāpya nirānandāṃ dadarśa ha // Ram_2,51.4
GE09ram_02_u:2969: sa śūnyām iva niḥśabdāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadurmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2971: kaccin na sagajā sāśvā sajanā sajanādhipā
GE09ram_02_u:2973: iti cintāparaḥ sūtas tvaritaḥ praviveśa ha // Ram_2,51.6
GE09ram_02_u:2975: kva rāma iti pṛcchantaḥ sūtam abhyadravan narāḥ // Ram_2,51.7
GE09ram_02_u:2976: teṣāṃ śaśaṃsa gaṅgāyām aham āpṛcchya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:2978: te tīrṇā iti vijñāya bāṣpapūrṇamukhā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2979: aho dhig iti niḥśvasya hā rāmeti ca cukruśuḥ // Ram_2,51.9
GE09ram_02_u:2980: śuśrāva ca vacas teṣāṃ vṛndaṃ vṛndaṃ ca tiṣṭhatām
GE09ram_02_u:2981: hatāḥ sma khalu ye neha paśyāma iti rāghavam // Ram_2,51.10
GE09ram_02_u:2983: na drakṣyāmaḥ punar jātu dhārmikaṃ rāmam antarā // Ram_2,51.11
GE09ram_02_u:2984: kiṃ samarthaṃ janasyāsya kiṃ priyaṃ kiṃ sukhāvaham
GE09ram_02_u:2985: iti rāmeṇa nagaraṃ pitṛvat paripālitam // Ram_2,51.12
GE09ram_02_u:2989: yatra rājā daśarathas tad evopayayau gṛham // Ram_2,51.14
