GE09ram_02_u:2990: so 'vatīrya rathāc chīghraṃ rājaveśma praviśya ca
GE09ram_02_u:2994: saha rāmeṇa niryāto vinā rāmam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2995: sūtaḥ kiṃ nāma kausalyāṃ śocantīṃ prativakṣyati // Ram_2,51.17
GE09ram_02_u:2996: yathā ca manye durjīvam evaṃ na sukaraṃ dhruvam
GE09ram_02_u:2997: ācchidya putre niryāte kausalyā yatra jīvati // Ram_2,51.18
GE09ram_02_u:2998: satyarūpaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājñaḥ strīṇāṃ niśāmayan
GE09ram_02_u:2999: pradīptam iva śokena viveśa sahasā gṛham // Ram_2,51.19
GE09ram_02_u:3000: sa praviśyāṣṭamīṃ kakṣyāṃ rājānaṃ dīnam āturam
GE09ram_02_u:3002: abhigamya tam āsīnaṃ narendram abhivādya ca
GE09ram_02_u:3004: sa tūṣṇīm eva tac chrutvā rājā vibhrāntacetanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3007: uddhṛtya bāhū cukrośa nṛpatau patite kṣitau // Ram_2,51.23
GE09ram_02_u:3008: sumitrayā tu sahitā kausalyā patitaṃ patim
GE09ram_02_u:3009: utthāpayāmāsa tadā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,51.24
GE09ram_02_u:3011: vanavāsād anuprāptaṃ kasmān na pratibhāṣase // Ram_2,51.25
GE09ram_02_u:3013: uttiṣṭha sukṛtaṃ te 'stu śoke na syāt sahāyatā // Ram_2,51.26
GE09ram_02_u:3014: deva yasyā bhayād rāmaṃ nānupṛcchasi sārathim
GE09ram_02_u:3015: neha tiṣṭhati kaikeyī viśrabdhaṃ pratibhāṣyatām // Ram_2,51.27
GE09ram_02_u:3018: evaṃ vilapatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kausalyāṃ patitāṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:3019: patiṃ cāvekṣya tāḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ ruruduḥ striyaḥ // Ram_2,51.29
GE09ram_02_u:3020: tatas tam antaḥpuranādam utthitaṃ samīkṣya vṛddhās taruṇāś ca mānavāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3021: striyaś ca sarvā ruruduḥ samantataḥ puraṃ tadāsīt punar eva saṃkulam // Ram_2,51.30
GE09ram_02_u:3022: pratyāśvasto yadā rājā mohāt pratyāgataḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3025: viniḥśvasantaṃ dhyāyantam asvastham iva kuñjaram // Ram_2,52.2
GE09ram_02_u:3026: rājā tu rajasā sūtaṃ dhvastāṅgaṃ samupasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:3028: kva nu vatsyati dharmātmā vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3030: bhūmipālātmajo bhūmau śete katham anāthavat // Ram_2,52.4
GE09ram_02_u:3032: sa vatsyati kathaṃ rāmo vijanaṃ vanam āśritaḥ // Ram_2,52.5
GE09ram_02_u:3034: kathaṃ kumārau vaidehyā sārdhaṃ vanam upasthitau // Ram_2,52.6
GE09ram_02_u:3036: rājaputrau kathaṃ pādair avaruhya rathād gatau // Ram_2,52.7
GE09ram_02_u:3037: siddhārthaḥ khalu sūta tvaṃ yena dṛṣṭau mamātmajau
GE09ram_02_u:3038: vanāntaṃ praviśantau tāv aśvināv iva mandaram // Ram_2,52.8
GE09ram_02_u:3039: kim uvāca vaco rāmaḥ kim uvāca ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3040: sumantra vanam āsādya kim uvāca ca maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:3041: āsitaṃ śayitaṃ bhuktaṃ sūta rāmasya kīrtaya // Ram_2,52.9
GE09ram_02_u:3045: añjaliṃ rāghavaḥ kṛtvā śirasābhipraṇamya ca // Ram_2,52.11
GE09ram_02_u:3047: śirasā vandanīyasya vandyau pādau mahātmanaḥ // Ram_2,52.12
GE09ram_02_u:3048: sarvam antaḥpuraṃ vācyaṃ sūta madvacanāt tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:3050: mātā ca mama kausalyā kuśalaṃ cābhivādanam
GE09ram_02_u:3051: devi devasya pādau ca devavat paripālaya // Ram_2,52.14
GE09ram_02_u:3052: bharataḥ kuśalaṃ vācyo vācyo madvacanena ca
GE09ram_02_u:3053: sarvāsv eva yathānyāyaṃ vṛttiṃ vartasva mātṛṣu // Ram_2,52.15
GE09ram_02_u:3056: ity evaṃ māṃ mahārāja bruvann eva mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3057: rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo bhṛśam aśrūṇy avartayat // Ram_2,52.17
GE09ram_02_u:3058: lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho niḥśvasan vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3062: rāmasya tu parityāge na hetum upalakṣaye // Ram_2,52.19
GE09ram_02_u:3066: bhrātā bhartā ca bandhuś ca pitā ca mama rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,52.21
GE09ram_02_u:3072: tena duḥkhena rudatī naiva māṃ kiṃcid abravīt // Ram_2,52.24
GE09ram_02_u:3074: mumoca sahasā bāṣpaṃ māṃ prayāntam udīkṣya sā // Ram_2,52.25
GE09ram_02_u:3076: tathaiva sītā rudatī tapasvinī nirīkṣate rājarathaṃ tathaiva mām // Ram_2,52.26
GE09ram_02_u:3077: mama tv aśvā nivṛttasya na prāvartanta vartmani
GE09ram_02_u:3078: uṣṇam aśru vimuñcanto rāme samprasthite vanam // Ram_2,53.1
GE09ram_02_u:3080: prasthito ratham āsthāya tad duḥkham api dhārayan // Ram_2,53.2
GE09ram_02_u:3081: guhena sārdhaṃ tatraiva sthito 'smi divasān bahūn
GE09ram_02_u:3082: āśayā yadi māṃ rāmaḥ punaḥ śabdāpayed iti // Ram_2,53.3
GE09ram_02_u:3085: na ca sarpanti sattvāni vyālā na prasaranti ca
GE09ram_02_u:3086: rāmaśokābhibhūtaṃ tan niṣkūjam abhavad vanam // Ram_2,53.5
GE09ram_02_u:3089: jalajāni ca puṣpāṇi mālyāni sthalajāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3090: nādya bhānty alpagandhīni phalāni ca yathā puram // Ram_2,53.7
GE09ram_02_u:3091: praviśantam ayodhyāṃ māṃ na kaścid abhinandati
GE09ram_02_u:3092: narā rāmam apaśyanto niḥśvasanti muhur muhuḥ // Ram_2,53.8
GE09ram_02_u:3093: harmyair vimānaiḥ prāsādair avekṣya ratham āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:3096: anyonyam abhivīkṣante vyaktam ārtatarāḥ striyaḥ // Ram_2,53.10
GE09ram_02_u:3098: aham ārtatayā kaṃcid viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye // Ram_2,53.11
GE09ram_02_u:3102: kausalyā putrahīneva ayodhyā pratibhāti mā // Ram_2,53.13
GE09ram_02_u:3104: bāṣpopahatayā rājā taṃ sūtam idam abravīt // Ram_2,53.14
GE09ram_02_u:3106: mayā na mantrakuśalair vṛddhaiḥ saha samarthitam // Ram_2,53.15
GE09ram_02_u:3107: na suhṛdbhir na cāmātyair mantrayitvā na naigamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3108: mayāyam arthaḥ sammohāt strīhetoḥ sahasā kṛtaḥ // Ram_2,53.16
GE09ram_02_u:3109: bhavitavyatayā nūnam idaṃ vā vyasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:3110: kulasyāsya vināśāya prāptaṃ sūta yadṛcchayā // Ram_2,53.17
GE09ram_02_u:3111: sūta yady asti te kiṃcin mayāpi sukṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:3112: tvaṃ prāpayāśu māṃ rāmaṃ prāṇāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām // Ram_2,53.18
GE09ram_02_u:3113: yad yad yāpi mamaivājñā nivartayatu rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:3114: na śakṣyāmi vinā rāmaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum // Ram_2,53.19
GE09ram_02_u:3115: atha vāpi mahābāhur gato dūraṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3116: mām eva ratham āropya śīghraṃ rāmāya darśaya // Ram_2,53.20
GE09ram_02_u:3118: yadi jīvāmi sādhv enaṃ paśyeyaṃ saha sītayā // Ram_2,53.21
GE09ram_02_u:3120: rāmaṃ yadi na paśyāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // Ram_2,53.22
GE09ram_02_u:3121: ato nu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yo 'ham ikṣvākunandanam
GE09ram_02_u:3122: imām avasthām āpanno neha paśyāmi rāghavam // Ram_2,53.23
GE09ram_02_u:3123: hā rāma rāmānuja hā hā vaidehi tapasvini
GE09ram_02_u:3124: na māṃ jānīta duḥkhena mriyamāṇam anāthavat
GE09ram_02_u:3125: dustaro jīvatā devi mayāyaṃ śokasāgaraḥ // Ram_2,53.24
GE09ram_02_u:3126: aśobhanaṃ yo 'ham ihādya rāghavaṃ didṛkṣamāṇo na labhe salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:3127: itīva rājā vilapan mahāyaśāḥ papāta tūrṇaṃ śayane sa mūrchitaḥ // Ram_2,53.25
GE09ram_02_u:3128: iti vilapati pārthive pranaṣṭe karuṇataraṃ dviguṇaṃ ca rāmahetoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3129: vacanam anuniśamya tasya devī bhayam agamat punar eva rāmamātā // Ram_2,53.26
GE09ram_02_u:3131: dharaṇyāṃ gatasattveva kausalyā sūtam abravīt // Ram_2,54.1
GE09ram_02_u:3132: naya māṃ yatra kākutsthaḥ sītā yatra ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3133: tān vinā kṣaṇam apy atra jīvituṃ notsahe hy aham // Ram_2,54.2
GE09ram_02_u:3134: nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ daṇḍakān naya mām api
GE09ram_02_u:3135: atha tān nānugacchāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // Ram_2,54.3
GE09ram_02_u:3137: idam āśvāsayan devīṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // Ram_2,54.4
GE09ram_02_u:3138: tyaja śokaṃ ca mohaṃ ca sambhramaṃ duḥkhajaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:3139: vyavadhūya ca saṃtāpaṃ vane vatsyati rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,54.5
GE09ram_02_u:3140: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmasya pādau paricaran vane
GE09ram_02_u:3142: vijane 'pi vane sītā vāsaṃ prāpya gṛheṣv iva
GE09ram_02_u:3144: nāsyā dainyaṃ kṛtaṃ kiṃcit susūkṣmam api lakṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:3145: uciteva pravāsānāṃ vaidehī pratibhāti mā // Ram_2,54.8
GE09ram_02_u:3146: nagaropavanaṃ gatvā yathā sma ramate purā
GE09ram_02_u:3147: tathaiva ramate sītā nirjaneṣu vaneṣv api // Ram_2,54.9
GE09ram_02_u:3149: rāmā rāme hy adhīnātmā vijane 'pi vane satī // Ram_2,54.10
GE09ram_02_u:3150: tadgataṃ hṛdayaṃ hy asyās tadadhīnaṃ ca jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:3151: ayodhyāpi bhavet tasyā rāmahīnā tathā vanam // Ram_2,54.11
GE09ram_02_u:3152: pathi pṛcchati vaidehī grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:3153: gatiṃ dṛṣṭvā nadīnāṃ ca pādapān vividhān api // Ram_2,54.12
GE09ram_02_u:3155: na hi gacchati vaidehyāś candrāṃśusadṛśī prabhā // Ram_2,54.13
GE09ram_02_u:3157: vadanaṃ tadvadānyāyā vaidehyā na vikampate // Ram_2,54.14
GE09ram_02_u:3161: idānīm api vaidehī tadrāgā nyastabhūṣaṇā // Ram_2,54.16
GE09ram_02_u:3162: gajaṃ vā vīkṣya siṃhaṃ vā vyāghraṃ vā vanam āśritā
GE09ram_02_u:3163: nāhārayati saṃtrāsaṃ bāhū rāmasya saṃśritā // Ram_2,54.17
GE09ram_02_u:3164: na śocyās te na cātmā te śocyo nāpi janādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3165: idaṃ hi caritaṃ loke pratiṣṭhāsyati śāśvatam // Ram_2,54.18
GE09ram_02_u:3166: vidhūya śokaṃ parihṛṣṭamānasā maharṣiyāte pathi suvyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3167: vane ratā vanyaphalāśanāḥ pituḥ śubhāṃ pratijñāṃ paripālayanti te // Ram_2,54.19
GE09ram_02_u:3169: na caiva devī virarāma kūjitāt priyeti putreti ca rāghaveti ca // Ram_2,54.20
GE09ram_02_u:3170: vanaṃ gate dharmapare rāme ramayatāṃ vare
GE09ram_02_u:3171: kausalyā rudatī svārtā bhartāram idam abravīt // Ram_2,55.1
GE09ram_02_u:3172: yadyapi triṣu lokeṣu prathitaṃ te mahad yaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3173: sānukrośo vadānyaś ca priyavādī ca rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,55.2
GE09ram_02_u:3174: kathaṃ naravaraśreṣṭha putrau tau saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:3175: duḥkhitau sukhasaṃvṛddhau vane duḥkhaṃ sahiṣyataḥ // Ram_2,55.3
GE09ram_02_u:3176: sā nūnaṃ taruṇī śyāmā sukumārī sukhocitā
GE09ram_02_u:3177: katham uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca maithilī prasahiṣyate // Ram_2,55.4
GE09ram_02_u:3179: vanyaṃ naivāram āhāraṃ kathaṃ sītopabhokṣyate // Ram_2,55.5
GE09ram_02_u:3181: kathaṃ kravyādasiṃhānāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty aśobhanam // Ram_2,55.6
GE09ram_02_u:3185: kadā drakṣyāmi rāmasya vadanaṃ puṣkarekṣaṇam // Ram_2,55.8
GE09ram_02_u:3186: vajrasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ me na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3187: apaśyantyā na taṃ yad vai phalatīdaṃ sahasradhā // Ram_2,55.9
GE09ram_02_u:3188: yadi pañcadaśe varṣe rāghavaḥ punar eṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3189: jahyād rājyaṃ ca kośaṃ ca bharatenopabhokṣyate // Ram_2,55.10
GE09ram_02_u:3190: evaṃ kanīyasā bhrātrā bhuktaṃ rājyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE09ram_02_u:3191: bhrātā jyeṣṭho variṣṭhaś ca kimarthaṃ nāvamaṃsyate // Ram_2,55.11
GE09ram_02_u:3192: na pareṇāhṛtaṃ bhakṣyaṃ vyāghraḥ khāditum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:3193: evam eva naravyāghraḥ paralīḍhaṃ na maṃsyate // Ram_2,55.12
GE09ram_02_u:3194: havir ājyaṃ puroḍāśāḥ kuśā yūpāś ca khādirāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3195: naitāni yātayāmāni kurvanti punar adhvare // Ram_2,55.13
GE09ram_02_u:3196: tathā hy āttam idaṃ rājyaṃ hṛtasārāṃ surām iva
GE09ram_02_u:3197: nābhimantum alaṃ rāmo naṣṭasomam ivādhvaram // Ram_2,55.14
GE09ram_02_u:3199: balavān iva śārdūlo vāladher abhimarśanam // Ram_2,55.15
GE09ram_02_u:3201: svayam eva hataḥ pitrā jalajenātmajo yathā // Ram_2,55.16
GE09ram_02_u:3203: yadi te dharmanirate tvayā putre vivāsite // Ram_2,55.17
GE09ram_02_u:3204: gatir ekā patir nāryā dvitīyā gatir ātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3205: tṛtīyā jñātayo rājaṃś caturthī neha vidyate // Ram_2,55.18
GE09ram_02_u:3206: tatra tvaṃ caiva me nāsti rāmaś ca vanam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3207: na vanaṃ gantum icchāmi sarvathā hi hatā tvayā // Ram_2,55.19
GE09ram_02_u:3208: hataṃ tvayā rājyam idaṃ sarāṣṭraṃ hatas tathātmā saha mantribhiś ca
GE09ram_02_u:3209: hatā saputrāsmi hatāś ca paurāḥ sutaś ca bhāryā ca tava prahṛṣṭau // Ram_2,55.20
GE09ram_02_u:3210: imāṃ giraṃ dāruṇaśabdasaṃśritāṃ niśamya rājāpi mumoha duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3211: tataḥ sa śokaṃ praviveśa pārthivaḥ svaduṣkṛtaṃ cāpi punas tadāsmarat // Ram_2,55.21
GE09ram_02_u:3212: evaṃ tu kruddhayā rājā rāmamātrā saśokayā
GE09ram_02_u:3213: śrāvitaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ cintayāmāsa duḥkhitaḥ // Ram_2,56.1
GE09ram_02_u:3215: yad anena kṛtaṃ pūrvam ajñānāc chabdavedhinā // Ram_2,56.2
GE09ram_02_u:3216: amanās tena śokena rāmaśokena ca prabhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3217: dahyamānas tu śokābhyāṃ kausalyām āha bhūpatiḥ // Ram_2,56.3
GE09ram_02_u:3219: vatsalā cānṛśaṃsā ca tvaṃ hi nityaṃ pareṣv api // Ram_2,56.4
GE09ram_02_u:3220: bhartā tu khalu nārīṇāṃ guṇavān nirguṇo 'pi vā
GE09ram_02_u:3221: dharmaṃ vimṛśamānānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ devi daivatam // Ram_2,56.5
GE09ram_02_u:3223: nārhase vipriyaṃ vaktuṃ duḥkhitāpi suduḥkhitam // Ram_2,56.6
GE09ram_02_u:3224: tad vākyaṃ karuṇaṃ rājñaḥ śrutvā dīnasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:3225: kausalyā vyasṛjad bāṣpaṃ praṇālīva navodakam // Ram_2,56.7
GE09ram_02_u:3226: sa mūrdhni baddhvā rudatī rājñaḥ padmam ivāñjalim
GE09ram_02_u:3227: sambhramād abravīt trastā tvaramāṇākṣaraṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,56.8
GE09ram_02_u:3228: prasīda śirasā yāce bhūmau nipatitāsmi te
GE09ram_02_u:3229: yācitāsmi hatā deva hantavyāhaṃ na hi tvayā // Ram_2,56.9
GE09ram_02_u:3230: naiṣā hi sā strī bhavati ślāghanīyena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:3231: ubhayor lokayor vīra patyā yā saṃprasādyate // Ram_2,56.10
GE09ram_02_u:3232: jānāmi dharmaṃ dharmajña tvāṃ jāne satyavādinam
GE09ram_02_u:3233: putraśokārtayā tat tu mayā kim api bhāṣitam // Ram_2,56.11
GE09ram_02_u:3234: śoko nāśayate dhairyaṃ śoko nāśayate śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:3235: śoko nāśayate sarvaṃ nāsti śokasamo ripuḥ // Ram_2,56.12
GE09ram_02_u:3237: soḍhum āpatitaḥ śokaḥ susūkṣmo 'pi na śakyate // Ram_2,56.13
GE09ram_02_u:3240: taṃ hi cintayamānāyāḥ śoko 'yaṃ hṛdi vardhate
GE09ram_02_u:3241: adīnām iva vegena samudrasalilaṃ mahat // Ram_2,56.15
GE09ram_02_u:3242: evaṃ hi kathayantyās tu kausalyāyāḥ śubhaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3243: mandaraśmir abhūt suryo rajanī cābhyavartata // Ram_2,56.16
GE09ram_02_u:3244: atha prahlādito vākyair devyā kausalyayā nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3245: śokena ca samākrānto nidrāyā vaśam eyivān // Ram_2,56.17
GE09ram_02_u:3247: atha rājā daśarathaḥ sa cintām abhyapadyata // Ram_2,57.1
GE09ram_02_u:3249: āviveśopasargas taṃ tamaḥ sūryam ivāsuram // Ram_2,57.2
GE09ram_02_u:3250: sa rājā rajanīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ rāme pravrajite vanam
GE09ram_02_u:3252: kausalyāṃ putraśokārtām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,57.3
GE09ram_02_u:3253: yad ācarati kalyāṇi śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE09ram_02_u:3254: tad eva labhate bhadre kartā karmajam ātmanaḥ // Ram_2,57.4
GE09ram_02_u:3256: doṣaṃ vā yo na jānāti sa bāla iti hocyate // Ram_2,57.5
GE09ram_02_u:3257: kaścid āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca niṣiñcati
GE09ram_02_u:3258: puṣpaṃ dṛṣṭvā phale gṛdhnuḥ sa śocati phalāgame // Ram_2,57.6
GE09ram_02_u:3259: so 'ham āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca nyaṣecayam
GE09ram_02_u:3260: rāmaṃ phalāgame tyaktvā paścāc chocāmi durmatiḥ // Ram_2,57.7
GE09ram_02_u:3262: kumāraḥ śabdavedhīti mayā pāpam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:3263: tad idaṃ me 'nusaṃprāptaṃ devi duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam // Ram_2,57.8
GE09ram_02_u:3264: sammohād iha bālena yathā syād bhakṣitaṃ viṣam
GE09ram_02_u:3265: evaṃ mamāpy avijñātaṃ śabdavedhyamayaṃ phalam // Ram_2,57.9
GE09ram_02_u:3266: devy anūḍhā tvam abhavo yuvarājo bhavāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:3268: upāsya hi rasān bhaumāṃs taptvā ca jagad aṃśubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3269: paretācaritāṃ bhīmāṃ ravir āviśate diśam // Ram_2,57.11
GE09ram_02_u:3270: uṣṇam antardadhe sadyaḥ snigdhā dadṛśire ghanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3274: tasminn atisukhe kāle dhanuṣmān iṣumān rathī
GE09ram_02_u:3276: nipāne mahiṣaṃ rātrau gajaṃ vābhyāgataṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:3277: anyaṃ vā śvāpadaṃ kaṃcij jighāṃsur ajitendriyaḥ // Ram_2,57.15
GE09ram_02_u:3278: athāndhakāre tv aśrauṣaṃ jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3279: acakṣur viṣaye ghoṣaṃ vāraṇasyeva nardataḥ // Ram_2,57.16
GE09ram_02_u:3281: amuñcaṃ niśitaṃ bāṇam aham āśīviṣopamam // Ram_2,57.17
GE09ram_02_u:3282: tatra vāg uṣasi vyaktā prādurāsīd vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3283: hā heti patatas toye vāg abhūt tatra mānuṣī
GE09ram_02_u:3284: katham asmadvidhe śastraṃ nipatet tu tapasvini // Ram_2,57.18
GE09ram_02_u:3286: iṣuṇābhihataḥ kena kasya vā kiṃ kṛtaṃ mayā // Ram_2,57.19
GE09ram_02_u:3287: ṛṣer hi nyastadaṇḍasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3288: kathaṃ nu śastreṇa vadho madvidhasya vidhīyate // Ram_2,57.20
GE09ram_02_u:3290: ko vadhena mamārthī syāt kiṃ vāsyāpakṛtaṃ mayā // Ram_2,57.21
GE09ram_02_u:3292: na kaścit sādhu manyeta yathaiva gurutalpagam // Ram_2,57.22
GE09ram_02_u:3294: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ cobhāv anuśocāmi madvidhe // Ram_2,57.23
GE09ram_02_u:3295: tad etan mithunaṃ vṛddhaṃ cirakālabhṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:3296: mayi pañcatvam āpanne kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayiṣyati // Ram_2,57.24
GE09ram_02_u:3297: vṛddhau ca mātāpitarāv ahaṃ caikeṣuṇā hataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3298: kena sma nihatāḥ sarve subālenākṛtātmanā // Ram_2,57.25
GE09ram_02_u:3299: tāṃ giraṃ karuṇāṃ śrutvā mama dharmānukāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3300: karābhyāṃ saśaraṃ cāpaṃ vyathitasyāpatad bhuvi // Ram_2,57.26
GE09ram_02_u:3301: taṃ deśam aham āgamya dīnasattvaḥ sudurmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3302: apaśyam iṣuṇā tīre sarayvās tāpasaṃ hatam // Ram_2,57.27
GE09ram_02_u:3303: sa mām udvīkṣya netrābhyāṃ trastam asvasthacetasam
GE09ram_02_u:3304: ity uvāca vacaḥ krūraṃ didhakṣann iva tejasā // Ram_2,57.28
GE09ram_02_u:3305: kiṃ tavāpakṛtaṃ rājan vane nivasatā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:3306: jihīrṣur ambho gurvarthaṃ yad ahaṃ tāḍitas tvayā // Ram_2,57.29
GE09ram_02_u:3307: ekena khalu bāṇena marmaṇy abhihate mayi
GE09ram_02_u:3308: dvāv andhau nihatau vṛddhau mātā janayitā ca me // Ram_2,57.30
GE09ram_02_u:3309: tau nūnaṃ durbalāv andhau matpratīkṣau pipāsitau
GE09ram_02_u:3310: ciram āśākṛtāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ kaṣṭāṃ saṃdhārayiṣyataḥ // Ram_2,57.31
GE09ram_02_u:3311: na nūnaṃ tapaso vāsti phalayogaḥ śrutasya vā
GE09ram_02_u:3312: pitā yan māṃ na jānāti śayānaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi // Ram_2,57.32
GE09ram_02_u:3313: jānann api ca kiṃ kuryād aśaktir aparikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3314: bhidyamānam ivāśaktas trātum anyo nago nagam // Ram_2,57.33
GE09ram_02_u:3315: pitus tvam eva me gatvā śīghram ācakṣva rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:3316: na tvām anudahet kruddho vanaṃ vahnir ivaidhitaḥ // Ram_2,57.34
GE09ram_02_u:3317: iyam ekapadī rājan yato me pitur āśramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3318: taṃ prasādaya gatvā tvaṃ na tvāṃ sa kupitaḥ śapet // Ram_2,57.35
GE09ram_02_u:3319: viśalyaṃ kuru māṃ rājan marma me niśitaḥ śaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3320: ruṇaddhi mṛdu sotsedhaṃ tīram amburayo yathā // Ram_2,57.36
GE09ram_02_u:3321: na dvijātir ahaṃ rājan mā bhūt te manaso vyathā
GE09ram_02_u:3322: śūdrāyām asmi vaiśyena jāto janapadādhipa // Ram_2,57.37
GE09ram_02_u:3324: tasya tv ānamyamānasya taṃ bāṇam aham uddharam // Ram_2,57.38
GE09ram_02_u:3325: jalārdragātraṃ tu vilapya kṛcchrān marmavraṇaṃ saṃtatam ucchvasantam
GE09ram_02_u:3326: tataḥ sarayvāṃ tam ahaṃ śayānaṃ samīkṣya bhadre subhṛśaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ // Ram_2,57.39
GE09ram_02_u:3327: tad ajñānān mahat pāpaṃ kṛtvā saṃkulitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3328: ekas tv acintayaṃ buddhyā kathaṃ nu sukṛtaṃ bhavet // Ram_2,58.1
GE09ram_02_u:3329: tatas taṃ ghaṭam ādāya pūrṇaṃ paramavāriṇā
GE09ram_02_u:3330: āśramaṃ tam ahaṃ prāpya yathākhyātapathaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,58.2
GE09ram_02_u:3332: apaśyaṃ tasya pitarau lūnapakṣāv iva dvijau // Ram_2,58.3
GE09ram_02_u:3334: tām āśāṃ matkṛte hīnāv udāsīnāv anāthavat // Ram_2,58.4
GE09ram_02_u:3335: padaśabdaṃ tu me śrutvā munir vākyam abhāṣata
GE09ram_02_u:3336: kiṃ cirāyasi me putra pānīyaṃ kṣipram ānaya // Ram_2,58.5
GE09ram_02_u:3337: yannimittam idaṃ tāta salile krīḍitaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:3338: utkaṇṭhitā te māteyaṃ praviśa kṣipram āśramam // Ram_2,58.6
GE09ram_02_u:3339: yad vyalīkaṃ kṛtaṃ putra mātrā te yadi vā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:3340: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ tvayā tāta tapasvinā // Ram_2,58.7
GE09ram_02_u:3341: tvaṃ gatis tv agatīnāṃ ca cakṣus tvaṃ hīnacakṣuṣām
GE09ram_02_u:3342: samāsaktās tvayi prāṇāḥ kiṃcin nau nābhibhāṣase // Ram_2,58.8
GE09ram_02_u:3343: munim avyaktayā vācā tam ahaṃ sajjamānayā
GE09ram_02_u:3344: hīnavyañjanayā prekṣya bhīto bhīta ivābruvam // Ram_2,58.9
GE09ram_02_u:3346: ācacakṣe tv ahaṃ tasmai putravyasanajaṃ bhayam // Ram_2,58.10
GE09ram_02_u:3348: sajjanāvamataṃ duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ svakarmajam // Ram_2,58.11
GE09ram_02_u:3350: jighāṃsuḥ śvāpadaṃ kiṃcin nipāne vāgataṃ gajam // Ram_2,58.12
GE09ram_02_u:3351: tatra śruto mayā śabdo jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3352: dvipo 'yam iti matvā hi bāṇenābhihato mayā // Ram_2,58.13
GE09ram_02_u:3353: gatvā nadyās tatas tīram apaśyam iṣuṇā hṛdi
GE09ram_02_u:3354: vinirbhinnaṃ gataprāṇaṃ śayānaṃ bhuvi tāpasam // Ram_2,58.14
GE09ram_02_u:3356: visṛṣṭo 'mbhasi nārācas tena te nihataḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,58.15
GE09ram_02_u:3357: sa coddhṛtena bāṇena tatraiva svargam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3358: bhagavantāv ubhau śocann andhāv iti vilapya ca // Ram_2,58.16
GE09ram_02_u:3360: śeṣam evaṃgate yat syāt tat prasīdatu me muniḥ // Ram_2,58.17
GE09ram_02_u:3361: sa tac chrutvā vacaḥ krūraṃ niḥśvasañ śokakarśitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3362: mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam // Ram_2,58.18
GE09ram_02_u:3363: yady etad aśubhaṃ karma na sma me kathayeḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:3364: phalen mūrdhā sma te rājan sadyaḥ śatasahasradhā // Ram_2,58.19
GE09ram_02_u:3366: jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaḥ sthānāc cyāvayed api vajriṇam // Ram_2,58.20
GE09ram_02_u:3367: ajñānāddhi kṛtaṃ yasmād idaṃ tenaiva jīvasi
GE09ram_02_u:3368: api hy adya kulaṃ na syād rāghavāṇāṃ kuto bhavān // Ram_2,58.21
GE09ram_02_u:3369: naya nau nṛpa taṃ deśam iti māṃ cābhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_02_u:3370: adya taṃ draṣṭum icchāvaḥ putraṃ paścimadarśanam // Ram_2,58.22
GE09ram_02_u:3372: śayānaṃ bhuvi niḥsaṃjñaṃ dharmarājavaśaṃ gatam // Ram_2,58.23
GE09ram_02_u:3373: athāham ekas taṃ deśaṃ nītvā tau bhṛśaduḥkhitau
GE09ram_02_u:3374: asparśayam ahaṃ putraṃ taṃ muniṃ saha bhāryayā // Ram_2,58.24
GE09ram_02_u:3375: tau putram ātmanaḥ spṛṣṭvā tam āsādya tapasvinau
GE09ram_02_u:3376: nipetatuḥ śarīre 'sya pitā cāsyedam abravīt // Ram_2,58.25
GE09ram_02_u:3377: na nv ahaṃ te priyaḥ putra mātaraṃ paśya dhārmika
GE09ram_02_u:3378: kiṃ nu nāliṅgase putra sukumāra vaco vada // Ram_2,58.26
GE09ram_02_u:3380: adhīyānasya madhuraṃ śāstraṃ vānyad viśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,58.27
GE09ram_02_u:3381: ko māṃ saṃdhyām upāsyaiva snātvā hutahutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3383: kandamūlaphalaṃ hṛtvā ko māṃ priyam ivātithim
GE09ram_02_u:3385: imām andhāṃ ca vṛddhāṃ ca mātaraṃ te tapasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:3386: kathaṃ putra bhariṣyāmi kṛpaṇāṃ putragardhinīm // Ram_2,58.30
GE09ram_02_u:3387: tiṣṭha mā mā gamaḥ putra yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:3388: śvo mayā saha gantāsi jananyā ca samedhitaḥ // Ram_2,58.31
GE09ram_02_u:3389: ubhāv api ca śokārtāv anāthau kṛpaṇau vane
GE09ram_02_u:3390: kṣipram eva gamiṣyāvas tvayā hīnau yamakṣayam // Ram_2,58.32
GE09ram_02_u:3391: tato vaivasvataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ pravakṣyāmi bhāratīm
GE09ram_02_u:3392: kṣamatāṃ dharmarājo me bibhṛyāt pitarāv ayam // Ram_2,58.33
GE09ram_02_u:3394: tena satyena gacchāśu ye lokāḥ śastrayodhinām // Ram_2,58.34
GE09ram_02_u:3395: yānti śūrā gatiṃ yāṃ ca saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3396: hatās tv abhimukhāḥ putra gatiṃ tāṃ paramāṃ vraja // Ram_2,58.35
GE09ram_02_u:3397: yāṃ gatiṃ sagaraḥ śaibyo dilīpo janamejayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3398: nahuṣo dhundhumāraś ca prāptās tāṃ gaccha putraka // Ram_2,58.36
GE09ram_02_u:3399: yā gatiḥ sarvasādhūnāṃ svādhyāyāt tapasā ca yā
GE09ram_02_u:3402: dehanyāsakṛtāṃ yā ca tāṃ gatiṃ gaccha putraka
GE09ram_02_u:3403: na hi tv asmin kule jāto gacchaty akuśalāṃ gatim // Ram_2,58.38
GE09ram_02_u:3405: tato 'smai kartum udakaṃ pravṛttaḥ saha bhāryayā // Ram_2,58.39
GE09ram_02_u:3406: sa tu divyena rūpeṇa muniputraḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3407: āśvāsya ca muhūrtaṃ tu pitarau vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,58.40
GE09ram_02_u:3408: sthānam asmi mahat prāpto bhavatoḥ paricāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:3409: bhavantāv api ca kṣipraṃ mama mūlam upaiṣyataḥ // Ram_2,58.41
GE09ram_02_u:3410: evam uktvā tu divyena vimānena vapuṣmatā
GE09ram_02_u:3411: āruroha divaṃ kṣipraṃ muniputro jitendriyaḥ // Ram_2,58.42
GE09ram_02_u:3412: sa kṛtvā tūdakaṃ tūrṇaṃ tāpasaḥ saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_02_u:3413: mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam // Ram_2,58.43
GE09ram_02_u:3414: adyaiva jahi māṃ rājan maraṇe nāsti me vyathā
GE09ram_02_u:3415: yac chareṇaikaputraṃ māṃ tvam akārṣīr aputrakam // Ram_2,58.44
GE09ram_02_u:3416: tvayā tu yad avijñānān nihato me sutaḥ śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3417: tena tvām abhiśapsyāmi suduḥkham atidāruṇam // Ram_2,58.45
GE09ram_02_u:3418: putravyasanajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yad etan mama sāmpratam
GE09ram_02_u:3419: evaṃ tvaṃ putraśokena rājan kālaṃ kariṣyasi // Ram_2,58.46
GE09ram_02_u:3420: tasmān mām āgataṃ bhadre tasyodārasya tadvacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3421: yad ahaṃ putraśokena saṃtyakṣyāmy adya jīvitam // Ram_2,58.47
GE09ram_02_u:3422: yadi māṃ saṃspṛśed rāmaḥ sakṛd adyālabheta vā
GE09ram_02_u:3423: na tan me sadṛśaṃ devi yan mayā rāghave kṛtam // Ram_2,58.48
GE09ram_02_u:3424: cakṣuṣā tvāṃ na paśyāmi smṛtir mama vilupyate
GE09ram_02_u:3425: dūtā vaivasvatasyaite kausalye tvarayanti mām // Ram_2,58.49
GE09ram_02_u:3426: atas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad ahaṃ jīvitakṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:3427: na hi paśyāmi dharmajñaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam // Ram_2,58.50
GE09ram_02_u:3428: na te manuṣyā devās te ye cāruśubhakuṇḍalam
GE09ram_02_u:3429: mukhaṃ drakṣyanti rāmasya varṣe pañcadaśe punaḥ // Ram_2,58.51
GE09ram_02_u:3431: dhanyā drakṣyanti rāmasya tārādhipanibhaṃ mukham // Ram_2,58.52
GE09ram_02_u:3433: sugandhi mama nāthasya dhanyā drakṣyanti tanmukham // Ram_2,58.53
GE09ram_02_u:3435: drakṣyanti sukhino rāmaṃ śukraṃ mārgagataṃ yathā // Ram_2,58.54
GE09ram_02_u:3436: ayam ātmabhavaḥ śoko mām anātham acetanam
GE09ram_02_u:3437: saṃsādayati vegena yathā kūlaṃ nadīrayaḥ // Ram_2,58.55
GE09ram_02_u:3439: rājā daśarathaḥ śocañ jīvitāntam upāgamat // Ram_2,58.56
GE09ram_02_u:3440: tathā tu dīnaṃ kathayan narādhipaḥ priyasya putrasya vivāsanāturaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3441: gate 'rdharātre bhṛśaduḥkhapīḍitas tadā jahau prāṇam udāradarśanaḥ // Ram_2,58.57
GE09ram_02_u:3449: upaninyus tathāpy anyāḥ kumārībahulāḥ striyaḥ // Ram_2,59.4
GE09ram_02_u:3451: tāḥ striyas tu samāgamya bhartāraṃ pratyabodhayan // Ram_2,59.5
GE09ram_02_u:3452: tā vepathuparītāś ca rājñaḥ prāṇeṣu śaṅkitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3454: atha saṃvepamānānāṃ strīṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:3455: yat tad āśaṅkitaṃ pāpaṃ tasya jajñe viniścayaḥ // Ram_2,59.7
GE09ram_02_u:3456: tataḥ pracukruśur dīnāḥ sasvaraṃ tā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3459: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca tyaktanidre babhūvatuḥ // Ram_2,59.9
GE09ram_02_u:3460: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:3461: hā nātheti parikruśya petatur dharaṇītale // Ram_2,59.10
GE09ram_02_u:3463: na babhrāja rajodhvastā tāreva gaganacyutā // Ram_2,59.11
GE09ram_02_u:3467: babhūva naradevasya sadma diṣṭāntam īyuṣaḥ // Ram_2,59.13
GE09ram_02_u:3468: atītam ājñāya tu pārthivarṣabhaṃ yaśasvinaṃ saṃparivārya patnayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3469: bhṛśaṃ rudantyaḥ karuṇaṃ suduḥkhitāḥ pragṛhya bāhū vyalapann anāthavat // Ram_2,59.14
GE09ram_02_u:3470: tam agnim iva saṃśāntam ambuhīnam ivārṇavam
GE09ram_02_u:3471: hataprabham ivādityaṃ svargasthaṃ prekṣya bhūmipam // Ram_2,60.1
GE09ram_02_u:3473: upagṛhya śiro rājñaḥ kaikeyīṃ pratyabhāṣata // Ram_2,60.2
GE09ram_02_u:3474: sakāmā bhava kaikeyi bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:3475: tyaktvā rājānam ekāgrā nṛśaṃse duṣṭacāriṇi // Ram_2,60.3
GE09ram_02_u:3476: vihāya māṃ gato rāmo bhartā ca svargato mama
GE09ram_02_u:3477: vipathe sārthahīneva nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe // Ram_2,60.4
GE09ram_02_u:3478: bhartāraṃ taṃ parityajya kā strī daivatam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3479: icchej jīvitum anyatra kaikeyyās tyaktadharmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,60.5
GE09ram_02_u:3480: na lubdho budhyate doṣān kiṃ pākam iva bhakṣayan
GE09ram_02_u:3481: kubjānimittaṃ kaikeyyā rāghavāṇāṃ kulaṃ hatam // Ram_2,60.6
GE09ram_02_u:3483: sabhāryaṃ janakaḥ śrutvā paritapsyaty ahaṃ yathā // Ram_2,60.7
GE09ram_02_u:3488: niśamya nūnaṃ saṃtrastā rāghavaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati // Ram_2,60.9
GE09ram_02_u:3490: so 'pi śokasamāviṣṭo nanu tyakṣyati jīvitam // Ram_2,60.10
GE09ram_02_u:3494: rājñaḥ sarvāṇy athādiṣṭāś cakruḥ karmāṇy anantaram // Ram_2,60.12
GE09ram_02_u:3495: na tu saṃkālanaṃ rājño vinā putreṇa mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3496: sarvajñāḥ kartum īṣus te tato rakṣanti bhūmipam // Ram_2,60.13
GE09ram_02_u:3497: tailadroṇyāṃ tu sacivaiḥ śāyitaṃ taṃ narādhipam
GE09ram_02_u:3498: hā mṛto 'yam iti jñātvā striyas tāḥ paryadevayan // Ram_2,60.14
GE09ram_02_u:3502: purī nārājatāyodhyā hīnā rājñā mahātmanā // Ram_2,60.16
GE09ram_02_u:3505: gataprabhā dyaur iva bhāskaraṃ vinā vyapetanakṣatragaṇeva śarvarī
GE09ram_02_u:3506: purī babhāse rahitā mahātmanā na cāsrakaṇṭhākulamārgacatvarā // Ram_2,60.18
GE09ram_02_u:3507: narāś ca nāryaś ca sametya saṃghaśo vigarhamāṇā bharatasya mātaram
GE09ram_02_u:3508: tadā nagaryāṃ naradevasaṃkṣaye babhūvur ārtā na ca śarma lebhire // Ram_2,60.19
GE09ram_02_u:3510: sametya rājakartāraḥ sabhām īyur dvijātayaḥ // Ram_2,61.1
GE09ram_02_u:3512: kātyāyano gautamaś ca jābāliś ca mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,61.2
GE09ram_02_u:3513: ete dvijāḥ sahāmātyaiḥ pṛthag vācam udīrayan
GE09ram_02_u:3515: atītā śarvarī duḥkhaṃ yā no varṣaśatopamā
GE09ram_02_u:3516: asmin pañcatvam āpanne putraśokena pārthive // Ram_2,61.4
GE09ram_02_u:3517: svargataś ca mahārājo rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3518: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tejasvī rāmeṇaiva gataḥ saha // Ram_2,61.5
GE09ram_02_u:3522: arājakaṃ hi no rāṣṭraṃ na vināśam avāpnuyāt // Ram_2,61.7
GE09ram_02_u:3524: abhivarṣati parjanyo mahīṃ divyena vāriṇā // Ram_2,61.8
GE09ram_02_u:3526: nārājake pituḥ putro bhāryā vā vartate vaśe // Ram_2,61.9
GE09ram_02_u:3527: arājake dhanaṃ nāsti nāsti bhāryāpy arājake
GE09ram_02_u:3528: idam atyāhitaṃ cānyat kutaḥ satyam arājake // Ram_2,61.10
GE09ram_02_u:3530: udyānāni ca ramyāṇi hṛṣṭāḥ puṇyagṛhāṇi ca // Ram_2,61.11
GE09ram_02_u:3532: sattrāṇy anvāsate dāntā brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // Ram_2,61.12
GE09ram_02_u:3534: utsavāś ca samājāś ca vardhante rāṣṭravardhanāḥ // Ram_2,61.13
GE09ram_02_u:3538: narā niryānty araṇyāni nārībhiḥ saha kāminaḥ // Ram_2,61.15
GE09ram_02_u:3544: bhāvayann ātmanātmānaṃ yatra sāyaṃgṛho muniḥ // Ram_2,61.18
GE09ram_02_u:3546: na cāpy arājake senā śatrūn viṣahate yudhi // Ram_2,61.19
GE09ram_02_u:3547: yathā hy anudakā nadyo yathā vāpy atṛṇaṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:3548: agopālā yathā gāvas tathā rāṣṭram arājakam // Ram_2,61.20
GE09ram_02_u:3550: matsyā iva narā nityaṃ bhakṣayanti parasparam // Ram_2,61.21
GE09ram_02_u:3553: aho tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃcana
GE09ram_02_u:3554: rājā cen na bhavel loke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī // Ram_2,61.23
GE09ram_02_u:3555: jīvaty api mahārāje tavaiva vacanaṃ vayam
GE09ram_02_u:3556: nātikramāmahe sarve velāṃ prāpyeva sāgaraḥ // Ram_2,61.24
GE09ram_02_u:3557: sa naḥ samīkṣya dvijavaryavṛttaṃ nṛpaṃ vinā rājyam araṇyabhūtam
GE09ram_02_u:3558: kumāram ikṣvākusutaṃ vadānyaṃ tvam eva rājānam ihābhiṣiñca // Ram_2,61.25
GE09ram_02_u:3559: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:3560: mitrāmātyagaṇān sarvān brāhmaṇāṃs tān idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,62.1
GE09ram_02_u:3561: yad asau mātulakule pure rājagṛhe sukhī
GE09ram_02_u:3562: bharato vasati bhrātrā śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // Ram_2,62.2
GE09ram_02_u:3563: tac chīghraṃ javanā dūtā gacchantu tvaritair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3564: ānetuṃ bhrātarau vīrau kiṃ samīkṣāmahe vayam // Ram_2,62.3
GE09ram_02_u:3565: gacchantv iti tataḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abruvan
GE09ram_02_u:3566: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,62.4
GE09ram_02_u:3568: śrūyatām itikartavyaṃ sarvān eva bravīmi vaḥ // Ram_2,62.5
GE09ram_02_u:3569: puraṃ rājagṛhaṃ gatvā śīghraṃ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3570: tyaktaśokair idaṃ vācyaḥ śāsanād bharato mama // Ram_2,62.6
GE09ram_02_u:3571: purohitas tvāṃ kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3572: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // Ram_2,62.7
GE09ram_02_u:3573: mā cāsmai proṣitaṃ rāmaṃ mā cāsmai pitaraṃ mṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:3574: bhavantaḥ śaṃsiṣur gatvā rāghavāṇām imaṃ kṣayam // Ram_2,62.8
GE09ram_02_u:3575: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:3576: kṣipram ādāya rājñaś ca bharatasya ca gacchata
GE09ram_02_u:3578: te hastinapure gaṅgāṃ tīrtvā pratyaṅmukhā yayuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3583: abhigamyābhivādyaṃ taṃ kuliṅgāṃ prāviśan purīm // Ram_2,62.12
GE09ram_02_u:3585: yayur madhyena vāhlīkān sudāmānaṃ ca parvatam
GE09ram_02_u:3586: viṣṇoḥ padaṃ prekṣamāṇā vipāśāṃ cāpi śālmalīm // Ram_2,62.13
GE09ram_02_u:3587: te śrāntavāhanā dūtā vikṛṣṭena satā pathā
GE09ram_02_u:3588: girivrajaṃ puravaraṃ śīghram āsedur añjasā // Ram_2,62.14
GE09ram_02_u:3589: bhartuḥ priyārthaṃ kularakṣaṇārthaṃ bhartuś ca vaṃśasya parigrahārtham
GE09ram_02_u:3590: aheḍamānās tvarayā sma dūtā rātryāṃ tu te tat puram eva yātāḥ // Ram_2,62.15
GE09ram_02_u:3591: yām eva rātriṃ te dūtāḥ praviśanti sma tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:3592: bharatenāpi tāṃ rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭo 'yam apriyaḥ // Ram_2,63.1
GE09ram_02_u:3593: vyuṣṭām eva tu tāṃ rātriṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ svapnam apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:3596: āyāsaṃ hi vineṣyantaḥ sabhāyāṃ cakrire kathāḥ // Ram_2,63.3
GE09ram_02_u:3597: vādayanti tathā śāntiṃ lāsayanty api cāpare
GE09ram_02_u:3598: nāṭakāny apare prāhur hāsyāni vividhāni ca // Ram_2,63.4
GE09ram_02_u:3599: sa tair mahātmā bharataḥ sakhibhiḥ priyavādibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3600: goṣṭhīhāsyāni kurvadbhir na prāhṛṣyata rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,63.5
GE09ram_02_u:3601: tam abravīt priyasakho bharataṃ sakhibhir vṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:3602: suhṛdbhiḥ paryupāsīnaḥ kiṃ sakhe nānumodase // Ram_2,63.6
GE09ram_02_u:3603: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ suhṛdaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:3604: śṛṇu tvaṃ yannimittaṃ me dainyam etad upāgatam // Ram_2,63.7
GE09ram_02_u:3607: plavamānaś ca me dṛṣṭaḥ sa tasmin gomayahrade
GE09ram_02_u:3608: pibann añjalinā tailaṃ hasann iva muhur muhuḥ // Ram_2,63.9
GE09ram_02_u:3609: tatas tilodanaṃ bhuktvā punaḥ punar adhaḥśirāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3611: svapne 'pi sāgaraṃ śuṣkaṃ candraṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:3612: sahasā cāpi saṃśāntaṃ jvalitaṃ jātavedasam // Ram_2,63.11
GE09ram_02_u:3613: avadīrṇāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ śuṣkāṃś ca vividhān drumān
GE09ram_02_u:3614: ahaṃ paśyāmi vidhvastān sadhūmāṃś caiva parvatān // Ram_2,63.12
GE09ram_02_u:3616: prahasanti sma rājānaṃ pramadāḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalāḥ // Ram_2,63.13
GE09ram_02_u:3619: evam etan mayā dṛṣṭam imāṃ rātriṃ bhayāvahām
GE09ram_02_u:3620: ahaṃ rāmo 'tha vā rājā lakṣmaṇo vā mariṣyati // Ram_2,63.15
GE09ram_02_u:3621: naro yānena yaḥ svapne kharayuktena yāti hi
GE09ram_02_u:3623: etannimittaṃ dīno 'haṃ tan na vaḥ pratipūjaye // Ram_2,63.16
GE09ram_02_u:3624: śuṣyatīva ca me kaṇṭho na svastham iva me manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3625: jugupsann iva cātmānaṃ na ca paśyāmi kāraṇam // Ram_2,63.17
GE09ram_02_u:3626: imāṃ hi duḥsvapnagatiṃ niśāmya tām anekarūpām avitarkitāṃ purā
GE09ram_02_u:3627: bhayaṃ mahat taddhṛdayān na yāti me vicintya rājānam acintyadarśanam // Ram_2,63.18
GE09ram_02_u:3628: bharate bruvati svapnaṃ dūtās te klāntavāhanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3630: samāgamya tu rājñā ca rājaputreṇa cārcitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3631: rājñaḥ pādau gṛhītvā tu tam ūcur bharataṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,64.2
GE09ram_02_u:3632: purohitas tvā kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3633: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // Ram_2,64.3
GE09ram_02_u:3634: atra viṃśatikoṭyas tu nṛpater mātulasya te
GE09ram_02_u:3635: daśakoṭyas tu sampūrṇās tathaiva ca nṛpātmaja // Ram_2,64.4
GE09ram_02_u:3636: pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ svanuraktaḥ suhṛjjane
GE09ram_02_u:3637: dūtān uvāca bharataḥ kāmaiḥ sampratipūjya tān // Ram_2,64.5
GE09ram_02_u:3638: kaccit sukuśalī rājā pitā daśaratho mama
GE09ram_02_u:3639: kaccic cārogatā rāme lakṣmaṇe vā mahātmani // Ram_2,64.6
GE09ram_02_u:3641: arogā cāpi kausalyā mātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ // Ram_2,64.7
GE09ram_02_u:3642: kaccit sumitrā dharmajñā jananī lakṣmaṇasya yā
GE09ram_02_u:3643: śatrughnasya ca vīrasya sārogā cāpi madhyamā // Ram_2,64.8
GE09ram_02_u:3645: arogā cāpi kaikeyī mātā me kim uvāca ha // Ram_2,64.9
GE09ram_02_u:3646: evam uktās tu te dūtā bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:3647: ūcuḥ sampraśritaṃ vākyam idaṃ taṃ bharataṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3648: kuśalās te naravyāghra yeṣāṃ kuśalam icchasi // Ram_2,64.10
GE09ram_02_u:3649: bharataś cāpi tān dūtān evam ukto 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_02_u:3650: āpṛcche 'haṃ mahārājaṃ dūtāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām // Ram_2,64.11
GE09ram_02_u:3651: evam uktvā tu tān dūtān bharataḥ pārthivātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3652: dūtaiḥ saṃcodito vākyaṃ mātāmaham uvāca ha // Ram_2,64.12
GE09ram_02_u:3654: punar apy aham eṣyāmi yadā me tvaṃ smariṣyasi // Ram_2,64.13
GE09ram_02_u:3655: bharatenaivam uktas tu nṛpo mātāmahas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3656: tam uvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ śirasy āghrāya rāghavam // Ram_2,64.14
GE09ram_02_u:3657: gaccha tātānujāne tvāṃ kaikeyī suprajās tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:3658: mātaraṃ kuśalaṃ brūyāḥ pitaraṃ ca paraṃtapa // Ram_2,64.15
GE09ram_02_u:3659: purohitaṃ ca kuśalaṃ ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3660: tau ca tāta maheṣvāsau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_2,64.16
GE09ram_02_u:3661: tasmai hastyuttamāṃś citrān kambalān ajināni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3662: abhisatkṛtya kaikeyo bharatāya dhanaṃ dadau // Ram_2,64.17
GE09ram_02_u:3664: satkṛtya kaikeyī putraṃ kekayo dhanam ādiśat // Ram_2,64.18
GE09ram_02_u:3668: kharāñ śīghrān susaṃyuktān mātulo 'smai dhanaṃ dadau // Ram_2,64.20
GE09ram_02_u:3670: daṃṣṭrāyudhān mahākāyāñ śunaś copāyanaṃ dadau // Ram_2,64.21
GE09ram_02_u:3671: sa mātāmaham āpṛcchya mātulaṃ ca yudhājitam
GE09ram_02_u:3672: ratham āruhya bharataḥ śatrughnasahito yayau // Ram_2,64.22
GE09ram_02_u:3674: uṣṭrago'śvakharair bhṛtyā bharataṃ yāntam anvayuḥ // Ram_2,64.23
GE09ram_02_u:3675: balena gupto bharato mahātmā sahāryakasyātmasamair amātyaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3676: ādāya śatrughnam apetaśatrur gṛhād yayau siddha ivendralokāt // Ram_2,64.24
GE09ram_02_u:3679: śatadrūm atarac chrīmān nadīm ikṣvākunandanaḥ // Ram_2,65.1
GE09ram_02_u:3681: śilām ākurvatīṃ tīrtvā āgneyaṃ śalyakartanam // Ram_2,65.2
GE09ram_02_u:3683: atyayāt sa mahāśailān vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ prati // Ram_2,65.3
GE09ram_02_u:3685: yamunāṃ prāpya saṃtīrṇo balam āśvāsayat tadā // Ram_2,65.4
GE09ram_02_u:3686: śītīkṛtya tu gātrāṇi klāntān āśvāsya vājinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3687: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca prāyād ādāya codakam // Ram_2,65.5
GE09ram_02_u:3689: bhadro bhadreṇa yānena mārutaḥ kham ivātyayāt // Ram_2,65.6
GE09ram_02_u:3691: varūthaṃ ca yayau ramyaṃ grāmaṃ daśarathātmajaḥ // Ram_2,65.7
GE09ram_02_u:3692: tatra ramye vane vāsaṃ kṛtvāsau prāṅmukho yayau
GE09ram_02_u:3693: udyānam ujjihānāyāḥ priyakā yatra pādapāḥ // Ram_2,65.8
GE09ram_02_u:3694: sālāṃs tu priyakān prāpya śīghrān āsthāya vājinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3695: anujñāpyātha bharato vāhinīṃ tvarito yayau // Ram_2,65.9
GE09ram_02_u:3696: vāsaṃ kṛtvā sarvatīrthe tīrtvā cottānikāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:3697: anyā nadīś ca vividhāḥ pārvatīyais turaṃgamaiḥ // Ram_2,65.10
GE09ram_02_u:3699: tatāra ca naravyāghro lauhitye sa kapīvatīm
GE09ram_02_u:3700: ekasāle sthāṇumatīṃ vinate gomatīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,65.11
GE09ram_02_u:3704: ayodhyāṃ manunā rājñā nirmitāṃ sa dadarśa ha // Ram_2,65.13
GE09ram_02_u:3706: ayodhyām agrato dṛṣṭvā rathe sārathim abravīt // Ram_2,65.14
GE09ram_02_u:3708: ayodhyā dṛśyate dūrāt sārathe pāṇḍumṛttikā // Ram_2,65.15
GE09ram_02_u:3711: ayodhyāyāṃ purā śabdaḥ śrūyate tumulo mahān
GE09ram_02_u:3712: samantān naranārīṇāṃ tam adya na śṛṇomy aham // Ram_2,65.17
GE09ram_02_u:3716: araṇyabhūteva purī sārathe pratibhāti me // Ram_2,65.19
GE09ram_02_u:3717: na hy atra yānair dṛśyante na gajair na ca vājibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3718: niryānto vābhiyānto vā naramukhyā yathāpuram // Ram_2,65.20
GE09ram_02_u:3719: aniṣṭāni ca pāpāni paśyāmi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3720: nimittāny amanojñāni tena sīdati me manaḥ // Ram_2,65.21
GE09ram_02_u:3722: dvāḥsthair utthāya vijayaṃ pṛṣṭas taiḥ sahito yayau // Ram_2,65.22
GE09ram_02_u:3723: sa tv anekāgrahṛdayo dvāḥsthaṃ pratyarcya taṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:3724: sūtam aśvapateḥ klāntam abravīt tatra rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,65.23
GE09ram_02_u:3725: śrutā no yādṛśāḥ pūrvaṃ nṛpatīnāṃ vināśane
GE09ram_02_u:3726: ākārās tān ahaṃ sarvān iha paśyāmi sārathe // Ram_2,65.24
GE09ram_02_u:3728: sastrīpuṃsaṃ ca paśyāmi janam utkaṇṭhitaṃ pure // Ram_2,65.25
GE09ram_02_u:3729: ity evam uktvā bharataḥ sūtaṃ taṃ dīnamānasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3730: tāny aniṣṭāny ayodhyāyāṃ prekṣya rājagṛhaṃ yayau
GE09ram_02_u:3732: dṛṣṭvā purīm indrapurīprakāśāṃ duḥkhena sampūrṇataro babhūva
GE09ram_02_u:3733: bahūni paśyan manaso 'priyāṇi yāny anyadā nāsya pure babhūvuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3734: avākśirā dīnamanā na hṛṣṭaḥ pitur mahātmā praviveśa veśma // Ram_2,65.27
GE09ram_02_u:3735: apaśyaṃs tu tatas tatra pitaraṃ pitur ālaye
GE09ram_02_u:3736: jagāma bharato draṣṭuṃ mātaraṃ mātur ālaye // Ram_2,66.1
GE09ram_02_u:3737: anuprāptaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikeyī proṣitaṃ sutam
GE09ram_02_u:3738: utpapāta tadā hṛṣṭā tyaktvā sauvarṇamānasam // Ram_2,66.2
GE09ram_02_u:3740: bharataḥ prekṣya jagrāha jananyāś caraṇau śubhau // Ram_2,66.3
GE09ram_02_u:3742: aṅke bharatam āropya praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // Ram_2,66.4
GE09ram_02_u:3744: api nādhvaśramaḥ śīghraṃ rathenāpatatas tava // Ram_2,66.5
GE09ram_02_u:3745: āryakas te sukuśalī yudhājin mātulas tava
GE09ram_02_u:3746: pravāsāc ca sukhaṃ putra sarvaṃ me vaktum arhasi // Ram_2,66.6
GE09ram_02_u:3747: evaṃ pṛṣṭas tu kaikeyyā priyaṃ pārthivanandanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3748: ācaṣṭa bharataḥ sarvaṃ mātre rājīvalocanaḥ // Ram_2,66.7
GE09ram_02_u:3750: ambāyāḥ kuśalī tāto yudhājin mātulaś ca me // Ram_2,66.8
GE09ram_02_u:3751: yan me dhanaṃ ca ratnaṃ ca dadau rājā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3752: pariśrāntaṃ pathy abhavat tato 'haṃ pūrvam āgataḥ // Ram_2,66.9
GE09ram_02_u:3754: yad ahaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi tad ambā vaktum arhati // Ram_2,66.10
GE09ram_02_u:3756: na cāyam ikṣvākujanaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ pratibhāti me // Ram_2,66.11
GE09ram_02_u:3758: tam ahaṃ nādya paśyāmi draṣṭum icchann ihāgataḥ // Ram_2,66.12
GE09ram_02_u:3759: pitur grahīṣye caraṇau taṃ mamākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3760: āhosvid amba jyeṣṭhāyāḥ kausalyāyā niveśane // Ram_2,66.13
GE09ram_02_u:3761: taṃ pratyuvāca kaikeyī priyavad ghoram apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:3763: yā gatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ te pitā gataḥ // Ram_2,66.14
GE09ram_02_u:3764: tac chrutvā bharato vākyaṃ dharmābhijanavāñ śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3768: etat suruciraṃ bhāti pitur me śayanaṃ purā
GE09ram_02_u:3769: tad idaṃ na vibhāty adya vihīnaṃ tena dhīmatā // Ram_2,66.17
GE09ram_02_u:3770: tam ārtaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ samīkṣya patitaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:3771: utthāpayitvā śokārtaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,66.18
GE09ram_02_u:3773: tvadvidhā na hi śocanti santaḥ sadasi saṃmatāḥ // Ram_2,66.19
GE09ram_02_u:3774: sa ruditvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmau viparivṛtya ca
GE09ram_02_u:3775: jananīṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtaḥ // Ram_2,66.20
GE09ram_02_u:3776: abhiṣekṣyati rāmaṃ tu rājā yajñaṃ nu yakṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3777: ity ahaṃ kṛtasaṃkalpo hṛṣṭo yātrām ayāsiṣam // Ram_2,66.21
GE09ram_02_u:3778: tad idaṃ hy anyathā bhūtaṃ vyavadīrṇaṃ mano mama
GE09ram_02_u:3779: pitaraṃ yo na paśyāmi nityaṃ priyahite ratam // Ram_2,66.22
GE09ram_02_u:3780: amba kenātyagād rājā vyādhinā mayy anāgate
GE09ram_02_u:3781: dhanyā rāmādayaḥ sarve yaiḥ pitā saṃskṛtaḥ svayam // Ram_2,66.23
GE09ram_02_u:3782: na nūnaṃ māṃ mahārājaḥ prāptaṃ jānāti kīrtimān
GE09ram_02_u:3783: upajighreddhi māṃ mūrdhni tātaḥ saṃnamya satvaram // Ram_2,66.24
GE09ram_02_u:3785: yena māṃ rajasā dhvastam abhīkṣṇaṃ parimārjati // Ram_2,66.25
GE09ram_02_u:3786: yo me bhrātā pitā bandhur yasya dāso 'smi dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3787: tasya māṃ śīghram ākhyāhi rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,66.26
GE09ram_02_u:3788: pitā hi bhavati jyeṣṭho dharmam āryasya jānataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3789: tasya pādau grahīṣyāmi sa hīdānīṃ gatir mama // Ram_2,66.27
GE09ram_02_u:3790: ārye kim abravīd rājā pitā me satyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3791: paścimaṃ sādhusaṃdeśam icchāmi śrotum ātmanaḥ // Ram_2,66.28
GE09ram_02_u:3792: iti pṛṣṭā yathātattvaṃ kaikeyī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3793: rāmeti rājā vilapan hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_02_u:3794: sa mahātmā paraṃ lokaṃ gato gatimatāṃ varaḥ // Ram_2,66.29
GE09ram_02_u:3795: imāṃ tu paścimāṃ vācaṃ vyājahāra pitā tava
GE09ram_02_u:3797: siddhārthās tu narā rāmam āgataṃ sītayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:3798: lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam // Ram_2,66.31
GE09ram_02_u:3800: viṣaṇṇavadano bhūtvā bhūyaḥ papraccha mātaram // Ram_2,66.32
GE09ram_02_u:3802: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca samaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,66.33
GE09ram_02_u:3804: mātāsya yugapad vākyaṃ vipriyaṃ priyaśaṅkayā // Ram_2,66.34
GE09ram_02_u:3805: sa hi rājasutaḥ putra cīravāsā mahāvanam
GE09ram_02_u:3806: daṇḍakān saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇānucaro gataḥ // Ram_2,66.35
GE09ram_02_u:3807: tac chrutvā bharatas trasto bhrātuś cāritraśaṅkayā
GE09ram_02_u:3808: svasya vaṃśasya māhātmyāt praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // Ram_2,66.36
GE09ram_02_u:3809: kaccin na brāhmaṇadhanaṃ hṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasyacit
GE09ram_02_u:3810: kaccin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ // Ram_2,66.37
GE09ram_02_u:3812: kasmāt sa daṇḍakāraṇye bhrūṇaheva vivāsitaḥ // Ram_2,66.38
GE09ram_02_u:3813: athāsya capalā mātā tat svakarma yathātatham
GE09ram_02_u:3815: na brāhmaṇadhanaṃ kiṃcid dhṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasyacit
GE09ram_02_u:3816: kaścin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3817: na rāmaḥ paradārāṃś ca cakṣurbhyām api paśyati // Ram_2,66.40
GE09ram_02_u:3819: yācitas te pitā rājyaṃ rāmasya ca vivāsanam // Ram_2,66.41
GE09ram_02_u:3820: sa svavṛttiṃ samāsthāya pitā te tat tathākarot
GE09ram_02_u:3821: rāmaś ca sahasaumitriḥ preṣitaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_2,66.42
GE09ram_02_u:3822: tam apaśyan priyaṃ putraṃ mahīpālo mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3824: tvayā tv idānīṃ dharmajña rājatvam avalambyatām
GE09ram_02_u:3825: tvatkṛte hi mayā sarvam idam evaṃvidhaṃ kṛtam // Ram_2,66.44
GE09ram_02_u:3826: tat putra śīghraṃ vidhinā vidhijñair vasiṣṭhamukhyaiḥ sahito dvijendraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3827: saṃkālya rājānam adīnasattvam ātmānam urvyām abhiṣecayasva // Ram_2,66.45
GE09ram_02_u:3828: śrutvā tu pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ bhrātarau ca vivāsitau
GE09ram_02_u:3829: bharato duḥkhasaṃtapta idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,67.1
GE09ram_02_u:3830: kiṃ nu kāryaṃ hatasyeha mama rājyena śocataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3831: vihīnasyātha pitrā ca bhrātrā pitṛsamena ca // Ram_2,67.2
GE09ram_02_u:3832: duḥkhe me duḥkham akaror vraṇe kṣāram ivādadhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3833: rājānaṃ pretabhāvasthaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ ca tāpasam // Ram_2,67.3
GE09ram_02_u:3835: aṅgāram upagūhya sma pitā me nāvabuddhavān // Ram_2,67.4
GE09ram_02_u:3837: duṣkaraṃ yadi jīvetāṃ prāpya tvāṃ jananīṃ mama // Ram_2,67.5
GE09ram_02_u:3838: nanu tv āryo 'pi dharmātmā tvayi vṛttim anuttamām
GE09ram_02_u:3839: vartate guruvṛttijño yathā mātari vartate // Ram_2,67.6
GE09ram_02_u:3840: tathā jyeṣṭhā hi me mātā kausalyā dīrghadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:3841: tvayi dharmaṃ samāsthāya bhaginyām iva vartate // Ram_2,67.7
GE09ram_02_u:3843: prasthāpya vanavāsāya kathaṃ pāpe na śocasi // Ram_2,67.8
GE09ram_02_u:3845: pravrājya cīravasanaṃ kiṃ nu paśyasi kāraṇam // Ram_2,67.9
GE09ram_02_u:3846: lubdhāyā vidito manye na te 'haṃ rāghavaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:3847: tathā hy anartho rājyārthaṃ tvayā nīto mahān ayam // Ram_2,67.10
GE09ram_02_u:3849: kena śaktiprabhāvena rājyaṃ rakṣitum utsahe // Ram_2,67.11
GE09ram_02_u:3850: taṃ hi nityaṃ mahārājo balavantaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3851: apāśrito 'bhūd dharmātmā merur meruvanaṃ yathā // Ram_2,67.12
GE09ram_02_u:3853: damyo dhuram ivāsādya saheyaṃ kena caujasā // Ram_2,67.13
GE09ram_02_u:3854: atha vā me bhavec chaktir yogair buddhibalena vā
GE09ram_02_u:3855: sakāmāṃ na kariṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ putragardhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:3857: ity evam uktvā bharato mahātmā priyetarair vākyagaṇais tudaṃs tām
GE09ram_02_u:3858: śokāturaś cāpi nanāda bhūyaḥ siṃho yathā parvatagahvarasthaḥ // Ram_2,67.15
GE09ram_02_u:3859: tāṃ tathā garhayitvā tu mātaraṃ bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3860: roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭaḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ // Ram_2,68.1
GE09ram_02_u:3862: parityaktā ca dharmeṇa mā mṛtaṃ rudatī bhava // Ram_2,68.2
GE09ram_02_u:3863: kiṃ nu te 'dūṣayad rājā rāmo vā bhṛśadhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3864: yayor mṛtyur vivāsaś ca tvatkṛte tulyam āgatau // Ram_2,68.3
GE09ram_02_u:3866: kaikeyi narakaṃ gaccha mā ca bhartuḥ salokatām // Ram_2,68.4
GE09ram_02_u:3867: yat tvayā hīdṛśaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ ghoreṇa karmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:3868: sarvalokapriyaṃ hitvā mamāpy āpāditaṃ bhayam // Ram_2,68.5
GE09ram_02_u:3869: tvatkṛte me pitā vṛtto rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3870: ayaśo jīvaloke ca tvayāhaṃ pratipāditaḥ // Ram_2,68.6
GE09ram_02_u:3872: na te 'ham abhibhāṣyo 'smi durvṛtte patighātini // Ram_2,68.7
GE09ram_02_u:3873: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā mama mātaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3874: duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭās tvāṃ prāpya kuladūṣiṇīm // Ram_2,68.8
GE09ram_02_u:3875: na tvam aśvapateḥ kanyā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3876: rākṣasī tatra jātāsi kulapradhvaṃsinī pituḥ // Ram_2,68.9
GE09ram_02_u:3877: yat tvayā dhārmiko rāmo nityaṃ satyaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3878: vanaṃ prasthāpito duḥkhāt pitā ca tridivaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,68.10
GE09ram_02_u:3879: yatpradhānāsi tat pāpaṃ mayi pitrā vinākṛte
GE09ram_02_u:3880: bhrātṛbhyāṃ ca parityakte sarvalokasya cāpriye // Ram_2,68.11
GE09ram_02_u:3882: kṛtvā kaṃ prāpsyase tv adya lokaṃ nirayagāminī // Ram_2,68.12
GE09ram_02_u:3886: tasmāt priyataro mātuḥ priyatvān na tu bāndhavaḥ // Ram_2,68.14
GE09ram_02_u:3889: tāv ardhadivase śrāntau dṛṣṭvā putrau mahītale
GE09ram_02_u:3892: bindavaḥ patitā gātre sūkṣmāḥ surabhigandhinaḥ // Ram_2,68.17
GE09ram_02_u:3894: indraḥ prāñjalir udvignaḥ surarājo 'bravīd vacaḥ // Ram_2,68.18
GE09ram_02_u:3895: bhayaṃ kaccin na cāsmāsu kutaścid vidyate mahat
GE09ram_02_u:3896: kutonimittaḥ śokas te brūhi sarvahitaiṣiṇi // Ram_2,68.19
GE09ram_02_u:3897: evam uktā tu surabhiḥ surarājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:3898: pratyuvāca tato dhīrā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradā // Ram_2,68.20
GE09ram_02_u:3899: śāntaṃ pāpaṃ na vaḥ kiṃcit kutaścid amarādhipa
GE09ram_02_u:3900: ahaṃ tu magnau śocāmi svaputrau viṣame sthitau // Ram_2,68.21
GE09ram_02_u:3903: mama kāyāt prasūtau hi duḥkhitau bhārapīḍitau
GE09ram_02_u:3904: yau dṛṣṭvā paritapye 'haṃ nāsti putrasamaḥ priyaḥ // Ram_2,68.23
GE09ram_02_u:3906: kiṃ punar yā vinā rāmaṃ kausalyā vartayiṣyati // Ram_2,68.24
GE09ram_02_u:3907: ekaputrā ca sādhvī ca vivatseyaṃ tvayā kṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:3908: tasmāt tvaṃ satataṃ duḥkhaṃ pretya ceha ca lapsyase // Ram_2,68.25
GE09ram_02_u:3909: ahaṃ hy apacitiṃ bhrātuḥ pituś ca sakalām imām
GE09ram_02_u:3910: vardhanaṃ yaśasaś cāpi kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,68.26
GE09ram_02_u:3912: svayam eva pravekṣyāmi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam // Ram_2,68.27
GE09ram_02_u:3914: papāta bhuvi saṃkruddho niḥśvasann iva pannagaḥ // Ram_2,68.28
GE09ram_02_u:3916: babhūva bhūmau patito nṛpātmajaḥ śacīpateḥ ketur ivotsavakṣaye // Ram_2,68.29
GE09ram_02_u:3918: kausalyā śabdam ājñāya sumitrām idam abravīt // Ram_2,69.1
GE09ram_02_u:3920: tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi bharataṃ dīrghadarśinam // Ram_2,69.2
GE09ram_02_u:3921: evam uktvā sumitrāṃ sā vivarṇā malināmbarā
GE09ram_02_u:3922: pratasthe bharato yatra vepamānā vicetanā // Ram_2,69.3
GE09ram_02_u:3923: sa tu rāmānujaś cāpi śatrughnasahitas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3924: pratasthe bharato yatra kausalyāyā niveśanam // Ram_2,69.4
GE09ram_02_u:3928: idaṃ te rājyakāmasya rājyaṃ prāptam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:3929: samprāptaṃ bata kaikeyyā śīghraṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā // Ram_2,69.6
GE09ram_02_u:3931: kaikeyī kaṃ guṇaṃ tatra paśyati krūradarśinī // Ram_2,69.7
GE09ram_02_u:3932: kṣipraṃ mām api kaikeyī prasthāpayitum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:3933: hiraṇyanābho yatrāste suto me sumahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,69.8
GE09ram_02_u:3934: atha vā svayam evāhaṃ sumitrānucarā sukham
GE09ram_02_u:3935: agnihotraṃ puraskṛtya prasthāsye yatra rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,69.9
GE09ram_02_u:3936: kāmaṃ vā svayam evādya tatra māṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:3937: yatrāsau puruṣavyāghras tapyate me tapaḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,69.10
GE09ram_02_u:3940: evaṃ vilapamānāṃ tāṃ bharataḥ prāñjalis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3941: kausalyāṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtām // Ram_2,69.12
GE09ram_02_u:3942: ārye kasmād ajānantaṃ garhase mām akilbiṣam
GE09ram_02_u:3943: vipulāṃ ca mama prītiṃ sthirāṃ jānāsi rāghave // Ram_2,69.13
GE09ram_02_u:3944: kṛtā śāstrānugā buddhir mā bhūt tasya kadācana
GE09ram_02_u:3945: satyasaṃdhaḥ satāṃ śreṣṭho yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.14
GE09ram_02_u:3946: praiṣyaṃ pāpīyasāṃ yātu sūryaṃ ca prati mehatu
GE09ram_02_u:3947: hantu pādena gāṃ suptāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.15
GE09ram_02_u:3948: kārayitvā mahat karma bhartā bhṛtyam anarthakam
GE09ram_02_u:3949: adharmo yo 'sya so 'syās tu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.16
GE09ram_02_u:3951: tatas tu druhyatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.17
GE09ram_02_u:3953: adharmo yo 'sya so 'syāstu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.18
GE09ram_02_u:3954: saṃśrutya ca tapasvibhyaḥ sattre vai yajñadakṣiṇām
GE09ram_02_u:3955: tāṃ vipralapatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.19
GE09ram_02_u:3957: mā sma kārṣīt satāṃ dharmaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.20
GE09ram_02_u:3959: sa nāśayatu duṣṭātmā yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.21
GE09ram_02_u:3960: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ chāgaṃ vṛthā so 'śnātu nirghṛṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3961: gurūṃś cāpy avajānātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.22
GE09ram_02_u:3962: putrair dāraiś ca bhṛtyaiś ca svagṛhe parivāritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3963: sa eko mṛṣṭam aśnātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.23
GE09ram_02_u:3965: bhṛtyatyāge ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // Ram_2,69.24
GE09ram_02_u:3966: ubhe saṃdhye śayānasya yat pāpaṃ parikalpyate
GE09ram_02_u:3967: tac ca pāpaṃ bhavet tasya yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.25
GE09ram_02_u:3968: yad agnidāyake pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ gurutalpage
GE09ram_02_u:3969: mitradrohe ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // Ram_2,69.26
GE09ram_02_u:3970: devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca mātāpitros tathaiva ca
GE09ram_02_u:3971: mā sma kārṣīt sa śuśrūṣāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.27
GE09ram_02_u:3972: satāṃ lokāt satāṃ kīrtyāḥ sajjuṣṭāt karmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:3973: bhraśyatu kṣipram adyaiva yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.28
GE09ram_02_u:3975: evam āśvāsayann eva duḥkhārto nipapāta ha // Ram_2,69.29
GE09ram_02_u:3976: tathā tu śapathaiḥ kaṣṭaiḥ śapamānam acetanam
GE09ram_02_u:3977: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,69.30
GE09ram_02_u:3978: mama duḥkham idaṃ putra bhūyaḥ samupajāyate
GE09ram_02_u:3979: śapathaiḥ śapamāno hi prāṇān uparuṇatsi me // Ram_2,69.31
GE09ram_02_u:3980: diṣṭyā na calito dharmād ātmā te sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3981: vatsa satyapratijño me satāṃ lokān avāpsyasi // Ram_2,69.32
GE09ram_02_u:3983: mohāc ca śokasaṃrodhād babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ // Ram_2,69.33
GE09ram_02_u:3985: muhur muhur niḥśvasataś ca dīrghaṃ sā tasya śokena jagāma rātriḥ // Ram_2,69.34
GE09ram_02_u:3987: uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhavāg ṛṣiḥ // Ram_2,70.1
GE09ram_02_u:3988: alaṃ śokena bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3989: prāptakālaṃ narapateḥ kuru saṃyānam uttaram // Ram_2,70.2
GE09ram_02_u:3990: vasiṣṭhasya vacaḥ śrutvā bharato dhāraṇāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3992: uddhṛtaṃ tailasaṃkledāt sa tu bhūmau niveśitam
GE09ram_02_u:3995: tato daśarathaṃ putro vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ // Ram_2,70.5
GE09ram_02_u:3996: kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ rājan proṣite mayy anāgate
GE09ram_02_u:3997: vivāsya rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // Ram_2,70.6
GE09ram_02_u:3998: kva yāsyasi mahārāja hitvemaṃ duḥkhitaṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:4000: yogakṣemaṃ tu te rājan ko 'smin kalpayitā pure
GE09ram_02_u:4001: tvayi prayāte svas tāta rāme ca vanam āśrite // Ram_2,70.8
GE09ram_02_u:4002: vidhavā pṛthivī rājaṃs tvayā hīnā na rājate
GE09ram_02_u:4003: hīnacandreva rajanī nagarī pratibhāti mām // Ram_2,70.9
GE09ram_02_u:4005: abravīd vacanaṃ bhūyo vasiṣṭhas tu mahān ṛṣiḥ // Ram_2,70.10
GE09ram_02_u:4007: tāny avyagraṃ mahābāho kriyantām avicāritam // Ram_2,70.11
GE09ram_02_u:4010: ye tv agrato narendrasya agnyagārād bahiṣkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4011: ṛtvigbhir yājakaiś caiva te hriyante yathāvidhi // Ram_2,70.13
GE09ram_02_u:4013: bāṣpakaṇṭhā vimanasas tam ūhuḥ paricārakāḥ // Ram_2,70.14
GE09ram_02_u:4014: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:4015: prakiranto janā mārgaṃ nṛpater agrato yayuḥ // Ram_2,70.15
GE09ram_02_u:4017: devadārūṇi cāhṛtya citāṃ cakrus tathāpare // Ram_2,70.16
GE09ram_02_u:4018: gandhān uccāvacāṃś cānyāṃs tatra dattvātha bhūmipam
GE09ram_02_u:4019: tataḥ saṃveśayāmāsuś citāmadhye tam ṛtvijaḥ // Ram_2,70.17
GE09ram_02_u:4020: tathā hutāśanaṃ hutvā jepus tasya tadartvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4021: jaguś ca te yathāśāstraṃ tatra sāmāni sāmagāḥ // Ram_2,70.18
GE09ram_02_u:4022: śibikābhiś ca yānaiś ca yathārhaṃ tasya yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4023: nagarān niryayus tatra vṛddhaiḥ parivṛtās tadā // Ram_2,70.19
GE09ram_02_u:4024: prasavyaṃ cāpi taṃ cakrur ṛtvijo 'gnicitaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:4025: striyaś ca śokasaṃtaptāḥ kausalyāpramukhās tadā // Ram_2,70.20
GE09ram_02_u:4026: krauñcīnām iva nārīṇāṃ ninādas tatra śuśruve
GE09ram_02_u:4027: ārtānāṃ karuṇaṃ kāle krośantīnāṃ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,70.21
GE09ram_02_u:4028: tato rudantyo vivaśā vilapya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4030: kṛtodakaṃ te bharatena sārdhaṃ nṛpāṅganā mantripurohitāś ca
GE09ram_02_u:4031: puraṃ praviśyāśruparītanetrā bhūmau daśāhaṃ vyanayanta duḥkham // Ram_2,70.23
GE09ram_02_u:4034: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau ratnaṃ dhanam annaṃ ca puṣkalam
GE09ram_02_u:4035: bāstikaṃ bahuśuklaṃ ca gāś cāpi śataśas tathā // Ram_2,71.2
GE09ram_02_u:4036: dāsīdāsaṃ ca yānaṃ ca veśmāni sumahānti ca
GE09ram_02_u:4037: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau putro rājñas tasyaurdhvadaihikam // Ram_2,71.3
GE09ram_02_u:4041: citāmūle pitur vākyam idam āha suduḥkhitaḥ // Ram_2,71.5
GE09ram_02_u:4042: tāta yasmin nisṛṣṭo 'haṃ tvayā bhrātari rāghave
GE09ram_02_u:4043: tasmin vanaṃ pravrajite śūnye tyakto 'smy ahaṃ tvayā // Ram_2,71.6
GE09ram_02_u:4045: tām ambāṃ tāta kausalyāṃ tyaktvā tvaṃ kva gato nṛpa // Ram_2,71.7
GE09ram_02_u:4047: pituḥ śarīranirvāṇaṃ niṣṭanan viṣasāda ha // Ram_2,71.8
GE09ram_02_u:4048: sa tu dṛṣṭvā rudan dīnaḥ papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_02_u:4049: utthāpyamānaḥ śakrasya yantradhvaja iva cyutaḥ // Ram_2,71.9
GE09ram_02_u:4051: antakāle nipatitaṃ yayātim ṛṣayo yathā // Ram_2,71.10
GE09ram_02_u:4053: visaṃjño nyapatad bhūmau bhūmipālam anusmaran // Ram_2,71.11
GE09ram_02_u:4055: smṛtvā pitur guṇāṅgāni tāni tāni tadā tadā // Ram_2,71.12
GE09ram_02_u:4058: sukumāraṃ ca bālaṃ ca satataṃ lālitaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:4059: kva tāta bharataṃ hitvā vilapantaṃ gato bhavān // Ram_2,71.14
GE09ram_02_u:4060: nanu bhojyeṣu pāneṣu vastreṣv ābharaṇeṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:4061: pravārayasi naḥ sarvāṃs tan naḥ ko 'dya kariṣyati // Ram_2,71.15
GE09ram_02_u:4063: vihīnā yā tvayā rājñā dharmajñena mahātmanā // Ram_2,71.16
GE09ram_02_u:4064: pitari svargam āpanne rāme cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:4065: kiṃ me jīvitasāmarthyaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam // Ram_2,71.17
GE09ram_02_u:4066: hīno bhrātrā ca pitrā ca śūnyām ikṣvākupālitām
GE09ram_02_u:4067: ayodhyāṃ na pravekṣyāmi pravekṣyāmi tapovanam // Ram_2,71.18
GE09ram_02_u:4068: tayor vilapitaṃ śrutvā vyasanaṃ cānvavekṣya tat
GE09ram_02_u:4069: bhṛśam ārtatarā bhūyaḥ sarva evānugāminaḥ // Ram_2,71.19
GE09ram_02_u:4070: tato viṣaṇṇau śrāntau ca śatrughnabharatāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:4072: tataḥ prakṛtimān vaidyaḥ pitur eṣāṃ purohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4073: vasiṣṭho bharataṃ vākyam utthāpya tam uvāca ha // Ram_2,71.21
GE09ram_02_u:4075: teṣu cāparihāryeṣu naivaṃ bhavitum arhati // Ram_2,71.22
GE09ram_02_u:4081: amātyās tvarayanti sma tanayau cāparāḥ kriyāḥ // Ram_2,71.25
GE09ram_02_u:4083: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,72.1
GE09ram_02_u:4084: gatir yaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ duḥkhe kiṃ punar ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4085: sa rāmaḥ sattvasampannaḥ striyā pravrājito vanam // Ram_2,72.2
GE09ram_02_u:4086: balavān vīryasampanno lakṣmaṇo nāma yo 'py asau
GE09ram_02_u:4087: kiṃ na mocayate rāmaṃ kṛtvāpi pitṛnigraham // Ram_2,72.3
GE09ram_02_u:4088: pūrvam eva tu nigrāhyaḥ samavekṣya nayānayau
GE09ram_02_u:4089: utpathaṃ yaḥ samārūḍho nāryā rājā vaśaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,72.4
GE09ram_02_u:4094: tāṃ samīkṣya tadā dvāḥstho bhṛśaṃ pāpasya kāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:4096: yasyāḥ kṛte vane rāmo nyastadehaś ca vaḥ pitā
GE09ram_02_u:4097: seyaṃ pāpā nṛśaṃsā ca tasyāḥ kuru yathāmati // Ram_2,72.8
GE09ram_02_u:4098: śatrughnaś ca tad ājñāya vacanaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4099: antaḥpuracarān sarvān ity uvāca dhṛtavrataḥ // Ram_2,72.9
GE09ram_02_u:4100: tīvram utpāditaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ me tathā pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4101: yayā seyaṃ nṛśaṃsasya karmaṇaḥ phalam aśnutām // Ram_2,72.10
GE09ram_02_u:4103: gṛhītā balavat kubjā sā tadgṛham anādayat // Ram_2,72.11
GE09ram_02_u:4105: kruddham ājñāya śatrughnaṃ vyapalāyata sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,72.12
GE09ram_02_u:4107: yathāyaṃ samupakrānto niḥśeṣaṃ naḥ kariṣyati // Ram_2,72.13
GE09ram_02_u:4108: sānukrośāṃ vadānyāṃ ca dharmajñāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:4109: kausalyāṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmaḥ sā hi no 'stu dhruvā gatiḥ // Ram_2,72.14
GE09ram_02_u:4110: sa ca roṣeṇa tāmrākṣaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4111: vicakarṣa tadā kubjāṃ krośantīṃ pṛthivītale // Ram_2,72.15
GE09ram_02_u:4112: tasyā hy ākṛṣyamāṇāyā mantharāyās tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4113: citraṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tad vyaśīryata // Ram_2,72.16
GE09ram_02_u:4115: aśobhata tadā bhūyaḥ śāradaṃ gaganaṃ yathā // Ram_2,72.17
GE09ram_02_u:4116: sa balī balavat krodhād gṛhītvā puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4117: kaikeyīm abhinirbhartsya babhāṣe paruṣaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,72.18
GE09ram_02_u:4118: tair vākyaiḥ paruṣair duḥkhaiḥ kaikeyī bhṛśaduḥkhitā
GE09ram_02_u:4120: tāṃ prekṣya bharataḥ kruddhaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:4121: avadhyāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pramadāḥ kṣamyatām iti // Ram_2,72.20
GE09ram_02_u:4122: hanyām aham imāṃ pāpāṃ kaikeyīṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:4123: yadi māṃ dhārmiko rāmo nāsūyen mātṛghātakam // Ram_2,72.21
GE09ram_02_u:4124: imām api hatāṃ kubjāṃ yadi jānāti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4125: tvāṃ ca māṃ caiva dharmātmā nābhibhāṣiṣyate dhruvam // Ram_2,72.22
GE09ram_02_u:4127: nyavartata tato roṣāt tāṃ mumoca ca mantharām // Ram_2,72.23
GE09ram_02_u:4128: sā pādamūle kaikeyyā mantharā nipapāta ha
GE09ram_02_u:4129: niḥśvasantī suduḥkhārtā kṛpaṇaṃ vilalāpa ca // Ram_2,72.24
GE09ram_02_u:4131: śanaiḥ samāśvāsayad ārtarūpāṃ krauñcīṃ vilagnām iva vīkṣamāṇām // Ram_2,72.25
GE09ram_02_u:4133: sametya rājakartāro bharataṃ vākyam abruvan // Ram_2,73.1
GE09ram_02_u:4134: gato daśarathaḥ svargaṃ yo no gurutaro guruḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4135: rāmaṃ pravrājya vai jyeṣṭhaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // Ram_2,73.2
GE09ram_02_u:4136: tvam adya bhava no rājā rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4137: saṃgatyā nāparādhnoti rājyam etad anāyakam // Ram_2,73.3
GE09ram_02_u:4139: pratīkṣate tvāṃ svajanaḥ śreṇayaś ca nṛpātmaja // Ram_2,73.4
GE09ram_02_u:4141: abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ pāhi cāsmān nararṣabha // Ram_2,73.5
GE09ram_02_u:4143: bharatas taṃ janaṃ sarvaṃ pratyuvāca dhṛtavrataḥ // Ram_2,73.6
GE09ram_02_u:4144: jyeṣṭhasya rājatā nityam ucitā hi kulasya naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4145: naivaṃ bhavanto māṃ vaktum arhanti kuśalā janāḥ // Ram_2,73.7
GE09ram_02_u:4146: rāmaḥ pūrvo hi no bhrātā bhaviṣyati mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4147: ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi varṣāṇi nava pañca ca // Ram_2,73.8
GE09ram_02_u:4149: ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ rāghavaṃ vanāt // Ram_2,73.9
GE09ram_02_u:4151: puraskṛtya gamiṣyāmi rāmahetor vanaṃ prati // Ram_2,73.10
GE09ram_02_u:4153: āneṣyāmi tu vai rāmaṃ havyavāham ivādhvarāt // Ram_2,73.11
GE09ram_02_u:4154: na sakāmāṃ kariṣyāmi svām imāṃ mātṛgandhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:4155: vane vatsyāmy ahaṃ durge rāmo rājā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,73.12
GE09ram_02_u:4156: kriyatāṃ śilpibhiḥ panthāḥ samāni viṣamāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:4159: pratyuvāca janaḥ sarvaḥ śrīmadvākyam anuttamam // Ram_2,73.14
GE09ram_02_u:4160: evaṃ te bhāṣamāṇasya padmā śrīr upatiṣṭhatām
GE09ram_02_u:4161: yas tvaṃ jyeṣṭhe nṛpasute pṛthivīṃ dātum icchasi // Ram_2,73.15
GE09ram_02_u:4162: anuttamaṃ tad vacanaṃ nṛpātmaja prabhāṣitaṃ saṃśravaṇe niśamya ca
GE09ram_02_u:4163: praharṣajās taṃ prati bāṣpabindavo nipetur āryānananetrasambhavāḥ // Ram_2,73.16
GE09ram_02_u:4164: ūcus te vacanam idaṃ niśamya hṛṣṭāḥ sāmātyāḥ sapariṣado viyātaśokāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4165: panthānaṃ naravarabhaktimāñ janaś ca vyādiṣṭas tava vacanāc ca śilpivargaḥ // Ram_2,73.17
GE09ram_02_u:4167: svakarmābhiratāḥ śūrāḥ khanakā yantrakās tathā // Ram_2,74.1
GE09ram_02_u:4169: tathā vardhakayaś caiva mārgiṇo vṛkṣatakṣakāḥ // Ram_2,74.2
GE09ram_02_u:4171: samarthā ye ca draṣṭāraḥ puratas te pratasthire // Ram_2,74.3
GE09ram_02_u:4172: sa tu harṣāt tam uddeśaṃ janaugho vipulaḥ prayān
GE09ram_02_u:4176: latāvallīś ca gulmāṃś ca sthāṇūn aśmana eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:4177: janās te cakrire mārgaṃ chindanto vividhān drumān // Ram_2,74.6
GE09ram_02_u:4178: avṛkṣeṣu ca deśeṣu kecid vṛkṣān aropayan
GE09ram_02_u:4179: kecit kuṭhāraiṣ ṭaṅkaiś ca dātraiś chindan kvacit kvacit // Ram_2,74.7
GE09ram_02_u:4181: vidhamanti sma durgāṇi sthalāni ca tatas tataḥ // Ram_2,74.8
GE09ram_02_u:4183: nimnabhāgāṃs tathā kecit samāṃś cakruḥ samantataḥ // Ram_2,74.9
GE09ram_02_u:4184: babandhur bandhanīyāṃś ca kṣodyān saṃcukṣudus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:4185: bibhidur bhedanīyāṃś ca tāṃs tān deśān narās tadā // Ram_2,74.10
GE09ram_02_u:4192: bahv aśobhata senāyāḥ panthāḥ svargapathopamaḥ // Ram_2,74.13
GE09ram_02_u:4195: yo niveśas tv abhipreto bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4196: bhūyas taṃ śobhayāmāsur bhūṣābhir bhūṣaṇopamam // Ram_2,74.15
GE09ram_02_u:4204: samucchritair niveśās te babhuḥ śakrapuropamāḥ // Ram_2,74.19
GE09ram_02_u:4207: sacandratārāgaṇamaṇḍitaṃ yathā nabhaḥ kṣapāyām amalaṃ virājate
GE09ram_02_u:4208: narendramārgaḥ sa tathā vyarājata krameṇa ramyaḥ śubhaśilpinirmitaḥ // Ram_2,74.21
GE09ram_02_u:4212: dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca śataśo vādyāṃś coccāvacasvarān // Ram_2,75.2
GE09ram_02_u:4213: sa tūryaghoṣaḥ sumahān divam āpūrayann iva
GE09ram_02_u:4214: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ bhūyaḥ śokair arandhrayat // Ram_2,75.3
GE09ram_02_u:4215: tataḥ prabuddho bharatas taṃ ghoṣaṃ saṃnivartya ca
GE09ram_02_u:4216: nāhaṃ rājeti cāpy uktvā śatrughnam idam abravīt // Ram_2,75.4
GE09ram_02_u:4218: visṛjya mayi duḥkhāni rājā daśaratho gataḥ // Ram_2,75.5
GE09ram_02_u:4220: paribhramati rājaśrīr naur ivākarṇikā jale // Ram_2,75.6
GE09ram_02_u:4221: ity evaṃ bharataṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ vicetanam
GE09ram_02_u:4222: kṛpaṇaṃ ruruduḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ yoṣitas tadā // Ram_2,75.7
GE09ram_02_u:4226: sudharmām iva dharmātmā sagaṇaḥ pratyapadyata // Ram_2,75.9
GE09ram_02_u:4228: adhyāsta sarvavedajño dūtān anuśaśāsa ca // Ram_2,75.10
GE09ram_02_u:4230: kṣipram ānayatāvyagrāḥ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ hi naḥ // Ram_2,75.11
GE09ram_02_u:4232: rathair aśvair gajaiś cāpi janānām upagacchatām // Ram_2,75.12
GE09ram_02_u:4234: pratyanandan prakṛtayo yathā daśarathaṃ tathā // Ram_2,75.13
GE09ram_02_u:4236: daśarathasutaśobhitā sabhā sadaśaratheva babhau yathā purā // Ram_2,75.14
GE09ram_02_u:4238: dadarśa buddhisampannaḥ pūrṇacandrāṃ niśām iva // Ram_2,76.1
GE09ram_02_u:4241: rājñas tu prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ samagrāḥ prekṣya dharmavit
GE09ram_02_u:4242: idaṃ purohito vākyaṃ bharataṃ mṛdu cābravīt // Ram_2,76.3
GE09ram_02_u:4243: tāta rājā daśarathaḥ svargato dharmam ācaran
GE09ram_02_u:4244: dhanadhānyavatīṃ sphītāṃ pradāya pṛthivīṃ tava // Ram_2,76.4
GE09ram_02_u:4245: rāmas tathā satyadhṛtiḥ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran
GE09ram_02_u:4246: nājahāt pitur ādeśaṃ śaśī jyotsnām ivoditaḥ // Ram_2,76.5
GE09ram_02_u:4247: pitrā bhrātrā ca te dattaṃ rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:4248: tad bhuṅkṣva muditāmātyaḥ kṣipram evābhiṣecaya // Ram_2,76.6
GE09ram_02_u:4249: udīcyāś ca pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca kevalāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4250: koṭyāparāntāḥ sāmudrā ratnāny abhiharantu te // Ram_2,76.7
GE09ram_02_u:4252: jagāma manasā rāmaṃ dharmajño dharmakāṅkṣayā // Ram_2,76.8
GE09ram_02_u:4254: vilalāpa sabhāmadhye jagarhe ca purohitam // Ram_2,76.9
GE09ram_02_u:4256: dharme prayatamānasya ko rājyaṃ madvidho haret // Ram_2,76.10
GE09ram_02_u:4258: rājyaṃ cāhaṃ ca rāmasya dharmaṃ vaktum ihārhasi // Ram_2,76.11
GE09ram_02_u:4260: labdhum arhati kākutstho rājyaṃ daśaratho yathā // Ram_2,76.12
GE09ram_02_u:4261: anāryajuṣṭam asvargyaṃ kuryāṃ pāpam ahaṃ yadi
GE09ram_02_u:4262: ikṣvākūṇām ahaṃ loke bhaveyaṃ kulapāṃsanaḥ // Ram_2,76.13
GE09ram_02_u:4263: yaddhi mātrā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ nāhaṃ tad abhirocaye
GE09ram_02_u:4265: rāmam evānugacchāmi sa rājā dvipadāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4266: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ rāghavo rājyam arhati // Ram_2,76.15
GE09ram_02_u:4267: tad vākyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ śrutvā sarve sabhāsadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4268: harṣān mumucur aśrūṇi rāme nihitacetasaḥ // Ram_2,76.16
GE09ram_02_u:4269: yadi tv āryaṃ na śakṣyāmi vinivartayituṃ vanāt
GE09ram_02_u:4270: vane tatraiva vatsyāmi yathāryo lakṣmaṇas tathā // Ram_2,76.17
GE09ram_02_u:4273: evam uktvā tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4275: tūrṇam utthāya gaccha tvaṃ sumantra mama śāsanāt
GE09ram_02_u:4276: yātrām ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ balaṃ caiva samānaya // Ram_2,76.20
GE09ram_02_u:4277: evam uktaḥ sumantras tu bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:4278: prahṛṣṭaḥ so 'diśat sarvaṃ yathā saṃdiṣṭam iṣṭavat // Ram_2,76.21
GE09ram_02_u:4279: tāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ prakṛtayo balādhyakṣā balasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:4280: śrutvā yātrāṃ samājñaptāṃ rāghavasya nivartane // Ram_2,76.22
GE09ram_02_u:4281: tato yodhāṅganāḥ sarvā bhartṝn sarvān gṛhe gṛhe
GE09ram_02_u:4282: yātrāgamanam ājñāya tvarayanti sma harṣitāḥ // Ram_2,76.23
GE09ram_02_u:4283: te hayair gorathaiḥ śīghraiḥ syandanaiś ca manojavaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4284: saha yodhair balādhyakṣā balaṃ sarvam acodayan // Ram_2,76.24
GE09ram_02_u:4285: sajjaṃ tu tad balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bharato gurusaṃnidhau
GE09ram_02_u:4286: rathaṃ me tvarayasveti sumantraṃ pārśvato 'bravīt // Ram_2,76.25
GE09ram_02_u:4288: rathaṃ gṛhītvā prayayau yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ // Ram_2,76.26
GE09ram_02_u:4289: sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiḥ pratāpavān bruvan suyuktaṃ dṛḍhasatyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4290: guruṃ mahāraṇyagataṃ yaśasvinaṃ prasādayiṣyan bharato 'bravīt tadā // Ram_2,76.27
GE09ram_02_u:4291: tūrṇaṃ samutthāya sumantra gaccha balasya yogāya balapradhānān
GE09ram_02_u:4292: ānetum icchāmi hi taṃ vanasthaṃ prasādya rāmaṃ jagato hitāya // Ram_2,76.28
GE09ram_02_u:4293: sa sūtaputro bharatena samyag ājñāpitaḥ saṃparipūrṇakāmaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4294: śaśāsa sarvān prakṛtipradhānān balasya mukhyāṃś ca suhṛjjanaṃ ca // Ram_2,76.29
GE09ram_02_u:4295: tataḥ samutthāya kule kule te rājanyavaiśyā vṛṣalāś ca viprāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4296: ayūyujann uṣṭrarathān kharāṃś ca nāgān hayāṃś caiva kulaprasūtān // Ram_2,76.30
GE09ram_02_u:4300: adhiruhya hayair yuktān rathān sūryarathopamān // Ram_2,77.2
GE09ram_02_u:4304: anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam // Ram_2,77.4
GE09ram_02_u:4306: anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam // Ram_2,77.5
GE09ram_02_u:4307: kaikeyī ca sumitrā ca kausalyā ca yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:4310: tasyaiva ca kathāś citrāḥ kurvāṇā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ // Ram_2,77.7
GE09ram_02_u:4312: kadā drakṣyāmahe rāmaṃ jagataḥ śokanāśanam // Ram_2,77.8
GE09ram_02_u:4313: dṛṣṭa eva hi naḥ śokam apaneṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4314: tamaḥ sarvasya lokasya samudyann iva bhāskaraḥ // Ram_2,77.9
GE09ram_02_u:4315: ity evaṃ kathayantas te samprahṛṣṭāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4316: pariṣvajānāś cānyonyaṃ yayur nāgarikās tadā // Ram_2,77.10
GE09ram_02_u:4317: ye ca tatrāpare sarve saṃmatā ye ca naigamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4318: rāmaṃ prati yayur hṛṣṭāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tadā // Ram_2,77.11
GE09ram_02_u:4319: maṇikārāś ca ye kecit kumbhakārāś ca śobhanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4320: sūtrakarmakṛtaś caiva ye ca śastropajīvinaḥ // Ram_2,77.12
GE09ram_02_u:4324: snāpakācchādakā vaidyā dhūpakāḥ śauṇḍikās tathā // Ram_2,77.14
GE09ram_02_u:4326: śailūṣāś ca saha strībhir yānti kaivartakās tathā // Ram_2,77.15
GE09ram_02_u:4328: gorathair bharataṃ yāntam anujagmuḥ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,77.16
GE09ram_02_u:4330: sarve te vividhair yānaiḥ śanair bharatam anvayuḥ // Ram_2,77.17
GE09ram_02_u:4333: nirīkṣyānugatāṃ senāṃ tāṃ ca gaṅgāṃ śivodakām
GE09ram_02_u:4334: bharataḥ sacivān sarvān abravīd vākyakovidaḥ // Ram_2,77.19
GE09ram_02_u:4336: viśrāntāḥ pratariṣyāmaḥ śva idānīṃ mahānadīm // Ram_2,77.20
GE09ram_02_u:4337: dātuṃ ca tāvad icchāmi svar gatasya mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4340: nyaveśayaṃs tāṃś chandena svena svena pṛthakpṛthak // Ram_2,77.22
GE09ram_02_u:4341: niveśya gaṅgām anu tāṃ mahānadīṃ camūṃ vidhānaiḥ paribarhaśobhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:4342: uvāsa rāmasya tadā mahātmano vicintayāno bharato nivartanam // Ram_2,77.23
GE09ram_02_u:4343: tato niviṣṭāṃ dhvajinīṃ gaṅgām anvāśritāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:4347: sa eṣa hi mahākāyaḥ kovidāradhvajo rathe
GE09ram_02_u:4348: bandhayiṣyati vā dāśān atha vāsmān vadhiṣyati // Ram_2,78.3
GE09ram_02_u:4349: atha dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ pitrā rājyād vivāsitam
GE09ram_02_u:4351: bhartā caiva sakhā caiva rāmo dāśarathir mama
GE09ram_02_u:4353: tiṣṭhantu sarvadāśāś ca gaṅgām anvāśritā nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:4355: nāvāṃ śatānāṃ pañcānāṃ kaivartānāṃ śataṃ śatam
GE09ram_02_u:4356: saṃnaddhānāṃ tathā yūnāṃ tiṣṭhantv ity abhyacodayat // Ram_2,78.7
GE09ram_02_u:4357: yadā tuṣṭas tu bharato rāmasyeha bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:4358: seyaṃ svastimayī senā gaṅgām adya tariṣyati // Ram_2,78.8
GE09ram_02_u:4361: tam āyāntaṃ tu samprekṣya sūtaputraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:4364: kuśalo daṇḍakāraṇye vṛddho bhrātuś ca te sakhā // Ram_2,78.11
GE09ram_02_u:4365: tasmāt paśyatu kākutstha tvāṃ niṣādādhipo guhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4366: asaṃśayaṃ vijānīte yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_2,78.12
GE09ram_02_u:4367: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sumantrād bharataḥ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:4368: uvāca vacanaṃ śīghraṃ guhaḥ paśyatu mām iti // Ram_2,78.13
GE09ram_02_u:4370: āgamya bharataṃ prahvo guho vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,78.14
GE09ram_02_u:4371: niṣkuṭaś caiva deśo 'yaṃ vañcitāś cāpi te vayam
GE09ram_02_u:4372: nivedayāmas te sarve svake dāśakule vasa // Ram_2,78.15
GE09ram_02_u:4373: asti mūlaṃ phalaṃ caiva niṣādaiḥ samupāhṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:4374: ārdraṃ ca māṃsaṃ śuṣkaṃ ca vanyaṃ coccāvacaṃ mahat // Ram_2,78.16
GE09ram_02_u:4376: arcito vividhaiḥ kāmaiḥ śvaḥ sasainyo gamiṣyasi // Ram_2,78.17
GE09ram_02_u:4377: evam uktas tu bharato niṣādādhipatiṃ guham
GE09ram_02_u:4379: ūrjitaḥ khalu te kāmaḥ kṛto mama guroḥ sakhe
GE09ram_02_u:4380: yo me tvam īdṛśīṃ senām eko 'bhyarcitum icchasi // Ram_2,79.2
GE09ram_02_u:4381: ity uktvā tu mahātejā guhaṃ vacanam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:4382: abravīd bharataḥ śrīmān niṣādādhipatiṃ punaḥ // Ram_2,79.3
GE09ram_02_u:4384: gahano 'yaṃ bhṛśaṃ deśo gaṅgānūpo duratyayaḥ // Ram_2,79.4
GE09ram_02_u:4386: abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ guho gahanagocaraḥ // Ram_2,79.5
GE09ram_02_u:4390: iyaṃ te mahatī senā śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me // Ram_2,79.7
GE09ram_02_u:4391: tam evam abhibhāṣantam ākāśa iva nirmalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4392: bharataḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā guhaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,79.8
GE09ram_02_u:4393: mā bhūt sa kālo yat kaṣṭaṃ na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:4394: rāghavaḥ sa hi me bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo mama // Ram_2,79.9
GE09ram_02_u:4396: buddhir anyā na te kāryā guha satyaṃ bravīmi te // Ram_2,79.10
GE09ram_02_u:4398: punar evābravīd vākyaṃ bharataṃ prati harṣitaḥ // Ram_2,79.11
GE09ram_02_u:4399: dhanyas tvaṃ na tvayā tulyaṃ paśyāmi jagatītale
GE09ram_02_u:4400: ayatnād āgataṃ rājyaṃ yas tvaṃ tyaktum ihecchasi // Ram_2,79.12
GE09ram_02_u:4401: śāśvatī khalu te kīrtir lokān anucariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:4402: yas tvaṃ kṛcchragataṃ rāmaṃ pratyānayitum icchasi // Ram_2,79.13
GE09ram_02_u:4404: babhau naṣṭaprabhaḥ sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata // Ram_2,79.14
GE09ram_02_u:4405: saṃniveśya sa tāṃ senāṃ guhena paritoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4406: śatrughnena saha śrīmāñ śayanaṃ punar āgamat // Ram_2,79.15
GE09ram_02_u:4408: upasthito hy anarhasya dharmaprekṣasya tādṛśaḥ // Ram_2,79.16
GE09ram_02_u:4412: yathā sūryāṃśusaṃtapto himavān prasruto himam // Ram_2,79.18
GE09ram_02_u:4417: guhena sārdhaṃ bharataḥ samāgato mahānubhāvaḥ sajanaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4418: sudurmanās taṃ bharataṃ tadā punar guhaḥ samāśvāsayad agrajaṃ prati // Ram_2,79.21
GE09ram_02_u:4422: bhrātṛguptyartham atyantam ahaṃ lakṣmaṇam abruvam // Ram_2,80.2
GE09ram_02_u:4423: iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā
GE09ram_02_u:4425: ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvo duḥkhānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4426: dharmātmaṃs tasya guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmahe vayam // Ram_2,80.4
GE09ram_02_u:4427: na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaścana
GE09ram_02_u:4428: motsuko bhūr bravīmy etad apy asatyaṃ tavāgrataḥ // Ram_2,80.5
GE09ram_02_u:4429: asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4430: dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām // Ram_2,80.6
GE09ram_02_u:4431: so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:4432: rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvaiḥ svair jñātibhiḥ saha // Ram_2,80.7
GE09ram_02_u:4433: na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃcid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:4434: caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ prasahema vayaṃ yudhi // Ram_2,80.8
GE09ram_02_u:4436: anunītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā // Ram_2,80.9
GE09ram_02_u:4437: kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:4438: śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā // Ram_2,80.10
GE09ram_02_u:4439: yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi
GE09ram_02_u:4440: taṃ paśya guha saṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā // Ram_2,80.11
GE09ram_02_u:4441: mahatā tapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4443: asmin pravrājite rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:4444: vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,80.13
GE09ram_02_u:4447: kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama
GE09ram_02_u:4448: nāśaṃse yadi te sarve jīveyuḥ śarvarīm imām // Ram_2,80.15
GE09ram_02_u:4449: jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā
GE09ram_02_u:4450: duḥkhitā yā tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati // Ram_2,80.16
GE09ram_02_u:4452: rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati // Ram_2,80.17
GE09ram_02_u:4453: siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite
GE09ram_02_u:4460: sukhitā vicariṣyanti rājadhānīṃ pitur mama // Ram_2,80.21
GE09ram_02_u:4462: nivṛtte samaye hy asmin sukhitāḥ praviśemahi // Ram_2,80.22
GE09ram_02_u:4465: prabhāte vimale sūrye kārayitvā jaṭā ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:4466: asmin bhāgīrathītīre sukhaṃ saṃtāritau mayā // Ram_2,80.24
GE09ram_02_u:4468: vareṣucāpāsidharau paraṃtapau vyavekṣamāṇau saha sītayā gatau // Ram_2,80.25
GE09ram_02_u:4469: guhasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharato bhṛśam apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:4470: dhyānaṃ jagāma tatraiva yatra tac chrutam apriyam // Ram_2,81.1
GE09ram_02_u:4474: papāta sahasā totrair hṛdi viddha iva dvipaḥ // Ram_2,81.3
GE09ram_02_u:4477: tataḥ sarvāḥ samāpetur mātaro bharatasya tāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4479: tāś ca taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau rudantyaḥ paryavārayan
GE09ram_02_u:4480: kausalyā tv anusṛtyainaṃ durmanāḥ pariṣasvaje // Ram_2,81.6
GE09ram_02_u:4481: vatsalā svaṃ yathā vatsam upagūhya tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:4483: putra vyādhir na te kaccic charīraṃ paribādhate
GE09ram_02_u:4484: adya rājakulasyāsya tvadadhīnaṃ hi jīvitam // Ram_2,81.8
GE09ram_02_u:4485: tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā putra jīvāmi rāme sabhrātṛke gate
GE09ram_02_u:4486: vṛtte daśarathe rājñi nātha ekas tvam adya naḥ // Ram_2,81.9
GE09ram_02_u:4487: kaccin na lakṣmaṇe putra śrutaṃ te kiṃcid apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:4488: putra vā hy ekaputrāyāḥ sahabhārye vanaṃ gate // Ram_2,81.10
GE09ram_02_u:4489: sa muhūrtaṃ samāśvasya rudann eva mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4490: kausalyāṃ parisāntvyedaṃ guhaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,81.11
GE09ram_02_u:4491: bhrātā me kvāvasad rātriṃ kva sītā kva ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4492: asvapac chayane kasmin kiṃ bhuktvā guha śaṃsa me // Ram_2,81.12
GE09ram_02_u:4494: yadvidhaṃ pratipede ca rāme priyahite 'tithau // Ram_2,81.13
GE09ram_02_u:4495: annam uccāvacaṃ bhakṣāḥ phalāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:4498: na hi tat pratyagṛhṇāt sa kṣatradharmam anusmaran // Ram_2,81.15
GE09ram_02_u:4499: na hy asmābhiḥ pratigrāhyaṃ sakhe deyaṃ tu sarvadā
GE09ram_02_u:4500: iti tena vayaṃ rājann anunītā mahātmanā // Ram_2,81.16
GE09ram_02_u:4502: aupavāsyaṃ tadākārṣīd rāghavaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_2,81.17
GE09ram_02_u:4503: tatas tu jalaśeṣeṇa lakṣmaṇo 'py akarot tadā
GE09ram_02_u:4504: vāgyatās te trayaḥ saṃdhyām upāsata samāhitāḥ // Ram_2,81.18
GE09ram_02_u:4505: saumitris tu tataḥ paścād akarot svāstaraṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:4506: svayam ānīya barhīṃṣi kṣipraṃ rāghavakāraṇāt // Ram_2,81.19
GE09ram_02_u:4507: tasmin samāviśad rāmaḥ svāstare saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:4508: prakṣālya ca tayoḥ pādāv apacakrāma lakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,81.20
GE09ram_02_u:4509: etat tad iṅgudīmūlam idam eva ca tat tṛṇam
GE09ram_02_u:4510: yasmin rāmaś ca sītā ca rātriṃ tāṃ śayitāv ubhau // Ram_2,81.21
GE09ram_02_u:4511: niyamya pṛṣṭhe tu talāṅgulitravāñ śaraiḥ supūrṇāv iṣudhī paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4512: mahad dhanuḥ sajyam upohya lakṣmaṇo niśām atiṣṭhat parito 'sya kevalam // Ram_2,81.22
GE09ram_02_u:4513: tatas tv ahaṃ cottamabāṇacāpadhṛk sthito 'bhavaṃ tatra sa yatra lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4514: atandribhir jñātibhir āttakārmukair mahendrakalpaṃ paripālayaṃs tadā // Ram_2,81.23
GE09ram_02_u:4515: tac chrutvā nipuṇaṃ sarvaṃ bharataḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4516: iṅgudīmūlam āgamya rāmaśayyām avekṣya tām // Ram_2,82.1
GE09ram_02_u:4517: abravīj jananīḥ sarvā iha tena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:4518: śarvarī śayitā bhūmāv idam asya vimarditam // Ram_2,82.2
GE09ram_02_u:4520: jāto daśarathenorvyāṃ na rāmaḥ svaptum arhati // Ram_2,82.3
GE09ram_02_u:4522: śayitvā puruṣavyāghraḥ kathaṃ śete mahītale // Ram_2,82.4
