GE09ram_02_u:4530: gāthābhir anurūpābhiḥ stutibhiś ca paraṃtapaḥ // Ram_2,82.8
GE09ram_02_u:4531: aśraddheyam idaṃ loke na satyaṃ pratibhāti mā
GE09ram_02_u:4532: muhyate khalu me bhāvaḥ svapno 'yam iti me matiḥ // Ram_2,82.9
GE09ram_02_u:4533: na nūnaṃ daivataṃ kiṃcit kālena balavattaram
GE09ram_02_u:4534: yatra dāśarathī rāmo bhūmāv evaṃ śayīta saḥ // Ram_2,82.10
GE09ram_02_u:4536: dayitā śayitā bhūmau snuṣā daśarathasya ca // Ram_2,82.11
GE09ram_02_u:4537: iyaṃ śayyā mama bhrātur idaṃ hi parivartitam
GE09ram_02_u:4538: sthaṇḍile kaṭhine sarvaṃ gātrair vimṛditaṃ tṛṇam // Ram_2,82.12
GE09ram_02_u:4539: manye sābharaṇā suptā sītāsmiñ śayane tadā
GE09ram_02_u:4540: tatra tatra hi dṛśyante saktāḥ kanakabindavaḥ // Ram_2,82.13
GE09ram_02_u:4542: tathā hy ete prakāśante saktāḥ kauśeyatantavaḥ // Ram_2,82.14
GE09ram_02_u:4543: manye bhartuḥ sukhā śayyā yena bālā tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:4544: sukumārī satī duḥkhaṃ na vijānāti maithilī // Ram_2,82.15
GE09ram_02_u:4546: sarvalokapriyas tyaktvā rājyaṃ priyam anuttamam // Ram_2,82.16
GE09ram_02_u:4548: sukhabhāgī ca duḥkhārhaḥ śayito bhuvi rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,82.17
GE09ram_02_u:4549: siddhārthā khalu vaidehī patiṃ yānugatā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:4550: vayaṃ saṃśayitāḥ sarve hīnās tena mahātmanā // Ram_2,82.18
GE09ram_02_u:4552: gate daśarathe svarge rāme cāraṇyam āśrite // Ram_2,82.19
GE09ram_02_u:4553: na ca prārthayate kaścin manasāpi vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:4558: śatravo nābhimanyante bhakṣān viṣakṛtān iva // Ram_2,82.22
GE09ram_02_u:4559: adya prabhṛti bhūmau tu śayiṣye 'haṃ tṛṇeṣu vā
GE09ram_02_u:4561: tasyārtham uttaraṃ kālaṃ nivatsyāmi sukhaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:4562: taṃ pratiśravam āmucya nāsya mithyā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,82.24
GE09ram_02_u:4564: lakṣmaṇena saha tv āryo ayodhyāṃ pālayiṣyati // Ram_2,82.25
GE09ram_02_u:4566: api me devatāḥ kuryur imaṃ satyaṃ manoratham // Ram_2,82.26
GE09ram_02_u:4567: prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mayā svayaṃ bahuprakāraṃ yadi na prapatsyate
GE09ram_02_u:4568: tato 'nuvatsyāmi cirāya rāghavaṃ vane vasan nārhati mām upekṣitum // Ram_2,82.27
GE09ram_02_u:4569: vyuṣya rātriṃ tu tatraiva gaṅgākūle sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4570: bharataḥ kālyam utthāya śatrughnam idam abravīt // Ram_2,83.1
GE09ram_02_u:4572: śīghram ānaya bhadraṃ te tārayiṣyati vāhinīm // Ram_2,83.2
GE09ram_02_u:4574: ity evam abravīd bhrātrā śatrughno 'pi pracoditaḥ // Ram_2,83.3
GE09ram_02_u:4576: āgamya prāñjaliḥ kāle guho bharatam abravīt // Ram_2,83.4
GE09ram_02_u:4578: kaccic ca saha sainyasya tava sarvam anāmayam // Ram_2,83.5
GE09ram_02_u:4579: guhasya tat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād udīritam
GE09ram_02_u:4581: sukhā naḥ śarvarī rājan pūjitāś cāpi te vayam
GE09ram_02_u:4582: gaṅgāṃ tu naubhir bahvībhir dāśāḥ saṃtārayantu naḥ // Ram_2,83.7
GE09ram_02_u:4584: pratipraviśya nagaraṃ taṃ jñātijanam abravīt // Ram_2,83.8
GE09ram_02_u:4585: uttiṣṭhata prabudhyadhvaṃ bhadram astu hi vaḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:4588: pañca nāvāṃ śatāny eva samāninyuḥ samantataḥ // Ram_2,83.10
GE09ram_02_u:4592: sanandighoṣāṃ kalyāṇīṃ guho nāvam upāharat // Ram_2,83.12
GE09ram_02_u:4593: tām āruroha bharataḥ śatrughnaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4594: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ // Ram_2,83.13
GE09ram_02_u:4595: purohitaś ca tat pūrvaṃ gurave brāhmaṇāś ca ye
GE09ram_02_u:4598: bhāṇḍāni cādadānānāṃ ghoṣas tridivam aspṛśat // Ram_2,83.15
GE09ram_02_u:4599: patākinyas tu tā nāvaḥ svayaṃ dāśair adhiṣṭhitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4600: vahantyo janam ārūḍhaṃ tadā saṃpetur āśugāḥ // Ram_2,83.16
GE09ram_02_u:4601: nārīṇām abhipūrṇās tu kāścit kāścit tu vājinām
GE09ram_02_u:4602: kaścit tatra vahanti sma yānayugyaṃ mahādhanam // Ram_2,83.17
GE09ram_02_u:4603: tāḥ sma gatvā paraṃ tīram avaropya ca taṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:4606: tarantaḥ sma prakāśante sadhvajā iva parvatāḥ // Ram_2,83.19
GE09ram_02_u:4607: nāvaś cāruruhus tv anye plavais terus tathāpare
GE09ram_02_u:4608: anye kumbhaghaṭais terur anye teruś ca bāhubhiḥ // Ram_2,83.20
GE09ram_02_u:4609: sā puṇyā dhvajinī gaṅgāṃ dāśaiḥ saṃtāritā svayam
GE09ram_02_u:4610: maitre muhūrte prayayau prayāgavanam uttamam // Ram_2,83.21
GE09ram_02_u:4611: āśvāsayitvā ca camūṃ mahātmā niveśayitvā ca yathopajoṣam
GE09ram_02_u:4612: draṣṭuṃ bharadvājam ṛṣipravaryam ṛtvigvṛtaḥ san bharataḥ pratasthe // Ram_2,83.22
GE09ram_02_u:4614: balaṃ sarvam avasthāpya jagāma saha mantribhiḥ // Ram_2,84.1
GE09ram_02_u:4616: vasāno vāsasī kṣaume purodhāya purohitam // Ram_2,84.2
GE09ram_02_u:4618: mantriṇas tān avasthāpya jagāmānu purohitam // Ram_2,84.3
GE09ram_02_u:4620: saṃcacālāsanāt tūrṇaṃ śiṣyān arghyam iti bruvan // Ram_2,84.4
GE09ram_02_u:4622: abudhyata mahātejāḥ sutaṃ daśarathasya tam // Ram_2,84.5
GE09ram_02_u:4623: tābhyām arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca dattvā paścāt phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:4624: ānupūrvyāc ca dharmajñaḥ papraccha kuśalaṃ kule // Ram_2,84.6
GE09ram_02_u:4625: ayodhyāyāṃ bale kośe mitreṣv api ca mantriṣu
GE09ram_02_u:4626: jānan daśarathaṃ vṛttaṃ na rājānam udāharat // Ram_2,84.7
GE09ram_02_u:4631: kim ihāgamane kāryaṃ tava rājyaṃ praśāsataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4632: etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ na hi me śudhyate manaḥ // Ram_2,84.10
GE09ram_02_u:4634: bhrātrā saha sabhāryo yaś ciraṃ pravrājito vanam // Ram_2,84.11
GE09ram_02_u:4636: vanavāsī bhavetīha samāḥ kila caturdaśa // Ram_2,84.12
GE09ram_02_u:4637: kaccin na tasyāpāpasya pāpaṃ kartum ihecchasi
GE09ram_02_u:4638: akaṇṭakaṃ bhoktumanā rājyaṃ tasyānujasya ca // Ram_2,84.13
GE09ram_02_u:4639: evam ukto bharadvājaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:4641: hato 'smi yadi mām evaṃ bhagavān api manyate
GE09ram_02_u:4642: matto na doṣam āśaṅker naivaṃ mām anuśādhi hi // Ram_2,84.15
GE09ram_02_u:4643: na caitad iṣṭaṃ mātā me yad avocan madantare
GE09ram_02_u:4644: nāham etena tuṣṭaś ca na tad vacanam ādade // Ram_2,84.16
GE09ram_02_u:4645: ahaṃ tu taṃ naravyāghram upayātaḥ prasādakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4646: pratinetum ayodhyāṃ ca pādau tasyābhivanditum // Ram_2,84.17
GE09ram_02_u:4647: tvaṃ mām evaṃ gataṃ matvā prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:4648: śaṃsa me bhagavan rāmaḥ kva samprati mahīpatiḥ // Ram_2,84.18
GE09ram_02_u:4649: uvāca taṃ bharadvājaḥ prasādād bharataṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4651: guruvṛttir damaś caiva sādhūnāṃ cānuyāyitā // Ram_2,84.19
GE09ram_02_u:4652: jāne caitan manaḥsthaṃ te dṛḍhīkaraṇam astv iti
GE09ram_02_u:4653: apṛcchaṃ tvāṃ tavātyarthaṃ kīrtiṃ samabhivardhayan // Ram_2,84.20
GE09ram_02_u:4654: asau vasati te bhrātā citrakūṭe mahāgirau
GE09ram_02_u:4655: śvas tu gantāsi taṃ deśaṃ vasādya saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4656: etaṃ me kuru suprājña kāmaṃ kāmārthakovida // Ram_2,84.21
GE09ram_02_u:4657: tatas tathety evam udāradarśanaḥ pratītarūpo bharato 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4658: cakāra buddhiṃ ca tadā mahāśrame niśānivāsāya narādhipātmajaḥ // Ram_2,84.22
GE09ram_02_u:4659: kṛtabuddhiṃ nivāsāya tathaiva sa munis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:4661: abravīd bharatas tv enaṃ nanv idaṃ bhavatā kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:4662: pādyam arghyaṃ tathātithyaṃ vane yad upapadyate // Ram_2,85.2
GE09ram_02_u:4664: jāne tvāṃ prītisaṃyuktaṃ tuṣyes tvaṃ yena kenacit // Ram_2,85.3
GE09ram_02_u:4665: senāyās tu tavaitasyāḥ kartum icchāmi bhojanam
GE09ram_02_u:4666: mama prītir yathārūpā tvam arho manujarṣabha // Ram_2,85.4
GE09ram_02_u:4667: kimarthaṃ cāpi nikṣipya dūre balam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4671: vājimukhyā manuṣyāś ca mattāś ca varavāraṇāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4672: pracchādya mahatīṃ bhūmiṃ bhagavann anuyānti mām // Ram_2,85.7
GE09ram_02_u:4673: te vṛkṣān udakaṃ bhūmim āśrameṣūṭajāṃs tathā
GE09ram_02_u:4674: na hiṃsyur iti tenāham eka evāgatas tataḥ // Ram_2,85.8
GE09ram_02_u:4676: tathā tu cakre bharataḥ senāyāḥ samupāgamam // Ram_2,85.9
GE09ram_02_u:4679: āhvaye viśvakarmāṇam ahaṃ tvaṣṭāram eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:4680: ātithyaṃ kartum icchāmi tatra me saṃvidhīyatām // Ram_2,85.11
GE09ram_02_u:4681: prāksrotasaś ca yā nadyaḥ pratyaksrotasa eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:4682: pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca samāyāntv adya sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,85.12
GE09ram_02_u:4683: anyāḥ sravantu maireyaṃ surām anyāḥ suniṣṭhitām
GE09ram_02_u:4686: tathaivāpsaraso devīr gandharvīś cāpi sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,85.14
GE09ram_02_u:4688: śakraṃ yāś copatiṣṭhanti brahmāṇaṃ yāś ca bhāminīḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4689: sarvās tumburuṇā sārdham āhvaye saparicchadāḥ // Ram_2,85.15
GE09ram_02_u:4690: vanaṃ kuruṣu yad divyaṃ vāso bhūṣaṇapattravat
GE09ram_02_u:4691: divyanārīphalaṃ śaśvat tat kauberam ihaiva tu // Ram_2,85.16
GE09ram_02_u:4692: iha me bhagavān somo vidhattām annam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:4693: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ ca lehyaṃ ca vividhaṃ bahu // Ram_2,85.17
GE09ram_02_u:4695: surādīni ca peyāni māṃsāni vividhāni ca // Ram_2,85.18
GE09ram_02_u:4699: ājagmus tāni sarvāṇi daivatāni pṛthakpṛthak // Ram_2,85.20
GE09ram_02_u:4701: upaspṛśya vavau yuktyā supriyātmā sukhaḥ śivaḥ // Ram_2,85.21
GE09ram_02_u:4703: devadundubhighoṣaś ca dikṣu sarvāsu śuśruve // Ram_2,85.22
GE09ram_02_u:4705: prajagur devagandharvā vīṇāḥ pramumucuḥ svarān // Ram_2,85.23
GE09ram_02_u:4706: sa śabdo dyāṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca prāṇināṃ śravaṇāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:4708: tasminn uparate śabde divye śrotrasukhe nṛṇām
GE09ram_02_u:4709: dadarśa bhārataṃ sainyaṃ vidhānaṃ viśvakarmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,85.25
GE09ram_02_u:4710: babhūva hi samā bhūmiḥ samantāt pañcayojanam
GE09ram_02_u:4712: tasmin bilvāḥ kapitthāś ca panasā bījapūrakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4713: āmalakyo babhūvuś ca cūtāś ca phalabhūṣaṇāḥ // Ram_2,85.27
GE09ram_02_u:4715: ājagāma nadī divyā tīrajair bahubhir vṛtā // Ram_2,85.28
GE09ram_02_u:4725: veśma tad ratnasampūrṇaṃ bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ // Ram_2,85.33
GE09ram_02_u:4726: anujagmuś ca taṃ sarve mantriṇaḥ sapurohitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4727: babhūvuś ca mudā yuktās taṃ dṛṣṭvā veśmasaṃvidhim // Ram_2,85.34
GE09ram_02_u:4728: tatra rājāsanaṃ divyaṃ vyajanaṃ chattram eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:4729: bharato mantribhiḥ sārdham abhyavartata rājavat // Ram_2,85.35
GE09ram_02_u:4733: tataḥ senāpatiḥ paścāt praśāstā ca niṣedatuḥ // Ram_2,85.37
GE09ram_02_u:4737: ramyāś cāvasathā divyā brahmaṇas tu prasādajāḥ // Ram_2,85.39
GE09ram_02_u:4739: āgur viṃśatisāhasrā brahmaṇā prahitāḥ striyaḥ // Ram_2,85.40
GE09ram_02_u:4742: yābhir gṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sonmāda iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:4747: upānṛtyaṃs tu bharataṃ bharadvājasya śāsanāt // Ram_2,85.44
GE09ram_02_u:4748: yāni mālyāni deveṣu yāni caitrarathe vane
GE09ram_02_u:4749: prayāge tāny adṛśyanta bharadvājasya śāsanāt // Ram_2,85.45
GE09ram_02_u:4751: aśvatthā nartakāś cāsan bharadvājasya tejasā // Ram_2,85.46
GE09ram_02_u:4753: prahṛṣṭās tatra saṃpetuḥ kubjā bhūtvātha vāmanāḥ // Ram_2,85.47
GE09ram_02_u:4754: śiṃśapāmalakī jambūr yāś cānyāḥ kānane latāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4756: surāṃ surāpāḥ pibata pāyasaṃ ca bubhukṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4757: māṃsāni ca sumedhyāni bhakṣyantāṃ yāvad icchatha // Ram_2,85.49
GE09ram_02_u:4759: apy ekam ekaṃ puruṣaṃ pramadāḥ sapta cāṣṭa ca // Ram_2,85.50
GE09ram_02_u:4761: parimṛjya tathā nyāyaṃ pāyayanti varāṅganāḥ // Ram_2,85.51
GE09ram_02_u:4762: hayān gajān kharān uṣṭrāṃs tathaiva surabheḥ sutān
GE09ram_02_u:4763: ikṣūṃś ca madhujālāṃś ca bhojayanti sma vāhanān
GE09ram_02_u:4766: mattapramattamuditā camūḥ sā tatra saṃbabhau // Ram_2,85.53
GE09ram_02_u:4770: kuśalaṃ bharatasyāstu rāmasyāstu tathā sukham // Ram_2,85.55
GE09ram_02_u:4772: anāthās taṃ vidhiṃ labdhvā vācam etām udairayan // Ram_2,85.56
GE09ram_02_u:4773: samprahṛṣṭā vinedus te narās tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4775: tato bhuktavatāṃ teṣāṃ tad annam amṛtopamam
GE09ram_02_u:4776: divyān udvīkṣya bhakṣyāṃs tān abhavad bhakṣaṇe matiḥ // Ram_2,85.58
GE09ram_02_u:4777: preṣyāś ceṭyaś ca vadhvaś ca balasthāś cāpi sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4778: babhūvus te bhṛśaṃ tṛptāḥ sarve cāhatavāsasaḥ // Ram_2,85.59
GE09ram_02_u:4779: kuñjarāś ca kharoṣṭraś ca go'śvāś ca mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4780: babhūvuḥ subhṛtās tatra nānyo hy anyam akalpayat // Ram_2,85.60
GE09ram_02_u:4782: rajasā dhvastakeśo vā naraḥ kaścid adṛśyata // Ram_2,85.61
GE09ram_02_u:4786: dadṛśur vismitās tatra narā lauhīḥ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,85.63
GE09ram_02_u:4788: tāś ca kāmadughā gāvo drumāś cāsan madhuścyutaḥ // Ram_2,85.64
GE09ram_02_u:4792: sthālyaḥ kumbhyaḥ karambhyaś ca dadhipūrṇāḥ susaṃskṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4794: hradāḥ pūrṇā rasālasya dadhnaḥ śvetasya cāpare
GE09ram_02_u:4795: babhūvuḥ pāyasasyānte śarkarāyāś ca saṃcayāḥ // Ram_2,85.67
GE09ram_02_u:4796: kalkāṃś cūrṇakaṣāyāṃś ca snānāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:4797: dadṛśur bhājanasthāni tīrtheṣu saritāṃ narāḥ // Ram_2,85.68
GE09ram_02_u:4799: śuklāṃś candanakalkāṃś ca samudgeṣv avatiṣṭhataḥ // Ram_2,85.69
GE09ram_02_u:4800: darpaṇān parimṛṣṭāṃś ca vāsasāṃ cāpi saṃcayān
GE09ram_02_u:4801: pādukopānahāṃ caiva yugmān yatra sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,85.70
GE09ram_02_u:4802: āñjanīḥ kaṅkatān kūrcāṃś chattrāṇi ca dhanūṃṣi ca
GE09ram_02_u:4803: marmatrāṇāni citrāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca // Ram_2,85.71
GE09ram_02_u:4805: avagāhya sutīrthāṃś ca hradān sotpalapuṣkarān // Ram_2,85.72
GE09ram_02_u:4807: nirvāpārthaṃ paśūnāṃ te dadṛśus tatra sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,85.73
GE09ram_02_u:4808: vyasmayanta manuṣyās te svapnakalpaṃ tad adbhutam
GE09ram_02_u:4809: dṛṣṭvātithyaṃ kṛtaṃ tādṛg bharatasya maharṣiṇā // Ram_2,85.74
GE09ram_02_u:4810: ity evaṃ ramamāṇānāṃ devānām iva nandane
GE09ram_02_u:4811: bharadvājāśrame ramye sā rātrir vyatyavartata // Ram_2,85.75
GE09ram_02_u:4812: pratijagmuś ca tā nadyo gandharvāś ca yathāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:4813: bharadvājam anujñāpya tāś ca sarvā varāṅganāḥ // Ram_2,85.76
GE09ram_02_u:4814: tathaiva mattā madirotkaṭā narās tathaiva divyāgurucandanokṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4815: tathaiva divyā vividhāḥ sraguttamāḥ pṛthakprakīrṇā manujaiḥ pramarditāḥ // Ram_2,85.77
GE09ram_02_u:4816: tatas tāṃ rajanīm uṣya bharataḥ saparicchadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4817: kṛtātithyo bharadvājaṃ kāmād abhijagāma ha // Ram_2,86.1
GE09ram_02_u:4818: tam ṛṣiḥ puruṣavyāghraṃ prekṣya prāñjalim āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:4820: kaccid atra sukhā rātris tavāsmadviṣaye gatā
GE09ram_02_u:4821: samagras te janaḥ kaccid ātithye śaṃsa me 'nagha // Ram_2,86.3
GE09ram_02_u:4825: tarpitaḥ sarvakāmaiś ca sāmātyo balavat tvayā // Ram_2,86.5
GE09ram_02_u:4827: api preṣyān upādāya sarve sma susukhoṣitāḥ // Ram_2,86.6
GE09ram_02_u:4829: samīpaṃ prasthitaṃ bhrātur maitreṇekṣasva cakṣuṣā // Ram_2,86.7
GE09ram_02_u:4831: ācakṣva katamo mārgaḥ kiyān iti ca śaṃsa me // Ram_2,86.8
GE09ram_02_u:4836: uttaraṃ pārśvam āsādya tasya mandākinī nadī
GE09ram_02_u:4838: anantaraṃ tat saritaś citrakūṭaś ca parvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4839: tayoḥ parṇakuṭī tāta tatra tau vasato dhruvam // Ram_2,86.12
GE09ram_02_u:4842: vāhayasva mahābhāga tato drakṣyasi rāghavam // Ram_2,86.13
GE09ram_02_u:4843: prayāṇam iti ca śrutvā rājarājasya yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4844: hitvā yānāni yānārhā brāhmaṇaṃ paryavārayan // Ram_2,86.14
GE09ram_02_u:4845: vepamānā kṛśā dīnā saha devyā sumitrayā
GE09ram_02_u:4846: kausalyā tatra jagrāha karābhyāṃ caraṇau muneḥ // Ram_2,86.15
GE09ram_02_u:4848: kaikeyī tasya jagrāha caraṇau savyapatrapā // Ram_2,86.16
GE09ram_02_u:4850: adūrād bharatasyaiva tasthau dīnamanās tadā // Ram_2,86.17
GE09ram_02_u:4852: viśeṣaṃ jñātum icchāmi mātṝṇāṃ tava rāghava // Ram_2,86.18
GE09ram_02_u:4853: evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4854: uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyaṃ vacanakovidaḥ // Ram_2,86.19
GE09ram_02_u:4856: pitur hi mahiṣīṃ devīṃ devatām iva paśyasi // Ram_2,86.20
GE09ram_02_u:4858: kausalyā suṣuve rāmaṃ dhātāram aditir yathā // Ram_2,86.21
GE09ram_02_u:4859: asyā vāmabhujaṃ śliṣṭā yaiṣā tiṣṭhati durmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4861: etasyās tau sutau devyāḥ kumārau devavarṇinau
GE09ram_02_u:4863: yasyāḥ kṛte naravyāghrau jīvanāśam ito gatau
GE09ram_02_u:4864: rājā putravihīnaś ca svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // Ram_2,86.24
GE09ram_02_u:4867: yatomūlaṃ hi paśyāmi vyasanaṃ mahad ātmanaḥ // Ram_2,86.25
GE09ram_02_u:4869: sa niśaśvāsa tāmrākṣo nāgaḥ kruddha ivāsakṛt // Ram_2,86.26
GE09ram_02_u:4870: bharadvājo maharṣis taṃ bruvantaṃ bharataṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:4871: pratyuvāca mahābuddhir idaṃ vacanam arthavat // Ram_2,86.27
GE09ram_02_u:4873: rāmapravrājanaṃ hy etat sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,86.28
GE09ram_02_u:4874: abhivādya tu saṃsiddhaḥ kṛtvā cainaṃ pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:4875: āmantrya bharataḥ sainyaṃ yujyatām ity acodayat // Ram_2,86.29
GE09ram_02_u:4877: adhyārohat prayāṇārthī bahūn bahuvidho janaḥ // Ram_2,86.30
GE09ram_02_u:4879: jīmūtā iva gharmānte saghoṣāḥ sampratasthire // Ram_2,86.31
GE09ram_02_u:4880: vividhāny api yānāni mahānti ca laghūni ca
GE09ram_02_u:4881: prayayuḥ sumahārhāṇi pādair eva padātayaḥ // Ram_2,86.32
GE09ram_02_u:4885: āsthāya prayayau śrīmān bharataḥ saparicchadaḥ // Ram_2,86.34
GE09ram_02_u:4888: vanāni tu vyatikramya juṣṭāni mṛgapakṣibhiḥ // Ram_2,86.35
GE09ram_02_u:4890: mahad vanaṃ tat pravigāhamānā rarāja senā bharatasya tatra // Ram_2,86.36
GE09ram_02_u:4892: arditā yūthapā mattāḥ sayūthāḥ sampradudruvuḥ // Ram_2,87.1
GE09ram_02_u:4893: ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca ruravaś ca samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4894: dṛśyante vanarājīṣu giriṣv api nadīṣu ca // Ram_2,87.2
GE09ram_02_u:4896: vṛto mahatyā nādinyā senayā caturaṅgayā // Ram_2,87.3
GE09ram_02_u:4898: mahīṃ saṃchādayāmāsa prāvṛṣi dyām ivāmbudaḥ // Ram_2,87.4
GE09ram_02_u:4900: anālakṣyā ciraṃ kālaṃ tasmin kāle babhūva bhūḥ // Ram_2,87.5
GE09ram_02_u:4902: uvāca bharataḥ śrīmān vasiṣṭhaṃ mantriṇāṃ varam // Ram_2,87.6
GE09ram_02_u:4903: yādṛśaṃ lakṣyate rūpaṃ yathā caiva śrutaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:4904: vyaktaṃ prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt // Ram_2,87.7
GE09ram_02_u:4905: ayaṃ giriś citrakūṭas tathā mandākinī nadī
GE09ram_02_u:4906: etat prakāśate dūrān nīlameghanibhaṃ vanam // Ram_2,87.8
GE09ram_02_u:4910: nīlā ivātapāpāye toyaṃ toyadharā ghanāḥ // Ram_2,87.10
GE09ram_02_u:4912: hayaiḥ samantād ākīrṇaṃ makarair iva sāgaram // Ram_2,87.11
GE09ram_02_u:4916: meghaprakāśaiḥ phalakair dākṣiṇātyā yathā narāḥ // Ram_2,87.13
GE09ram_02_u:4918: ayodhyeva janākīrṇā samprati pratibhāti mā // Ram_2,87.14
GE09ram_02_u:4919: khurair udīrito reṇur divaṃ pracchādya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_02_u:4920: taṃ vahaty anilaḥ śīghraṃ kurvann iva mama priyam // Ram_2,87.15
GE09ram_02_u:4922: etān saṃpatataḥ śīghraṃ paśya śatrughna kānane // Ram_2,87.16
GE09ram_02_u:4924: etam āviśataḥ śailam adhivāsaṃ patatriṇām // Ram_2,87.17
GE09ram_02_u:4925: atimātram ayaṃ deśo manojñaḥ pratibhāti mā
GE09ram_02_u:4926: tāpasānāṃ nivāso 'yaṃ vyaktaṃ svargapatho yathā // Ram_2,87.18
GE09ram_02_u:4927: mṛgā mṛgībhiḥ sahitā bahavaḥ pṛṣatā vane
GE09ram_02_u:4928: manojñarūpā lakṣyante kusumair iva citritāḥ // Ram_2,87.19
GE09ram_02_u:4929: sādhu sainyāḥ pratiṣṭhantāṃ vicinvantu ca kānanam
GE09ram_02_u:4930: yathā tau puruṣavyāghrau dṛśyete rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_2,87.20
GE09ram_02_u:4932: viviśus tad vanaṃ śūrā dhūmaṃ ca dadṛśus tataḥ // Ram_2,87.21
GE09ram_02_u:4933: te samālokya dhūmāgram ūcur bharatam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4934: nāmanuṣye bhavaty agnir vyaktam atraiva rāghavau // Ram_2,87.22
GE09ram_02_u:4936: anye rāmopamāḥ santi vyaktam atra tapasvinaḥ // Ram_2,87.23
GE09ram_02_u:4937: tac chrutvā bharatas teṣāṃ vacanaṃ sādhusaṃmatam
GE09ram_02_u:4938: sainyān uvāca sarvāṃs tān amitrabalamardanaḥ // Ram_2,87.24
GE09ram_02_u:4939: yattā bhavantas tiṣṭhantu neto gantavyam agrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4940: aham eva gamiṣyāmi sumantro gurur eva ca // Ram_2,87.25
GE09ram_02_u:4941: evam uktās tataḥ sarve tatra tasthuḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4942: bharato yatra dhūmāgraṃ tatra dṛṣṭiṃ samādadhāt // Ram_2,87.26
GE09ram_02_u:4943: vyavasthitā yā bharatena sā camūr nirīkṣamāṇāpi ca dhūmam agrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4944: babhūva hṛṣṭā nacireṇa jānatī priyasya rāmasya samāgamaṃ tadā // Ram_2,87.27
GE09ram_02_u:4946: vaidehyāḥ priyamākāṅkṣan svaṃ ca cittaṃ vilobhayan // Ram_2,88.1
GE09ram_02_u:4948: bhāryām amarasaṃkāśaḥ śacīm iva puraṃdaraḥ // Ram_2,88.2
GE09ram_02_u:4949: na rājyād bhraṃśanaṃ bhadre na suhṛdbhir vinābhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4950: mano me bādhate dṛṣṭvā ramaṇīyam imaṃ girim // Ram_2,88.3
GE09ram_02_u:4952: śikharaiḥ kham ivodviddhair dhātumadbhir vibhūṣitam // Ram_2,88.4
GE09ram_02_u:4958: aduṣṭair bhāty ayaṃ śailo bahupakṣisamākulaḥ // Ram_2,88.7
GE09ram_02_u:4964: evamādibhir ākīrṇaḥ śriyaṃ puṣyaty ayaṃ giriḥ // Ram_2,88.10
GE09ram_02_u:4966: kiṃnarān dvaṃdvaśo bhadre ramamāṇān manasvinaḥ // Ram_2,88.11
GE09ram_02_u:4967: śākhāvasaktān khaḍgāṃś ca pravarāṇy ambarāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:4969: jalaprapātair udbhedair nisyandaiś ca kvacit kvacit
GE09ram_02_u:4970: sravadbhir bhāty ayaṃ śailaḥ sravan mada iva dvipaḥ // Ram_2,88.13
GE09ram_02_u:4972: ghrāṇatarpaṇam abhyetya kaṃ naraṃ na praharṣayet // Ram_2,88.14
GE09ram_02_u:4974: lakṣmaṇena ca vatsyāmi na māṃ śokaḥ pradhakṣyati // Ram_2,88.15
GE09ram_02_u:4976: vicitraśikhare hy asmin ratavān asmi bhāmini // Ram_2,88.16
GE09ram_02_u:4978: pituś cānṛṇatā dharme bharatasya priyaṃ tathā // Ram_2,88.17
GE09ram_02_u:4979: vaidehi ramase kaccic citrakūṭe mayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:4981: idam evāmṛtaṃ prāhū rājñāṃ rājarṣayaḥ pare
GE09ram_02_u:4982: vanavāsaṃ bhavārthāya pretya me prapitāmahāḥ // Ram_2,88.19
GE09ram_02_u:4986: oṣadhyaḥ svaprabhā lakṣmyā bhrājamānāḥ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,88.21
GE09ram_02_u:4988: kecid ekaśilā bhānti parvatasyāsya bhāmini // Ram_2,88.22
GE09ram_02_u:4990: citrakūṭasya kūṭo 'sau dṛśyate sarvataḥ śivaḥ // Ram_2,88.23
GE09ram_02_u:4994: kāmibhir vanite paśya phalāni vividhāni ca // Ram_2,88.25
GE09ram_02_u:4997: imaṃ tu kālaṃ vanite vijahrivāṃs tvayā ca sīte saha lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_02_u:4998: ratiṃ prapatsye kuladharmavardhinīṃ satāṃ pathi svair niyamaiḥ paraiḥ sthitaḥ // Ram_2,88.27
GE09ram_02_u:5000: adarśayac chubhajalāṃ ramyāṃ mandākinīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,89.1
GE09ram_02_u:5004: kusumair upasaṃpannāṃ paśya mandākinīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,89.3
GE09ram_02_u:5006: rājantīṃ rājarājasya nalinīm iva sarvataḥ // Ram_2,89.4
GE09ram_02_u:5008: tīrthāni ramaṇīyāni ratiṃ saṃjanayanti me // Ram_2,89.5
GE09ram_02_u:5010: ṛṣayas tv avagāhante nadīṃ mandākinīṃ priye // Ram_2,89.6
GE09ram_02_u:5014: pādapaiḥ pattrapuṣpāṇi sṛjadbhir abhito nadīm // Ram_2,89.8
GE09ram_02_u:5016: kaccit siddhajanākīrṇāṃ paśya mandākinīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,89.9
GE09ram_02_u:5018: poplūyamānān aparān paśya tvaṃ jalamadhyagān // Ram_2,89.10
GE09ram_02_u:5020: adhirohanti kalyāṇi niṣkūjantaḥ śubhā giraḥ // Ram_2,89.11
GE09ram_02_u:5022: adhikaṃ puravāsāc ca manye ca tava darśanāt // Ram_2,89.12
GE09ram_02_u:5025: sakhīvac ca vigāhasva sīte mandākinīm imām
GE09ram_02_u:5026: kamalāny avamajjantī puṣkarāṇi ca bhāmini // Ram_2,89.14
GE09ram_02_u:5027: tvaṃ paurajanavad vyālān ayodhyām iva parvatam
GE09ram_02_u:5028: manyasva vanite nityaṃ sarayūvad imāṃ nadīm // Ram_2,89.15
GE09ram_02_u:5030: tvaṃ cānukūlā vaidehi prītiṃ janayatho mama // Ram_2,89.16
GE09ram_02_u:5032: nāyodhyāyai na rājyāya spṛhaye 'dya tvayā saha // Ram_2,89.17
GE09ram_02_u:5033: imāṃ hi ramyāṃ gajayūthalolitāṃ nipītatoyāṃ gajasiṃhavānaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5034: supuṣpitaiḥ puṣpadharair alaṃkṛtāṃ na so 'sti yaḥ syān na gatakramaḥ sukhī // Ram_2,89.18
GE09ram_02_u:5035: itīva rāmo bahusaṃgataṃ vacaḥ priyāsahāyaḥ saritaṃ prati bruvan
GE09ram_02_u:5036: cacāra ramyaṃ nayanāñjanaprabhaṃ sa citrakūṭaṃ raghuvaṃśavardhanaḥ // Ram_2,89.19
GE09ram_02_u:5038: sainyareṇuś ca śabdaś ca prādurāstāṃ nabhaḥspṛśau // Ram_2,90.1
GE09ram_02_u:5039: etasminn antare trastāḥ śabdena mahatā tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5040: arditā yūthapā mattāḥ sayūthā dudruvur diśaḥ // Ram_2,90.2
GE09ram_02_u:5041: sa taṃ sainyasamudbhūtaṃ śabdaṃ śuśrava rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5042: tāṃś ca vipradrutān sarvān yūthapān anvavaikṣata // Ram_2,90.3
GE09ram_02_u:5043: tāṃś ca vidravato dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca śrutvā sa niḥsvanam
GE09ram_02_u:5044: uvāca rāmaḥ saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_2,90.4
GE09ram_02_u:5045: hanta lakṣmaṇa paśyeha sumitrā suprajās tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:5047: rājā vā rājamātro vā mṛgayām aṭate vane
GE09ram_02_u:5048: anyad vā śvāpadaṃ kiṃcit saumitre jñātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:5049: sarvam etad yathātattvam acirāj jñātum arhasi // Ram_2,90.6
GE09ram_02_u:5050: sa lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃtvaritaḥ sālam āruhya puṣpitam
GE09ram_02_u:5051: prekṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvāḥ pūrvāṃ diśam avaikṣata // Ram_2,90.7
GE09ram_02_u:5055: śaśaṃsa senāṃ rāmāya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,90.9
GE09ram_02_u:5056: agniṃ saṃśamayatv āryaḥ sītā ca bhajatāṃ guhām
GE09ram_02_u:5057: sajyaṃ kuruṣva cāpaṃ ca śarāṃś ca kavacaṃ tathā // Ram_2,90.10
GE09ram_02_u:5058: taṃ rāmaḥ puruṣavyāghro lakṣmaṇaṃ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:5059: aṅgāvekṣasva saumitre kasyaitāṃ manyase camūm // Ram_2,90.11
GE09ram_02_u:5060: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:5061: didhakṣann iva tāṃ senāṃ ruṣitaḥ pāvako yathā // Ram_2,90.12
GE09ram_02_u:5062: sampannaṃ rājyam icchaṃs tu vyaktaṃ prāpyābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:5063: āvāṃ hantuṃ samabhyeti kaikeyyā bharataḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,90.13
GE09ram_02_u:5064: eṣa vai sumahāñ śrīmān viṭapī saṃprakāśate
GE09ram_02_u:5066: bhajanty ete yathākāmam aśvān āruhya śīghragān
GE09ram_02_u:5067: ete bhrājanti saṃhṛṣṭā gajān āruhya sādinaḥ // Ram_2,90.15
GE09ram_02_u:5069: api nau vaśam āgacchet kovidāradhvajo raṇe // Ram_2,90.16
GE09ram_02_u:5070: api drakṣyāmi bharataṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:5071: tvayā rāghava samprāptaṃ sītayā ca mayā tathā // Ram_2,90.17
GE09ram_02_u:5072: yannimittaṃ bhavān rājyāc cyuto rāghava śāśvatāt
GE09ram_02_u:5073: samprāpto 'yam arir vīra bharato vadhya eva me // Ram_2,90.18
GE09ram_02_u:5074: bharatasya vadhe doṣaṃ nāhaṃ paśyāmi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:5075: pūrvāpakāriṇāṃ tyāge na hy adharmo vidhīyate
GE09ram_02_u:5076: etasmin nihate kṛtsnām anuśādhi vasuṃdharām // Ram_2,90.19
GE09ram_02_u:5077: adya putraṃ hataṃ saṃkhye kaikeyī rājyakāmukā
GE09ram_02_u:5078: mayā paśyet suduḥkhārtā hastibhagnam iva drumam // Ram_2,90.20
GE09ram_02_u:5081: adyemaṃ saṃyataṃ krodham asatkāraṃ ca mānada
GE09ram_02_u:5082: mokṣyāmi śatrusainyeṣu kakṣeṣv iva hutāśanam // Ram_2,90.22
GE09ram_02_u:5086: śvāpadāḥ parikarṣantu narāṃś ca nihatān mayā // Ram_2,90.24
GE09ram_02_u:5088: sasainyaṃ bharataṃ hatvā bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,90.25
GE09ram_02_u:5090: rāmas tu parisāntvyātha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,91.1
GE09ram_02_u:5091: kim atra dhanuṣā kāryam asinā vā sacarmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:5092: maheṣvāse mahāprājñe bharate svayam āgate // Ram_2,91.2
GE09ram_02_u:5093: prāptakālaṃ yad eṣo 'smān bharato draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:5094: asmāsu manasāpy eṣa nāhitaṃ kiṃcid ācaret // Ram_2,91.3
GE09ram_02_u:5095: vipriyaṃ kṛtapūrvaṃ te bharatena kadā na kim
GE09ram_02_u:5096: īdṛśaṃ vā bhayaṃ te 'dya bharataṃ yo 'tra śaṅkase // Ram_2,91.4
GE09ram_02_u:5097: na hi te niṣṭhuraṃ vācyo bharato nāpriyaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5098: ahaṃ hy apriyam uktaḥ syāṃ bharatasyāpriye kṛte // Ram_2,91.5
GE09ram_02_u:5099: kathaṃ nu putrāḥ pitaraṃ hanyuḥ kasyāṃcid āpadi
GE09ram_02_u:5100: bhrātā vā bhrātaraṃ hanyāt saumitre prāṇam ātmanaḥ // Ram_2,91.6
GE09ram_02_u:5101: yadi rājyasya hetos tvam imāṃ vācaṃ prabhāṣase
GE09ram_02_u:5102: vakṣyāmi bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyam asmai pradīyatām // Ram_2,91.7
GE09ram_02_u:5103: ucyamāno hi bharato mayā lakṣmaṇa tattvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5104: rājyam asmai prayaccheti bāḍham ity eva vakṣyati // Ram_2,91.8
GE09ram_02_u:5105: tathokto dharmaśīlena bhrātrā tasya hite rataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5106: lakṣmaṇaḥ praviveśeva svāni gātrāṇi lajjayā // Ram_2,91.9
GE09ram_02_u:5107: vrīḍitaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:5108: eṣa manye mahābāhur ihāsmān draṣṭum āgataḥ // Ram_2,91.10
GE09ram_02_u:5110: imāṃ vāpy eṣa vaidehīm atyantasukhasevinīm // Ram_2,91.11
GE09ram_02_u:5114: nāgaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma vṛddhas tātasya dhīmataḥ // Ram_2,91.13
GE09ram_02_u:5115: avatīrya tu sālāgrāt tasmāt sa samitiṃjayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5116: lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā tasthau rāmasya pārśvataḥ // Ram_2,91.14
GE09ram_02_u:5117: bharatenātha saṃdiṣṭā sammardo na bhaved iti
GE09ram_02_u:5118: samantāt tasya śailasya senāvāsam akalpayat // Ram_2,91.15
GE09ram_02_u:5121: sā citrakūṭe bharatena senā dharmaṃ puraskṛtya vidhūya darpam
GE09ram_02_u:5122: prasādanārthaṃ raghunandanasya virocate nītimatā praṇītā // Ram_2,91.17
GE09ram_02_u:5123: niveśya senāṃ tu vibhuḥ padbhyāṃ pādavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5124: abhigantuṃ sa kākutstham iyeṣa guruvartakam // Ram_2,92.1
GE09ram_02_u:5126: bharato bhrātaraṃ vākyaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt // Ram_2,92.2
GE09ram_02_u:5127: kṣipraṃ vanam idaṃ saumya narasaṃghaiḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5128: lubdhaiś ca sahitair ebhis tvam anveṣitum arhasi // Ram_2,92.3
GE09ram_02_u:5129: yāvan na rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇaṃ vā mahābalam
GE09ram_02_u:5130: vaidehīṃ vā mahābhāgāṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,92.4
GE09ram_02_u:5131: yāvan na candrasaṃkāśaṃ drakṣyāmi śubham ānanam
GE09ram_02_u:5132: bhrātuḥ padmapalāśākṣaṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,92.5
GE09ram_02_u:5134: śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,92.6
GE09ram_02_u:5135: yāvan na rājye rājyārhaḥ pitṛpaitāmahe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5136: abhiṣekajalaklinno na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,92.7
GE09ram_02_u:5140: yasmin vasati kākutsthaḥ kubera iva nandane // Ram_2,92.9
GE09ram_02_u:5142: yad adhyāste mahātejā rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // Ram_2,92.10
GE09ram_02_u:5144: padbhyām eva mahātejāḥ praviveśa mahad vanam // Ram_2,92.11
GE09ram_02_u:5146: puṣpitāgrāṇi madhyena jagāma vadatāṃ varaḥ // Ram_2,92.12
GE09ram_02_u:5147: sa gireś citrakūṭasya sālam āsādya puṣpitam
GE09ram_02_u:5149: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bharataḥ śrīmān mumoda sahabāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5150: atra rāma iti jñātvā gataḥ pāram ivāmbhasaḥ // Ram_2,92.14
GE09ram_02_u:5151: sa citrakūṭe tu girau niśāmya rāmāśramaṃ puṇyajanopapannam
GE09ram_02_u:5152: guhena sārdhaṃ tvarito jagāma punar niveśyaiva camūṃ mahātmā // Ram_2,92.15
GE09ram_02_u:5153: niviṣṭāyāṃ tu senāyām utsuko bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:5154: jagāma bhrātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ śatrughnam anudarśayan // Ram_2,93.1
GE09ram_02_u:5155: ṛṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ saṃdiśya mātṝn me śīghram ānaya
GE09ram_02_u:5156: iti tvaritam agre sa jagāma guruvatsalaḥ // Ram_2,93.2
GE09ram_02_u:5157: sumantras tv api śatrughnam adūrād anvapadyata
GE09ram_02_u:5158: rāmadarśanajas tarṣo bharatasyeva tasya ca // Ram_2,93.3
GE09ram_02_u:5160: bhrātuḥ parṇakuṭīṃ śrīmān uṭajaṃ ca dadarśa ha // Ram_2,93.4
GE09ram_02_u:5161: śālāyās tv agratas tasyā dadarśa bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:5162: kāṣṭhāni cāvabhagnāni puṣpāṇy avacitāni ca // Ram_2,93.5
GE09ram_02_u:5163: dadarśa ca vane tasmin mahataḥ saṃcayān kṛtān
GE09ram_02_u:5164: mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca karīṣaiḥ śītakāraṇāt // Ram_2,93.6
GE09ram_02_u:5165: gacchan eva mahābāhur dyutimān bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:5166: śatrughnaṃ cābravīd dhṛṣṭas tān amātyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,93.7
GE09ram_02_u:5167: manye prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:5168: nātidūre hi manye 'haṃ nadīṃ mandākinīm itaḥ // Ram_2,93.8
GE09ram_02_u:5169: uccair baddhāni cīrāṇi lakṣmaṇena bhaved ayam
GE09ram_02_u:5170: abhijñānakṛtaḥ panthā vikāle gantum icchatā // Ram_2,93.9
GE09ram_02_u:5173: yam evādhātum icchanti tāpasāḥ satataṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:5174: tasyāsau dṛśyate dhūmaḥ saṃkulaḥ kṛṣṇavartmanaḥ // Ram_2,93.11
GE09ram_02_u:5176: āryaṃ drakṣyāmi saṃhṛṣṭo maharṣim iva rāghavam // Ram_2,93.12
GE09ram_02_u:5177: atha gatvā muhūrtaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5178: mandākinīm anuprāptas taṃ janaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,93.13
GE09ram_02_u:5180: janendro nirjanaṃ prāpya dhin me janma sajīvitam // Ram_2,93.14
GE09ram_02_u:5182: sarvān kāmān parityajya vane vasati rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,93.15
GE09ram_02_u:5184: rāmasya nipatiṣyāmi sītāyāś ca punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,93.16
GE09ram_02_u:5185: evaṃ sa vilapaṃs tasmin vane daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5186: dadarśa mahatīṃ puṇyāṃ parṇaśālāṃ manoramām // Ram_2,93.17
GE09ram_02_u:5188: viśālāṃ mṛdubhis tīrṇāṃ kuśair vedim ivādhvare // Ram_2,93.18
GE09ram_02_u:5192: śobhitāṃ dīptavadanaiḥ sarpair bhogavatīm iva // Ram_2,93.20
GE09ram_02_u:5196: arisaṃghair anādhṛṣyāṃ mṛgaiḥ siṃhaguhām iva // Ram_2,93.22
GE09ram_02_u:5198: dadarśa bharatas tatra puṇyāṃ rāmaniveśane // Ram_2,93.23
GE09ram_02_u:5199: nirīkṣya sa muhūrtaṃ tu dadarśa bharato gurum
GE09ram_02_u:5202: dadarśa rāmam āsīnam abhitaḥ pāvakopamam // Ram_2,93.25
GE09ram_02_u:5206: sthaṇḍile darbhasaṃstīrṇe sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca // Ram_2,93.27
GE09ram_02_u:5210: aśaknuvan dhārayituṃ dhairyād vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,93.29
GE09ram_02_u:5211: yaḥ saṃsadi prakṛtibhir bhaved yukta upāsitum
GE09ram_02_u:5212: vanyair mṛgair upāsīnaḥ so 'yam āste mamāgrajaḥ // Ram_2,93.30
GE09ram_02_u:5214: mṛgājine so 'yam iha pravaste dharmam ācaran // Ram_2,93.31
GE09ram_02_u:5215: adhārayad yo vividhāś citrāḥ sumanasas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:5216: so 'yaṃ jaṭābhāram imaṃ sahate rāghavaḥ katham // Ram_2,93.32
GE09ram_02_u:5217: yasya yajñair yathādiṣṭair yukto dharmasya saṃcayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5220: malena tasyāṅgam idaṃ katham āryasya sevyate // Ram_2,93.34
GE09ram_02_u:5221: mannimittam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpto rāmaḥ sukhocitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5222: dhig jīvitaṃ nṛśaṃsasya mama lokavigarhitam // Ram_2,93.35
GE09ram_02_u:5224: pādāv aprāpya rāmasya papāta bharato rudan // Ram_2,93.36
GE09ram_02_u:5226: uktvāryeti sakṛd dīnaṃ punar novāca kiṃcana // Ram_2,93.37
GE09ram_02_u:5228: āryety evābhisaṃkruśya vyāhartuṃ nāśakat tataḥ // Ram_2,93.38
GE09ram_02_u:5229: śatrughnaś cāpi rāmasya vavande caraṇau rudan
GE09ram_02_u:5230: tāv ubhau sa samāliṅgya rāmo 'py aśrūṇy avartayat // Ram_2,93.39
GE09ram_02_u:5231: tataḥ sumantreṇa guhena caiva samīyatū rājasutāv araṇye
GE09ram_02_u:5232: divākaraś caiva niśākaraś ca yathāmbare śukrabṛhaspatibhyām // Ram_2,93.40
GE09ram_02_u:5233: tān pārthivān vāraṇayūthapābhān samāgatāṃs tatra mahaty araṇye
GE09ram_02_u:5234: vanaukasas te 'pi samīkṣya sarve 'py aśrūṇy amuñcan pravihāya harṣam // Ram_2,93.41
GE09ram_02_u:5235: āghrāya rāmas taṃ mūrdhni pariṣvajya ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5236: aṅke bharatam āropya paryapṛcchat samāhitaḥ // Ram_2,94.1
GE09ram_02_u:5237: kva nu te 'bhūt pitā tāta yad araṇyaṃ tvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5238: na hi tvaṃ jīvatas tasya vanam āgantum arhasi // Ram_2,94.2
GE09ram_02_u:5239: cirasya bata paśyāmi dūrād bharatam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:5240: duṣpratīkam araṇye 'smin kiṃ tāta vanam āgataḥ // Ram_2,94.3
GE09ram_02_u:5243: sa kaccid brāhmaṇo vidvān dharmanityo mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5244: ikṣvākūṇām upādhyāyo yathāvat tāta pūjyate // Ram_2,94.5
GE09ram_02_u:5245: tāta kaccic ca kausalyā sumitrā ca prajāvatī
GE09ram_02_u:5246: sukhinī kaccid āryā ca devī nandati kaikayī // Ram_2,94.6
GE09ram_02_u:5248: anasūyur anudraṣṭā satkṛtas te purohitaḥ // Ram_2,94.7
GE09ram_02_u:5249: kaccid agniṣu te yukto vidhijño matimān ṛjuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5250: hutaṃ ca hoṣyamāṇaṃ ca kāle vedayate sadā // Ram_2,94.8
GE09ram_02_u:5252: sudhanvānam upādhyāyaṃ kaccit tvaṃ tāta manyase // Ram_2,94.9
GE09ram_02_u:5254: kulīnāś ceṅgitajñāś ca kṛtās te tāta mantriṇaḥ // Ram_2,94.10
GE09ram_02_u:5255: mantro vijayamūlaṃ hi rājñāṃ bhavati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:5257: kaccin nidrāvaśaṃ naiṣi kaccit kāle vibudhyase
GE09ram_02_u:5259: kaccin mantrayase naikaḥ kaccin na bahubhiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:5260: kaccit te mantrito mantro rāṣṭraṃ na paridhāvati // Ram_2,94.13
GE09ram_02_u:5262: kṣipram ārabhase kartuṃ na dīrghayasi rāghava // Ram_2,94.14
GE09ram_02_u:5263: kaccit tu sukṛtāny eva kṛtarūpāṇi vā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5264: vidus te sarvakāryāṇi na kartavyāni pārthivāḥ // Ram_2,94.15
GE09ram_02_u:5265: kaccin na tarkair yuktvā vā ye cāpy aparikīrtitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5266: tvayā vā tava vāmātyair budhyate tāta mantritam // Ram_2,94.16
GE09ram_02_u:5267: kaccit sahasrān mūrkhāṇām ekam icchasi paṇḍitam
GE09ram_02_u:5268: paṇḍito hy arthakṛcchreṣu kuryān niḥśreyasaṃ mahat // Ram_2,94.17
GE09ram_02_u:5269: sahasrāṇy api mūrkhāṇāṃ yady upāste mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5270: atha vāpy ayutāny eva nāsti teṣu sahāyatā // Ram_2,94.18
GE09ram_02_u:5271: eko 'py amātyo medhāvī śūro dakṣo vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5272: rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā prāpayen mahatīṃ śriyam // Ram_2,94.19
GE09ram_02_u:5273: kaccin mukhyā mahatsv eva madhyameṣu ca madhyamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5274: jaghanyāś ca jaghanyeṣu bhṛtyāḥ karmasu yojitāḥ // Ram_2,94.20
GE09ram_02_u:5276: śreṣṭhāñ śreṣṭheṣu kaccit tvaṃ niyojayasi karmasu // Ram_2,94.21
GE09ram_02_u:5277: kaccit tvāṃ nāvajānanti yājakāḥ patitaṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:5280: śūram aiśvaryakāmaṃ ca yo na hanti sa vadhyate // Ram_2,94.23
GE09ram_02_u:5281: kaccid dhṛṣṭaś ca śūraś ca dhṛtimān matimāñ śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5282: kulīnaś cānuraktaś ca dakṣaḥ senāpatiḥ kṛtaḥ // Ram_2,94.24
GE09ram_02_u:5283: balavantaś ca kaccit te mukhyā yuddhaviśāradāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5284: dṛṣṭāpadānā vikrāntās tvayā satkṛtya mānitāḥ // Ram_2,94.25
GE09ram_02_u:5285: kaccid balasya bhaktaṃ ca vetanaṃ ca yathocitam
GE09ram_02_u:5286: samprāptakālaṃ dātavyaṃ dadāsi na vilambase // Ram_2,94.26
GE09ram_02_u:5288: bhartuḥ kupyanti duṣyanti so 'narthaḥ sumahān smṛtaḥ // Ram_2,94.27
GE09ram_02_u:5290: kaccit prāṇāṃs tavārtheṣu saṃtyajanti samāhitāḥ // Ram_2,94.28
GE09ram_02_u:5292: yathoktavādī dūtas te kṛto bharata paṇḍitaḥ // Ram_2,94.29
GE09ram_02_u:5293: kaccid aṣṭādaśāny eṣu svapakṣe daśa pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:5294: tribhis tribhir avijñātair vetsi tīrthāni cārakaiḥ // Ram_2,94.30
GE09ram_02_u:5295: kaccid vyapāstān ahitān pratiyātāṃś ca sarvadā
GE09ram_02_u:5297: kaccin na lokāyatikān brāhmaṇāṃs tāta sevase
GE09ram_02_u:5298: anarthakuśalā hy ete bālāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ // Ram_2,94.32
GE09ram_02_u:5300: buddhimān vīkṣikīṃ prāpya nirarthaṃ pravadanti te // Ram_2,94.33
GE09ram_02_u:5301: vīrair adhyuṣitāṃ pūrvam asmākaṃ tāta pūrvakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5304: jitendriyair mahotsāhair vṛtām āryaiḥ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,94.35
GE09ram_02_u:5306: kaccit samuditāṃ sphītām ayodhyāṃ parirakṣasi // Ram_2,94.36
GE09ram_02_u:5308: devasthānaiḥ prapābhiś ca taḍāgaiś copaśobhitaḥ // Ram_2,94.37
GE09ram_02_u:5312: kaccij janapadaḥ sphītaḥ sukhaṃ vasati rāghava // Ram_2,94.39
GE09ram_02_u:5314: vārttāyāṃ saṃśritas tāta loko hi sukham edhate // Ram_2,94.40
GE09ram_02_u:5315: teṣāṃ guptiparīhāraiḥ kaccit te bharaṇaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:5316: rakṣyā hi rājñā dharmeṇa sarve viṣayavāsinaḥ // Ram_2,94.41
GE09ram_02_u:5317: kaccit striyaḥ sāntvayasi kaccit tāś ca surakṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5318: kaccin na śraddadhāsyāsāṃ kaccid guhyaṃ na bhāṣase // Ram_2,94.42
GE09ram_02_u:5319: kaccin nāgavanaṃ guptaṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca tṛpyasi
GE09ram_02_u:5323: yantraiś ca paripūrṇāni tathā śilpidhanurdharaiḥ // Ram_2,94.44
GE09ram_02_u:5324: āyas te vipulaḥ kaccit kaccid alpataro vyayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5325: apātreṣu na te kaccit kośo gacchati rāghava // Ram_2,94.45
GE09ram_02_u:5327: yodheṣu mitravargeṣu kaccid gacchati te vyayaḥ // Ram_2,94.46
GE09ram_02_u:5329: apṛṣṭaḥ śāstrakuśalair na lobhād badhyate śuciḥ // Ram_2,94.47
GE09ram_02_u:5330: gṛhītaś caiva pṛṣṭaś ca kāle dṛṣṭaḥ sakāraṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5331: kaccin na mucyate coro dhanalobhān nararṣabha // Ram_2,94.48
GE09ram_02_u:5332: vyasane kaccid āḍhyasya durgatasya ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:5333: arthaṃ virāgāḥ paśyanti tavāmātyā bahuśrutāḥ // Ram_2,94.49
GE09ram_02_u:5335: tāni putrapaśūn ghnanti prītyartham anuśāsataḥ // Ram_2,94.50
GE09ram_02_u:5336: kaccid vṛddhāṃś ca bālāṃś ca vaidyamukhyāṃś ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:5337: dānena manasā vācā tribhir etair bubhūṣase // Ram_2,94.51
GE09ram_02_u:5338: kaccid gurūṃś ca vṛddhāṃś ca tāpasān devatātithīn
GE09ram_02_u:5339: caityāṃś ca sarvān siddhārthān brāhmaṇāṃś ca namasyasi // Ram_2,94.52
GE09ram_02_u:5340: kaccid arthena vā dharmaṃ dharmaṃ dharmeṇa vā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5341: ubhau vā prītilobhena kāmena na vibādhase // Ram_2,94.53
GE09ram_02_u:5342: kaccid arthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:5343: vibhajya kāle kālajña sarvān bharata sevase // Ram_2,94.54
GE09ram_02_u:5351: kaccit tvaṃ varjayasy etān rājadoṣāṃś caturdaśa // Ram_2,94.58
GE09ram_02_u:5352: kaccit svādukṛtaṃ bhojyam eko nāśnāsi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:5354: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:5355: kiṃ me dharmād vihīnasya rājadharmaḥ kariṣyati // Ram_2,95.1
GE09ram_02_u:5357: jyeṣṭhaputre sthite rājan na kanīyān bhaven nṛpaḥ // Ram_2,95.2
GE09ram_02_u:5358: sa samṛddhāṃ mayā sārdham ayodhyāṃ gaccha rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:5359: abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ kulasyāsya bhavāya naḥ // Ram_2,95.3
GE09ram_02_u:5360: rājānaṃ mānuṣaṃ prāhur devatve saṃmato mama
GE09ram_02_u:5361: yasya dharmārthasahitaṃ vṛttam āhur amānuṣam // Ram_2,95.4
GE09ram_02_u:5362: kekayasthe ca mayi tu tvayi cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:5363: divam ārya gato rājā yāyajūkaḥ satāṃ mataḥ // Ram_2,95.5
GE09ram_02_u:5365: ahaṃ cāyaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ pūrvam eva kṛtodakau // Ram_2,95.6
GE09ram_02_u:5366: priyeṇa kila dattaṃ hi pitṛlokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:5367: akṣayyaṃ bhavatīty āhur bhavāṃś caiva pituḥ priyaḥ // Ram_2,95.7
GE09ram_02_u:5368: tāṃ śrutvā karuṇāṃ vācaṃ pitur maraṇasaṃhitām
GE09ram_02_u:5371: pragṛhya bāhū rāmo vai puṣpitāgro yathā drumaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5372: vane paraśunā kṛttas tathā bhuvi papāta ha // Ram_2,95.9
GE09ram_02_u:5373: tathā hi patitaṃ rāmaṃ jagatyāṃ jagatīpatim
GE09ram_02_u:5376: rudantaḥ saha vaidehyā siṣicuḥ salilena vai // Ram_2,95.11
GE09ram_02_u:5377: sa tu saṃjñāṃ punar labdhvā netrābhyām āsram utsṛjan
GE09ram_02_u:5379: kiṃ nu tasya mayā kāryaṃ durjātena mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5380: yo mṛto mama śokena na mayā cāpi saṃskṛtaḥ // Ram_2,95.13
GE09ram_02_u:5381: aho bharata siddhārtho yena rājā tvayānagha
GE09ram_02_u:5382: śatrugheṇa ca sarveṣu pretakṛtyeṣu satkṛtaḥ // Ram_2,95.14
GE09ram_02_u:5386: ko nu śāsiṣyati punas tāte lokāntaraṃ gate // Ram_2,95.16
GE09ram_02_u:5387: purā prekṣya suvṛttaṃ māṃ pitā yāny āha sāntvayan
GE09ram_02_u:5388: vākyāni tāni śroṣyāmi kutaḥ karṇasukhāny aham // Ram_2,95.17
GE09ram_02_u:5389: evam uktvā sa bharataṃ bhāryām abhyetya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5391: sīte mṛtas te śvaśuraḥ pitrā hīno 'si lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:5392: bharato duḥkham ācaṣṭe svargataṃ pṛthivīpatim // Ram_2,95.19
GE09ram_02_u:5393: sāntvayitvā tu tāṃ rāmo rudantīṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_02_u:5394: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ tatra duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,95.20
GE09ram_02_u:5397: sītā purastād vrajatu tvam enām abhito vraja
GE09ram_02_u:5398: ahaṃ paścād gamiṣyāmi gatir hy eṣā sudāruṇā // Ram_2,95.22
GE09ram_02_u:5400: mṛdur dāntaś ca śāntaś ca rāme ca dṛḍhabhaktimān // Ram_2,95.23
GE09ram_02_u:5401: sumantras tair nṛpasutaiḥ sārdham āśvāsya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:5402: avātārayad ālambya nadīṃ mandākinīṃ śivām // Ram_2,95.24
GE09ram_02_u:5403: te sutīrthāṃ tataḥ kṛcchrād upāgamya yaśasvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5404: nadīṃ mandākinīṃ ramyāṃ sadā puṣpitakānanām // Ram_2,95.25
GE09ram_02_u:5406: siṣicus tūdakaṃ rājñe tata etad bhavatv iti // Ram_2,95.26
GE09ram_02_u:5408: diśaṃ yāmyām abhimukho rudan vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,95.27
GE09ram_02_u:5409: etat te rājaśārdūla vimalaṃ toyam akṣayam
GE09ram_02_u:5412: pituś cakāra tejasvī nivāpaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha // Ram_2,95.29
GE09ram_02_u:5414: nyasya rāmaḥ suduḥkhārto rudan vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,95.30
GE09ram_02_u:5415: idaṃ bhuṅkṣva mahārāja prīto yadaśanā vayam
GE09ram_02_u:5416: yadannaḥ puruṣo bhavati tadannās tasya devatāḥ // Ram_2,95.31
GE09ram_02_u:5421: teṣāṃ tu rudatāṃ śabdāt pratiśrutkābhavad girau
GE09ram_02_u:5422: bhrātṝṇāṃ saha vaidehyā siṃhānāṃ nardatām iva // Ram_2,95.34
GE09ram_02_u:5424: abruvaṃś cāpi rāmeṇa bharataḥ saṃgato dhruvam
GE09ram_02_u:5425: teṣām eva mahāñ śabdaḥ śocatāṃ pitaraṃ mṛtam // Ram_2,95.35
GE09ram_02_u:5426: atha vāsān parityajya taṃ sarve 'bhimukhāḥ svanam
GE09ram_02_u:5427: apy ekamanaso jagmur yathāsthānaṃ pradhāvitāḥ // Ram_2,95.36
GE09ram_02_u:5428: hayair anye gajair anye rathair anye svalaṃkṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5429: sukumārās tathaivānye padbhir eva narā yayuḥ // Ram_2,95.37
GE09ram_02_u:5431: draṣṭukāmo janaḥ sarvo jagāma sahasāśramam // Ram_2,95.38
GE09ram_02_u:5432: bhrātṝṇāṃ tvaritās te tu draṣṭukāmāḥ samāgamam
GE09ram_02_u:5435: mumoca tumulaṃ śabdaṃ dyaur ivābhrasamāgame // Ram_2,95.40
GE09ram_02_u:5437: āvāsayanto gandhena jagmur anyad vanaṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,95.41
GE09ram_02_u:5441: tathā puṃskokilāḥ krauñcā visaṃjñā bhejire diśaḥ // Ram_2,95.43
GE09ram_02_u:5442: tena śabdena vitrastair ākāśaṃ pakṣibhir vṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:5443: manuṣyair āvṛtā bhūmir ubhayaṃ prababhau tadā // Ram_2,95.44
GE09ram_02_u:5445: paryaṣvajata dharmajñaḥ pitṛvan mātṛvac ca saḥ // Ram_2,95.45
GE09ram_02_u:5446: sa tatra kāṃścit pariṣasvaje narān narāś ca kecit tu tam abhyavādayan
GE09ram_02_u:5447: cakāra sarvān savayasyabāndhavān yathārham āsādya tadā nṛpātmajaḥ // Ram_2,95.46
GE09ram_02_u:5448: tataḥ sa teṣāṃ rudatāṃ mahātmanāṃ bhuvaṃ ca khaṃ cānuvinādayan svanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5449: guhā girīṇāṃ ca diśaś ca saṃtataṃ mṛdaṅgaghoṣapratimo viśuśruve // Ram_2,95.47
GE09ram_02_u:5450: vasiṣṭhaḥ purataḥ kṛtvā dārān daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:5452: rājapatnyaś ca gacchantyo mandaṃ mandākinīṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:5453: dadṛśus tatra tat tīrthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇasevitam // Ram_2,96.2
GE09ram_02_u:5455: sumitrām abravīd dīnā yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ // Ram_2,96.3
GE09ram_02_u:5457: vane prāk kevalaṃ tīrthaṃ ye te nirviṣayīkṛtāḥ // Ram_2,96.4
GE09ram_02_u:5458: itaḥ sumitre putras te sadā jalam atandritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5459: svayaṃ harati saumitrir mama putrasya kāraṇāt // Ram_2,96.5
GE09ram_02_u:5462: taṃ bhūmau pitur ārtena nyastaṃ rāmeṇa vīkṣya sā
GE09ram_02_u:5463: uvāca devī kausalyā sarvā daśarathastriyaḥ // Ram_2,96.7
GE09ram_02_u:5465: rāghaveṇa pitur dattaṃ paśyataitad yathāvidhi // Ram_2,96.8
GE09ram_02_u:5467: naitad aupayikaṃ manye bhuktabhogasya bhojanam // Ram_2,96.9
GE09ram_02_u:5469: katham iṅgudīpiṇyākaṃ sa bhuṅkte vasudhādhipaḥ // Ram_2,96.10
GE09ram_02_u:5470: ato duḥkhataraṃ loke na kiṃcit pratibhāti mā
GE09ram_02_u:5471: yatra rāmaḥ pitur dadyād iṅgudīkṣodam ṛddhimān // Ram_2,96.11
GE09ram_02_u:5473: kathaṃ duḥkhena hṛdayaṃ na sphoṭati sahasradhā // Ram_2,96.12
GE09ram_02_u:5474: evam ārtāṃ sapatnyas tā jagmur āśvāsya tāṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:5475: dadṛśuś cāśrame rāmaṃ svargāc cyutam ivāmaram // Ram_2,96.13
GE09ram_02_u:5477: ārtā mumucur aśrūṇi sasvaraṃ śokakarśitāḥ // Ram_2,96.14
GE09ram_02_u:5478: tāsāṃ rāmaḥ samutthāya jagrāha caraṇāñ śubhān
GE09ram_02_u:5482: saumitrir api tāḥ sarvā mātṝn samprekṣya duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5484: yathā rāme tathā tasmin sarvā vavṛtire striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5485: vṛttiṃ daśarathāj jāte lakṣmaṇe śubhalakṣaṇe // Ram_2,96.18
GE09ram_02_u:5487: śvaśrūṇām aśrupūrṇākṣī sā babhūvāgrataḥ sthitā // Ram_2,96.19
GE09ram_02_u:5488: tāṃ pariṣvajya duḥkhārtāṃ mātā duhitaraṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:5489: vanavāsakṛśāṃ dīnāṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,96.20
GE09ram_02_u:5491: rāmapatnī kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ samprāptā nirjane vane // Ram_2,96.21
GE09ram_02_u:5493: kāñcanaṃ rajasā dhvastaṃ kliṣṭaṃ candram ivāmbudaiḥ // Ram_2,96.22
GE09ram_02_u:5494: mukhaṃ te prekṣya māṃ śoko dahaty agnir ivāśrayam
GE09ram_02_u:5497: pādāv āsādya jagrāha vasiṣṭhasya sa rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,96.24
GE09ram_02_u:5498: purohitasyāgnisamasya tasya vai bṛhaspater indra ivāmarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5499: pragṛhya pādau susamṛddhatejasaḥ sahaiva tenopaviveśa rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,96.25
GE09ram_02_u:5500: tato jaghanyaṃ sahitaiḥ sa mantribhiḥ purapradhānaiś ca sahaiva sainikaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5501: janena dharmajñatamena dharmavān upopaviṣṭo bharatas tadāgrajam // Ram_2,96.26
GE09ram_02_u:5502: upopaviṣṭas tu tadā sa vīryavāṃs tapasviveṣeṇa samīkṣya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:5503: śriyā jvalantaṃ bharataḥ kṛtāñjalir yathā mahendraḥ prayataḥ prajāpatim // Ram_2,96.27
GE09ram_02_u:5504: kim eṣa vākyaṃ bharato 'dya rāghavaṃ praṇamya satkṛtya ca sādhu vakṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:5505: itīva tasyāryajanasya tattvato babhūva kautūhalam uttamaṃ tadā // Ram_2,96.28
GE09ram_02_u:5506: sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiś ca lakṣmaṇo mahānubhāvo bharataś ca dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5507: vṛtāḥ suhṛdbhiś ca virejur adhvare yathā sadasyaiḥ sahitās trayo 'gnayaḥ // Ram_2,96.29
GE09ram_02_u:5508: taṃ tu rāmaḥ samāśvāsya bhrātaraṃ guruvatsalam
GE09ram_02_u:5509: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // Ram_2,97.1
GE09ram_02_u:5510: kim etad iccheyam ahaṃ śrotuṃ pravyāhṛtaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:5511: yasmāt tvam āgato deśam imaṃ cīrajaṭājinī // Ram_2,97.2
GE09ram_02_u:5513: hitvā rājyaṃ praviṣṭas tvaṃ tat sarvaṃ vaktum arhasi // Ram_2,97.3
GE09ram_02_u:5515: pragṛhya balavad bhūyaḥ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,97.4
GE09ram_02_u:5516: āryaṃ tātaḥ parityajya kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_02_u:5518: striyā niyuktaḥ kaikeyyā mama mātrā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_02_u:5519: cakāra sumahat pāpam idam ātmayaśoharam // Ram_2,97.6
GE09ram_02_u:5521: patiṣyati mahāghore niraye jananī mama // Ram_2,97.7
GE09ram_02_u:5522: tasya me dāsabhūtasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:5523: abhiṣiñcasva cādyaiva rājyena maghavān iva // Ram_2,97.8
GE09ram_02_u:5524: imāḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā vidhavā mātaraś ca yāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5525: tvatsakāśam anuprāptāḥ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_2,97.9
GE09ram_02_u:5526: tadānupūrvyā yuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ cātmani mānada
GE09ram_02_u:5527: rājyaṃ prāpnuhi dharmeṇa sakāmān suhṛdaḥ kuru // Ram_2,97.10
GE09ram_02_u:5528: bhavatv avidhavā bhūmiḥ samagrā patinā tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:5529: śaśinā vimaleneva śāradī rajanī yathā // Ram_2,97.11
GE09ram_02_u:5530: ebhiś ca sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ śirasā yācito mayā
GE09ram_02_u:5531: bhrātuḥ śiṣyasya dāsasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_2,97.12
GE09ram_02_u:5532: tad idaṃ śāśvataṃ pitryaṃ sarvaṃ sacivamaṇḍalam
GE09ram_02_u:5535: rāmasya śirasā pādau jagrāha bharataḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,97.14
GE09ram_02_u:5536: taṃ mattam iva mātaṃgaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5537: bhrātaraṃ bharataṃ rāmaḥ pariṣvajyedam abravīt // Ram_2,97.15
GE09ram_02_u:5539: rājyahetoḥ kathaṃ pāpam ācaret tvadvidho janaḥ // Ram_2,97.16
GE09ram_02_u:5540: na doṣaṃ tvayi paśyāmi sūkṣmam apy arisūdana
GE09ram_02_u:5541: na cāpi jananīṃ bālyāt tvaṃ vigarhitum arhasi // Ram_2,97.17
GE09ram_02_u:5543: tāvad dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha jananyām api gauravam // Ram_2,97.18
GE09ram_02_u:5545: mātāpitṛbhyām ukto 'haṃ katham anyat samācare // Ram_2,97.19
GE09ram_02_u:5549: vyādiśya ca mahātejā divaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // Ram_2,97.21
GE09ram_02_u:5550: sa ca pramāṇaṃ dharmātmā rājā lokagurus tava
GE09ram_02_u:5551: pitrā dattaṃ yathābhāgam upabhoktuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_2,97.22
GE09ram_02_u:5553: upabhokṣye tv ahaṃ dattaṃ bhāgaṃ pitrā mahātmanā // Ram_2,97.23
GE09ram_02_u:5554: yad abravīn māṃ naralokasatkṛtaḥ pitā mahātmā vibudhādhipopamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5555: tad eva manye paramātmano hitaṃ na sarvalokeśvarabhāvam avyayam // Ram_2,97.24
GE09ram_02_u:5557: śocatām eva rajanī duḥkhena vyatyavartata // Ram_2,98.1
GE09ram_02_u:5559: mandākinyāṃ hutaṃ japyaṃ kṛtvā rāmam upāgaman // Ram_2,98.2
GE09ram_02_u:5560: tūṣṇīṃ te samupāsīnā na kaścit kiṃcid abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:5561: bharatas tu suhṛnmadhye rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,98.3
GE09ram_02_u:5562: sāntvitā māmikā mātā dattaṃ rājyam idaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:5563: tad dadāmi tavaivāhaṃ bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam // Ram_2,98.4
GE09ram_02_u:5565: durāvāraṃ tvadanyena rājyakhaṇḍam idaṃ mahat // Ram_2,98.5
GE09ram_02_u:5567: anugantuṃ na śaktir me gatiṃ tava mahīpate // Ram_2,98.6
GE09ram_02_u:5568: sujīvaṃ nityaśas tasya yaḥ parair upajīvyate
GE09ram_02_u:5569: rāma tena tu durjīvaṃ yaḥ parān upajīvati // Ram_2,98.7
GE09ram_02_u:5570: yathā tu ropito vṛkṣaḥ puruṣeṇa vivardhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5572: sa yadā puṣpito bhūtvā phalāni na vidarśayet
GE09ram_02_u:5573: sa tāṃ nānubhavet prītiṃ yasya hetoḥ prabhāvitaḥ // Ram_2,98.9
GE09ram_02_u:5574: eṣopamā mahābāho tvam arthaṃ vettum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:5575: yadi tvam asmān ṛṣabho bhartā bhṛtyān na śādhi hi // Ram_2,98.10
GE09ram_02_u:5576: śreṇayas tvāṃ mahārāja paśyantv agryāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5577: pratapantam ivādityaṃ rājye sthitam ariṃdamam // Ram_2,98.11
GE09ram_02_u:5580: tasya sādhv ity amanyanta nāgarā vividhā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5581: bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaṃ pratyanuyācataḥ // Ram_2,98.13
GE09ram_02_u:5582: tam evaṃ duḥkhitaṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ yaśasvinam
GE09ram_02_u:5583: rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bharataṃ samāśvāsayad ātmavān // Ram_2,98.14
GE09ram_02_u:5585: itaś cetarataś cainaṃ kṛtāntaḥ parikarṣati // Ram_2,98.15
GE09ram_02_u:5587: saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ ca jīvitam // Ram_2,98.16
GE09ram_02_u:5588: yathā phalānāṃ pakvānāṃ nānyatra patanād bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:5589: evaṃ narasya jātasya nānyatra maraṇād bhayam // Ram_2,98.17
GE09ram_02_u:5593: āyūṃṣi kṣapayanty āśu grīṣme jalam ivāṃśavaḥ // Ram_2,98.19
GE09ram_02_u:5594: ātmānam anuśoca tvaṃ kim anyam anuśocasi
GE09ram_02_u:5595: āyus te hīyate yasya sthitasya ca gatasya ca // Ram_2,98.20
GE09ram_02_u:5596: sahaiva mṛtyur vrajati saha mṛtyur niṣīdati
GE09ram_02_u:5597: gatvā sudīrgham adhvānaṃ saha mṛtyur nivartate // Ram_2,98.21
GE09ram_02_u:5598: gātreṣu valayaḥ prāptāḥ śvetāś caiva śiroruhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5599: jarayā puruṣo jīrṇaḥ kiṃ hi kṛtvā prabhāvayet // Ram_2,98.22
GE09ram_02_u:5600: nandanty udita āditye nandanty astam ite ravau
GE09ram_02_u:5602: hṛṣyanty ṛtumukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā navaṃ navam ihāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:5604: yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahārṇave
GE09ram_02_u:5605: sametya ca vyapeyātāṃ kālam āsādya kaṃcana // Ram_2,98.25
GE09ram_02_u:5606: evaṃ bhāryāś ca putrāś ca jñātayaś ca vasūni ca
GE09ram_02_u:5607: sametya vyavadhāvanti dhruvo hy eṣāṃ vinābhavaḥ // Ram_2,98.26
GE09ram_02_u:5608: nātra kaścid yathā bhāvaṃ prāṇī samabhivartate
GE09ram_02_u:5609: tena tasmin na sāmarthyaṃ pretasyāsty anuśocataḥ // Ram_2,98.27
GE09ram_02_u:5610: yathā hi sārthaṃ gacchantaṃ brūyāt kaścit pathi sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5611: aham apy āgamiṣyāmi pṛṣṭhato bhavatām iti // Ram_2,98.28
GE09ram_02_u:5612: evaṃ pūrvair gato mārgaḥ pitṛpaitāmaho dhruvaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5613: tam āpannaḥ kathaṃ śoced yasya nāsti vyatikramaḥ // Ram_2,98.29
GE09ram_02_u:5615: ātmā sukhe niyoktavyaḥ sukhabhājaḥ prajāḥ smṛtāḥ // Ram_2,98.30
GE09ram_02_u:5616: dharmātmā sa śubhaiḥ kṛtsnaiḥ kratubhiś cāptadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5617: dhūtapāpo gataḥ svargaṃ pitā naḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // Ram_2,98.31
GE09ram_02_u:5619: arthādānāc ca dhārmeṇa pitā nas tridivaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,98.32
GE09ram_02_u:5620: iṣṭvā bahuvidhair yajñair bhogāṃś cāvāpya puṣkalān
GE09ram_02_u:5621: uttamaṃ cāyur āsādya svar gataḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // Ram_2,98.33
GE09ram_02_u:5622: sa jīrṇaṃ mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ parityajya pitā hi naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5624: taṃ tu naivaṃvidhaḥ kaścit prājñaḥ śocitum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:5625: tvadvidho yadvidhaś cāpi śrutavān buddhimattaraḥ // Ram_2,98.35
GE09ram_02_u:5627: varjanīyā hi dhīreṇa sarvāvasthāsu dhīmatā // Ram_2,98.36
GE09ram_02_u:5628: sa svastho bhava mā śoco yātvā cāvasa tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:5629: tathā pitrā niyukto 'si vaśinā vadatāṃ vara // Ram_2,98.37
GE09ram_02_u:5631: tatraivāhaṃ kariṣyāmi pitur āryasya śāsanam // Ram_2,98.38
GE09ram_02_u:5632: na mayā śāsanaṃ tasya tyaktuṃ nyāyyam ariṃdama
GE09ram_02_u:5633: tat tvayāpi sadā mānyaṃ sa vai bandhuḥ sa naḥ pitā // Ram_2,98.39
GE09ram_02_u:5634: evam uktvā tu virate rāme vacanam arthavat
GE09ram_02_u:5635: uvāca bharataś citraṃ dhārmiko dhārmikaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,98.40
GE09ram_02_u:5636: ko hi syād īdṛśo loke yādṛśas tvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_02_u:5637: na tvāṃ pravyathayed duḥkhaṃ prītir vā na praharṣayet // Ram_2,98.41
GE09ram_02_u:5638: saṃmataś cāsi vṛddhānāṃ tāṃś ca pṛcchasi saṃśayān
GE09ram_02_u:5639: yathā mṛtas tathā jīvan yathāsati tathā sati // Ram_2,98.42
GE09ram_02_u:5640: yasyaiṣa buddhilābhaḥ syāt paritapyeta kena saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5641: sa evaṃ vyasanaṃ prāpya na viṣīditum arhati // Ram_2,98.43
GE09ram_02_u:5643: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca buddhimāṃś cāsi rāghava // Ram_2,98.44
GE09ram_02_u:5644: na tvām evaṃ guṇair yuktaṃ prabhavābhavakovidam
GE09ram_02_u:5646: proṣite mayi yat pāpaṃ mātrā matkāraṇāt kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:5647: kṣudrayā tad aniṣṭaṃ me prasīdatu bhavān mama // Ram_2,98.46
GE09ram_02_u:5649: hanmi tīvreṇa daṇḍena daṇḍārhāṃ pāpakāriṇīm // Ram_2,98.47
GE09ram_02_u:5651: jānan dharmam adharmiṣṭhaṃ kuryāṃ karma jugupsitam // Ram_2,98.48
GE09ram_02_u:5652: guruḥ kriyāvān vṛddhaś ca rājā pretaḥ piteti ca
GE09ram_02_u:5653: tātaṃ na parigarheyaṃ daivataṃ ceti saṃsadi // Ram_2,98.49
GE09ram_02_u:5654: ko hi dharmārthayor hīnam īdṛśaṃ karma kilbiṣam
GE09ram_02_u:5655: striyāḥ priyacikīrṣuḥ san kuryād dharmajña dharmavit // Ram_2,98.50
GE09ram_02_u:5657: rājñaivaṃ kurvatā loke pratyakṣā sā śrutiḥ kṛtā // Ram_2,98.51
GE09ram_02_u:5658: sādhvartham abhisaṃdhāya krodhān mohāc ca sāhasāt
GE09ram_02_u:5659: tātasya yad atikrāntaṃ pratyāharatu tad bhavān // Ram_2,98.52
GE09ram_02_u:5660: pitur hi samatikrāntaṃ putro yaḥ sādhu manyate
GE09ram_02_u:5661: tad apatyaṃ mataṃ loke viparītam ato 'nyathā // Ram_2,98.53
GE09ram_02_u:5662: tad apatyaṃ bhavān astu mā bhavān duṣkṛtaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5663: abhipattā kṛtaṃ karma loke dhīravigarhitam // Ram_2,98.54
GE09ram_02_u:5664: kaikeyīṃ māṃ ca tātaṃ ca suhṛdo bāndhavāṃś ca naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5665: paurajānapadān sarvāṃs trātu sarvam idaṃ bhavān // Ram_2,98.55
GE09ram_02_u:5666: kva cāraṇyaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ kva jaṭāḥ kva ca pālanam
GE09ram_02_u:5667: īdṛśaṃ vyāhataṃ karma na bhavān kartum arhati // Ram_2,98.56
GE09ram_02_u:5668: atha kleśajam eva tvaṃ dharmaṃ caritum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:5669: dharmeṇa caturo varṇān pālayan kleśam āpnuhi // Ram_2,98.57
GE09ram_02_u:5670: caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ hi gārhasthyaṃ śreṣṭham āśramam
GE09ram_02_u:5671: āhur dharmajña dharmajñās taṃ kathaṃ tyaktum arhasi // Ram_2,98.58
GE09ram_02_u:5672: śrutena bālaḥ sthānena janmanā bhavato hy aham
GE09ram_02_u:5673: sa kathaṃ pālayiṣyāmi bhūmiṃ bhavati tiṣṭhati // Ram_2,98.59
GE09ram_02_u:5674: hīnabuddhiguṇo bālo hīnaḥ sthānena cāpy aham
GE09ram_02_u:5675: bhavatā ca vinā bhūto na vartayitum utsahe // Ram_2,98.60
GE09ram_02_u:5676: idaṃ nikhilam avyagraṃ pitryaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:5677: anuśādhi svadharmeṇa dharmajña saha bāndhavaiḥ // Ram_2,98.61
GE09ram_02_u:5679: ṛtvijaḥ savasiṣṭhāś ca mantravan mantrakovidāḥ // Ram_2,98.62
GE09ram_02_u:5680: abhiṣiktas tvam asmābhir ayodhyāṃ pālane vraja
GE09ram_02_u:5681: vijitya tarasā lokān marudbhir iva vāsavaḥ // Ram_2,98.63
GE09ram_02_u:5682: ṛṇāni trīṇy apākurvan durhṛdaḥ sādhu nirdahan
GE09ram_02_u:5683: suhṛdas tarpayan kāmais tvam evātrānuśādhi mām // Ram_2,98.64
GE09ram_02_u:5685: adya bhītāḥ pālayantāṃ durhṛdas te diśo daśa // Ram_2,98.65
GE09ram_02_u:5686: ākrośaṃ mama mātuś ca pramṛjya puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:5687: adya tatra bhavantaṃ ca pitaraṃ rakṣa kilbiṣāt // Ram_2,98.66
GE09ram_02_u:5689: bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu bhūteṣv iva maheśvaraḥ // Ram_2,98.67
GE09ram_02_u:5690: atha vā pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā vanam eva bhavān itaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5691: gamiṣyati gamiṣyāmi bhavatā sārdham apy aham // Ram_2,98.68
GE09ram_02_u:5692: tathāpi rāmo bharatena tāmyatā prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5693: na caiva cakre gamanāya sattvavān matiṃ pitus tadvacane pratiṣṭhitaḥ // Ram_2,98.69
GE09ram_02_u:5694: tad adbhutaṃ sthairyam avekṣya rāghave samaṃ jano harṣam avāpa duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5695: na yāty ayodhyām iti duḥkhito 'bhavat sthirapratijñatvam avekṣya harṣitaḥ // Ram_2,98.70
GE09ram_02_u:5696: tam ṛtvijo naigamayūthavallabhās tathā visaṃjñāśrukalāś ca mātaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5697: tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ pratuṣṭuvuḥ praṇamya rāmaṃ ca yayācire saha // Ram_2,98.71
GE09ram_02_u:5698: punar evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu bharataṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5700: upapannam idaṃ vākyaṃ yat tvam evam abhāṣathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5701: jātaḥ putro daśarathāt kaikeyyāṃ rājasattamāt // Ram_2,99.2
GE09ram_02_u:5702: purā bhrātaḥ pitā naḥ sa mātaraṃ te samudvahan
GE09ram_02_u:5704: devāsure ca saṃgrāme jananyai tava pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5705: samprahṛṣṭo dadau rājā varam ārādhitaḥ prabhuḥ // Ram_2,99.4
GE09ram_02_u:5706: tataḥ sā saṃpratiśrāvya tava mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:5707: ayācata naraśreṣṭhaṃ dvau varau varavarṇinī // Ram_2,99.5
GE09ram_02_u:5708: tava rājyaṃ naravyāghra mama pravrājanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:5709: tac ca rājā tathā tasyai niyuktaḥ pradadau varam // Ram_2,99.6
GE09ram_02_u:5710: tena pitrāham apy atra niyuktaḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:5711: caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi varadānikam // Ram_2,99.7
GE09ram_02_u:5712: so 'haṃ vanam idaṃ prāpto nirjanaṃ lakṣmaṇānvitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5713: śītayā cāpratidvandvaḥ satyavāde sthitaḥ pituḥ // Ram_2,99.8
GE09ram_02_u:5714: bhavān api tathety eva pitaraṃ satyavādinam
GE09ram_02_u:5715: kartum arhati rājendraṃ kṣipram evābhiṣecanāt // Ram_2,99.9
GE09ram_02_u:5716: ṛṇān mocaya rājānaṃ matkṛte bharata prabhum
GE09ram_02_u:5717: pitaraṃ trāhi dharmajña mātaraṃ cābhinandaya // Ram_2,99.10
GE09ram_02_u:5718: śrūyate hi purā tāta śrutir gītā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:5719: gayena yajamānena gayeṣv eva pitṝn prati // Ram_2,99.11
GE09ram_02_u:5720: puṃnāmnā narakād yasmāt pitaraṃ trāyate sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5721: tasmāt putra iti proktaḥ pitṝn yat pāti vā sutaḥ // Ram_2,99.12
GE09ram_02_u:5723: teṣāṃ vai samavetānām api kaścid gayāṃ vrajet // Ram_2,99.13
GE09ram_02_u:5725: tasmāt trāhi naraśreṣṭha pitaraṃ narakāt prabho // Ram_2,99.14
GE09ram_02_u:5727: śatrughnasahito vīra saha sarvair dvijātibhiḥ // Ram_2,99.15
GE09ram_02_u:5729: ābhyāṃ tu sahito rājan vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // Ram_2,99.16
GE09ram_02_u:5730: tvaṃ rājā bhava bharata svayaṃ narāṇāṃ vanyānām aham api rājarāṇ mṛgāṇām
GE09ram_02_u:5731: gaccha tvaṃ puravaram adya samprahṛṣṭaḥ saṃhṛṣṭas tv aham api daṇḍakān pravekṣye // Ram_2,99.17
GE09ram_02_u:5732: chāyāṃ te dinakarabhāḥ prabādhamānaṃ varṣatraṃ bharata karotu mūrdhni śītām
GE09ram_02_u:5733: eteṣām aham api kānanadrumāṇāṃ chāyāṃ tām atiśayinīṃ sukhaṃ śrayiṣye // Ram_2,99.18
GE09ram_02_u:5734: śatrughnaḥ kuśalamatis tu te sahāyaḥ saumitrir mama viditaḥ pradhānamitram
GE09ram_02_u:5735: catvāras tanayavarā vayaṃ narendraṃ satyasthaṃ bharata carāma mā viṣādam // Ram_2,99.19
GE09ram_02_u:5737: uvāca rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ dharmāpetam idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,100.1
GE09ram_02_u:5738: sādhu rāghava mā bhūt te buddhir evaṃ nirarthakā
GE09ram_02_u:5740: kaḥ kasya puruṣo bandhuḥ kim āpyaṃ kasya kenacit
GE09ram_02_u:5741: yad eko jāyate jantur eka eva vinaśyati // Ram_2,100.3
GE09ram_02_u:5742: tasmān mātā pitā ceti rāma sajjeta yo naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5743: unmatta iva sa jñeyo nāsti kāciddhi kasyacit // Ram_2,100.4
GE09ram_02_u:5744: yathā grāmāntaraṃ gacchan naraḥ kaścit kvacid vaset
GE09ram_02_u:5745: utsṛjya ca tam āvāsaṃ pratiṣṭhetāpare 'hani // Ram_2,100.5
GE09ram_02_u:5746: evam eva manuṣyāṇāṃ pitā mātā gṛhaṃ vasu
GE09ram_02_u:5747: āvāsamātraṃ kākutstha sajjante nātra sajjanāḥ // Ram_2,100.6
GE09ram_02_u:5748: pitryaṃ rājyaṃ samutsṛjya sa nārhati narottama
GE09ram_02_u:5749: āsthātuṃ kāpathaṃ duḥkhaṃ viṣamaṃ bahukaṇṭakam // Ram_2,100.7
GE09ram_02_u:5751: ekaveṇīdharā hi tvāṃ nagarī sampratīkṣate // Ram_2,100.8
GE09ram_02_u:5753: vihara tvam ayodhyāyāṃ yathā śakras triviṣṭape // Ram_2,100.9
GE09ram_02_u:5754: na te kaścid daśaratas tvaṃ ca tasya na kaścana
GE09ram_02_u:5755: anyo rājā tvam anyaś ca tasmāt kuru yad ucyate // Ram_2,100.10
GE09ram_02_u:5756: gataḥ sa nṛpatis tatra gantavyaṃ yatra tena vai
GE09ram_02_u:5757: pravṛttir eṣā martyānāṃ tvaṃ tu mithyā vihanyase // Ram_2,100.11
GE09ram_02_u:5758: arthadharmaparā ye ye tāṃs tāñ śocāmi netarān
GE09ram_02_u:5759: te hi duḥkham iha prāpya vināśaṃ pretya bhejire // Ram_2,100.12
GE09ram_02_u:5761: annasyopadravaṃ paśya mṛto hi kim aśiṣyati // Ram_2,100.13
GE09ram_02_u:5762: yadi bhuktam ihānyena deham anyasya gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:5763: dadyāt pravasataḥ śrāddhaṃ na tat pathy aśanaṃ bhavet // Ram_2,100.14
GE09ram_02_u:5764: dānasaṃvananā hy ete granthā medhāvibhiḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5765: yajasva dehi dīkṣasva tapas tapyasva saṃtyaja // Ram_2,100.15
GE09ram_02_u:5766: sa nāsti param ity eva kuru buddhiṃ mahāmate
GE09ram_02_u:5767: pratyakṣaṃ yat tad ātiṣṭha parokṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuru // Ram_2,100.16
GE09ram_02_u:5769: rājyaṃ tvaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva bharatena prasāditaḥ // Ram_2,100.17
GE09ram_02_u:5770: jābāles tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ satyātmanāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5771: uvāca parayā yuktyā svabuddhyā cāvipannayā // Ram_2,101.1
GE09ram_02_u:5772: bhavān me priyakāmārthaṃ vacanaṃ yad ihoktavān
GE09ram_02_u:5775: mānaṃ na labhate satsu bhinnacāritradarśanaḥ // Ram_2,101.3
GE09ram_02_u:5777: cāritram eva vyākhyāti śuciṃ vā yadi vāśucim // Ram_2,101.4
GE09ram_02_u:5778: anāryas tv āryasaṃkāśaḥ śaucāddhīnas tathā śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5779: lakṣaṇyavad alakṣaṇyo duḥśīlaḥ śīlavān iva // Ram_2,101.5
GE09ram_02_u:5783: bahu maṃsyati māṃ loke durvṛttaṃ lokadūṣaṇam // Ram_2,101.7
GE09ram_02_u:5784: kasya yāsyāmy ahaṃ vṛttaṃ kena vā svargam āpnuyām
GE09ram_02_u:5786: kāmavṛttas tv ayaṃ lokaḥ kṛtsnaḥ samupavartate
GE09ram_02_u:5787: yadvṛttāḥ santi rājānas tadvṛttāḥ santi hi prajāḥ // Ram_2,101.9
GE09ram_02_u:5789: tasmāt satyātmakaṃ rājyaṃ satye lokaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // Ram_2,101.10
GE09ram_02_u:5790: ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca satyam eva hi menire
GE09ram_02_u:5791: satyavādī hi loke 'smin paramaṃ gacchati kṣayam // Ram_2,101.11
GE09ram_02_u:5793: dharmaḥ satyaṃ paro loke mūlaṃ svargasya cocyate // Ram_2,101.12
GE09ram_02_u:5794: satyam eveśvaro loke satyaṃ padmā samāśritā
GE09ram_02_u:5795: satyamūlāni sarvāṇi satyān nāsti paraṃ padam // Ram_2,101.13
GE09ram_02_u:5796: dattam iṣṭaṃ hutaṃ caiva taptāni ca tapāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:5797: vedāḥ satyapratiṣṭhānās tasmāt satyaparo bhavet // Ram_2,101.14
GE09ram_02_u:5798: ekaḥ pālayate lokam ekaḥ pālayate kulam
GE09ram_02_u:5799: majjaty eko hi niraya ekaḥ svarge mahīyate // Ram_2,101.15
GE09ram_02_u:5800: so 'haṃ pitur nideśaṃ tu kimarthaṃ nānupālaye
GE09ram_02_u:5802: naiva lobhān na mohād vā na cājñānāt tamo'nvitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5803: setuṃ satyasya bhetsyāmi guroḥ satyapratiśravaḥ // Ram_2,101.17
GE09ram_02_u:5805: naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratīcchantīti naḥ śrutam // Ram_2,101.18
GE09ram_02_u:5806: pratyagātmam imaṃ dharmaṃ satyaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:5808: kṣātraṃ dharmam ahaṃ tyakṣye hy adharmaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_02_u:5809: kṣudrair nṛśaṃsair lubdhaiś ca sevitaṃ pāpakarmabhiḥ // Ram_2,101.20
GE09ram_02_u:5810: kāyena kurute pāpaṃ manasā sampradhārya ca
GE09ram_02_u:5811: anṛtaṃ jihvayā cāha trividhaṃ karma pātakam // Ram_2,101.21
GE09ram_02_u:5812: bhūmiḥ kīrtir yaśo lakṣmīḥ puruṣaṃ prārthayanti hi
GE09ram_02_u:5813: svargasthaṃ cānubadhnanti satyam eva bhajeta tat // Ram_2,101.22
GE09ram_02_u:5814: śreṣṭhaṃ hy anāryam eva syād yad bhavān avadhārya mām
GE09ram_02_u:5815: āha yuktikarair vākyair idaṃ bhadraṃ kuruṣva ha // Ram_2,101.23
GE09ram_02_u:5816: kathaṃ hy ahaṃ pratijñāya vanavāsam imaṃ guroḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5817: bharatasya kariṣyāmi vaco hitvā guror vacaḥ // Ram_2,101.24
GE09ram_02_u:5819: prahṛṣṭamānasā devī kaikeyī cābhavat tadā // Ram_2,101.25
GE09ram_02_u:5821: mūlaiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pitṝn devāṃś ca tarpayan // Ram_2,101.26
GE09ram_02_u:5824: karmabhūmim imāṃ prāpya kartavyaṃ karma yac chubham
GE09ram_02_u:5825: agnir vāyuś ca somaś ca karmaṇāṃ phalabhāginaḥ // Ram_2,101.28
GE09ram_02_u:5826: śataṃ kratūnām āhṛtya devarāṭ tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5827: tapāṃsy ugrāṇi cāsthāya divaṃ yātā maharṣayaḥ // Ram_2,101.29
GE09ram_02_u:5828: satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca bhūtānukampāṃ priyavāditāṃ ca
GE09ram_02_u:5829: dvijātidevātithipūjanaṃ ca panthānam āhus tridivasya santaḥ // Ram_2,101.30
GE09ram_02_u:5830: dharme ratāḥ satpuruṣaiḥ sametās tejasvino dānaguṇapradhānāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5831: ahiṃsakā vītamalāś ca loke bhavanti pūjyā munayaḥ pradhānāḥ // Ram_2,101.31
GE09ram_02_u:5832: kruddham ājñāya rāmaṃ tu vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:5834: nivartayitukāmas tu tvām etad vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,102.1
GE09ram_02_u:5836: sarvaṃ salilam evāsīt pṛthivī yatra nirmitā
GE09ram_02_u:5837: tataḥ samabhavad brahmā svayambhūr daivataiḥ saha // Ram_2,102.2
GE09ram_02_u:5838: sa varāhas tato bhūtvā projjahāra vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:5839: asṛjac ca jagat sarvaṃ saha putraiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ // Ram_2,102.3
GE09ram_02_u:5841: tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,102.4
GE09ram_02_u:5842: vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivasvataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5843: sa tu prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,102.5
GE09ram_02_u:5844: yasyeyaṃ prathamaṃ dattā samṛddhā manunā mahī
GE09ram_02_u:5845: tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam // Ram_2,102.6
GE09ram_02_u:5846: ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān kukṣir eveti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5847: kukṣer athātmajo vīro vikukṣir udapadyata // Ram_2,102.7
GE09ram_02_u:5848: vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:5849: bāṇasya tu mahābāhur anaraṇyo mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,102.8
GE09ram_02_u:5850: nānāvṛṣṭir babhūvāsmin na durbhikṣaṃ satāṃ vare
GE09ram_02_u:5851: anaraṇye mahārāje taskaro vāpi kaścana // Ram_2,102.9
GE09ram_02_u:5852: anaraṇyān mahābāhuḥ pṛthū rājā babhūva ha
GE09ram_02_u:5854: sa satyavacanād vīraḥ saśarīro divaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,102.10
GE09ram_02_u:5858: māndhātus tu mahātejāḥ susaṃdhir udapadyata // Ram_2,102.12
GE09ram_02_u:5859: susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit
GE09ram_02_u:5860: yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato ripusūdanaḥ // Ram_2,102.13
GE09ram_02_u:5861: bharatāt tu mahābāhor asito nāma jāyata
GE09ram_02_u:5863: haihayās tālajaṅghāś ca śūrāś ca śaśabindavaḥ // Ram_2,102.14
GE09ram_02_u:5864: tāṃs tu sarvān prativyūhya yuddhe rājā pravāsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5865: sa ca śailavare ramye babhūvābhirato muniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5866: dve cāsya bhārye garbhiṇyau babhūvatur iti śrutiḥ // Ram_2,102.15
GE09ram_02_u:5868: tam ṛṣiṃ samupāgamya kālindī tv abhyavādayat // Ram_2,102.16
GE09ram_02_u:5869: sa tām abhyavadad vipro varepsuṃ putrajanmani
GE09ram_02_u:5870: tataḥ sā gṛham āgamya devī putraṃ vyajāyata // Ram_2,102.17
GE09ram_02_u:5871: sapatnyā tu garas tasyai datto garbhajighāṃsayā
GE09ram_02_u:5872: gareṇa saha tenaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat // Ram_2,102.18
GE09ram_02_u:5873: sa rājā sagaro nāma yaḥ samudram akhānayat
GE09ram_02_u:5874: iṣṭvā parvaṇi vegena trāsayantam imāḥ prajāḥ // Ram_2,102.19
GE09ram_02_u:5875: asamañjas tu putro 'bhūt sagarasyeti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:5876: jīvann eva sa pitrā tu nirastaḥ pāpakarmakṛt // Ram_2,102.20
GE09ram_02_u:5879: bhagīrathāt kakutsthas tu kākutsthā yena tu smṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5880: kakutsthasya tu putro 'bhūd raghur yena tu rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,102.22
GE09ram_02_u:5881: raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5882: kalmāṣapādaḥ saudāsa ity evaṃ prathito bhuvi // Ram_2,102.23
GE09ram_02_u:5884: yas tu tad vīryam āsādya sahaseno vyanīnaśat // Ram_2,102.24
GE09ram_02_u:5885: śaṅkhaṇasya tu putro 'bhūc chūraḥ śrīmān sudarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5887: śīghragasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ praśuśrukaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5890: nahuṣasya ca nābhāgaḥ putraḥ paramadhārmikaḥ // Ram_2,102.27
GE09ram_02_u:5891: ajaś ca suvrataś caiva nābhāgasya sutāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:5892: ajasya caiva dharmātmā rājā daśarathaḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,102.28
GE09ram_02_u:5893: tasya jyeṣṭho 'si dāyādo rāma ity abhiviśrutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5894: tad gṛhāṇa svakaṃ rājyam avekṣasva jagan nṛpa // Ram_2,102.29
GE09ram_02_u:5895: ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ rājā bhavati pūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5897: sa rāghavāṇāṃ kuladharmam ātmanaḥ sanātanaṃ nādya vihātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:5898: prabhūtaratnām anuśādhi medinīṃ prabhūtarāṣṭrāṃ pitṛvan mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,102.31
GE09ram_02_u:5899: vasiṣṭhas tu tadā rāmam uktvā rājapurohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5900: abravīd dharmasaṃyuktaṃ punar evāparaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,103.1
GE09ram_02_u:5902: ācāryaś caiva kākutstha pitā mātā ca rāghava // Ram_2,103.2
GE09ram_02_u:5903: pitā hy enaṃ janayati puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:5904: prajñāṃ dadāti cācāryas tasmāt sa gurur ucyate // Ram_2,103.3
GE09ram_02_u:5905: sa te 'haṃ pitur ācāryas tava caiva paraṃtapa
GE09ram_02_u:5906: mama tvaṃ vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // Ram_2,103.4
GE09ram_02_u:5907: imā hi te pariṣadaḥ śreṇayaś ca samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5908: eṣu tāta caran dharmaṃ nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // Ram_2,103.5
GE09ram_02_u:5910: asyās tu vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // Ram_2,103.6
GE09ram_02_u:5913: evaṃ madhuram uktas tu guruṇā rāghavaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:5915: yan mātāpitarau vṛttaṃ tanaye kurutaḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:5916: na supratikaraṃ tat tu mātrā pitrā ca yat kṛtam // Ram_2,103.9
GE09ram_02_u:5918: nityaṃ ca priyavādena tathā saṃvardhanena ca // Ram_2,103.10
GE09ram_02_u:5919: sa hi rājā janayitā pitā daśaratho mama
GE09ram_02_u:5920: ājñātaṃ yan mayā tasya na tan mithyā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,103.11
GE09ram_02_u:5921: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharataḥ pratyanantaram
GE09ram_02_u:5923: iha me sthaṇḍile śīghraṃ kuśān āstara sārathe
GE09ram_02_u:5924: āryaṃ pratyupavekṣyāmi yāvan me na prasīdati // Ram_2,103.13
GE09ram_02_u:5926: śeṣye purastāc chālāyā yāvan na pratiyāsyati // Ram_2,103.14
GE09ram_02_u:5927: sa tu rāmam avekṣantaṃ sumantraṃ prekṣya durmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5928: kuśottaram upasthāpya bhūmāv evāstarat svayam // Ram_2,103.15
GE09ram_02_u:5930: kiṃ māṃ bharata kurvāṇaṃ tāta pratyupavekṣyasi // Ram_2,103.16
GE09ram_02_u:5931: brāhmaṇo hy ekapārśvena narān roddhum ihārhati
GE09ram_02_u:5932: na tu mūrdhāvasiktānāṃ vidhiḥ pratyupaveśane // Ram_2,103.17
GE09ram_02_u:5934: puravaryām itaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ yāhi rāghava // Ram_2,103.18
GE09ram_02_u:5935: āsīnas tv eva bharataḥ paurajānapadaṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:5936: uvāca sarvataḥ prekṣya kim āryaṃ nānuśāsatha // Ram_2,103.19
GE09ram_02_u:5937: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5938: kākutstham abhijānīmaḥ samyag vadati rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,103.20
GE09ram_02_u:5939: eṣo 'pi hi mahābhāgaḥ pitur vacasi tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_02_u:5940: ata eva na śaktāḥ smo vyāvartayitum añjasā // Ram_2,103.21
GE09ram_02_u:5941: teṣām ājñāya vacanaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:5942: evaṃ nibodha vacanaṃ suhṛdāṃ dharmacakṣuṣām // Ram_2,103.22
GE09ram_02_u:5943: etac caivobhayaṃ śrutvā samyak saṃpaśya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:5944: uttiṣṭha tvaṃ mahābāho māṃ ca spṛśa tathodakam // Ram_2,103.23
GE09ram_02_u:5945: athotthāya jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā bharato vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:5946: śṛṇvantu me pariṣado mantriṇaḥ śreṇayas tathā // Ram_2,103.24
GE09ram_02_u:5947: na yāce pitaraṃ rājyaṃ nānuśāsāmi mātaram
GE09ram_02_u:5949: yadi tv avaśyaṃ vastavyaṃ kartavyaṃ ca pitur vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5950: aham eva nivatsyāmi caturdaśa vane samāḥ // Ram_2,103.26
GE09ram_02_u:5951: dharmātmā tasya tathyena bhrātur vākyena vismitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5952: uvāca rāmaḥ samprekṣya paurajānapadaṃ janam // Ram_2,103.27
GE09ram_02_u:5953: vikrītam āhitaṃ krītaṃ yat pitrā jīvatā mama
GE09ram_02_u:5954: na tal lopayituṃ śakyaṃ mayā vā bharatena vā // Ram_2,103.28
GE09ram_02_u:5955: upadhir na mayā kāryo vanavāse jugupsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5956: yuktam uktaṃ ca kaikeyyā pitrā me sukṛtaṃ kṛtam // Ram_2,103.29
GE09ram_02_u:5958: sarvam evātra kalyāṇaṃ satyasaṃdhe mahātmani // Ram_2,103.30
GE09ram_02_u:5960: bhrātrā saha bhaviṣyāmi pṛthivyāḥ patir uttamaḥ // Ram_2,103.31
GE09ram_02_u:5961: vṛto rājā hi kaikeyyā mayā tadvacanaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:5962: anṛtān mocayānena pitaraṃ taṃ mahīpatim // Ram_2,103.32
GE09ram_02_u:5964: vismitāḥ saṃgamaṃ prekṣya samavetā maharṣayaḥ // Ram_2,104.1
GE09ram_02_u:5965: antarhitās tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5966: tau bhrātarau mahātmānau kākutsthau praśaśaṃsire // Ram_2,104.2
GE09ram_02_u:5967: sa dhanyo yasya putrau dvau dharmajñau dharmavikramau
GE09ram_02_u:5968: śrutvā vayaṃ hi sambhāṣām ubhayoḥ spṛhayāmahe // Ram_2,104.3
GE09ram_02_u:5970: bharataṃ rājaśārdūlam ity ūcuḥ saṃgatā vacaḥ // Ram_2,104.4
GE09ram_02_u:5972: grāhyaṃ rāmasya vākyaṃ te pitaraṃ yady avekṣase // Ram_2,104.5
GE09ram_02_u:5973: sadānṛṇam imaṃ rāmaṃ vayam icchāmahe pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5974: anṛṇatvāc ca kaikeyyāḥ svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // Ram_2,104.6
GE09ram_02_u:5976: rājarṣayaś caiva tathā sarve svāṃ svāṃ gatiṃ gatāḥ // Ram_2,104.7
GE09ram_02_u:5978: rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭavadanas tān ṛṣīn abhyapūjayat // Ram_2,104.8
GE09ram_02_u:5979: srastagātras tu bharataḥ sa vācā sajjamānayā
GE09ram_02_u:5980: kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vākyaṃ rāghavaṃ punar abravīt // Ram_2,104.9
GE09ram_02_u:5982: kartum arhasi kākutstha mama mātuś ca yācanām // Ram_2,104.10
GE09ram_02_u:5983: rakṣituṃ sumahad rājyam aham ekas tu notsahe
GE09ram_02_u:5984: paurajānapadāṃś cāpi raktān rañjayituṃ tathā // Ram_2,104.11
GE09ram_02_u:5985: jñātayaś ca hi yodhāś ca mitrāṇi suhṛdaś ca naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5986: tvām eva pratikāṅkṣante parjanyam iva karṣakāḥ // Ram_2,104.12
GE09ram_02_u:5987: idaṃ rājyaṃ mahāprājña sthāpaya pratipadya hi
GE09ram_02_u:5988: śaktimān asi kākutstha lokasya paripālane // Ram_2,104.13
GE09ram_02_u:5989: ity uktvā nyapatad bhrātuḥ pādayor bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:5990: bhṛśaṃ samprārthayāmāsa rāmam evaṃ priyaṃvadaḥ // Ram_2,104.14
GE09ram_02_u:5991: tam aṅke bhrātaraṃ kṛtvā rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:5993: āgatā tvām iyaṃ buddhiḥ svajā vainayikī ca yā
GE09ram_02_u:5994: bhṛśam utsahase tāta rakṣituṃ pṛthivīm api // Ram_2,104.16
GE09ram_02_u:5995: amātyaiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca buddhimadbhiś ca mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5996: sarvakāryāṇi saṃmantrya sumahānty api kāraya // Ram_2,104.17
GE09ram_02_u:5997: lakṣmīś candrād apeyād vā himavān vā himaṃ tyajet
GE09ram_02_u:5998: atīyāt sāgaro velāṃ na pratijñām ahaṃ pituḥ // Ram_2,104.18
GE09ram_02_u:5999: kāmād vā tāta lobhād vā mātrā tubhyam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:6000: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ vartitavyaṃ ca mātṛvat // Ram_2,104.19
GE09ram_02_u:6004: ete hi sarvalokasya yogakṣemaṃ vidhāsyataḥ // Ram_2,104.21
GE09ram_02_u:6005: so 'dhiruhya naravyāghraḥ pāduke hy avaruhya ca
GE09ram_02_u:6007: sa pāduke te bharataḥ pratāpavān svalaṃkṛte samparigṛhya dharmavit
GE09ram_02_u:6008: pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ cakāra caivottamanāgamūrdhani // Ram_2,104.23
GE09ram_02_u:6009: athānupūrvyāt pratipūjya taṃ janaṃ gurūṃś ca mantriprakṛtīs tathānujau
GE09ram_02_u:6010: vyasarjayad rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ sthitaḥ svadharme himavān ivācalaḥ // Ram_2,104.24
GE09ram_02_u:6011: taṃ mātaro bāṣpagṛhītakaṇṭhyo duḥkhena nāmantrayituṃ hi śekuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6012: sa tv eva mātṝn abhivādya sarvā rudan kuṭīṃ svāṃ praviveśa rāmaḥ // Ram_2,104.25
GE09ram_02_u:6013: tataḥ śirasi kṛtvā tu pāduke bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:6014: āruroha rathaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // Ram_2,105.1
GE09ram_02_u:6015: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābāliś ca dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6016: agrataḥ prayayuḥ sarve mantriṇo mantrapūjitāḥ // Ram_2,105.2
GE09ram_02_u:6017: mandākinīṃ nadīṃ ramyāṃ prāṅmukhās te yayus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:6018: pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kurvāṇāś citrakūṭaṃ mahāgirim // Ram_2,105.3
GE09ram_02_u:6020: prayayau tasya pārśvena sasainyo bharatas tadā // Ram_2,105.4
GE09ram_02_u:6022: āśramaṃ yatra sa munir bharadvājaḥ kṛtālayaḥ // Ram_2,105.5
GE09ram_02_u:6023: sa tam āśramam āgamya bharadvājasya buddhimān
GE09ram_02_u:6024: avatīrya rathāt pādau vavande kulanandanaḥ // Ram_2,105.6
GE09ram_02_u:6025: tato hṛṣṭo bharadvājo bharataṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:6026: api kṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ tāta rāmeṇa ca samāgatam // Ram_2,105.7
GE09ram_02_u:6027: evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:6029: sa yācyamāno guruṇā mayā ca dṛḍhavikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6030: rāghavaḥ paramaprīto vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,105.9
GE09ram_02_u:6031: pituḥ pratijñāṃ tām eva pālayiṣyāmi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6032: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi yā pratijñā pitur mama // Ram_2,105.10
GE09ram_02_u:6033: evam ukto mahāprājño vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:6034: vākyajño vākyakuśalaṃ rāghavaṃ vacanaṃ mahat // Ram_2,105.11
GE09ram_02_u:6037: evam ukto vasiṣṭhena rāghavaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6038: pāduke hemavikṛte mama rājyāya te dadau // Ram_2,105.13
GE09ram_02_u:6040: ayodhyām eva gacchāmi gṛhītvā pāduke śubhe // Ram_2,105.14
GE09ram_02_u:6041: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6042: bharadvājaḥ śubhataraṃ munir vākyam udāharat // Ram_2,105.15
GE09ram_02_u:6044: yad āryaṃ tvayi tiṣṭhet tu nimne vṛṣṭim ivodakam // Ram_2,105.16
GE09ram_02_u:6045: amṛtaḥ sa mahābāhuḥ pitā daśarathas tava
GE09ram_02_u:6046: yasya tvam īdṛśaḥ putro dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ // Ram_2,105.17
GE09ram_02_u:6047: tam ṛṣiṃ tu mahātmānam uktavākyaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6048: āmantrayitum ārebhe caraṇāv upagṛhya ca // Ram_2,105.18
GE09ram_02_u:6049: tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā bharadvājaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6050: bharatas tu yayau śrīmān ayodhyāṃ saha mantribhiḥ // Ram_2,105.19
GE09ram_02_u:6051: yānaiś ca śakaṭaiś caiva hayair nāgaiś ca sā camūḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6053: tatas te yamunāṃ divyāṃ nadīṃ tīrtvormimālinīm
GE09ram_02_u:6054: dadṛśus tāṃ punaḥ sarve gaṅgāṃ śivajalāṃ nadīm // Ram_2,105.21
GE09ram_02_u:6058: bharato duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ sārathiṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,105.23
GE09ram_02_u:6059: sārathe paśya vidhvastā ayodhyā na prakāśate
GE09ram_02_u:6062: ayodhyāṃ bharataḥ kṣipraṃ praviveśa mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,106.1
GE09ram_02_u:6064: timirābhyāhatāṃ kālīm aprakāśāṃ niśām iva // Ram_2,106.2
GE09ram_02_u:6070: havirabhyukṣitāṃ paścāc chikhāṃ vipralayaṃ gatām // Ram_2,106.5
GE09ram_02_u:6072: hatapravīrām āpannāṃ camūm iva mahāhave // Ram_2,106.6
