GE09ram_02_u:6075: tyaktāṃ yajñāyudhaiḥ sarvair abhirūpaiś ca yājakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6076: sutyākāle vinirvṛtte vediṃ gataravām iva // Ram_2,106.8
GE09ram_02_u:6077: goṣṭhamadhye sthitām ārtām acarantīṃ navaṃ tṛṇam
GE09ram_02_u:6078: govṛṣeṇa parityaktāṃ gavāṃ patnīm ivotsukām // Ram_2,106.9
GE09ram_02_u:6080: viyuktāṃ maṇibhir jātyair navāṃ muktāvalīm iva // Ram_2,106.10
GE09ram_02_u:6081: sahasā calitāṃ sthānān mahīṃ puṇyakṣayād gatām
GE09ram_02_u:6082: saṃhṛtadyutivistārāṃ tārām iva divaś cyutām // Ram_2,106.11
GE09ram_02_u:6090: upayuktodakāṃ bhagnāṃ prapāṃ nipatitām iva // Ram_2,106.15
GE09ram_02_u:6092: bhūmau bāṇair viniṣkṛttāṃ patitāṃ jyām ivāyudhāt // Ram_2,106.16
GE09ram_02_u:6094: nikṣiptabhāṇḍām utsṛṣṭāṃ kiśorīm iva durbalām // Ram_2,106.17
GE09ram_02_u:6096: pracchannāṃ nīlajīmūtair bhāskarasya prabhām iva // Ram_2,106.18
GE09ram_02_u:6097: bharatas tu rathasthaḥ sañ śrīmān daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6098: vāhayantaṃ rathaśreṣṭhaṃ sārathiṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,106.19
GE09ram_02_u:6099: kiṃ nu khalv adya gambhīro mūrchito na niśamyate
GE09ram_02_u:6102: dhūpitāgarugandhaś ca na pravāti samantataḥ // Ram_2,106.21
GE09ram_02_u:6105: nedānīṃ śrūyate puryām asyāṃ rāme vivāsite // Ram_2,106.22
GE09ram_02_u:6107: saṃpatadbhir ayodhyāyāṃ na vibhānti mahāpathāḥ // Ram_2,106.23
GE09ram_02_u:6108: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ jalpan viveśa vasatiṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6109: tena hīnāṃ narendreṇa siṃhahīnāṃ guhām iva // Ram_2,106.24
GE09ram_02_u:6110: tato nikṣipya mātṝn sa ayodhyāyāṃ dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6111: bharataḥ śokasaṃtapto gurūn idam athābravīt // Ram_2,107.1
GE09ram_02_u:6113: tatra duḥkham idaṃ sarvaṃ sahiṣye rāghavaṃ vinā // Ram_2,107.2
GE09ram_02_u:6114: gataś ca hi divaṃ rājā vanasthaś ca gurur mama
GE09ram_02_u:6115: rāmaṃ pratīkṣe rājyāya sa hi rājā mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,107.3
GE09ram_02_u:6116: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6117: abruvan mantriṇaḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaś ca purohitaḥ // Ram_2,107.4
GE09ram_02_u:6118: sadṛśaṃ ślāghanīyaṃ ca yad uktaṃ bharata tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:6119: vacanaṃ bhrātṛvātsalyād anurūpaṃ tavaiva tat // Ram_2,107.5
GE09ram_02_u:6121: āryamārgaṃ prapannasya nānumanyeta kaḥ pumān // Ram_2,107.6
GE09ram_02_u:6123: abravīt sārathiṃ vākyaṃ ratho me yujyatām iti // Ram_2,107.7
GE09ram_02_u:6125: āruroha rathaṃ śrīmāñ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // Ram_2,107.8
GE09ram_02_u:6126: āruhya tu rathaṃ śīghraṃ śatrughnabharatāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:6129: prayayuḥ prāṅmukhāḥ sarve nandigrāmo yato 'bhavat // Ram_2,107.10
GE09ram_02_u:6131: prayayau bharate yāte sarve ca puravāsinaḥ // Ram_2,107.11
GE09ram_02_u:6132: rathasthaḥ sa tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6133: nandigrāmaṃ yayau tūrṇaṃ śirasy ādhāya pāduke // Ram_2,107.12
GE09ram_02_u:6134: tatas tu bharataḥ kṣipraṃ nandigrāmaṃ praviśya saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6135: avatīrya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gurūn idam uvāca ha // Ram_2,107.13
GE09ram_02_u:6136: etad rājyaṃ mama bhrātrā dattaṃ saṃnyāsavat svayam
GE09ram_02_u:6138: tam imaṃ pālayiṣyāmi rāghavāgamanaṃ prati // Ram_2,107.14
GE09ram_02_u:6139: kṣipraṃ saṃyojayitvā tu rāghavasya punaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:6140: caraṇau tau tu rāmasya drakṣyāmi sahapādukau // Ram_2,107.15
GE09ram_02_u:6142: nivedya gurave rājyaṃ bhajiṣye guruvṛttitām // Ram_2,107.16
GE09ram_02_u:6144: rājyaṃ cedam ayodhyāṃ ca dhūtapāpo bhavāmi ca // Ram_2,107.17
GE09ram_02_u:6146: prītir mama yaśaś caiva bhaved rājyāc caturguṇam // Ram_2,107.18
GE09ram_02_u:6147: evaṃ tu vilapan dīno bharataḥ sa mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6148: nandigrāme 'karod rājyaṃ duḥkhito mantribhiḥ saha // Ram_2,107.19
GE09ram_02_u:6150: nandigrāme 'vasad vīraḥ sasainyo bharatas tadā // Ram_2,107.20
GE09ram_02_u:6152: bhrātur vacanakārī ca pratijñāpāragas tadā // Ram_2,107.21
GE09ram_02_u:6154: bharataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ pādukābhyāṃ nyavedayat // Ram_2,107.22
GE09ram_02_u:6158: rāmam āśritya niratās tān alakṣayad utsukān // Ram_2,108.2
GE09ram_02_u:6159: nayanair bhṛkuṭībhiś ca rāmaṃ nirdiśya śaṅkitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6160: anyonyam upajalpantaḥ śanaiś cakrur mithaḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,108.3
GE09ram_02_u:6161: teṣām autsukyam ālakṣya rāmas tv ātmani śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6162: kṛtāñjalir uvācedam ṛṣiṃ kulapatiṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,108.4
GE09ram_02_u:6163: na kaccid bhagavan kiṃcit pūrvavṛttam idaṃ mayi
GE09ram_02_u:6164: dṛśyate vikṛtaṃ yena vikriyante tapasvinaḥ // Ram_2,108.5
GE09ram_02_u:6165: pramādāc caritaṃ kaccit kiṃcin nāvarajasya me
GE09ram_02_u:6168: pramadābhyucitāṃ vṛttiṃ sītā yuktaṃ na vartate // Ram_2,108.7
GE09ram_02_u:6169: atharṣir jarayā vṛddhas tapasā ca jarāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6172: calanaṃ tāta vaidehyās tapasviṣu viśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,108.9
GE09ram_02_u:6173: tvannimittam idaṃ tāvat tāpasān prati vartate
GE09ram_02_u:6174: rakṣobhyas tena saṃvignāḥ kathayanti mithaḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,108.10
GE09ram_02_u:6177: dhṛṣṭaś ca jitakāśī ca nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6178: avaliptaś ca pāpaś ca tvāṃ ca tāta na mṛṣyate // Ram_2,108.12
GE09ram_02_u:6179: tvaṃ yadā prabhṛti hy asminn āśrame tāta vartase
GE09ram_02_u:6180: tadā prabhṛti rakṣāṃsi viprakurvanti tāpasān // Ram_2,108.13
GE09ram_02_u:6181: darśayanti hi bībhatsaiḥ krūrair bhīṣaṇakair api
GE09ram_02_u:6182: nānā rūpair virūpaiś ca rūpair asukhadarśanaiḥ // Ram_2,108.14
GE09ram_02_u:6184: pratighnanty aparān kṣipram anāryāḥ purataḥ sthitāḥ // Ram_2,108.15
GE09ram_02_u:6185: teṣu teṣv āśramasthāneṣv abuddham avalīya ca
GE09ram_02_u:6188: kalaśāṃś ca pramṛdnanti havane samupasthite // Ram_2,108.17
GE09ram_02_u:6191: tat purā rāma śārīrām upahiṃsāṃ tapasviṣu
GE09ram_02_u:6192: darśayanti hi duṣṭās te tyakṣyāma imam āśramam // Ram_2,108.19
GE09ram_02_u:6194: purāṇāśramam evāhaṃ śrayiṣye sagaṇaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,108.20
GE09ram_02_u:6195: kharas tvayy api cāyuktaṃ purā tāta pravartate
GE09ram_02_u:6196: sahāsmābhir ito gaccha yadi buddhiḥ pravartate // Ram_2,108.21
GE09ram_02_u:6197: sakalatrasya saṃdeho nityaṃ yat tasya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:6198: samarthasyāpi hi sato vāso duḥkham ihādya te // Ram_2,108.22
GE09ram_02_u:6199: ity uktavantaṃ rāmas taṃ rājaputras tapasvinam
GE09ram_02_u:6200: na śaśākottarair vākyair avaroddhuṃ samutsukam // Ram_2,108.23
GE09ram_02_u:6202: sa jagāmāśramaṃ tyaktvā kulaiḥ kulapatiḥ saha // Ram_2,108.24
GE09ram_02_u:6203: rāmaḥ saṃsādhya tv ṛṣigaṇam anugamanād deśāt tasmāccit kulapatim abhivādya rṣim
GE09ram_02_u:6204: samyakprītais tair anumata upadiṣṭārthaḥ puṇyaṃ vāsāya svanilayam upasaṃpede // Ram_2,108.25
GE09ram_02_u:6205: āśramaṃ tv ṛṣivirahitaṃ prabhuḥ kṣaṇam api na jahau sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6206: rāghavaṃ hi satatam anugatās tāpasāś cārṣicaritadhṛtaguṇāḥ // Ram_2,108.26
GE09ram_02_u:6208: na tatrārocayad vāsaṃ kāraṇair bahubhis tadā // Ram_2,109.1
GE09ram_02_u:6209: iha me bharato dṛṣṭo mātaraś ca sanāgarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6210: sā ca me smṛtir anveti tān nityam anuśocataḥ // Ram_2,109.2
GE09ram_02_u:6212: hayahastikarīṣaiś ca upamardaḥ kṛto bhṛśam // Ram_2,109.3
GE09ram_02_u:6213: tasmād anyatra gacchāma iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6214: prātiṣṭhata sa vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca saṃgataḥ // Ram_2,109.4
GE09ram_02_u:6215: so 'trer āśramam āsādya taṃ vavande mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6216: taṃ cāpi bhagavān atriḥ putravat pratyapadyata // Ram_2,109.5
GE09ram_02_u:6217: svayam ātithyam ādiśya sarvam asya susatkṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:6218: saumitriṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ sītāṃ ca samasāntvayat // Ram_2,109.6
GE09ram_02_u:6219: patnīṃ ca samanuprāptāṃ vṛddhām āmantrya satkṛtām
GE09ram_02_u:6224: daśa varṣāṇy anāvṛṣṭyā dagdhe loke nirantaram // Ram_2,109.9
GE09ram_02_u:6225: yayā mūlaphale sṛṣṭe jāhnavī ca pravartitā
GE09ram_02_u:6226: ugreṇa tapasā yuktā niyamaiś cāpy alaṃkṛtā // Ram_2,109.10
GE09ram_02_u:6228: anasūyāvratais tāta pratyūhāś ca nibarhitāḥ // Ram_2,109.11
GE09ram_02_u:6230: daśarātraṃ kṛtvā rātriḥ seyaṃ māteva te 'nagha // Ram_2,109.12
GE09ram_02_u:6232: abhigacchatu vaidehī vṛddhām akrodhanāṃ sadā // Ram_2,109.13
GE09ram_02_u:6233: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tathety uktvā sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6234: sītām uvāca dharmajñām idaṃ vacanam uttamam // Ram_2,109.14
GE09ram_02_u:6235: rājaputri śrutaṃ tv etan muner asya samīritam
GE09ram_02_u:6236: śreyo'rtham ātmanaḥ śīghram abhigaccha tapasvinīm // Ram_2,109.15
GE09ram_02_u:6237: anasūyeti yā loke karmabhiḥ khyātim āgatā
GE09ram_02_u:6238: tāṃ śīghram abhigaccha tvam abhigamyāṃ tapasvinīm // Ram_2,109.16
GE09ram_02_u:6239: sītā tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavasya hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:6240: tām atripatnīṃ dharmajñām abhicakrāma maithilī // Ram_2,109.17
GE09ram_02_u:6242: satataṃ vepamānāṅgīṃ pravāte kadalī yathā // Ram_2,109.18
GE09ram_02_u:6243: tāṃ tu sītā mahābhāgām anasūyāṃ pativratām
GE09ram_02_u:6244: abhyavādayad avyagrā svaṃ nāma samudāharat // Ram_2,109.19
GE09ram_02_u:6245: abhivādya ca vaidehī tāpasīṃ tām aninditām
GE09ram_02_u:6247: tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ dharmacāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:6248: sāntvayanty abravīd dhṛṣṭā diṣṭyā dharmam avekṣase // Ram_2,109.21
GE09ram_02_u:6249: tyaktvā jñātijanaṃ sīte mānam ṛddhiṃ ca mānini
GE09ram_02_u:6250: avaruddhaṃ vane rāmaṃ diṣṭyā tvam anugacchasi // Ram_2,109.22
GE09ram_02_u:6251: nagarastho vanastho vā pāpo vā yadi vāśubhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6252: yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ // Ram_2,109.23
GE09ram_02_u:6253: duḥśīlaḥ kāmavṛtto vā dhanair vā parivarjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6254: strīṇām āryasvabhāvānāṃ paramaṃ daivataṃ patiḥ // Ram_2,109.24
GE09ram_02_u:6255: nāto viśiṣṭaṃ paśyāmi bāndhavaṃ vimṛśanty aham
GE09ram_02_u:6256: sarvatra yogyaṃ vaidehi tapaḥ kṛtam ivāvyayam // Ram_2,109.25
GE09ram_02_u:6257: na tv evam avagacchanti guṇadoṣam asatstriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6259: prāpnuvanty ayaśaś caiva dharmabhraṃśaṃ ca maithili
GE09ram_02_u:6260: akāryavaśam āpannāḥ striyo yāḥ khalu tadvidhāḥ // Ram_2,109.27
GE09ram_02_u:6262: striyaḥ svarge cariṣyanti yathā puṇyakṛtas tathā // Ram_2,109.28
GE09ram_02_u:6263: sā tv evam uktā vaidehī anasūyānasūyayā
GE09ram_02_u:6264: pratipūjya vaco mandaṃ pravaktum upacakrame // Ram_2,110.1
GE09ram_02_u:6265: naitad āścaryam āryāyā yan māṃ tvam anubhāṣase
GE09ram_02_u:6266: viditaṃ tu mamāpy etad yathā nāryāḥ patir guruḥ // Ram_2,110.2
GE09ram_02_u:6267: yady apy eṣa bhaved bhartā mamārye vṛttavarjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6268: advaidham upacartavyas tathāpy eṣa mayā bhavet // Ram_2,110.3
GE09ram_02_u:6269: kiṃ punar yo guṇaślāghyaḥ sānukrośo jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6271: yāṃ vṛttiṃ vartate rāmaḥ kausalyāyāṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6272: tām eva nṛpanārīṇām anyāsām api vartate // Ram_2,110.5
GE09ram_02_u:6273: sakṛd dṛṣṭāsv api strīṣu nṛpeṇa nṛpavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6274: mātṛvad vartate vīro mānam utsṛjya dharmavit // Ram_2,110.6
GE09ram_02_u:6275: āgacchantyāś ca vijanaṃ vanam evaṃ bhayāvaham
GE09ram_02_u:6276: samāhitaṃ hi me śvaśrvā hṛdaye yat sthitaṃ mama // Ram_2,110.7
GE09ram_02_u:6277: pāṇipradānakāle ca yat purā tv agnisaṃnidhau
GE09ram_02_u:6278: anuśiṣṭā jananyāsmi vākyaṃ tad api me dhṛtam // Ram_2,110.8
GE09ram_02_u:6279: navīkṛtaṃ tu tat sarvaṃ vākyais te dharmacāriṇi
GE09ram_02_u:6280: patiśuśrūṣaṇān nāryās tapo nānyad vidhīyate // Ram_2,110.9
GE09ram_02_u:6282: tathā vṛttiś ca yātā tvaṃ patiśuśrūṣayā divam // Ram_2,110.10
GE09ram_02_u:6283: variṣṭhā sarvanārīṇām eṣā ca divi devatā
GE09ram_02_u:6284: rohiṇī ca vinā candraṃ muhūrtam api dṛśyate // Ram_2,110.11
GE09ram_02_u:6286: devaloke mahīyante puṇyena svena karmaṇā // Ram_2,110.12
GE09ram_02_u:6288: śirasy āghrāya covāca maithilīṃ harṣayanty uta // Ram_2,110.13
GE09ram_02_u:6289: niyamair vividhair āptaṃ tapo hi mahad asti me
GE09ram_02_u:6290: tat saṃśritya balaṃ sīte chandaye tvāṃ śucivrate // Ram_2,110.14
GE09ram_02_u:6291: upapannaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca vacanaṃ tava maithili
GE09ram_02_u:6292: prītā cāsmy ucitaṃ kiṃ te karavāṇi bravīhi me
GE09ram_02_u:6293: kṛtam ity abravīt sītā tapobalasamanvitām // Ram_2,110.15
GE09ram_02_u:6294: sā tv evam uktā dharmajñā tayā prītatarābhavat
GE09ram_02_u:6295: saphalaṃ ca praharṣaṃ te hanta sīte karomy aham // Ram_2,110.16
GE09ram_02_u:6296: idaṃ divyaṃ varaṃ mālyaṃ vastram ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:6297: aṅgarāgaṃ ca vaidehi mahārham anulepanam // Ram_2,110.17
GE09ram_02_u:6298: mayā dattam idaṃ sīte tava gātrāṇi śobhayet
GE09ram_02_u:6299: anurūpam asaṃkliṣṭaṃ nityam eva bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,110.18
GE09ram_02_u:6301: śobhayiṣyāmi bhartāraṃ yathā śrīr viṣṇum avyayam // Ram_2,110.19
GE09ram_02_u:6302: sā vastram aṅgarāgaṃ ca bhūṣaṇāni srajas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:6304: pratigṛhya ca tat sītā prītidānaṃ yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:6307: vacanaṃ praṣṭum ārebhe kathāṃ kāṃcid anupriyām // Ram_2,110.22
GE09ram_02_u:6308: svayaṃvare kila prāptā tvam anena yaśasvinā
GE09ram_02_u:6309: rāghaveṇeti me sīte kathā śrutim upāgatā // Ram_2,110.23
GE09ram_02_u:6310: tāṃ kathāṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa ca maithili
GE09ram_02_u:6311: yathānubhūtaṃ kārtsnyena tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi // Ram_2,110.24
GE09ram_02_u:6312: evam uktā tu sā sītā tāṃ tato dharmacāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:6313: śrūyatām iti coktvā vai kathayāmāsa tāṃ kathām // Ram_2,110.25
GE09ram_02_u:6315: kṣatradharmaṇy abhirato nyāyataḥ śāsti medinīm // Ram_2,110.26
GE09ram_02_u:6317: ahaṃ kilotthitā bhittvā jagatīṃ nṛpateḥ sutā // Ram_2,110.27
GE09ram_02_u:6320: anapatyena ca snehād aṅkam āropya ca svayam
GE09ram_02_u:6321: mameyaṃ tanayety uktvā sneho mayi nipātitaḥ // Ram_2,110.29
GE09ram_02_u:6322: antarikṣe ca vāg uktā pratimāmānuṣī kila
GE09ram_02_u:6323: evam etan narapate dharmeṇa tanayā tava // Ram_2,110.30
GE09ram_02_u:6324: tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dharmātmā pitā me mithilādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6325: avāpto vipulām ṛddhiṃ mām avāpya narādhipaḥ // Ram_2,110.31
GE09ram_02_u:6327: tayā saṃbhāvitā cāsmi snigdhayā mātṛsauhṛdāt // Ram_2,110.32
GE09ram_02_u:6328: patisaṃyogasulabhaṃ vayo dṛṣṭvā tu me pitā
GE09ram_02_u:6329: cintām abhyagamad dīno vittanāśād ivādhanaḥ // Ram_2,110.33
GE09ram_02_u:6330: sadṛśāc cāpakṛṣṭāc ca loke kanyāpitā janāt
GE09ram_02_u:6331: pradharṣaṇām avāpnoti śakreṇāpi samo bhuvi // Ram_2,110.34
GE09ram_02_u:6334: ayonijāṃ hi māṃ jñātvā nādhyagacchat sa cintayan
GE09ram_02_u:6335: sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca mahīpālaḥ patiṃ mama // Ram_2,110.36
GE09ram_02_u:6336: tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā cintayānasya saṃtatam
GE09ram_02_u:6337: svayaṃ varaṃ tanūjāyāḥ kariṣyāmīti dhīmataḥ // Ram_2,110.37
GE09ram_02_u:6339: dattaṃ dhanurvaraṃ prītyā tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau // Ram_2,110.38
GE09ram_02_u:6340: asaṃcālyaṃ manuṣyaiś ca yatnenāpi ca gauravāt
GE09ram_02_u:6341: tan na śaktā namayituṃ svapneṣv api narādhipāḥ // Ram_2,110.39
GE09ram_02_u:6342: tad dhanuḥ prāpya me pitrā vyāhṛtaṃ satyavādinā
GE09ram_02_u:6343: samavāye narendrāṇāṃ pūrvam āmantrya pārthivān // Ram_2,110.40
GE09ram_02_u:6344: idaṃ ca dhanur udyamya sajyaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6345: tasya me duhitā bhāryā bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,110.41
GE09ram_02_u:6346: tac ca dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ gauravād girisaṃnibham
GE09ram_02_u:6347: abhivādya nṛpā jagmur aśaktās tasya tolane // Ram_2,110.42
GE09ram_02_u:6349: viśvāmitreṇa sahito yajñaṃ draṣṭuṃ samāgataḥ // Ram_2,110.43
GE09ram_02_u:6351: viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā mama pitrā supūjitaḥ // Ram_2,110.44
GE09ram_02_u:6354: ity uktas tena vipreṇa tad dhanuḥ samupānayat // Ram_2,110.45
GE09ram_02_u:6356: jyāṃ samāropya jhaṭiti pūrayāmāsa vīryavān // Ram_2,110.46
GE09ram_02_u:6357: tena pūrayatā vegān madhye bhagnaṃ dvidhā dhanuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6358: tasya śabdo 'bhavad bhīmaḥ patitasyāśaner iva // Ram_2,110.47
GE09ram_02_u:6360: udyatā dātum udyamya jalabhājanam uttamam // Ram_2,110.48
GE09ram_02_u:6361: dīyamānāṃ na tu tadā pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6362: avijñāya pituś chandam ayodhyādhipateḥ prabhoḥ // Ram_2,110.49
GE09ram_02_u:6363: tataḥ śvaśuram āmantrya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:6364: mama pitrā ahaṃ dattā rāmāya viditātmane // Ram_2,110.50
GE09ram_02_u:6366: bhāryārthe lakṣmaṇasyāpi dattā pitrā mama svayam // Ram_2,110.51
GE09ram_02_u:6367: evaṃ dattāsmi rāmāya tadā tasmin svayaṃvare
GE09ram_02_u:6368: anuraktā ca dharmeṇa patiṃ vīryavatāṃ varam // Ram_2,110.52
GE09ram_02_u:6369: anasūyā tu dharmajñā śrutvā tāṃ mahatīṃ kathām
GE09ram_02_u:6370: paryaṣvajata bāhubhyāṃ śirasy āghrāya maithilīm // Ram_2,111.1
GE09ram_02_u:6372: yathā svayaṃvaraṃ vṛttaṃ tat sarvaṃ hi śrutaṃ mayā // Ram_2,111.2
GE09ram_02_u:6373: rame 'haṃ kathayā te tu dṛḍhaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇi
GE09ram_02_u:6374: ravir astaṃ gataḥ śrīmān upohya rajanīṃ śivām // Ram_2,111.3
GE09ram_02_u:6376: saṃdhyākāle nilīnānāṃ nidrārthaṃ śrūyate dhvaniḥ // Ram_2,111.4
GE09ram_02_u:6382: viprakṛṣṭe 'pi ye deśe na prakāśanti vai diśaḥ // Ram_2,111.7
GE09ram_02_u:6384: tapovanamṛgā hy ete veditīrtheṣu śerate // Ram_2,111.8
GE09ram_02_u:6388: kathayantyā hi madhuraṃ tvayāhaṃ paritoṣitā // Ram_2,111.10
GE09ram_02_u:6389: alaṃkuru ca tāvat tvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ mama maithili
GE09ram_02_u:6390: prītiṃ janaya me vatsa divyālaṃkāraśobhinī // Ram_2,111.11
GE09ram_02_u:6392: praṇamya śirasā tasyai rāmaṃ tv abhimukhī yayau // Ram_2,111.12
GE09ram_02_u:6393: tathā tu bhūṣitāṃ sītāṃ dadarśa vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6394: rāghavaḥ prītidānena tapasvinyā jaharṣa ca // Ram_2,111.13
GE09ram_02_u:6395: nyavedayat tataḥ sarvaṃ sītā rāmāya maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:6397: prahṛṣṭas tv abhavad rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6398: maithilyāḥ satkriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā mānuṣeṣu sudurlabhām // Ram_2,111.15
GE09ram_02_u:6399: tatas tāṃ śarvarīṃ prītaḥ puṇyāṃ śaśinibhānanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6400: arcitas tāpasaiḥ siddhair uvāsa raghunandanaḥ // Ram_2,111.16
GE09ram_02_u:6403: tāv ūcus te vanacarās tāpasā dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6404: vanasya tasya saṃcāraṃ rākṣasaiḥ samabhiplutam // Ram_2,111.18
GE09ram_02_u:6405: eṣa panthā maharṣīṇāṃ phalāny āharatāṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:6406: anena tu vanaṃ durgaṃ gantuṃ rāghava te kṣamam // Ram_2,111.19
GE09ram_02_u:6407: itīva taiḥ prāñjalibhis tapasvibhir dvijaiḥ kṛtasvastyayanaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6408: vanaṃ sabhāryaḥ praviveśa rāghavaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ sūrya ivābhramaṇḍalam // Ram_2,111.20
GE09ram_02_u:6412: yathā pradīptaṃ durdharṣaṃ gagane sūryamaṇḍalam // Ram_3,1.2
GE09ram_02_u:6414: pūjitaṃ copanṛttaṃ ca nityam apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ // Ram_3,1.3
GE09ram_02_u:6416: samidbhis toyakalaśaiḥ phalamūlaiś ca śobhitam // Ram_3,1.4
GE09ram_02_u:6417: āraṇyaiś ca mahāvṛkṣaiḥ puṇyaiḥ svāduphalair vṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:6419: puṣpair vanyaiḥ parikṣiptaṃ padminyā ca sapadmayā
GE09ram_02_u:6422: puṇyaiś ca niyatāhāraiḥ śobhitaṃ paramarṣibhiḥ // Ram_3,1.7
GE09ram_02_u:6426: abhyagacchan mahātejā vijyaṃ kṛtvā mahad dhanuḥ // Ram_3,1.9
GE09ram_02_u:6428: abhyagacchaṃs tadā prītā vaidehīṃ ca yaśasvinīm // Ram_3,1.10
GE09ram_02_u:6429: te taṃ somam ivodyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6433: vaidehīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaṃ netrair animiṣair iva
GE09ram_02_u:6434: āścaryabhūtān dadṛśuḥ sarve te vanacāriṇaḥ // Ram_3,1.13
GE09ram_02_u:6438: ājahrus te mahābhāgāḥ salilaṃ dharmacāriṇaḥ // Ram_3,1.15
GE09ram_02_u:6439: mūlaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vanyam āśramaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6442: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca rājā daṇḍadharo guruḥ // Ram_3,1.17
GE09ram_02_u:6444: rājā tasmād varān bhogān bhuṅkte lokanamaskṛtaḥ // Ram_3,1.18
GE09ram_02_u:6446: nagarastho vanastho vā tvaṃ no rājā janeśvaraḥ // Ram_3,1.19
GE09ram_02_u:6448: rakṣitavyās tvayā śaśvad garbhabhūtās tapodhanāḥ // Ram_3,1.20
GE09ram_02_u:6449: evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpair vanyaiś ca rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:6450: anyaiś ca vividhāhāraiḥ salakṣmaṇam apūjayan // Ram_3,1.21
GE09ram_02_u:6454: āmantrya sa munīn sarvān vanam evānvagāhata // Ram_3,2.1
GE09ram_02_u:6458: lakṣmaṇānugato rāmo vanamadhyaṃ dadarśa ha // Ram_3,2.3
GE09ram_02_u:6462: bībhatsaṃ viṣamaṃ dīrghaṃ vikṛtaṃ ghoradarśanam // Ram_3,2.5
GE09ram_02_u:6465: trīn siṃhāṃś caturo vyāghrān dvau vṛkau pṛṣatān daśa
GE09ram_02_u:6466: saviṣāṇaṃ vasādigdhaṃ gajasya ca śiro mahat // Ram_3,2.7
GE09ram_02_u:6468: sa rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maithilīm // Ram_3,2.8
GE09ram_02_u:6470: sa kṛtvā bhairavaṃ nādaṃ cālayann iva medinīm // Ram_3,2.9
GE09ram_02_u:6474: kathaṃ tāpasayor vāṃ ca vāsaḥ pramadayā saha // Ram_3,2.11
GE09ram_02_u:6476: ahaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ virādho nāma rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,2.12
GE09ram_02_u:6478: iyaṃ nārī varārohā mama bhāryā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:6479: yuvayoḥ pāpayoś cāhaṃ pāsyāmi rudhiraṃ mṛdhe // Ram_3,2.13
GE09ram_02_u:6482: sītā prāvepatodvegāt pravāte kadalī yathā // Ram_3,2.14
GE09ram_02_u:6483: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ sītāṃ virādhāṅkagatāṃ śubhām
GE09ram_02_u:6484: abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā // Ram_3,2.15
GE09ram_02_u:6488: yad abhipretam asmāsu priyaṃ varavṛtaṃ ca yat
GE09ram_02_u:6489: kaikeyyās tu susaṃvṛttaṃ kṣipram adyaiva lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,2.17
GE09ram_02_u:6490: yā na tuṣyati rājyena putrārthe dīrghadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:6492: adyedānīṃ sakāmā sā yā mātā mama madhyamā // Ram_3,2.18
GE09ram_02_u:6493: parasparśāt tu vaidehyā na duḥkhataram asti me
GE09ram_02_u:6494: pitur vināśāt saumitre svarājyaharaṇāt tathā // Ram_3,2.19
GE09ram_02_u:6496: abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddho ruddho nāga iva śvasan // Ram_3,2.20
GE09ram_02_u:6497: anātha iva bhūtānāṃ nāthas tvaṃ vāsavopamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6498: mayā preṣyeṇa kākutstha kimarthaṃ paritapyase // Ram_3,2.21
GE09ram_02_u:6500: virādhasya gatāsor hi mahī pāsyati śoṇitam // Ram_3,2.22
GE09ram_02_u:6501: rājyakāme mama krodho bharate yo babhūva ha
GE09ram_02_u:6502: taṃ virādhe vimokṣyāmi vajrī vajram ivācale // Ram_3,2.23
GE09ram_02_u:6503: mama bhujabalavegavegitaḥ patatu śaro 'sya mahān mahorasi
GE09ram_02_u:6504: vyapanayatu tanoś ca jīvitaṃ patatu tataś ca mahīṃ vighūrṇitaḥ // Ram_3,2.24
GE09ram_02_u:6505: athovāca punar vākyaṃ virādhaḥ pūrayan vanam
GE09ram_02_u:6506: ātmānaṃ pṛcchate brūtaṃ kau yuvāṃ kva gamiṣyathaḥ // Ram_3,3.1
GE09ram_02_u:6507: tam uvāca tato rāmo rākṣasaṃ jvalitānanam
GE09ram_02_u:6510: tvāṃ tu veditum icchāvaḥ kas tvaṃ carasi daṇḍakān // Ram_3,3.3
GE09ram_02_u:6511: tam uvāca virādhas tu rāmaṃ satyaparākramam
GE09ram_02_u:6512: hanta vakṣyāmi te rājan nibodha mama rāghava // Ram_3,3.4
GE09ram_02_u:6513: putraḥ kila jayasyāhaṃ mātā mama śatahradā
GE09ram_02_u:6514: virādha iti mām āhuḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvarākṣasāḥ // Ram_3,3.5
GE09ram_02_u:6515: tapasā cāpi me prāptā brahmaṇo hi prasādajā
GE09ram_02_u:6518: tvaramāṇau pālayethāṃ na vāṃ jīvitam ādade // Ram_3,3.7
GE09ram_02_u:6521: kṣudra dhik tvāṃ tu hīnārthaṃ mṛtyum anveṣase dhruvam
GE09ram_02_u:6522: raṇe samprāpsyase tiṣṭha na me jīvan gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,3.9
GE09ram_02_u:6523: tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā rāmaḥ suniśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_02_u:6524: suśīghram abhisaṃdhāya rākṣasaṃ nijaghāna ha // Ram_3,3.10
GE09ram_02_u:6532: dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ cicheda rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // Ram_3,3.14
GE09ram_02_u:6533: tasya raudrasya saumitrir bāhuṃ savyaṃ babhañja ha
GE09ram_02_u:6534: rāmas tu dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ tarasā tasya rakṣasaḥ // Ram_3,3.15
GE09ram_02_u:6537: idaṃ provāca kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ puruṣarṣabham // Ram_3,3.16
GE09ram_02_u:6538: kausalyā suprajās tāta rāmas tvaṃ vidito mayā
GE09ram_02_u:6539: vaidehī ca mahābhāgā lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_3,3.17
GE09ram_02_u:6540: abhiśāpād ahaṃ ghorāṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasīṃ tanum
GE09ram_02_u:6541: tumburur nāma gandharvaḥ śapto vaiśravaṇena hi // Ram_3,3.18
GE09ram_02_u:6542: prasādyamānaś ca mayā so 'bravīn māṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6543: yadā dāśarathī rāmas tvāṃ vadhiṣyati saṃyuge // Ram_3,3.19
GE09ram_02_u:6544: tadā prakṛtim āpanno bhavān svargaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:6545: iti vaiśravaṇo rājā rambhāsaktam uvāca ha // Ram_3,3.20
GE09ram_02_u:6548: bhavanaṃ svaṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu paraṃtapa // Ram_3,3.21
GE09ram_02_u:6551: taṃ kṣipram abhigaccha tvaṃ sa te śreyo vidhāsyati
GE09ram_02_u:6552: avaṭe cāpi māṃ rāma nikṣipya kuśalī vraja // Ram_3,3.23
GE09ram_02_u:6554: avaṭe ye nidhīyante teṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ // Ram_3,3.24
GE09ram_02_u:6555: evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ śarapīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6558: virādhaṃ prākṣipac chvabhre nadantaṃ bhairavasvanam // Ram_3,3.26
GE09ram_02_u:6559: tatas tu tau kāñcanacitrakārmukau nihatya rakṣaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:6560: vijahratus tau muditau mahāvane divi sthitau candradivākarāv iva // Ram_3,3.27
GE09ram_02_u:6561: hatvā tu taṃ bhīmabalaṃ virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:6562: tataḥ sītāṃ pariṣvajya samāśvāsya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:6563: abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_3,4.1
GE09ram_02_u:6564: kaṣṭaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ na ca smo vanagocarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6568: samīpe śarabhaṅgasya dadarśa mahad adbhutam // Ram_3,4.4
GE09ram_02_u:6572: tadvidhair eva bahubhiḥ pūjyamānaṃ mahātmabhiḥ // Ram_3,4.6
GE09ram_02_u:6578: gṛhīte vananārībhyāṃ dhūyamāne ca mūrdhani // Ram_3,4.9
GE09ram_02_u:6580: antarikṣagataṃ devaṃ vāgbhir agryābhir īḍire // Ram_3,4.10
GE09ram_02_u:6581: dṛṣṭvā śatakratuṃ tatra rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:6582: ye hayāḥ puruhūtasya purā śakrasya naḥ śrutāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6583: antarikṣagatā divyās ta ime harayo dhruvam // Ram_3,4.11
GE09ram_02_u:6584: ime ca puruṣavyāghra ye tiṣṭhanty abhito ratham
GE09ram_02_u:6585: śataṃ śataṃ kuṇḍalino yuvānaḥ khaḍgapāṇayaḥ // Ram_3,4.12
GE09ram_02_u:6588: etaddhi kila devānāṃ vayo bhavati nityadā
GE09ram_02_u:6590: ihaiva saha vaidehyā muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:6591: yāvaj janāmy ahaṃ vyaktaṃ ka eṣa dyutimān rathe // Ram_3,4.15
GE09ram_02_u:6592: tam evam uktvā saumitrim ihaiva sthīyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:6595: śarabhaṅgam anujñāpya vibudhān idam abravīt // Ram_3,4.17
GE09ram_02_u:6596: ihopayāty asau rāmo yāvan māṃ nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:6597: niṣṭhāṃ nayata tāvat tu tato māṃ draṣṭum arhati // Ram_3,4.18
GE09ram_02_u:6598: jitavantaṃ kṛtārthaṃ ca draṣṭāham acirād imam
GE09ram_02_u:6599: karma hy anena kartavyaṃ mahad anyaiḥ suduṣkaram // Ram_3,4.19
GE09ram_02_u:6600: iti vajrī tam āmantrya mānayitvā ca tāpasam
GE09ram_02_u:6601: rathena hariyuktena yayau divam ariṃdamaḥ // Ram_3,4.20
GE09ram_02_u:6604: tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya rāmaḥ sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6606: tataḥ śakropayānaṃ tu paryapṛcchat sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6607: śarabhaṅgaś ca tat sarvaṃ rāghavāya nyavedayat // Ram_3,4.23
GE09ram_02_u:6608: mām eṣa varado rāma brahmalokaṃ ninīṣati
GE09ram_02_u:6609: jitam ugreṇa tapasā duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ // Ram_3,4.24
GE09ram_02_u:6611: brahmalokaṃ na gacchāmi tvām adṛṣṭvā priyātithim // Ram_3,4.25
GE09ram_02_u:6613: akṣayā naraśārdūla jitā lokā mayā śubhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6614: brāhmyāś ca nākapṛṣṭhyāś ca pratigṛhṇīṣva māmakān // Ram_3,4.26
GE09ram_02_u:6616: ṛṣiṇā śarabhaṅgena rāghavo vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,4.27
GE09ram_02_u:6618: āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane // Ram_3,4.28
GE09ram_02_u:6620: śarabhaṅgo mahāprājñaḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ // Ram_3,4.29
GE09ram_02_u:6621: sutīkṣṇam abhigaccha tvaṃ śucau deśe tapasvinam
GE09ram_02_u:6622: ramaṇīye vanoddeśe sa te vāsaṃ vidhāsyati // Ram_3,4.30
GE09ram_02_u:6623: eṣa panthā naravyāghra muhūrtaṃ paśya tāta mām
GE09ram_02_u:6624: yāvaj jahāmi gātrāṇi jīrṇāṃ tvacam ivoragaḥ // Ram_3,4.31
GE09ram_02_u:6625: tato 'gniṃ sa samādhāya hutvā cājyena mantravit
GE09ram_02_u:6627: tasya romāṇi keśāṃś ca dadāhāgnir mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6628: jīrṇāṃ tvacaṃ tathāsthīni yac ca māṃsaṃ ca śoṇitam // Ram_3,4.33
GE09ram_02_u:6631: sa lokān āhitāgnīnām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_02_u:6632: devānāṃ ca vyatikramya brahmalokaṃ vyarohata // Ram_3,4.35
GE09ram_02_u:6633: sa puṇyakarmā bhuvane dvijarṣabhaḥ pitāmahaṃ sānucaraṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_02_u:6634: pitāmahaś cāpi samīkṣya taṃ dvijaṃ nananda susvāgatam ity uvāca ha // Ram_3,4.36
GE09ram_02_u:6638: aśmakuṭṭāś ca bahavaḥ pattrāhārāś ca tāpasāḥ // Ram_3,5.2
GE09ram_02_u:6645: śarabhaṅgāśrame rāmam abhijagmuś ca tāpasāḥ // Ram_3,5.5
GE09ram_02_u:6646: abhigamya ca dharmajñā rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:6649: pradhānaś cāsi nāthaś ca devānāṃ maghavān iva // Ram_3,5.7
GE09ram_02_u:6650: viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu yaśasā vikrameṇa ca
GE09ram_02_u:6651: pitṛvratatvaṃ satyaṃ ca tvayi dharmaś ca puṣkalaḥ // Ram_3,5.8
GE09ram_02_u:6653: arthitvān nātha vakṣyāmas tac ca naḥ kṣantum arhasi // Ram_3,5.9
GE09ram_02_u:6654: adharmas tu mahāṃs tāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6655: yo hared baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ na ca rakṣati putravat // Ram_3,5.10
GE09ram_02_u:6656: yuñjānaḥ svān iva prāṇān prāṇair iṣṭān sutān iva
GE09ram_02_u:6657: nityayuktaḥ sadā rakṣan sarvān viṣayavāsinaḥ // Ram_3,5.11
GE09ram_02_u:6658: prāpnoti śāśvatīṃ rāma kīrtiṃ sa bahuvārṣikīm
GE09ram_02_u:6659: brahmaṇaḥ sthānam āsādya tatra cāpi mahīyate // Ram_3,5.12
GE09ram_02_u:6660: yat karoti paraṃ dharmaṃ munir mūlaphalāśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6661: tatra rājñaś caturbhāgaḥ prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ // Ram_3,5.13
GE09ram_02_u:6663: tvan nātho 'nāthavad rāma rākṣasair vadhyate bhṛśam // Ram_3,5.14
GE09ram_02_u:6665: hatānāṃ rākṣasair ghorair bahūnāṃ bahudhā vane // Ram_3,5.15
GE09ram_02_u:6667: citrakūṭālayānāṃ ca kriyate kadanaṃ mahat // Ram_3,5.16
GE09ram_02_u:6668: evaṃ vayaṃ na mṛṣyāmo viprakāraṃ tapasvinām
GE09ram_02_u:6669: kriyamāṇaṃ vane ghoraṃ rakṣobhir bhīmakarmabhiḥ // Ram_3,5.17
GE09ram_02_u:6670: tatas tvāṃ śaraṇārthaṃ ca śaraṇyaṃ samupasthitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6671: paripālaya no rāma vadhyamānān niśācaraiḥ // Ram_3,5.18
GE09ram_02_u:6672: etac chrutvā tu kākutsthas tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām
GE09ram_02_u:6673: idaṃ provāca dharmātmā sarvān eva tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6674: naivam arhatha māṃ vaktum ājñāpyo 'haṃ tapasvinām // Ram_3,5.19
GE09ram_02_u:6676: tasya me 'yaṃ vane vāso bhaviṣyati mahāphalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6677: tapasvināṃ raṇe śatrūn hantum icchāmi rākṣasān // Ram_3,5.20
GE09ram_02_u:6678: dattvā varaṃ cāpi tapodhanānāṃ dharme dhṛtātmā saha lakṣmaṇena
GE09ram_02_u:6679: tapodhanaiś cāpi sabhājyavṛttaḥ sutīkṣṇam evābhijagāma vīraḥ // Ram_3,5.21
GE09ram_02_u:6680: rāmas tu sahito bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6681: sutīkṣṇasyāśramapadaṃ jagāma saha tair dvijaiḥ // Ram_3,6.1
GE09ram_02_u:6682: sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ nadīs tīrtvā bahūdakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6683: dadarśa vipulaṃ śailaṃ mahāmegham ivonnatam // Ram_3,6.2
GE09ram_02_u:6684: tatas tad ikṣvākuvarau satataṃ vividhair drumaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6685: kānanaṃ tau viviśatuḥ sītayā saha rāghavau // Ram_3,6.3
GE09ram_02_u:6689: rāmaḥ sutīkṣṇaṃ vidhivat tapovṛddham abhāṣata // Ram_3,6.5
GE09ram_02_u:6690: rāmo 'ham asmi bhagavan bhavantaṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6691: tan mābhivada dharmajña maharṣe satyavikrama // Ram_3,6.6
GE09ram_02_u:6692: sa nirīkṣya tato vīraṃ rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:6693: samāśliṣya ca bāhubhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,6.7
GE09ram_02_u:6694: svāgataṃ khalu te vīra rāma dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:6695: āśramo 'yaṃ tvayākrāntaḥ sanātha iva sāmpratam // Ram_3,6.8
GE09ram_02_u:6697: devalokam ito vīra dehaṃ tyaktvā mahītale // Ram_3,6.9
GE09ram_02_u:6700: sarvāṃl lokāñ jitān āha mama puṇyena karmaṇā // Ram_3,6.10
GE09ram_02_u:6702: matprasādāt sabhāryas tvaṃ viharasva salakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,6.11
GE09ram_02_u:6704: pratyuvācātmavān rāmo brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ // Ram_3,6.12
GE09ram_02_u:6706: āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane // Ram_3,6.13
GE09ram_02_u:6709: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa maharṣir lokaviśrutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6710: abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ harṣeṇa mahatāplutaḥ // Ram_3,6.15
GE09ram_02_u:6711: ayam evāśramo rāma guṇavān ramyatām iha
GE09ram_02_u:6715: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya maharṣer lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6716: uvāca vacanaṃ dhīro vikṛṣya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // Ram_3,6.18
GE09ram_02_u:6719: bhavāṃs tatrābhiṣajyeta kiṃ syāt kṛcchrataraṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6720: etasminn āśrame vāsaṃ ciraṃ tu na samarthaye // Ram_3,6.20
GE09ram_02_u:6721: tam evam uktvā varadaṃ rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāgamat
GE09ram_02_u:6722: anvāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tatra vāsam akalpayat // Ram_3,6.21
GE09ram_02_u:6723: tataḥ śubhaṃ tāpasabhojyam annaṃ svayaṃ sutīkṣṇaḥ puruṣarṣabhābhyām
GE09ram_02_u:6724: tābhyāṃ susatkṛtya dadau mahātmā saṃdhyānivṛttau rajanīṃ samīkṣya // Ram_3,6.22
GE09ram_02_u:6726: pariṇāmya niśāṃ tatra prabhāte pratyabudhyata // Ram_3,7.1
GE09ram_02_u:6727: utthāya tu yathākālaṃ rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:6729: atha te 'gniṃ surāṃś caiva vaidehī rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:6730: kālyaṃ vidhivad abhyarcya tapasviśaraṇe vane // Ram_3,7.3
GE09ram_02_u:6732: sutīkṣṇam abhigamyedaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abruvan // Ram_3,7.4
GE09ram_02_u:6733: sukhoṣitāḥ sma bhagavaṃs tvayā pūjyena pūjitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6734: āpṛcchāmaḥ prayāsyāmo munayas tvarayanti naḥ // Ram_3,7.5
GE09ram_02_u:6738: dharmanityais tapodāntair viśikhair iva pāvakaiḥ // Ram_3,7.7
GE09ram_02_u:6741: tāvad icchāmahe gantum ity uktvā caraṇau muneḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6742: vavande sahasaumitriḥ sītayā saha rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,7.9
GE09ram_02_u:6744: gāḍham āliṅgya sasneham idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,7.10
GE09ram_02_u:6745: ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ rāma saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:6748: eṣāṃ tapasvināṃ vīra tapasā bhāvitātmanām // Ram_3,7.12
GE09ram_02_u:6755: gamyatāṃ vatsa saumitre bhavān api ca gacchatu
GE09ram_02_u:6756: āgantavyaṃ ca te dṛṣṭvā punar evāśramaṃ mama // Ram_3,7.16
GE09ram_02_u:6757: evam uktas tathety uktvā kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6758: pradakṣiṇaṃ muniṃ kṛtvā prasthātum upacakrame // Ram_3,7.17
GE09ram_02_u:6760: dadau sītā tayor bhrātroḥ khaḍgau ca vimalau tataḥ // Ram_3,7.18
GE09ram_02_u:6761: ābadhya ca śubhe tūṇī cāpau cādāya sasvanau
GE09ram_02_u:6762: niṣkrāntāv āśramād gantum ubhau tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_3,7.19
GE09ram_02_u:6764: vaidehī snigdhayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt // Ram_3,8.1
GE09ram_02_u:6765: ayaṃ dharmaḥ susūkṣmeṇa vidhinā prāpyate mahān
GE09ram_02_u:6766: nivṛttena ca śakyo 'yaṃ vyasanāt kāmajād iha // Ram_3,8.2
GE09ram_02_u:6767: trīṇy eva vyasanāny atra kāmajāni bhavanty uta
GE09ram_02_u:6769: paradārābhigamanaṃ vinā vairaṃ ca raudratā // Ram_3,8.3
GE09ram_02_u:6770: mithyāvākyaṃ na te bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:6772: tac ca sarvaṃ mahābāho śakyaṃ voḍhuṃ jitendriyaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6773: tava vaśyendriyatvaṃ ca jānāmi śubhadarśana // Ram_3,8.5
GE09ram_02_u:6775: nirvairaṃ kriyate mohāt tac ca te samupasthitam // Ram_3,8.6
GE09ram_02_u:6777: ṛṣīṇāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya vadhaḥ saṃyati rakṣasām // Ram_3,8.7
GE09ram_02_u:6778: etannimittaṃ ca vanaṃ daṇḍakā iti viśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:6779: prasthitas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā dhṛtabāṇaśarāsanaḥ // Ram_3,8.8
GE09ram_02_u:6780: tatas tvāṃ prasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mama cintākulaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6781: tvadvṛttaṃ cintayantyā vai bhaven niḥśreyasaṃ hitam // Ram_3,8.9
GE09ram_02_u:6782: na hi me rocate vīra gamanaṃ daṇḍakān prati
GE09ram_02_u:6783: kāraṇaṃ tatra vakṣyāmi vadantyāḥ śrūyatāṃ mama // Ram_3,8.10
GE09ram_02_u:6784: tvaṃ hi bāṇadhanuṣpāṇir bhrātrā saha vanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6785: dṛṣṭvā vanacarān sarvān kaccit kuryāḥ śaravyayam // Ram_3,8.11
GE09ram_02_u:6787: samīpataḥ sthitaṃ tejobalam ucchrayate bhṛśam // Ram_3,8.12
GE09ram_02_u:6788: purā kila mahābāho tapasvī satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6789: kasmiṃścid abhavat puṇye vane ratamṛgadvije // Ram_3,8.13
GE09ram_02_u:6790: tasyaiva tapaso vighnaṃ kartum indraḥ śacīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6793: sa nyāsavidhinā dattaḥ puṇye tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ // Ram_3,8.15
GE09ram_02_u:6795: vane tu vicaraty eva rakṣan pratyayam ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,8.16
GE09ram_02_u:6796: yatra gacchaty upādātuṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:6797: na vinā yāti taṃ khaḍgaṃ nyāsarakṣaṇatatparaḥ // Ram_3,8.17
GE09ram_02_u:6798: nityaṃ śastraṃ parivahan krameṇa sa tapodhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6799: cakāra raudrīṃ svāṃ buddhiṃ tyaktvā tapasi niścayam // Ram_3,8.18
GE09ram_02_u:6801: tasya śastrasya saṃvāsāj jagāma narakaṃ muniḥ // Ram_3,8.19
GE09ram_02_u:6802: snehāc ca bahumānāc ca smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:6803: na kathaṃcana sā kāryā gṛhītadhanuṣā tvayā // Ram_3,8.20
GE09ram_02_u:6804: buddhir vairaṃ vinā hantuṃ rākṣasān daṇḍakāśritān
GE09ram_02_u:6805: aparādhaṃ vinā hantuṃ lokān vīra na kāmaye // Ram_3,8.21
GE09ram_02_u:6807: dhanuṣā kāryam etāvad ārtānām abhirakṣaṇam // Ram_3,8.22
GE09ram_02_u:6808: kva ca śastraṃ kva ca vanaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ tapaḥ kva ca
GE09ram_02_u:6809: vyāviddham idam asmābhir deśadharmas tu pūjyatām // Ram_3,8.23
GE09ram_02_u:6811: punar gatvā tv ayodhyāyāṃ kṣatradharmaṃ cariṣyasi // Ram_3,8.24
GE09ram_02_u:6812: akṣayā tu bhavet prītiḥ śvaśrūśvaśurayor mama
GE09ram_02_u:6813: yadi rājyaṃ hi saṃnyasya bhaves tvaṃ nirato muniḥ // Ram_3,8.25
GE09ram_02_u:6814: dharmād arthaḥ prabhavati dharmāt prabhavate sukham
GE09ram_02_u:6815: dharmeṇa labhate sarvaṃ dharmasāram idaṃ jagat // Ram_3,8.26
GE09ram_02_u:6816: ātmānaṃ niyamais tais taiḥ karṣayitvā prayatnataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6817: prāpyate nipuṇair dharmo na sukhāl labhyate sukham // Ram_3,8.27
GE09ram_02_u:6818: nityaṃ śucimatiḥ saumya cara dharmaṃ tapovane
GE09ram_02_u:6819: sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tubhyaṃ trailokyam api tattvataḥ // Ram_3,8.28
GE09ram_02_u:6820: strīcāpalād etad udāhṛtaṃ me dharmaṃ ca vaktuṃ tava kaḥ samarthaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6821: vicārya buddhyā tu sahānujena yad rocate tat kuru mācireṇa // Ram_3,8.29
GE09ram_02_u:6822: vākyam etat tu vaidehyā vyāhṛtaṃ bhartṛbhaktayā
GE09ram_02_u:6823: śrutvā dharme sthito rāmaḥ pratyuvācātha maithilīm // Ram_3,9.1
GE09ram_02_u:6824: hitam uktaṃ tvayā devi snigdhayā sadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6825: kulaṃ vyapadiśantyā ca dharmajñe janakātmaje // Ram_3,9.2
GE09ram_02_u:6826: kiṃ tu vakṣyāmy ahaṃ devi tvayaivoktam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6827: kṣatriyair dhāryate cāpo nārtaśabdo bhaved iti // Ram_3,9.3
GE09ram_02_u:6829: māṃ sīte svayam āgamya śaraṇyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Ram_3,9.4
GE09ram_02_u:6831: na labhante sukhaṃ bhītā rākṣasaiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ // Ram_3,9.5
GE09ram_02_u:6832: kāle kāle ca niratā niyamair vividhair vane
GE09ram_02_u:6835: asmān abhyavapadyeti mām ūcur dvijasattamāḥ // Ram_3,9.7
GE09ram_02_u:6836: mayā tu vacanaṃ śrutvā teṣām evaṃ mukhāc cyutam
GE09ram_02_u:6837: kṛtvā caraṇaśuśrūṣāṃ vākyam etad udāhṛtam // Ram_3,9.8
GE09ram_02_u:6838: prasīdantu bhavanto me hrīr eṣā hi mamātulā
GE09ram_02_u:6840: kiṃ karomīti ca mayā vyāhṛtaṃ dvijasaṃnidhau // Ram_3,9.9
GE09ram_02_u:6841: sarvair eva samāgamya vāg iyaṃ samudāhṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:6843: arditāḥ sma bhṛśaṃ rāma bhavān nas trātum arhati // Ram_3,9.10
GE09ram_02_u:6845: dharṣayanti sma durdharṣā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ // Ram_3,9.11
GE09ram_02_u:6847: gatiṃ mṛgayamāṇānāṃ bhavān naḥ paramā gatiḥ // Ram_3,9.12
GE09ram_02_u:6849: cirārjitaṃ tu necchāmas tapaḥ khaṇḍayituṃ vayam // Ram_3,9.13
GE09ram_02_u:6851: tena śāpaṃ na muñcāmo bhakṣyamāṇāś ca rākṣasaiḥ // Ram_3,9.14
GE09ram_02_u:6853: rakṣa nas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā tvannāthā hi vayaṃ vane // Ram_3,9.15
GE09ram_02_u:6854: mayā caitad vacaḥ śrutvā kārtsnyena paripālanam
GE09ram_02_u:6856: saṃśrutya ca na śakṣyāmi jīvamānaḥ pratiśravam
GE09ram_02_u:6857: munīnām anyathā kartuṃ satyam iṣṭaṃ hi me sadā // Ram_3,9.17
GE09ram_02_u:6858: apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ tvāṃ vā sīte salakṣmaṇām
GE09ram_02_u:6859: na tu pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya brāhmaṇebhyo viśeṣataḥ // Ram_3,9.18
GE09ram_02_u:6860: tad avaśyaṃ mayā kāryam ṛṣīṇāṃ paripālanam
GE09ram_02_u:6861: anuktenāpi vaidehi pratijñāya tu kiṃ punaḥ // Ram_3,9.19
GE09ram_02_u:6862: mama snehāc ca sauhārdād idam uktaṃ tvayā vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6863: parituṣṭo 'smy ahaṃ sīte na hy aniṣṭo 'nuśiṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:6864: sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kulasya tava śobhane // Ram_3,9.20
GE09ram_02_u:6865: ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā sītāṃ priyāṃ maithilarājaputrīm
GE09ram_02_u:6866: rāmo dhanuṣmān saha lakṣmaṇena jagāma ramyāṇi tapovanāni // Ram_3,9.21
GE09ram_02_u:6867: agrataḥ prayayau rāmaḥ sītā madhye sumadhyamā
GE09ram_02_u:6868: pṛṣṭhatas tu dhanuṣpāṇir lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha // Ram_3,10.1
GE09ram_02_u:6869: tau paśyamānau vividhāñ śailaprasthān vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:6870: nadīś ca vividhā ramyā jagmatuḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,10.2
GE09ram_02_u:6872: sarāṃsi ca sapadmāni yutāni jalajaiḥ khagaiḥ // Ram_3,10.3
GE09ram_02_u:6874: mahiṣāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca gajāṃś ca drumavairiṇaḥ // Ram_3,10.4
GE09ram_02_u:6875: te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare
GE09ram_02_u:6876: dadṛśuḥ sahitā ramyaṃ taṭākaṃ yojanāyatam // Ram_3,10.5
GE09ram_02_u:6880: gītavāditranirghoṣo na tu kaścana dṛśyate // Ram_3,10.7
GE09ram_02_u:6881: tataḥ kautūhalād rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6882: muniṃ dharmabhṛtaṃ nāma praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // Ram_3,10.8
GE09ram_02_u:6883: idam atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ no mahāmune
GE09ram_02_u:6884: kautūhalaṃ mahaj jātaṃ kim idaṃ sādhu kathyatām // Ram_3,10.9
GE09ram_02_u:6885: tenaivam ukto dharmātmā rāghaveṇa munis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:6886: prabhāvaṃ sarasaḥ kṛtsnam ākhyātum upacakrame // Ram_3,10.10
GE09ram_02_u:6888: nirmitaṃ tapasā rāma muninā māṇḍakarṇinā // Ram_3,10.11
GE09ram_02_u:6889: sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ māṇḍakarṇir mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6893: asmākaṃ kasyacit sthānam eṣa prārthayate muniḥ // Ram_3,10.13
GE09ram_02_u:6894: tataḥ kartuṃ tapovighnaṃ sarvair devair niyojitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6898: tāś caivāpsarasaḥ pañca muneḥ patnītvam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6899: taṭāke nirmitaṃ tāsām asminn antarhitaṃ gṛham // Ram_3,10.16
GE09ram_02_u:6901: ramayanti tapoyogān muniṃ yauvanam āsthitam // Ram_3,10.17
GE09ram_02_u:6905: rāghavaḥ pratijagrāha saha bhrātrā mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_3,10.19
GE09ram_02_u:6908: praviśya saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6909: tadā tasmin sa kākutsthaḥ śrīmaty āśramamaṇḍale // Ram_3,10.21
GE09ram_02_u:6911: jagāma cāśramāṃs teṣāṃ paryāyeṇa tapasvinām // Ram_3,10.22
GE09ram_02_u:6912: yeṣām uṣitavān pūrvaṃ sakāśe sa mahāstravit
GE09ram_02_u:6913: kvacit paridaśān māsān ekaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kvacit // Ram_3,10.23
GE09ram_02_u:6914: kvacic ca caturo māsān pañcaṣaṭ cāparān kvacit
GE09ram_02_u:6915: aparatrādhikān māsān adhyardham adhikaṃ kvacit // Ram_3,10.24
GE09ram_02_u:6916: trīn māsān aṣṭamāsāṃś ca rāghavo nyavasat sukham
GE09ram_02_u:6917: tathā saṃvasatas tasya munīnām āśrameṣu vai
GE09ram_02_u:6918: ramataś cānukūlyena yayuḥ saṃvatsarā daśa // Ram_3,10.25
GE09ram_02_u:6919: parisṛtya ca dharmajño rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:6920: sutīkṣṇasyāśramaṃ śrīmān punar evājagāma ha // Ram_3,10.26
GE09ram_02_u:6921: sa tam āśramam āgamya munibhiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6922: tatrāpi nyavasad rāmaḥ kaṃcit kālam ariṃdamaḥ // Ram_3,10.27
GE09ram_02_u:6924: upāsīnaḥ sa kākutsthaḥ sutīkṣṇam idam abravīt // Ram_3,10.28
GE09ram_02_u:6926: vasatīti mayā nityaṃ kathāḥ kathayatāṃ śrutam // Ram_3,10.29
GE09ram_02_u:6927: na tu jānāmi taṃ deśaṃ vanasyāsya mahattayā
GE09ram_02_u:6928: kutrāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ maharṣes tasya dhīmataḥ // Ram_3,10.30
GE09ram_02_u:6929: prasādāt tatra bhavataḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:6932: yad ahaṃ taṃ munivaraṃ śuśrūṣeyam api svayam // Ram_3,10.32
GE09ram_02_u:6933: iti rāmasya sa muniḥ śrutvā dharmātmano vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6935: aham apy etad eva tvāṃ vaktukāmaḥ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:6936: agastyam abhigaccheti sītayā saha rāghava // Ram_3,10.34
GE09ram_02_u:6937: diṣṭyā tv idānīm arthe 'smin svayam eva bravīṣi mām
GE09ram_02_u:6938: aham ākhyāsi te vatsa yatrāgastyo mahāmuniḥ // Ram_3,10.35
GE09ram_02_u:6939: yojanāny āśramāt tāta yāhi catvāri vai tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6940: dakṣiṇena mahāñ śrīmān agastyabhrātur āśramaḥ // Ram_3,10.36
GE09ram_02_u:6945: tatraikāṃ rajanīm uṣya prabhāte rāma gamyatām
GE09ram_02_u:6946: dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya vanakhaṇḍasya pārśvataḥ // Ram_3,10.39
GE09ram_02_u:6949: raṃsyate tatra vaidehī lakṣmaṇaś ca tvayā saha // Ram_3,10.40
GE09ram_02_u:6951: yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā draṣṭum agastyaṃ taṃ mahāmunim
GE09ram_02_u:6952: adyaiva gamane buddhiṃ rocayasva mahāyaśaḥ // Ram_3,10.41
GE09ram_02_u:6953: iti rāmo muneḥ śrutvā saha bhrātrābhivādya ca
GE09ram_02_u:6954: pratasthe 'gastyam uddiśya sānujaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,10.42
GE09ram_02_u:6956: sarāṃsi saritaś caiva pathi mārgavaśānugāḥ // Ram_3,10.43
GE09ram_02_u:6958: idaṃ paramasaṃhṛṣṭo vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,10.44
GE09ram_02_u:6960: agastyasya muner bhrātur dṛśyate puṇyakarmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,10.45
GE09ram_02_u:6961: yathā hīme vanasyāsya jñātāḥ pathi sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6962: saṃnatāḥ phalabhāreṇa puṣpabhāreṇa ca drumāḥ // Ram_3,10.46
GE09ram_02_u:6963: pippalīnāṃ ca pakvānāṃ vanād asmād upāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6965: tatra tatra ca dṛśyante saṃkṣiptāḥ kāṣṭhasaṃcayāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6966: lūnāś ca pathi dṛśyante darbhā vaiḍūryavarcasaḥ // Ram_3,10.48
GE09ram_02_u:6970: puṣpopahāraṃ kurvanti kusumaiḥ svayam ārjitaiḥ // Ram_3,10.50
GE09ram_02_u:6971: tat sutīkṣṇasya vacanaṃ yathā saumya mayā śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:6972: agastyasyāśramo bhrātur nūnam eṣa bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,10.51
GE09ram_02_u:6974: yasya bhrātrā kṛteyaṃ dik śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā // Ram_3,10.52
GE09ram_02_u:6975: ihaikadā kila krūro vātāpir api celvalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6976: bhrātarau sahitāv āstāṃ brāhmaṇaghnau mahāsurau // Ram_3,10.53
GE09ram_02_u:6977: dhārayan brāhmaṇaṃ rūpam ilvalaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vadan
GE09ram_02_u:6978: āmantrayati viprān sa śrāddham uddiśya nirghṛṇaḥ // Ram_3,10.54
GE09ram_02_u:6979: bhrātaraṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhrātā tatas taṃ meṣarūpiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:6980: tān dvijān bhojayāmāsa śrāddhadṛṣṭena karmaṇā // Ram_3,10.55
GE09ram_02_u:6982: vātāpe niṣkramasveti svareṇa mahatā vadan // Ram_3,10.56
GE09ram_02_u:6983: tato bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā vātāpir meṣavan nadan
GE09ram_02_u:6984: bhittvā bhittvā śarīrāṇi brāhmaṇānāṃ viniṣpatat // Ram_3,10.57
GE09ram_02_u:6988: anubhūya kila śrāddhe bhakṣitaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ // Ram_3,10.59
GE09ram_02_u:6989: tataḥ sampannam ity uktvā dattvā hastāvasecanam
GE09ram_02_u:6991: taṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ tu bhrātaraṃ vipraghātinam
GE09ram_02_u:6992: abravīt prahasan dhīmān agastyo munisattamaḥ // Ram_3,10.61
GE09ram_02_u:6993: kuto niṣkramituṃ śaktir mayā jīrṇasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6994: bhrātus te meṣarūpasya gatasya yamasādanam // Ram_3,10.62
GE09ram_02_u:6995: atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur nidhanasaṃśritam
GE09ram_02_u:6996: pradharṣayitum ārebhe muniṃ krodhān niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,10.63
GE09ram_02_u:7000: viprānukampayā yena karmedaṃ duṣkaraṃ kṛtam // Ram_3,10.65
GE09ram_02_u:7003: upāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ saha bhrātrā yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:7005: samyak pratigṛhītas tu muninā tena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7006: nyavasat tāṃ niśām ekāṃ prāśya mūlaphalāni ca // Ram_3,10.68
GE09ram_02_u:7008: bhrātaraṃ tam agastyasya āmantrayata rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,10.69
GE09ram_02_u:7009: abhivādaye tvā bhagavan sukham adhyuṣito niśām
GE09ram_02_u:7010: āmantraye tvāṃ gacchāmi guruṃ te draṣṭum agrajam // Ram_3,10.70
GE09ram_02_u:7012: yathoddiṣṭena mārgeṇa vanaṃ tac cāvalokayan // Ram_3,10.71
GE09ram_02_u:7013: nīvārān panasāṃs tālāṃs timiśān vañjulān dhavān
GE09ram_02_u:7014: ciribilvān madhūkāṃś ca bilvān api ca tindukān // Ram_3,10.72
GE09ram_02_u:7016: dadarśa rāmaḥ śataśas tatra kāntārapādapān // Ram_3,10.73
GE09ram_02_u:7018: mattaiḥ śakunisaṃghaiś ca śataśaḥ pratināditān // Ram_3,10.74
GE09ram_02_u:7021: snigdhapattrā yathā vṛkṣā yathā kṣāntā mṛgadvijāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7023: agastya iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:7028: dakṣiṇā dik kṛtā yena śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā // Ram_3,10.79
GE09ram_02_u:7030: dig iyaṃ dakṣiṇā trāsād dṛśyate nopabhujyate // Ram_3,10.80
GE09ram_02_u:7032: tadā prabhṛti nirvairāḥ praśāntā rajanīcarāḥ // Ram_3,10.81
GE09ram_02_u:7033: nāmnā ceyaṃ bhagavato dakṣiṇā dik pradakṣiṇā
GE09ram_02_u:7034: prathitā triṣu lokeṣu durdharṣā krūrakarmabhiḥ // Ram_3,10.82
GE09ram_02_u:7036: saṃdeśaṃ pālayaṃs tasya vindhyaḥ śailo na vardhate // Ram_3,10.83
GE09ram_02_u:7039: eṣa lokārcitaḥ sādhur hite nityaṃ rataḥ satām
GE09ram_02_u:7040: asmān adhigatān eṣa śreyasā yojayiṣyati // Ram_3,10.85
GE09ram_02_u:7042: śeṣaṃ ca vanavāsasya saumya vatsyāmy ahaṃ prabho // Ram_3,10.86
GE09ram_02_u:7043: atra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7045: nātra jīven mṛṣāvādī krūro vā yadi vā śaṭhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7046: nṛśaṃsaḥ kāmavṛtto vā munir eṣa tathāvidhaḥ // Ram_3,10.88
GE09ram_02_u:7047: atra devāś ca yakṣāś ca nāgāś ca patagaiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:7050: tyaktvā dehān navair dehaiḥ svaryātāḥ paramarṣayaḥ // Ram_3,10.90
GE09ram_02_u:7051: yakṣatvam amaratvaṃ ca rājyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:7052: atra devāḥ prayacchanti bhūtair ārādhitāḥ śubhaiḥ // Ram_3,10.91
GE09ram_02_u:7054: nivedayeha māṃ prāptam ṛṣaye saha sītayā // Ram_3,10.92
GE09ram_02_u:7056: agastyaśiṣyam āsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha // Ram_3,11.1
GE09ram_02_u:7057: rājā daśaratho nāma jyeṣṭhas tasya suto balī
GE09ram_02_u:7058: rāmaḥ prāpto muniṃ draṣṭuṃ bhāryayā saha sītayā // Ram_3,11.2
GE09ram_02_u:7059: lakṣmaṇo nāma tasyāhaṃ bhrātā tv avarajo hitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7060: anukūlaś ca bhaktaś ca yadi te śrotram āgataḥ // Ram_3,11.3
GE09ram_02_u:7061: te vayaṃ vanam atyugraṃ praviṣṭāḥ pitṛśāsanāt
GE09ram_02_u:7062: draṣṭum icchāmahe sarve bhagavantaṃ nivedyatām // Ram_3,11.4
GE09ram_02_u:7067: putrau daśarathasyemau rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:7068: praviṣṭāv āśramapadaṃ sītayā saha bhāryayā // Ram_3,11.7
GE09ram_02_u:7070: yad atrānantaraṃ tattvam ājñāpayitum arhasi // Ram_3,11.8
GE09ram_02_u:7071: tataḥ śiṣyād upaśrutya prāptaṃ rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:7072: vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,11.9
GE09ram_02_u:7073: diṣṭyā rāmaś cirasyādya draṣṭuṃ māṃ samupāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7074: manasā kāṅkṣitaṃ hy asya mayāpy āgamanaṃ prati // Ram_3,11.10
GE09ram_02_u:7076: praveśyatāṃ samīpaṃ me kiṃ cāsau na praveśitaḥ // Ram_3,11.11
GE09ram_02_u:7077: evam uktas tu muninā dharmajñena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:7079: tato niṣkramya saṃbhrāntaḥ śiṣyo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:7080: kvāsau rāmo muniṃ draṣṭum etu praviśatu svayam // Ram_3,11.13
GE09ram_02_u:7082: darśayāmāsa kākutsthaṃ sītāṃ ca janakātmajām // Ram_3,11.14
GE09ram_02_u:7083: taṃ śiṣyaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam agastyavacanaṃ bruvan
GE09ram_02_u:7087: sa tatra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam agneḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_02_u:7088: viṣṇoḥ sthānaṃ mahendrasya sthānaṃ caiva vivasvataḥ // Ram_3,11.17
GE09ram_02_u:7089: somasthānaṃ bhagasthānaṃ sthānaṃ kauberam eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:7090: dhātur vidhātuḥ sthānaṃ ca vāyoḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca // Ram_3,11.18
GE09ram_02_u:7091: tataḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto munir apy abhiniṣpatat
GE09ram_02_u:7093: abravīd vacanaṃ vīro lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam // Ram_3,11.19
GE09ram_02_u:7094: eṣa lakṣmaṇa niṣkrāmaty agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7097: jagrāha paramaprītas tasya pādau paraṃtapaḥ // Ram_3,11.21
GE09ram_02_u:7098: abhivādya tu dharmātmā tasthau rāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7099: sītayā saha vaidehyā tadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,11.22
GE09ram_02_u:7101: kuśalapraśnam uktvā ca āsyatām iti so 'bravīt // Ram_3,11.23
GE09ram_02_u:7102: agniṃ hutvā pradāyārghyam atithiṃ pratipūjya ca
GE09ram_02_u:7103: vānaprasthena dharmeṇa sa teṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadau // Ram_3,11.24
GE09ram_02_u:7105: uvāca rāmam āsīnaṃ prāñjaliṃ dharmakovidam // Ram_3,11.25
GE09ram_02_u:7107: duḥsākṣīva pare loke svāni māṃsāni bhakṣayet // Ram_3,11.26
GE09ram_02_u:7109: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca bhavān prāptaḥ priyātithiḥ // Ram_3,11.27
GE09ram_02_u:7110: evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpaiś cānyaiś ca rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:7111: pūjayitvā yathākāmaṃ punar eva tato 'bravīt // Ram_3,11.28
GE09ram_02_u:7115: datto mama mahendreṇa tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau // Ram_3,11.30
GE09ram_02_u:7116: sampūrṇau niśitair bāṇair jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7118: anena dhanuṣā rāma hatvā saṃkhye mahāsurān
GE09ram_02_u:7119: ājahāra śriyaṃ dīptāṃ purā viṣṇur divaukasām // Ram_3,11.32
GE09ram_02_u:7120: tad dhanus tau ca tūṇīrau śaraṃ khaḍgaṃ ca mānada
GE09ram_02_u:7121: jayāya pratigṛhṇīṣva vajraṃ vajradharo yathā // Ram_3,11.33
GE09ram_02_u:7122: evam uktvā mahātejāḥ samastaṃ tad varāyudham
GE09ram_02_u:7123: dattvā rāmāya bhagavān agastyaḥ punar abravīt // Ram_3,11.34
GE09ram_02_u:7124: rāma prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te parituṣṭo 'smi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:7125: abhivādayituṃ yan māṃ prāptau sthaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,12.1
GE09ram_02_u:7127: vyaktam utkaṇṭhate cāpi maithilī janakātmajā // Ram_3,12.2
GE09ram_02_u:7128: eṣā hi sukumārī ca duḥkhaiś ca na vimānitā
GE09ram_02_u:7130: yathaiṣā ramate rāma iha sītā tathā kuru
GE09ram_02_u:7131: duṣkaraṃ kṛtavaty eṣā vane tvām anugacchatī // Ram_3,12.4
GE09ram_02_u:7132: eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana
GE09ram_02_u:7133: samastham anurajyante viṣamasthaṃ tyajanti ca // Ram_3,12.5
GE09ram_02_u:7136: iyaṃ tu bhavato bhāryā doṣair etair vivarjitā
GE09ram_02_u:7137: ślāghyā ca vyapadeśyā ca yathā devī hy arundhatī // Ram_3,12.7
GE09ram_02_u:7138: alaṃkṛto 'yaṃ deśaś ca yatra saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:7139: vaidehyā cānayā rāma vatsyasi tvam ariṃdama // Ram_3,12.8
GE09ram_02_u:7140: evam uktas tu muninā rāghavaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7141: uvāca praśritaṃ vākyam ṛṣiṃ dīptam ivānalam // Ram_3,12.9
GE09ram_02_u:7144: kiṃ tu vyādiśa me deśaṃ sodakaṃ bahukānanam
GE09ram_02_u:7145: yatrāśramapadaṃ kṛtvā vaseyaṃ nirataḥ sukham // Ram_3,12.11
GE09ram_02_u:7147: dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ dharmātmā dhīro dhīrataraṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,12.12
GE09ram_02_u:7149: deśo bahumṛgaḥ śrīmān pañcavaṭy abhiviśrutaḥ // Ram_3,12.13
GE09ram_02_u:7151: ramasva tvaṃ pitur vākyaṃ yathoktam anupālayan // Ram_3,12.14
GE09ram_02_u:7152: vidito hy eṣa vṛttānto mama sarvas tavānagha
GE09ram_02_u:7153: tapasaś ca prabhāvena snehād daśarathasya ca // Ram_3,12.15
GE09ram_02_u:7154: hṛdayasthaś ca te chando vijñātas tapasā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:7155: iha vāsaṃ pratijñāya mayā saha tapovane // Ram_3,12.16
GE09ram_02_u:7156: ataś ca tvām ahaṃ brūmi gaccha pañcavaṭīm iti
GE09ram_02_u:7157: sa hi ramyo vanoddeśo maithilī tatra raṃsyate // Ram_3,12.17
GE09ram_02_u:7158: sa deśaḥ ślāghanīyaś ca nātidūre ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:7159: godāvaryāḥ samīpe ca maithilī tatra raṃsyate // Ram_3,12.18
GE09ram_02_u:7161: viviktaś ca mahābāho puṇyo ramyas tathaiva ca // Ram_3,12.19
GE09ram_02_u:7162: bhavān api sadāraś ca śaktaś ca parirakṣaṇe
GE09ram_02_u:7163: api cātra vasan rāmas tāpasān pālayiṣyasi // Ram_3,12.20
GE09ram_02_u:7164: etad ālakṣyate vīra madhūkānāṃ mahad vanam
GE09ram_02_u:7168: agastyenaivam uktas tu rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:7171: tadāśramāt pañcavaṭīṃ jagmatuḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,12.24
GE09ram_02_u:7172: gṛhītacāpau tu narādhipātmajau viṣaktatūṇī samareṣv akātarau
GE09ram_02_u:7173: yathopadiṣṭena pathā maharṣiṇā prajagmatuḥ pañcavaṭīṃ samāhitau // Ram_3,12.25
GE09ram_02_u:7176: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau mahābhāgau vanasthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:7177: menāte rākṣasaṃ pakṣiṃ bruvāṇau ko bhavān iti // Ram_3,13.2
GE09ram_02_u:7178: sa tau madhurayā vācā saumyayā prīṇayann iva
GE09ram_02_u:7179: uvāca vatsa māṃ viddhi vayasyaṃ pitur ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,13.3
GE09ram_02_u:7180: sa taṃ pitṛsakhaṃ buddhvā pūjayāmāsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7181: sa tasya kulam avyagram atha papraccha nāma ca // Ram_3,13.4
GE09ram_02_u:7182: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kulam ātmānam eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:7185: tān me nigadataḥ sarvān āditaḥ śṛṇu rāghava // Ram_3,13.6
GE09ram_02_u:7187: śeṣaś ca saṃśrayaś caiva bahuputraś ca vīryavān // Ram_3,13.7
GE09ram_02_u:7188: sthāṇur marīcir atriś ca kratuś caiva mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7189: pulastyaś cāṅgirāś caiva pracetāḥ pulahas tathā // Ram_3,13.8
GE09ram_02_u:7191: kaśyapaś ca mahātejās teṣām āsīc ca paścimaḥ // Ram_3,13.9
GE09ram_02_u:7192: prajāpates tu dakṣasya babhūvur iti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:7193: ṣaṣṭir duhitaro rāma yaśasvinyo mahāyaśaḥ // Ram_3,13.10
GE09ram_02_u:7195: aditiṃ ca ditiṃ caiva danum api ca kālakām // Ram_3,13.11
GE09ram_02_u:7196: tāmrāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva manuṃ cāpy analām api
GE09ram_02_u:7197: tās tu kanyās tataḥ prītaḥ kaśyapaḥ punar abravīt // Ram_3,13.12
GE09ram_02_u:7199: aditis tanmanā rāma ditiś ca danur eva ca // Ram_3,13.13
GE09ram_02_u:7200: kālakā ca mahābāho śeṣās tv amanaso 'bhavan
GE09ram_02_u:7201: adityāṃ jajñire devās trayastriṃśad ariṃdama // Ram_3,13.14
GE09ram_02_u:7202: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_02_u:7203: ditis tv ajanayat putrān daityāṃs tāta yaśasvinaḥ // Ram_3,13.15
GE09ram_02_u:7205: danus tv ajanayat putram aśvagrīvam ariṃdama // Ram_3,13.16
GE09ram_02_u:7207: krauñcīṃ bhāsīṃ tathā śyenīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrīṃ tathā śukīm // Ram_3,13.17
GE09ram_02_u:7209: ulūkāñ janayat krauñcī bhāsī bhāsān vyajāyata // Ram_3,13.18
GE09ram_02_u:7210: śyenī śyenāṃś ca gṛdhrāṃś ca vyajāyata sutejasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7211: dhṛtarāṣṭrī tu haṃsāṃś ca kalahaṃsāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ // Ram_3,13.19
GE09ram_02_u:7212: cakravākāṃś ca bhadraṃ te vijajñe sāpi bhāminī
GE09ram_02_u:7213: śukī natāṃ vijajñe tu natāyā vinatā sutā // Ram_3,13.20
GE09ram_02_u:7215: mṛgīṃ ca mṛgamandāṃ ca harīṃ bhadramadām api // Ram_3,13.21
GE09ram_02_u:7216: mātaṃgīm atha śārdūlīṃ śvetāṃ ca surabhīṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:7218: apatyaṃ tu mṛgāḥ sarve mṛgyā naravarottama
GE09ram_02_u:7219: ṛkṣāś ca mṛgamandāyāḥ sṛmarāś camarās tathā // Ram_3,13.23
GE09ram_02_u:7220: tatas tv irāvatīṃ nāma jajñe bhadramadā sutām
GE09ram_02_u:7221: tasyās tv airāvataḥ putro lokanātho mahāgajaḥ // Ram_3,13.24
GE09ram_02_u:7222: haryāś ca harayo 'patyaṃ vānarāś ca tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7223: golāṅgūlāṃś ca śārdūlī vyāghrāṃś cājanayat sutān // Ram_3,13.25
GE09ram_02_u:7224: mātaṃgyās tv atha mātaṃgā apatyaṃ manujarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:7225: diśāgajaṃ tu śvetākṣaṃ śvetā vyajanayat sutam // Ram_3,13.26
GE09ram_02_u:7226: tato duhitarau rāma surabhir devy ajāyata
GE09ram_02_u:7227: rohiṇīṃ nāma bhadraṃ te gandharvīṃ ca yaśasvinīm // Ram_3,13.27
GE09ram_02_u:7228: rohiṇy ajanayad gā vai gandharvī vājinaḥ sutān
GE09ram_02_u:7229: surasājanayan nāgān rāma kadrūś ca pannagān // Ram_3,13.28
GE09ram_02_u:7231: brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś ca manujarṣabha // Ram_3,13.29
GE09ram_02_u:7232: mukhato brāhmaṇā jātā urasaḥ kṣatriyās tathā
GE09ram_02_u:7233: ūrubhyāṃ jajñire vaiśyāḥ padbhyāṃ śūdrā iti śrutiḥ // Ram_3,13.30
GE09ram_02_u:7235: vinatā ca śukī pautrī kadrūś ca surasā svasā // Ram_3,13.31
GE09ram_02_u:7236: kadrūr nāgaṃ sahasraṃ tu vijajñe dharaṇīdharam
GE09ram_02_u:7237: dvau putrau vinatāyās tu garuḍo 'ruṇa eva ca // Ram_3,13.32
GE09ram_02_u:7238: tasmāj jāto 'ham aruṇāt sampātiś ca mamāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7239: jaṭāyur iti māṃ viddhi śyenīputram ariṃdama // Ram_3,13.33
GE09ram_02_u:7241: sītāṃ ca tāta rakṣiṣye tvayi yāte salakṣmaṇe // Ram_3,13.34
GE09ram_02_u:7242: jaṭāyuṣaṃ tu pratipūjya rāghavo mudā pariṣvajya ca saṃnato 'bhavat
GE09ram_02_u:7243: pitur hi śuśrāva sakhitvam ātmavāñ jaṭāyuṣā saṃkathitaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_3,13.35
GE09ram_02_u:7244: sa tatra sītāṃ paridāya maithilīṃ sahaiva tenātibalena pakṣiṇā
GE09ram_02_u:7245: jagāma tāṃ pañcavaṭīṃ salakṣmaṇo ripūn didhakṣañ śalabhān ivānalaḥ // Ram_3,13.36
GE09ram_02_u:7247: uvāca bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_3,14.1
GE09ram_02_u:7248: āgatāḥ sma yathoddiṣṭam amuṃ deśaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_02_u:7250: sarvataś cāryatāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kānane nipuṇo hy asi
GE09ram_02_u:7251: āśramaḥ katarasmin no deśe bhavati saṃmataḥ // Ram_3,14.3
GE09ram_02_u:7252: ramate yatra vaidehī tvam ahaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:7255: saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ ca yatra syāt samitpuṣpakuśodakam // Ram_3,14.5
GE09ram_02_u:7256: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7257: sītāsamakṣaṃ kākutstham idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,14.6
GE09ram_02_u:7258: paravān asmi kākutstha tvayi varṣaśataṃ sthite
GE09ram_02_u:7259: svayaṃ tu rucire deśe kriyatām iti māṃ vada // Ram_3,14.7
GE09ram_02_u:7262: sa taṃ ruciram ākramya deśam āśramakarmaṇi
GE09ram_02_u:7263: hastau gṛhītvā hastena rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt // Ram_3,14.9
GE09ram_02_u:7264: ayaṃ deśaḥ samaḥ śrīmān puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7265: ihāśramapadaṃ saumya yathāvat kartum arhasi // Ram_3,14.10
GE09ram_02_u:7267: adūre dṛśyate ramyā padminī padmaśobhitā // Ram_3,14.11
GE09ram_02_u:7269: iyaṃ godāvarī ramyā puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtā // Ram_3,14.12
GE09ram_02_u:7273: dṛśyante girayaḥ saumya phullais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ // Ram_3,14.14
GE09ram_02_u:7274: sauvarṇe rājatais tāmrair deśe deśe ca dhātubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7276: sālais tālais tamālaiś ca kharjūraiḥ panasāmrakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7277: nīvārais timiśaiś caiva puṃnāgaiś copaśobhitāḥ // Ram_3,14.16
GE09ram_02_u:7278: cūtair aśokais tilakaiś campakaiḥ ketakair api
GE09ram_02_u:7279: puṣpagulmalatopetais tais tais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ // Ram_3,14.17
GE09ram_02_u:7280: candanaiḥ syandanair nīpaiḥ panasair lakucair api
GE09ram_02_u:7282: idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ medhyam idaṃ bahumṛgadvijam
GE09ram_02_u:7283: iha vatsyāma saumitre sārdham etena pakṣiṇā // Ram_3,14.19
GE09ram_02_u:7284: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_02_u:7287: sustambhāṃ maskarair dīrghaiḥ kṛtavaṃśāṃ suśobhanām // Ram_3,14.21
GE09ram_02_u:7288: sa gatvā lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nadīṃ godāvarīṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:7289: snātvā padmāni cādāya saphalaḥ punar āgataḥ // Ram_3,14.22
GE09ram_02_u:7290: tataḥ puṣpabaliṃ kṛtvā śāntiṃ ca sa yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:7291: darśayāmāsa rāmāya tad āśramapadaṃ kṛtam // Ram_3,14.23
GE09ram_02_u:7292: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtaṃ saumyam āśramaṃ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:7293: rāghavaḥ parṇaśālāyāṃ harṣam āhārayat param // Ram_3,14.24
GE09ram_02_u:7295: atisnigdhaṃ ca gāḍhaṃ ca vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_3,14.25
GE09ram_02_u:7296: prīto 'smi te mahat karma tvayā kṛtam idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_02_u:7297: pradeyo yannimittaṃ te pariṣvaṅgo mayā kṛtaḥ // Ram_3,14.26
GE09ram_02_u:7299: tvayā putreṇa dharmātmā na saṃvṛttaḥ pitā mama // Ram_3,14.27
GE09ram_02_u:7300: evaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktvā tu rāghavo lakṣmivardhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7301: tasmin deśe bahuphale nyavasat sa sukhaṃ vaśī // Ram_3,14.28
GE09ram_02_u:7302: kaṃcit kālaṃ sa dharmātmā sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_02_u:7304: asatas tasya tu sukhaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7305: śaradvyapāye hemanta ṛtur iṣṭaḥ pravartate // Ram_3,15.1
GE09ram_02_u:7307: prayayāv abhiṣekārthaṃ ramyāṃ godāvarīṃ nadīm // Ram_3,15.2
GE09ram_02_u:7308: prahvaḥ kalaśahastas taṃ sītayā saha vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:7309: pṛṣṭhato 'nuvrajan bhrātā saumitrir idam abravīt // Ram_3,15.3
GE09ram_02_u:7310: ayaṃ sa kālaḥ samprāptaḥ priyo yas te priyaṃvada
GE09ram_02_u:7311: alaṃkṛta ivābhāti yena saṃvatsaraḥ śubhaḥ // Ram_3,15.4
GE09ram_02_u:7319: vihīnatilakeva strī nottarā dik prakāśate // Ram_3,15.8
GE09ram_02_u:7321: yathārthanāmā suvyaktaṃ himavān himavān giriḥ // Ram_3,15.9
GE09ram_02_u:7325: śūnyāraṇyā himadhvastā divasā bhānti sāmpratam // Ram_3,15.11
GE09ram_02_u:7327: śītā vṛddhatarāyāmās triyāmā yānti sāmpratam // Ram_3,15.12
GE09ram_02_u:7329: niḥśvāsāndha ivādarśaś candramā na prakāśate // Ram_3,15.13
GE09ram_02_u:7331: sīteva cātapaśyāmā lakṣyate na tu śobhate // Ram_3,15.14
GE09ram_02_u:7333: pravāti paścimo vāyuḥ kāle dviguṇaśītalaḥ // Ram_3,15.15
GE09ram_02_u:7339: dūram abhyuditaḥ sūryaḥ śaśāṅka iva lakṣyate // Ram_3,15.18
GE09ram_02_u:7341: saṃraktaḥ kiṃcid āpāṇḍur ātapaḥ śobhate kṣitau // Ram_3,15.19
GE09ram_02_u:7345: prasuptā iva lakṣyante vipuṣpā vanarājayaḥ // Ram_3,15.21
GE09ram_02_u:7347: himārdravālukais tīraiḥ sarito bhānti sāmpratam // Ram_3,15.22
GE09ram_02_u:7349: śaityād agāgrastham api prāyeṇa rasavaj jalam // Ram_3,15.23
GE09ram_02_u:7351: nālaśeṣā himadhvastā na bhānti kamalākarāḥ // Ram_3,15.24
GE09ram_02_u:7353: tapaś carati dharmātmā tvadbhaktyā bharataḥ pure // Ram_3,15.25
GE09ram_02_u:7354: tyaktvā rājyaṃ ca mānaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
GE09ram_02_u:7355: tapasvī niyatāhāraḥ śete śīte mahītale // Ram_3,15.26
GE09ram_02_u:7356: so 'pi velām imāṃ nūnam abhiṣekārtham udyataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7357: vṛtaḥ prakṛtibhir nityaṃ prayāti sarayūṃ nadīm // Ram_3,15.27
GE09ram_02_u:7359: kathaṃ tv apararātreṣu sarayūm avagāhate // Ram_3,15.28
GE09ram_02_u:7361: dharmajñaḥ satyavādī ca hrīniṣedho jitendriyaḥ // Ram_3,15.29
GE09ram_02_u:7363: saṃtyajya vividhān bhogān āryaṃ sarvātmanāśritaḥ // Ram_3,15.30
GE09ram_02_u:7364: jitaḥ svargas tava bhrātrā bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:7365: vanastham api tāpasye yas tvām anuvidhīyate // Ram_3,15.31
GE09ram_02_u:7366: na pitryam anuvartante mātṛkaṃ dvipadā iti
GE09ram_02_u:7368: bhartā daśaratho yasyāḥ sādhuś ca bharataḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7369: kathaṃ nu sāmbā kaikeyī tādṛśī krūradarśinī // Ram_3,15.33
GE09ram_02_u:7370: ity evaṃ lakṣmaṇe vākyaṃ snehād bruvati dhārmike
GE09ram_02_u:7371: parivādaṃ jananyās tam asahan rāghavo 'bravīt // Ram_3,15.34
GE09ram_02_u:7372: na te 'mbā madhyamā tāta garhitavyā kathaṃcana
GE09ram_02_u:7373: tām evekṣvākunāthasya bharatasya kathāṃ kuru // Ram_3,15.35
GE09ram_02_u:7374: niścitāpi hi me buddhir vanavāse dṛḍhavratā
GE09ram_02_u:7376: ity evaṃ vilapaṃs tatra prāpya godāvarīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:7377: cakre 'bhiṣekaṃ kākutsthaḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,15.37
GE09ram_02_u:7378: tarpayitvātha salilais te pitṝn daivatāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:7379: stuvanti smoditaṃ sūryaṃ devatāś ca samāhitāḥ // Ram_3,15.38
GE09ram_02_u:7380: kṛtābhiṣekaḥ sa rarāja rāmaḥ sītādvitīyaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena
GE09ram_02_u:7381: kṛtābhiṣekas tv agarājaputryā rudraḥ sanandī bhagavān iveśaḥ // Ram_3,15.39
GE09ram_02_u:7382: kṛtābhiṣeko rāmas tu sītā saumitrir eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:7383: tasmād godāvarītīrāt tato jagmuḥ svam āśramam // Ram_3,16.1
GE09ram_02_u:7385: kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ karma parṇaśālām upāgamat // Ram_3,16.2
GE09ram_02_u:7386: sa rāmaḥ parṇaśālāyām āsīnaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:7388: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cakāra vividhāḥ kathāḥ // Ram_3,16.3
GE09ram_02_u:7390: taṃ deśaṃ rākṣasī kācid ājagāma yadṛcchayā // Ram_3,16.4
GE09ram_02_u:7391: sā tu śūrpaṇakhā nāma daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7392: bhaginī rāmam āsādya dadarśa tridaśopamam // Ram_3,16.5
GE09ram_02_u:7400: taruṇaṃ dāruṇā vṛddhā dakṣiṇaṃ vāmabhāṣiṇī // Ram_3,16.9
GE09ram_02_u:7404: āgatas tvam imaṃ deśaṃ kathaṃ rākṣasasevitam // Ram_3,16.11
GE09ram_02_u:7405: evam uktas tu rākṣasyā śūrpaṇakhyā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7408: tasyāham agrajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ // Ram_3,16.13
GE09ram_02_u:7409: bhrātāyaṃ lakṣmaṇo nāma yavīyān mām anuvrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7410: iyaṃ bhāryā ca vaidehī mama sīteti viśrutā // Ram_3,16.14
GE09ram_02_u:7411: niyogāt tu narendrasya pitur mātuś ca yantritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7412: dharmārthaṃ dharmakāṅkṣī ca vanaṃ vastum ihāgataḥ // Ram_3,16.15
GE09ram_02_u:7413: tvāṃ tu veditum icchāmi kathyatāṃ kāsi kasya vā
GE09ram_02_u:7414: iha vā kiṃnimittaṃ tvam āgatā brūhi tattvataḥ // Ram_3,16.16
GE09ram_02_u:7416: śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi tattvārthaṃ vacanaṃ mama // Ram_3,16.17
GE09ram_02_u:7419: rāvaṇo nāma me bhrātā rākṣaso rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7420: pravṛddhanidraś ca sadā kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,16.19
GE09ram_02_u:7421: vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā na tu rākṣasaceṣṭitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7422: prakhyātavīryau ca raṇe bhrātarau kharadūṣaṇau // Ram_3,16.20
GE09ram_02_u:7423: tān ahaṃ samatikrāntā rāma tvā pūrvadarśanāt
GE09ram_02_u:7425: cirāya bhava bhartā me sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi // Ram_3,16.21
GE09ram_02_u:7426: vikṛtā ca virūpā ca na seyaṃ sadṛśī tava
GE09ram_02_u:7427: aham evānurūpā te bhāryā rūpeṇa paśya mām // Ram_3,16.22
GE09ram_02_u:7429: anena saha te bhrātrā bhakṣayiṣyāmi mānuṣīm // Ram_3,16.23
GE09ram_02_u:7431: paśyan saha mayā kānta daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi // Ram_3,16.24
GE09ram_02_u:7432: ity evam uktaḥ kākutsthaḥ prahasya madirekṣaṇām
GE09ram_02_u:7433: idaṃ vacanam ārebhe vaktuṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ // Ram_3,16.25
GE09ram_02_u:7435: svacchayā ślakṣṇayā vācā smitapūrvam athābravīt // Ram_3,17.1
GE09ram_02_u:7437: tvadvidhānāṃ tu nārīṇāṃ suduḥkhā sasapatnatā // Ram_3,17.2
GE09ram_02_u:7438: anujas tv eṣa me bhrātā śīlavān priyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7439: śrīmān akṛtadāraś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān // Ram_3,17.3
GE09ram_02_u:7441: anurūpaś ca te bhartā rūpasyāsya bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,17.4
GE09ram_02_u:7442: enaṃ bhaja viśālākṣi bhartāraṃ bhrātaraṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:7443: asapatnā varārohe merum arkaprabhā yathā // Ram_3,17.5
GE09ram_02_u:7444: iti rāmeṇa sā proktā rākṣasī kāmamohitā
GE09ram_02_u:7445: visṛjya rāmaṃ sahasā tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,17.6
GE09ram_02_u:7446: asya rūpasya te yuktā bhāryāhaṃ varavarṇinī
GE09ram_02_u:7447: mayā saha sukhaṃ sarvān daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi // Ram_3,17.7
GE09ram_02_u:7448: evam uktas tu saumitrī rākṣasyā vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7449: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhīṃ smitvā lakṣmaṇo yuktam abravīt // Ram_3,17.8
GE09ram_02_u:7450: kathaṃ dāsasya me dāsī bhāryā bhavitum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:7451: so 'ham āryeṇa paravān bhrātrā kamalavarṇini // Ram_3,17.9
GE09ram_02_u:7453: āryasya tvaṃ viśālākṣi bhāryā bhava yavīyasī // Ram_3,17.10
GE09ram_02_u:7455: bhāryāṃ vṛddhāṃ parityajya tvām evaiṣa bhajiṣyati // Ram_3,17.11
GE09ram_02_u:7456: ko hi rūpam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ saṃtyajya varavarṇini
GE09ram_02_u:7457: mānuṣeṣu varārohe kuryād bhāvaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // Ram_3,17.12
GE09ram_02_u:7459: manyate tad vacaḥ satyaṃ parihāsāvicakṣaṇā // Ram_3,17.13
GE09ram_02_u:7461: sītayā saha durdharṣam abravīt kāmamohitā // Ram_3,17.14
GE09ram_02_u:7463: vṛddhāṃ bhāryām avaṣṭabhya na māṃ tvaṃ bahu manyase // Ram_3,17.15
GE09ram_02_u:7465: tvayā saha cariṣyāmi niḥsapatnā yathāsukham // Ram_3,17.16
GE09ram_02_u:7467: abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddhā maholkā rohiṇīm iva // Ram_3,17.17
GE09ram_02_u:7469: nigṛhya rāmaḥ kupitas tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,17.18
GE09ram_02_u:7471: na kāryaḥ paśya vaidehīṃ kathaṃcit saumya jīvatīm // Ram_3,17.19
GE09ram_02_u:7474: ity ukto lakṣmaṇas tasyāḥ kruddho rāmasya paśyataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7475: uddhṛtya khaḍgaṃ cicheda karṇanāsaṃ mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,17.21
GE09ram_02_u:7476: nikṛttakarṇanāsā tu visvaraṃ sā vinadya ca
GE09ram_02_u:7477: yathāgataṃ pradudrāva ghorā śūrpaṇakhā vanam // Ram_3,17.22
GE09ram_02_u:7479: nanāda vividhān nādān yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ // Ram_3,17.23
GE09ram_02_u:7481: pragṛhya bāhū garjantī praviveśa mahāvanam // Ram_3,17.24
GE09ram_02_u:7482: tatas tu sā rākṣasasaṃghasaṃvṛtaṃ kharaṃ janasthānagataṃ virūpitā
GE09ram_02_u:7483: upetya taṃ bhrātaram ugratejasaṃ papāta bhūmau gaganād yathāśaniḥ // Ram_3,17.25
GE09ram_02_u:7484: tataḥ sabhāryaṃ bhayamohamūrchitā salakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavam āgataṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:7485: virūpaṇaṃ cātmani śoṇitokṣitā śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā // Ram_3,17.26
GE09ram_02_u:7486: tāṃ tathā patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā virūpāṃ śoṇitokṣitām
GE09ram_02_u:7487: bhaginīṃ krodhasaṃtaptaḥ kharaḥ papraccha rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,18.1
GE09ram_02_u:7489: imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ kenāntakasamā gatā // Ram_3,18.2
GE09ram_02_u:7491: ko 'yam evaṃ mahāvīryas tvāṃ virūpāṃ cakāra ha // Ram_3,18.3
GE09ram_02_u:7492: na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ loke yaḥ kuryān mama vipriyam
GE09ram_02_u:7495: salile kṣīram āsaktaṃ niṣpibann iva sārasaḥ // Ram_3,18.5
GE09ram_02_u:7497: saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktaṃ medinī kasya pāsyati // Ram_3,18.6
GE09ram_02_u:7498: kasya pattrarathāḥ kāyān māṃsam utkṛtya saṃgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7499: prahṛṣṭā bhakṣayiṣyanti nihatasya mayā raṇe // Ram_3,18.7
GE09ram_02_u:7500: taṃ na devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7501: mayāpakṛṣṭaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ śaktās trātuṃ mahāhave // Ram_3,18.8
GE09ram_02_u:7502: upalabhya śanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ taṃ me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:7503: yena tvaṃ durvinītena vane vikramya nirjitā // Ram_3,18.9
GE09ram_02_u:7504: iti bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhasya ca viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7505: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ sabāṣpam idam abravīt // Ram_3,18.10
GE09ram_02_u:7509: devau vā mānuṣau vā tau na tarkayitum utsahe // Ram_3,18.12
GE09ram_02_u:7511: dṛṣṭā tatra mayā nārī tayor madhye sumadhyamā // Ram_3,18.13
GE09ram_02_u:7512: tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ sambhūya pramadām adhikṛtya tām
GE09ram_02_u:7513: imām avasthāṃ nītāhaṃ yathānāthāsatī tathā // Ram_3,18.14
GE09ram_02_u:7514: tasyāś cānṛjuvṛttāyās tayoś ca hatayor aham
GE09ram_02_u:7515: saphenaṃ pātum icchāmi rudhiraṃ raṇamūrdhani // Ram_3,18.15
GE09ram_02_u:7516: eṣa me prathamaḥ kāmaḥ kṛtas tāta tvayā bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:7517: tasyās tayoś ca rudhiraṃ pibeyam aham āhave // Ram_3,18.16
GE09ram_02_u:7519: vyādideśa kharaḥ kruddho rākṣasān antakopamān // Ram_3,18.17
GE09ram_02_u:7521: praviṣṭau daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ ghoraṃ pramadayā saha // Ram_3,18.18
GE09ram_02_u:7522: tau hatvā tāṃ ca durvṛttām upāvartitum arhatha
GE09ram_02_u:7523: iyaṃ ca rudhiraṃ teṣāṃ bhaginī mama pāsyati // Ram_3,18.19
GE09ram_02_u:7525: śīghraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ gatvā tau pramathya svatejasā // Ram_3,18.20
GE09ram_02_u:7527: tatra jagmus tayā sārdhaṃ ghanā vāteritā yathā // Ram_3,18.21
GE09ram_02_u:7529: rakṣasām ācacakṣe tau bhrātarau saha sītayā // Ram_3,19.1
GE09ram_02_u:7531: dadṛśuḥ sītayā sārdhaṃ vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // Ram_3,19.2
GE09ram_02_u:7532: tān dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmān āgatāṃ tāṃ ca rākṣasīm
GE09ram_02_u:7533: abravīd bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_3,19.3
GE09ram_02_u:7535: imān asyā vadhiṣyāmi padavīm āgatān iha // Ram_3,19.4
GE09ram_02_u:7536: vākyam etat tataḥ śrutvā rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7537: tatheti lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ rāmasya pratyapūjayat // Ram_3,19.5
GE09ram_02_u:7539: cakāra sajyaṃ dharmātmā tāni rakṣāṃsi cābravīt // Ram_3,19.6
GE09ram_02_u:7541: praviṣṭau sītayā sārdhaṃ duścaraṃ daṇḍakāvanam // Ram_3,19.7
GE09ram_02_u:7545: ṛṣīṇāṃ tu niyogena prāpto 'haṃ saśarāsanaḥ // Ram_3,19.9
GE09ram_02_u:7547: yadi prāṇair ihārtho vo nivartadhvaṃ niśācarāḥ // Ram_3,19.10
GE09ram_02_u:7548: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_02_u:7549: ūcur vācaṃ susaṃkruddhā brahmaghnāḥ śūlapāṇayaḥ // Ram_3,19.11
GE09ram_02_u:7552: krodham utpādya no bhartuḥ kharasya sumahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7553: tvam eva hāsyase prāṇān adyāsmābhir hato yudhi // Ram_3,19.13
GE09ram_02_u:7554: kā hi te śaktir ekasya bahūnāṃ raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_02_u:7555: asmākam agrataḥ sthātuṃ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave // Ram_3,19.14
GE09ram_02_u:7557: prāṇāṃs tyakṣyasi vīryaṃ ca dhanuś ca karapīḍitam // Ram_3,19.15
GE09ram_02_u:7558: ity evam uktvā saṃrabdhā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_02_u:7560: cikṣipus tāni śūlāni rāghavaṃ prati durjayam // Ram_3,19.16
GE09ram_02_u:7562: tāvadbhir eva cicheda śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ // Ram_3,19.17
GE09ram_02_u:7565: gṛhītvā dhanur āyamya lakṣyān uddiśya rākṣasān
GE09ram_02_u:7566: mumoca rāghavo bāṇān vajrān iva śatakratuḥ // Ram_3,19.19
GE09ram_02_u:7569: te bhittvā rakṣasāṃ vegād vakṣāṃsi rudhirāplutāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7571: te bhinnahṛdayā bhūmau chinnamūlā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7573: tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā
GE09ram_02_u:7574: paritrastā punas tatra vyasṛjad bhairavaṃ ravam // Ram_3,19.23
GE09ram_02_u:7575: sā nadantī mahānādaṃ javāc chūrpaṇakhā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7576: upagamya kharaṃ sā tu kiṃcit saṃśuṣkaśoṇitā
GE09ram_02_u:7577: papāta punar evārtā saniryāseva vallarī // Ram_3,19.24
GE09ram_02_u:7578: nipātitān prekṣya raṇe tu rākṣasān pradhāvitā śūrpaṇakhā punas tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7579: vadhaṃ ca teṣāṃ nikhilena rakṣasāṃ śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā // Ram_3,19.25
GE09ram_02_u:7580: sa punaḥ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāc chūrpaṇakhāṃ kharaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7581: uvāca vyaktayā vācā tām anarthārtham āgatām // Ram_3,20.1
GE09ram_02_u:7582: mayā tv idānīṃ śūrās te rākṣasā rudhirāśanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7583: tvatpriyārthaṃ vinirdiṣṭāḥ kimarthaṃ rudyate punaḥ // Ram_3,20.2
GE09ram_02_u:7584: bhaktāś caivānuraktāś ca hitāś ca mama nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7585: ghnanto 'pi na nihantavyā na na kuryur vaco mama // Ram_3,20.3
GE09ram_02_u:7586: kim etac chrotum icchāmi kāraṇaṃ yatkṛte punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7587: hā nātheti vinardantī sarpavad veṣṭase kṣitau // Ram_3,20.4
GE09ram_02_u:7588: anāthavad vilapasi kiṃ nu nāthe mayi sthite
GE09ram_02_u:7589: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha mā bhaiṣīr vaiklavyaṃ tyajyatām iha // Ram_3,20.5
GE09ram_02_u:7590: ity evam uktā durdharṣā khareṇa parisāntvitā
GE09ram_02_u:7591: vimṛjya nayane sāsre kharaṃ bhrātaram abravīt // Ram_3,20.6
GE09ram_02_u:7592: preṣitāś ca tvayā śūrā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_02_u:7593: nihantuṃ rāghavaṃ ghorā matpriyārthaṃ salakṣmaṇam // Ram_3,20.7
GE09ram_02_u:7595: samare nihatāḥ sarve sāyakair marmabhedibhiḥ // Ram_3,20.8
GE09ram_02_u:7596: tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇenaiva mahābalān
GE09ram_02_u:7597: rāmasya ca mahat karma mahāṃs trāso 'bhavan mama // Ram_3,20.9
GE09ram_02_u:7598: sāsmi bhītā samudvignā viṣaṇṇā ca niśācara
GE09ram_02_u:7599: śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ punaḥ prāptā sarvato bhayadarśinī // Ram_3,20.10
GE09ram_02_u:7601: kiṃ māṃ na trāyase magnāṃ vipule śokasāgare // Ram_3,20.11
GE09ram_02_u:7602: ete ca nihatā bhūmau rāmeṇa niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7603: ye ca me padavīṃ prāptā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ // Ram_3,20.12
GE09ram_02_u:7604: mayi te yady anukrośo yadi rakṣaḥsu teṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:7605: rāmeṇa yadi śaktis te tejo vāsti niśācara
GE09ram_02_u:7607: yadi rāmaṃ mamāmitram adya tvaṃ na vadhiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:7608: tava caivāgrataḥ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi nirapatrapā // Ram_3,20.14
GE09ram_02_u:7609: buddhyāham anupaśyāmi na tvaṃ rāmasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_02_u:7610: sthātuṃ pratimukhe śaktaḥ sacāpasya mahāraṇe // Ram_3,20.15
GE09ram_02_u:7612: mānuṣau yan na śaknoṣi hantuṃ tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_3,20.16
GE09ram_02_u:7614: niḥsattvasyālpavīryasya vāsas te kīdṛśas tv iha // Ram_3,20.17
GE09ram_02_u:7617: bhrātā cāsya mahāvīryo yena cāsmi virūpitā // Ram_3,20.18
GE09ram_02_u:7618: evam ādharṣitaḥ śūraḥ śūrpaṇakhyā kharas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:7619: uvāca rakṣasāṃ madhye kharaḥ kharataraṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,21.1
GE09ram_02_u:7621: na śakyate dhārayituṃ lavaṇāmbha ivotthitam // Ram_3,21.2
GE09ram_02_u:7622: na rāmaṃ gaṇaye vīryān mānuṣaṃ kṣīṇajīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:7623: ātmā duścaritaiḥ prāṇān hato yo 'dya vimokṣyati // Ram_3,21.3
GE09ram_02_u:7624: bāṣpaḥ saṃhriyatām eṣa sambhramaś ca vimucyatām
GE09ram_02_u:7625: ahaṃ rāmaṃ saha bhrātrā nayāmi yamasādanam // Ram_3,21.4
GE09ram_02_u:7627: rāmasya rudhiraṃ raktam uṣṇaṃ pāsyasi rākṣasi // Ram_3,21.5
GE09ram_02_u:7628: sā prahṛṣṭā vacaḥ śrutvā kharasya vadanāc cyutam
GE09ram_02_u:7629: praśaśaṃsa punar maurkhyād bhrātaraṃ rakṣasāṃ varam // Ram_3,21.6
GE09ram_02_u:7630: tayā paruṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ punar eva praśaṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7631: abravīd dūṣaṇaṃ nāma kharaḥ senāpatiṃ tadā // Ram_3,21.7
GE09ram_02_u:7637: sarvodyogam udīrṇānāṃ rakṣasāṃ saumya kāraya // Ram_3,21.10
GE09ram_02_u:7638: upasthāpaya me kṣipraṃ rathaṃ saumya dhanūṃṣi ca
GE09ram_02_u:7639: śarāṃś ca citrān khaḍgāṃś ca śaktīś ca vividhāḥ śitāḥ // Ram_3,21.11
GE09ram_02_u:7643: sadaśvaiḥ śabalair yuktam ācacakṣe 'tha dūṣaṇaḥ // Ram_3,21.13
GE09ram_02_u:7646: matsyaiḥ puṣpair drumaiḥ śailaiś candrasūryaiś ca kāñcanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7647: māṅgalyaiḥ pakṣisaṃghaiś ca tārābhiś ca samāvṛtam // Ram_3,21.15
GE09ram_02_u:7649: sadaśvayuktaṃ so 'marṣād āruroha rathaṃ kharaḥ // Ram_3,21.16
GE09ram_02_u:7651: tasthuḥ saṃparivāryainaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // Ram_3,21.17
GE09ram_02_u:7653: niryātety abravīd dṛṣṭvā rathasthaḥ sarvarākṣasān // Ram_3,21.18
GE09ram_02_u:7656: mudgaraiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7657: khaḍgaiś cakraiś ca hastasthair bhrājamānaiś ca tomaraiḥ // Ram_3,21.20
GE09ram_02_u:7658: śaktibhiḥ parighair ghorair atimātraiś ca kārmukaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7662: tāṃs tv abhidravato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasān bhīmavikramān
GE09ram_02_u:7663: kharasyāpi rathaḥ kiṃcij jagāma tadanantaram // Ram_3,21.23
GE09ram_02_u:7665: kharasya matam ājñāya sārathiḥ samacodayat // Ram_3,21.24
GE09ram_02_u:7666: sa codito rathaḥ śīghraṃ kharasya ripughātinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7667: śabdenāpūrayām āsa diśaḥ pratidiśas tathā // Ram_3,21.25
GE09ram_02_u:7668: pravṛddhamanyus tu kharaḥ kharasvano ripor vadhārthaṃ tvarito yathāntakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7669: acūcudat sārathim unnadan punar mahābalo megha ivāśmavarṣavān // Ram_3,21.26
GE09ram_02_u:7670: tat prayātaṃ balaṃ ghoram aśivaṃ śoṇitodakam
GE09ram_02_u:7673: same puṣpacite deśe rājamārge yadṛcchayā // Ram_3,22.2
GE09ram_02_u:7677: samākramya mahākāyas tasthau gṛdhraḥ sudāruṇaḥ // Ram_3,22.4
GE09ram_02_u:7679: visvarān vividhāṃś cakrur māṃsādā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // Ram_3,22.5
GE09ram_02_u:7680: vyājahruś ca pradīptāyāṃ diśi vai bhairavasvanam
GE09ram_02_u:7681: aśivaṃ yātudhānānāṃ śivā ghorā mahāsvanāḥ // Ram_3,22.6
GE09ram_02_u:7683: ākāśaṃ tad anākāśaṃ cakrur bhīmā balāhakāḥ // Ram_3,22.7
GE09ram_02_u:7685: diśo vā vidiśo vāpi suvyaktaṃ na cakāśire // Ram_3,22.8
GE09ram_02_u:7687: kharasyābhimukhaṃ nedus tadā ghorā mṛgāḥ khagāḥ // Ram_3,22.9
GE09ram_02_u:7691: jagrāha sūryaṃ svarbhānur aparvaṇi mahāgrahaḥ // Ram_3,22.11
GE09ram_02_u:7693: utpetuś ca vinā rātriṃ tārāḥ khadyotasaprabhāḥ // Ram_3,22.12
GE09ram_02_u:7695: tasmin kṣaṇe babhūvuś ca vinā puṣpaphalair drumāḥ // Ram_3,22.13
GE09ram_02_u:7696: uddhūtaś ca vinā vātaṃ reṇur jaladharāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7697: vīcīkūcīti vāśyanto babhūvus tatra sārikāḥ // Ram_3,22.14
GE09ram_02_u:7701: prākampata bhujaḥ savyaḥ kharaś cāsyāvasajjata // Ram_3,22.16
GE09ram_02_u:7703: lalāṭe ca rujā jātā na ca mohān nyavartata // Ram_3,22.17
GE09ram_02_u:7705: abravīd rākṣasān sarvān prahasan sa kharas tadā // Ram_3,22.18
GE09ram_02_u:7707: na cintayāmy ahaṃ vīryād balavān durbalān iva // Ram_3,22.19
GE09ram_02_u:7708: tārā api śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ pātayeyaṃ nabhastalāt
GE09ram_02_u:7709: mṛtyuṃ maraṇadharmeṇa saṃkruddho yojayāmy aham // Ram_3,22.20
GE09ram_02_u:7710: rāghavaṃ taṃ balotsiktaṃ bhrātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:7711: ahatvā sāyakais tīkṣṇair nopāvartitum utsahe // Ram_3,22.21
GE09ram_02_u:7712: sakāmā bhaginī me 'stu pītvā tu rudhiraṃ tayoḥ
