GE09ram_02_u:7713: yannimittaṃ tu rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya viparyayaḥ // Ram_3,22.22
GE09ram_02_u:7714: na kvacit prāptapūrvo me saṃyugeṣu parājayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7715: yuṣmākam etat pratyakṣaṃ nānṛtaṃ kathayāmy aham // Ram_3,22.23
GE09ram_02_u:7717: vajrahastaṃ raṇe hanyāṃ kiṃ punas tau ca mānuṣau // Ram_3,22.24
GE09ram_02_u:7718: sā tasya garjitaṃ śrutvā rākṣasasya mahācamūḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7721: ṛṣayo devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ // Ram_3,22.26
GE09ram_02_u:7723: svasti gobrāhmaṇebhyo 'stu lokānāṃ ye ca saṃmatāḥ // Ram_3,22.27
GE09ram_02_u:7725: cakrahasto yathā yuddhe sarvān asurapuṃgavān // Ram_3,22.28
GE09ram_02_u:7726: etac cānyac ca bahuśo bruvāṇāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7727: dadṛśur vāhinīṃ teṣāṃ rākṣasānāṃ gatāyuṣām // Ram_3,22.29
GE09ram_02_u:7728: rathena tu kharo vegāt sainyasyāgrād viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7729: taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ bhūyo rākṣasāś ca viniḥsṛtāḥ // Ram_3,22.30
GE09ram_02_u:7733: dvādaśaite mahāvīryāḥ pratasthur abhitaḥ kharam // Ram_3,22.32
GE09ram_02_u:7735: catvāra ete senāgryā dūṣaṇaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nvayuḥ // Ram_3,22.33
GE09ram_02_u:7737: tau rājaputrau sahasābhyupetā mālā grahāṇām iva candrasūryau // Ram_3,22.34
GE09ram_02_u:7739: tān evautpātikān rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā dadarśa ha // Ram_3,23.1
GE09ram_02_u:7741: prajānām ahitān dṛṣṭvā vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,23.2
GE09ram_02_u:7745: vyomni meghā vivartante paruṣā gardabhāruṇāḥ // Ram_3,23.4
GE09ram_02_u:7746: sadhūmāś ca śarāḥ sarve mama yuddhābhinandinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7747: rukmapṛṣṭhāni cāpāni viveṣṭante ca lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,23.5
GE09ram_02_u:7749: agrato no bhayaṃ prāptaṃ saṃśayo jīvitasya ca // Ram_3,23.6
GE09ram_02_u:7750: samprahāras tu sumahān bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7751: ayam ākhyāti me bāhuḥ sphuramāṇo muhur muhuḥ // Ram_3,23.7
GE09ram_02_u:7752: saṃnikarṣe tu naḥ śūra jayaṃ śatroḥ parājayam
GE09ram_02_u:7753: suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca tava vaktraṃ hi lakṣyate // Ram_3,23.8
GE09ram_02_u:7754: udyatānāṃ hi yuddhārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7755: niṣprabhaṃ vadanaṃ teṣāṃ bhavaty āyuḥparikṣayaḥ // Ram_3,23.9
GE09ram_02_u:7759: guhām āśraya śailasya durgāṃ pādapasaṃkulām // Ram_3,23.11
GE09ram_02_u:7760: pratikūlitum icchāmi na hi vākyam idaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:7761: śāpito mama pādābhyāṃ gamyatāṃ vatsa māciram // Ram_3,23.12
GE09ram_02_u:7762: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:7763: śarān ādāya cāpaṃ ca guhāṃ durgāṃ samāśrayat // Ram_3,23.13
GE09ram_02_u:7764: tasmin praviṣṭe tu guhāṃ lakṣmaṇe saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:7765: hanta niryuktam ity uktvā rāmaḥ kavacam āviśat // Ram_3,23.14
GE09ram_02_u:7767: babhūva rāmas timire vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ // Ram_3,23.15
GE09ram_02_u:7768: sa cāpam udyamya mahac charān ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:7769: babhūvāvasthitas tatra jyāsvanaiḥ pūrayan diśaḥ // Ram_3,23.16
GE09ram_02_u:7770: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7771: ūcuḥ paramasaṃtrastā guhyakāś ca parasparam // Ram_3,23.17
GE09ram_02_u:7773: ekaś ca rāmo dharmātmā kathaṃ yuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,23.18
GE09ram_02_u:7777: cāpāni visphārayatāṃ jṛmbhatāṃ cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ // Ram_3,23.20
GE09ram_02_u:7779: teṣāṃ sutumulaḥ śabdaḥ pūrayāmāsa tad vanam // Ram_3,23.21
GE09ram_02_u:7781: dudruvur yatra niḥśabdaṃ pṛṣṭhato nāvalokayan // Ram_3,23.22
GE09ram_02_u:7782: tat tv anīkaṃ mahāvegaṃ rāmaṃ samupasarpata
GE09ram_02_u:7785: dadarśa kharasainyaṃ tad yuddhābhimukham udyatam // Ram_3,23.24
GE09ram_02_u:7786: vitatya ca dhanur bhīmaṃ tūṇyāś coddhṛtya sāyakān
GE09ram_02_u:7787: krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām // Ram_3,23.25
GE09ram_02_u:7788: duṣprekṣyaḥ so 'bhavat kruddho yugāntāgnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_02_u:7789: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tejasāviṣṭaṃ prāvyathan vanadevatāḥ // Ram_3,23.26
GE09ram_02_u:7790: tasya kruddhasya rūpaṃ tu rāmasya dadṛśe tadā
GE09ram_02_u:7791: dakṣasyeva kratuṃ hantum udyatasya pinākinaḥ // Ram_3,23.27
GE09ram_02_u:7793: dadarśāśramam āgamya kharaḥ saha puraḥsaraiḥ // Ram_3,24.1
GE09ram_02_u:7794: taṃ dṛṣṭvā saguṇaṃ cāpam udyamya kharaniḥsvanam
GE09ram_02_u:7795: rāmasyābhimukhaṃ sūtaṃ codyatām ity acodayat // Ram_3,24.2
GE09ram_02_u:7797: yatra rāmo mahābāhur eko dhunvan dhanuḥ sthitaḥ // Ram_3,24.3
GE09ram_02_u:7798: taṃ tu niṣpatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7800: sa teṣāṃ yātudhānānāṃ madhye rato gataḥ kharaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7801: babhūva madhye tārāṇāṃ lohitāṅga ivoditaḥ // Ram_3,24.5
GE09ram_02_u:7802: tatas taṃ bhīmadhanvānaṃ kruddhāḥ sarve niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7803: rāmaṃ nānāvidhaiḥ śastrair abhyavarṣanta durjayam // Ram_3,24.6
GE09ram_02_u:7804: mudgarair āyasaiḥ śūlaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7805: rākṣasāḥ samare rāmaṃ nijaghnū roṣatatparāḥ // Ram_3,24.7
GE09ram_02_u:7807: abhyadhāvanta kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ yuddhe jighāṃsavaḥ // Ram_3,24.8
GE09ram_02_u:7808: te rāme śaravarṣāṇi vyasṛjan rakṣasāṃ guṇāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7809: śailendram iva dhārābhir varṣamāṇā balāhakāḥ // Ram_3,24.9
GE09ram_02_u:7810: sa taiḥ parivṛto ghorai rāghavo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7811: tithiṣv iva mahādevo vṛtaḥ pāriṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ // Ram_3,24.10
GE09ram_02_u:7812: tāni muktāni śastrāṇi yātudhānaiḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7813: pratijagrāha viśikhair nadyoghān iva sāgaraḥ // Ram_3,24.11
GE09ram_02_u:7814: sa taiḥ praharaṇair ghorair bhinnagātro na vivyathe
GE09ram_02_u:7815: rāmaḥ pradīptair bahubhir vajrair iva mahācalaḥ // Ram_3,24.12
GE09ram_02_u:7817: babhūva rāmaḥ saṃdhyābhrair divākara ivāvṛtaḥ // Ram_3,24.13
GE09ram_02_u:7819: ekaṃ sahasrair bahubhis tadā dṛṣṭvā samāvṛtam // Ram_3,24.14
GE09ram_02_u:7821: sasarja niśitān bāṇāñ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // Ram_3,24.15
GE09ram_02_u:7823: mumoca līlayā rāmaḥ kaṅkapattrān ajihmagān // Ram_3,24.16
GE09ram_02_u:7824: te śarāḥ śatrusainyeṣu muktā rāmeṇa līlayā
GE09ram_02_u:7825: ādadū rakṣasāṃ prāṇān pāśāḥ kālakṛtā iva // Ram_3,24.17
GE09ram_02_u:7826: bhittvā rākṣasadehāṃs tāṃs te śarā rudhirāplutāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7830: tair dhanūṃṣi dhvajāgrāṇi varmāṇi ca śirāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:7833: bhīmam ārtasvaraṃ cakrur bhidyamānā niśācarāḥ // Ram_3,24.21
GE09ram_02_u:7834: tat sainyaṃ niśitair bāṇair arditaṃ marmabhedibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7835: rāmeṇa na sukhaṃ lebhe śuṣkaṃ vanam ivāgninā // Ram_3,24.22
GE09ram_02_u:7836: kecid bhīmabalāḥ śūrāḥ śūlān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
GE09ram_02_u:7838: tāni bāṇair mahābāhuḥ śastrāṇy āvārya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7839: jahāra samare prāṇāṃś cicheda ca śirodharān // Ram_3,24.24
GE09ram_02_u:7840: avaśiṣṭāś ca ye tatra viṣaṇṇāś ca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7842: tān sarvān punar ādāya samāśvāsya ca dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7843: abhyadhāvata kākutsthaṃ kruddho rudram ivāntakaḥ // Ram_3,24.26
GE09ram_02_u:7847: rāmasyāsya mahāghoraṃ punas teṣāṃ ca rakṣasām // Ram_3,24.28
GE09ram_02_u:7848: tad drumāṇāṃ śilānāṃ ca varṣaṃ prāṇaharaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:7850: pratigṛhya ca tad varaṃ nimīlita ivarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7851: rāmaḥ krodhaṃ paraṃ bheje vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām // Ram_3,25.2
GE09ram_02_u:7853: śarair abhyakirat sainyaṃ sarvataḥ sahadūṣaṇam // Ram_3,25.3
GE09ram_02_u:7857: āyasaiḥ śaṅkubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ kīrṇaṃ paravasokṣitam // Ram_3,25.5
GE09ram_02_u:7862: dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ cicheda sahastābharaṇau bhujau // Ram_3,25.7
GE09ram_02_u:7865: sa karābhyāṃ vikīrṇābhyāṃ papāta bhuvi dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7867: dṛṣṭvā taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau dūṣaṇaṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_02_u:7868: sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ sarvabhūtāny apūjayan // Ram_3,25.10
GE09ram_02_u:7871: mahākapālaḥ sthūlākṣaḥ pramāthī ca mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,25.11
GE09ram_02_u:7873: sthūlākṣaḥ paṭṭiśaṃ gṛhya pramāthī ca paraśvadham // Ram_3,25.12
GE09ram_02_u:7874: dṛṣṭvaivāpatatas tāṃs tu rāghavaḥ sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7875: tīkṣṇāgraiḥ pratijagrāha samprāptān atithīn iva // Ram_3,25.13
GE09ram_02_u:7877: asaṃkhyeyais tu bāṇaughaiḥ pramamātha pramāthinam // Ram_3,25.14
GE09ram_02_u:7879: sa papāta hato bhūmau viṭapīva mahādrumaḥ // Ram_3,25.15
GE09ram_02_u:7881: jaghanaśeṣaṃ tejasvī tasya sainyasya sāyakaiḥ // Ram_3,25.16
GE09ram_02_u:7882: te rukmapuṅkhā viśikhāḥ sadhūmā iva pāvakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7883: nijaghnus tāni rakṣāṃsi vajrā iva mahādrumān // Ram_3,25.17
GE09ram_02_u:7884: rakṣasāṃ tu śataṃ rāmaḥ śatenaikena karṇinā
GE09ram_02_u:7885: sahasraṃ ca sahasreṇa jaghāna raṇamūrdhani // Ram_3,25.18
GE09ram_02_u:7889: āstīrṇā vasudhā kṛtsnā mahāvediḥ kuśair iva // Ram_3,25.20
GE09ram_02_u:7893: hatāny ekena rāmeṇa mānuṣeṇa padātinā // Ram_3,25.22
GE09ram_02_u:7894: tasya sainyasya sarvasya kharaḥ śeṣo mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7895: rākṣasas triśirāś caiva rāmaś ca ripusūdanaḥ // Ram_3,25.23
GE09ram_02_u:7896: tatas tu tad bhīmabalaṃ mahāhave samīkṣya rāmeṇa hataṃ balīyasā
GE09ram_02_u:7897: rathena rāmaṃ mahatā kharas tataḥ samāsasādendra ivodyatāśaniḥ // Ram_3,25.24
GE09ram_02_u:7899: rākṣasas triśirā nāma saṃnipatyedam abravīt // Ram_3,26.1
GE09ram_02_u:7901: paśya rāmaṃ mahābāhuṃ saṃyuge vinipātitam // Ram_3,26.2
GE09ram_02_u:7902: pratijānāmi te satyam āyudhaṃ cāham ālabhe
GE09ram_02_u:7903: yathā rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmi vadhārhaṃ sarvarakṣasām // Ram_3,26.3
GE09ram_02_u:7904: ahaṃ vāsya raṇe mṛtyur eṣa vā samare mama
GE09ram_02_u:7905: vinivartya raṇotsāhaṃ muhūrtaṃ prāśniko bhava // Ram_3,26.4
GE09ram_02_u:7906: prahṛṣṭo vā hate rāme janasthānaṃ prayāsyasi
GE09ram_02_u:7907: mayi vā nihate rāmaṃ saṃyugāyopayāsyasi // Ram_3,26.5
GE09ram_02_u:7909: gaccha yudhyety anujñāto rāghavābhimukho yayau // Ram_3,26.6
GE09ram_02_u:7911: abhyadravad raṇe rāmaṃ triśṛṅga iva parvataḥ // Ram_3,26.7
GE09ram_02_u:7913: vyasṛjat sadṛśaṃ nādaṃ jalārdrasyeva dundubheḥ // Ram_3,26.8
GE09ram_02_u:7915: dhanuṣā pratijagrāha vidhunvan sāyakāñ śitān // Ram_3,26.9
GE09ram_02_u:7918: tatas triśirasā bāṇair lalāṭe tāḍitas tribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7919: amarṣī kupito rāmaḥ saṃrabdham idam abravīt // Ram_3,26.11
GE09ram_02_u:7921: puṣpair iva śarair yasya lalāṭe 'smi parikṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7923: evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaḥ śarān āśīviṣopamān
GE09ram_02_u:7926: nyapātayata tejasvī caturas tasya vājinaḥ // Ram_3,26.14
GE09ram_02_u:7928: rāmaś cicheda bāṇena dhvajaṃ cāsya samucchritam // Ram_3,26.15
GE09ram_02_u:7930: bibheda rāmas taṃ bāṇair hṛdaye so 'bhavaj jaḍaḥ // Ram_3,26.16
GE09ram_02_u:7932: śirāṃsy apātayat trīṇi vegavadbhis tribhiḥ śataiḥ // Ram_3,26.17
GE09ram_02_u:7934: nyapatat patitaiḥ pūrvaṃ svaśirobhir niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,26.18
GE09ram_02_u:7936: dravanti sma na tiṣṭhanti vyāghratrastā mṛgā iva // Ram_3,26.19
GE09ram_02_u:7937: tān kharo dravato dṛṣṭvā nivartya ruṣitaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:7938: rāmam evābhidudrāva rāhuś candramasaṃ yathā // Ram_3,26.20
GE09ram_02_u:7939: nihataṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe triśirasā saha
GE09ram_02_u:7940: kharasyāpy abhavat trāso dṛṣṭvā rāmasya vikramam // Ram_3,27.1
GE09ram_02_u:7941: sa dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ sainyam aviṣahyaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_02_u:7942: hatam ekena rāmeṇa dūṣaṇas triśirā api // Ram_3,27.2
GE09ram_02_u:7943: tad balaṃ hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ vimanāḥ prekṣya rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7944: āsasāda kharo rāmaṃ namucir vāsavaṃ yathā // Ram_3,27.3
GE09ram_02_u:7946: kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya kruddhān āśīviṣān iva // Ram_3,27.4
GE09ram_02_u:7948: cacāra samare mārgāñ śarai rathagataḥ kharaḥ // Ram_3,27.5
GE09ram_02_u:7949: sa sarvāś ca diśo bāṇaiḥ pradiśaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7950: pūrayāmāsa taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo 'pi sumahad dhanuḥ // Ram_3,27.6
GE09ram_02_u:7952: nabhaś cakārāvivaraṃ parjanya iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ // Ram_3,27.7
GE09ram_02_u:7955: śarajālāvṛtaḥ sūryo na tadā sma prakāśate
GE09ram_02_u:7958: ājaghāna raṇe rāmaṃ totrair iva mahādvipam // Ram_3,27.10
GE09ram_02_u:7962: dṛṣṭvā nodvijate rāmaḥ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // Ram_3,27.12
GE09ram_02_u:7964: āsasāda raṇe rāmaṃ pataṃga iva pāvakam // Ram_3,27.13
GE09ram_02_u:7966: kharaś cicheda rāmasya darśayan pāṇilāghavam // Ram_3,27.14
GE09ram_02_u:7967: sa punas tv aparān sapta śarān ādāya varmaṇi
GE09ram_02_u:7969: tatas tat prahataṃ bāṇaiḥ kharamuktaiḥ suparvabhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7971: sa śarair arpitaḥ kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7972: rarāja samare rāmo vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan // Ram_3,27.17
GE09ram_02_u:7974: cakārāntāya sa ripoḥ sajyam anyan mahad dhanuḥ // Ram_3,27.18
GE09ram_02_u:7975: sumahad vaiṣṇavaṃ yat tad atisṛṣṭaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_02_u:7976: varaṃ tad dhanur udyamya kharaṃ samabhidhāvata // Ram_3,27.19
GE09ram_02_u:7978: cicheda rāmaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ kharasya samare dhvajam // Ram_3,27.20
GE09ram_02_u:7979: sa darśanīyo bahudhā vicchinnaḥ kāñcano dhvajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7980: jagāma dharaṇīṃ sūryo devatānām ivājñayā // Ram_3,27.21
GE09ram_02_u:7981: taṃ caturbhiḥ kharaḥ kruddho rāmaṃ gātreṣu mārgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7982: vivyādha hṛdi marmajño mātaṃgam iva tomaraiḥ // Ram_3,27.22
GE09ram_02_u:7984: viddho rudhirasiktāṅgo babhūva ruṣito bhṛśam // Ram_3,27.23
GE09ram_02_u:7985: sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya paramāhave
GE09ram_02_u:7986: mumoca parameṣvāsaḥ ṣaṭ śarān abhilakṣitān // Ram_3,27.24
GE09ram_02_u:7987: śirasy ekena bāṇena dvābhyāṃ bāhvor athārpayat
GE09ram_02_u:7988: tribhiś candrārdhavaktraiś ca vakṣasy abhijaghāna ha // Ram_3,27.25
GE09ram_02_u:7990: jighāṃsū rākṣasaṃ kruddhas trayodaśa śilāśitān // Ram_3,27.26
GE09ram_02_u:7991: tato 'sya yugam ekena caturbhiś caturo hayān
GE09ram_02_u:7992: ṣaṣṭhena ca śiraḥ saṃkhye cicheda kharasāratheḥ // Ram_3,27.27
GE09ram_02_u:7993: tribhis triveṇuṃ balavān dvābhyām akṣaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7994: dvādaśena tu bāṇena kharasya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // Ram_3,27.28*
GE09ram_02_u:7998: gadāpāṇir avaplutya tasthau bhūmau kharas tadā // Ram_3,27.29
GE09ram_02_u:7999: tat karma rāmasya mahārathasya sametya devāś ca maharṣayaś ca
GE09ram_02_u:8000: apūjayan prāñjalayaḥ prahṛṣṭās tadā vimānāgragatāḥ sametāḥ // Ram_3,27.30
GE09ram_02_u:8001: kharaṃ tu virathaṃ rāmo gadāpāṇim avasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:8002: mṛdupūrvaṃ mahātejāḥ paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,28.1
GE09ram_02_u:8006: trayāṇām api lokānām īśvaro 'pi na tiṣṭhati // Ram_3,28.3
GE09ram_02_u:8008: tīkṣṇaṃ sarvajano hanti sarpaṃ duṣṭam ivāgatam // Ram_3,28.4
GE09ram_02_u:8009: lobhāt pāpāni kurvāṇaḥ kāmād vā yo na budhyate
GE09ram_02_u:8010: bhraṣṭaḥ paśyati tasyāntaṃ brāhmaṇī karakād iva // Ram_3,28.5
GE09ram_02_u:8012: kiṃ nu hatvā mahābhāgān phalaṃ prāpsyasi rākṣasa // Ram_3,28.6
GE09ram_02_u:8014: aiśvaryaṃ prāpya tiṣṭhanti śīrṇamūlā iva drumāḥ // Ram_3,28.7
GE09ram_02_u:8015: avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8016: ghoraṃ paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpam ivārtavam // Ram_3,28.8
GE09ram_02_u:8017: nacirāt prāpyate loke pāpānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalam
GE09ram_02_u:8020: aham āsādito rājā prāṇān hantuṃ niśācara // Ram_3,28.10
GE09ram_02_u:8021: adya hi tvāṃ mayā muktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8022: vidārya nipatiṣyanti valmīkam iva pannagāḥ // Ram_3,28.11
GE09ram_02_u:8024: tān adya nihataḥ saṃkhye sasainyo 'nugamiṣyasi // Ram_3,28.12
GE09ram_02_u:8025: adya tvāṃ nihataṃ bāṇaiḥ paśyantu paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8026: nirayasthaṃ vimānasthā ye tvayā hiṃsitāḥ purā // Ram_3,28.13
GE09ram_02_u:8027: prahara tvaṃ yathākāmaṃ kuru yatnaṃ kulādhama
GE09ram_02_u:8028: adya te pātayiṣyāmi śiras tālaphalaṃ yathā // Ram_3,28.14
GE09ram_02_u:8029: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8030: pratyuvāca tato rāmaṃ prahasan krodhamūrchitaḥ // Ram_3,28.15
GE09ram_02_u:8032: ātmanā katham ātmānam apraśasyaṃ praśaṃsasi // Ram_3,28.16
GE09ram_02_u:8033: vikrāntā balavanto vā ye bhavanti nararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8034: kathayanti na te kiṃcit tejasā svena garvitāḥ // Ram_3,28.17
GE09ram_02_u:8036: nirarthakaṃ vikatthante yathā rāma vikatthase // Ram_3,28.18
GE09ram_02_u:8038: mṛtyukāle hi samprāpte svayam aprastave stavam // Ram_3,28.19
GE09ram_02_u:8039: sarvathā tu laghutvaṃ te katthanena vidarśitam
GE09ram_02_u:8041: na tu mām iha tiṣṭhantaṃ paśyasi tvaṃ gadādharam
GE09ram_02_u:8042: dharādharam ivākampyaṃ parvataṃ dhātubhiś citam // Ram_3,28.21
GE09ram_02_u:8043: paryāpto 'haṃ gadāpāṇir hantuṃ prāṇān raṇe tava
GE09ram_02_u:8044: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ pāśahasta ivāntakaḥ // Ram_3,28.22
GE09ram_02_u:8045: kāmaṃ bahv api vaktavyaṃ tvayi vakṣyāmi na tv aham
GE09ram_02_u:8046: astaṃ gaccheddhi savitā yuddhavighnas tato bhavet // Ram_3,28.23
GE09ram_02_u:8048: tvadvināśāt karomy adya teṣām aśrupramārjanam // Ram_3,28.24
GE09ram_02_u:8049: ity uktvā paramakruddhas tāṃ gadāṃ paramāṅgadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8050: kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya pradīptām aśaniṃ yathā // Ram_3,28.25
GE09ram_02_u:8052: bhasma vṛkṣāṃś ca gulmāṃś ca kṛtvāgāt tatsamīpataḥ // Ram_3,28.26
GE09ram_02_u:8054: antarikṣagatāṃ rāmaś cicheda bahudhā śaraiḥ // Ram_3,28.27
GE09ram_02_u:8055: sā viśīrṇā śarair bhinnā papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_02_u:8057: bhittvā tu tāṃ gadāṃ bāṇai rāghavo dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8058: smayamānaḥ kharaṃ vākyaṃ saṃrabdham idam abravīt // Ram_3,29.1
GE09ram_02_u:8060: śaktihīnataro matto vṛthā tvam avagarjasi // Ram_3,29.2
GE09ram_02_u:8064: rākṣasānāṃ karomīti mithyā tad api te vacaḥ // Ram_3,29.4
GE09ram_02_u:8066: prāṇān apahariṣyāmi garutmān amṛtaṃ yathā // Ram_3,29.5
GE09ram_02_u:8068: vidāritasya madbāṇair mahī pāsyati śoṇitam // Ram_3,29.6
GE09ram_02_u:8070: svapsyase gāṃ samāśliṣya durlabhāṃ pramadām iva // Ram_3,29.7
GE09ram_02_u:8072: bhaviṣyanty aśaraṇyānāṃ śaraṇyā daṇḍakā ime // Ram_3,29.8
GE09ram_02_u:8074: nirbhayā vicariṣyanti sarvato munayo vane // Ram_3,29.9
GE09ram_02_u:8078: anurūpakulāḥ patnyo yāsāṃ tvaṃ patir īdṛśaḥ // Ram_3,29.11
GE09ram_02_u:8080: tvatkṛte śaṅkitair agnau munibhiḥ pātyate haviḥ // Ram_3,29.12
GE09ram_02_u:8081: tam evam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rāghavaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_02_u:8083: dṛḍhaṃ khalv avalipto 'si bhayeṣv api ca nirbhayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8084: vācyāvācyaṃ tato hi tvaṃ mṛtyuvaśyo na budhyase // Ram_3,29.14
GE09ram_02_u:8086: kāryākāryaṃ na jānanti te nirastaṣaḍindriyāḥ // Ram_3,29.15
GE09ram_02_u:8087: evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ saṃrudhya bhrukuṭiṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8088: sa dadarśa mahāsālam avidūre niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,29.16
GE09ram_02_u:8090: sa tam utpāṭayāmāsa saṃdṛśya daśanacchadam // Ram_3,29.17
GE09ram_02_u:8092: rāmam uddiśya cikṣepa hatas tvam iti cābravīt // Ram_3,29.18
GE09ram_02_u:8093: tam āpatantaṃ bāṇaughaiś chittvā rāmaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:8094: roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ nihantuṃ samare kharam // Ram_3,29.19
GE09ram_02_u:8096: nirbibheda sahasreṇa bāṇānāṃ samare kharam // Ram_3,29.20
GE09ram_02_u:8097: tasya bāṇāntarād raktaṃ bahu susrāva phenilam
GE09ram_02_u:8099: vihvalaḥ sa kṛto bāṇaiḥ kharo rāmeṇa saṃyuge
GE09ram_02_u:8100: matto rudhiragandhena tam evābhyadravad drutam // Ram_3,29.22
GE09ram_02_u:8104: kharasya rāmo jagrāha brahmadaṇḍam ivāparam // Ram_3,29.24
GE09ram_02_u:8105: sa tad dattaṃ maghavatā surarājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:8106: saṃdadhe ca sa dharmātmā mumoca ca kharaṃ prati // Ram_3,29.25
GE09ram_02_u:8108: rāmeṇa dhanur udyamya kharasyorasi cāpatat // Ram_3,29.26
GE09ram_02_u:8109: sa papāta kharo bhūmau dahyamānaḥ śarāgninā
GE09ram_02_u:8111: sa vṛtra iva vajreṇa phenena namucir yathā
GE09ram_02_u:8112: balo vendrāśanihato nipapāta hataḥ kharaḥ // Ram_3,29.28
GE09ram_02_u:8114: sabhājya muditā rāmam idaṃ vacanam abruvan // Ram_3,29.29
GE09ram_02_u:8117: ānītas tvam imaṃ deśam upāyena maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8118: eṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ krūrāṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ pāpakarmaṇām // Ram_3,29.31
GE09ram_02_u:8119: tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā daśarathātmaja
GE09ram_02_u:8120: sukhaṃ dharmaṃ cariṣyanti daṇḍakeṣu maharṣayaḥ // Ram_3,29.32
GE09ram_02_u:8121: etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:8123: tato rāmas tu vijayī pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8126: babhūva hṛṣṭā vaidehī bhartāraṃ pariṣasvaje // Ram_3,29.35
GE09ram_02_u:8128: hatāny ekena rāmeṇa rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām // Ram_3,30.1
GE09ram_02_u:8129: dūṣaṇaṃ ca kharaṃ caiva hataṃ triśirasaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_02_u:8130: dṛṣṭvā punar mahānādaṃ nanāda jaladopamā // Ram_3,30.2
GE09ram_02_u:8131: sā dṛṣṭvā karma rāmasya kṛtam anyaiḥ suduṣkaram
GE09ram_02_u:8134: upopaviṣṭaṃ sacivair marudbhir iva vāsavam // Ram_3,30.4
GE09ram_02_u:8136: rukmavedigataṃ prājyaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam // Ram_3,30.5
GE09ram_02_u:8138: ajeyaṃ samare śūraṃ vyāttānanam ivāntakam // Ram_3,30.6
GE09ram_02_u:8146: āhatāṅgaṃ samastaiś ca devapraharaṇais tathā // Ram_3,30.10
GE09ram_02_u:8148: kṣeptāraṃ parvatāgrāṇāṃ surāṇāṃ ca pramardanam // Ram_3,30.11
GE09ram_02_u:8151: purīṃ bhogavatīṃ gatvā parājitya ca vāsukim
GE09ram_02_u:8152: takṣakasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ parājitya jahāra yaḥ // Ram_3,30.13
GE09ram_02_u:8154: vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tasya kāmagaṃ vai jahāra yaḥ // Ram_3,30.14
GE09ram_02_u:8155: vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ divyaṃ nalinīṃ nandanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:8156: vināśayati yaḥ krodhād devodyānāni vīryavān // Ram_3,30.15
GE09ram_02_u:8160: purā svayambhuve dhīraḥ śirāṃsy upajahāra yaḥ // Ram_3,30.17
GE09ram_02_u:8162: abhayaṃ yasya saṃgrāme mṛtyuto mānuṣād ṛte // Ram_3,30.18
GE09ram_02_u:8164: havirdhāneṣu yaḥ somam upahanti mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,30.19
GE09ram_02_u:8168: rākṣasī bhrātaraṃ krūraṃ sā dadarśa mahābalam
GE09ram_02_u:8172: sudāruṇaṃ vākyam abhītacāriṇī mahātmanā śūrpaṇakhā virūpitā // Ram_3,30.22
GE09ram_02_u:8174: amātyamadhye saṃkruddhā paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,31.1
GE09ram_02_u:8176: samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ boddhavyaṃ nāvabudhyase // Ram_3,31.2
GE09ram_02_u:8178: lubdhaṃ na bahu manyante śmaśānāgnim iva prajāḥ // Ram_3,31.3
GE09ram_02_u:8179: svayaṃ kāryāṇi yaḥ kāle nānutiṣṭhati pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8180: sa tu vai saha rājyena taiś ca kāryair vinaśyati // Ram_3,31.4
GE09ram_02_u:8182: varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkam iva dvipāḥ // Ram_3,31.5
GE09ram_02_u:8183: ye na rakṣanti viṣayam asvādhīnā narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8184: te na vṛddhyā prakāśante girayaḥ sāgare yathā // Ram_3,31.6
GE09ram_02_u:8186: ayuktacāraś capalaḥ kathaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi // Ram_3,31.7
GE09ram_02_u:8187: yeṣāṃ cāraś ca kośaś ca nayaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:8188: asvādhīnā narendrāṇāṃ prākṛtais te janaiḥ samāḥ // Ram_3,31.8
GE09ram_02_u:8189: yasmāt paśyanti dūrasthān sarvān arthān narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8190: cāreṇa tasmād ucyante rājāno dīrghacakṣuṣaḥ // Ram_3,31.9
GE09ram_02_u:8191: ayuktacāraṃ manye tvāṃ prākṛtaiḥ sacivair vṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:8192: svajanaṃ ca janasthānaṃ hataṃ yo nāvabudhyase // Ram_3,31.10
GE09ram_02_u:8194: hatāny ekena rāmeṇa kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ // Ram_3,31.11
GE09ram_02_u:8195: ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8197: tvaṃ tu lubdhaḥ pramattaś ca parādhīnaś ca rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:8198: viṣaye sve samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ yo nāvabudhyase // Ram_3,31.13
GE09ram_02_u:8202: krodhanaṃ vyasane hanti svajano 'pi narādhipam // Ram_3,31.15
GE09ram_02_u:8203: nānutiṣṭhati kāryāṇi bhayeṣu na bibheti ca
GE09ram_02_u:8204: kṣipraṃ rājyāc cyuto dīnas tṛṇais tulyo bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,31.16
GE09ram_02_u:8205: śuṣkakāṣṭhair bhavet kāryaṃ loṣṭair api ca pāṃsubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8206: na tu sthānāt paribhraṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ syād vasudhādhipaiḥ // Ram_3,31.17
GE09ram_02_u:8207: upabhuktaṃ yathā vāsaḥ srajo vā mṛditā yathā
GE09ram_02_u:8208: evaṃ rājyāt paribhraṣṭaḥ samartho 'pi nirarthakaḥ // Ram_3,31.18
GE09ram_02_u:8209: apramattaś ca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8210: kṛtajño dharmaśīlaś ca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram // Ram_3,31.19
GE09ram_02_u:8212: vyaktakrodhaprasādaś ca sa rājā pūjyate janaiḥ // Ram_3,31.20
GE09ram_02_u:8213: tvaṃ tu rāvaṇa durbuddhir guṇair etair vivarjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8214: yasya te 'viditaś cārai rakṣasāṃ sumahān vadhaḥ // Ram_3,31.21
GE09ram_02_u:8216: ayuktabuddhir guṇadoṣaniścaye vipannarājyo na cirād vipatsyate // Ram_3,31.22
GE09ram_02_u:8217: iti svadoṣān parikīrtitāṃs tayā samīkṣya buddhyā kṣaṇadācareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8218: dhanena darpeṇa balena cānvito vicintayāmāsa ciraṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,31.23
GE09ram_02_u:8219: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāṃ kruddhāṃ bruvatīṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8221: kaś ca rāmaḥ kathaṃvīryaḥ kiṃrūpaḥ kiṃparākramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8222: kimarthaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ praviṣṭaś ca suduścaram // Ram_3,32.2
GE09ram_02_u:8223: āyudhaṃ kiṃ ca rāmasya nihatā yena rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8224: kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā // Ram_3,32.3
GE09ram_02_u:8226: tato rāmaṃ yathānyāyam ākhyātum upacakrame // Ram_3,32.4
GE09ram_02_u:8230: dīptān kṣipati nārācān sarpān iva mahāviṣān // Ram_3,32.6
GE09ram_02_u:8231: nādadānaṃ śarān ghorān na muñcantaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_02_u:8232: na kārmukaṃ vikarṣantaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi saṃyuge // Ram_3,32.7
GE09ram_02_u:8233: hanyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ paśyāmi śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8234: indreṇevottamaṃ sasyam āhataṃ tv aśmavṛṣṭibhiḥ // Ram_3,32.8
GE09ram_02_u:8236: nihatāni śarais tīkṣṇais tenaikena padātinā // Ram_3,32.9
GE09ram_02_u:8238: ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ // Ram_3,32.10
GE09ram_02_u:8242: anuraktaś ca bhaktaś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān // Ram_3,32.12
GE09ram_02_u:8243: amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī
GE09ram_02_u:8244: rāmasya dakṣiṇo bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ // Ram_3,32.13
GE09ram_02_u:8246: sītā nāma varārohā vaidehī tanumadhyamā // Ram_3,32.14
GE09ram_02_u:8247: naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
GE09ram_02_u:8248: tathārūpā mayā nārī dṛṣṭapūrvā mahītale // Ram_3,32.15
GE09ram_02_u:8249: yasya sītā bhaved bhāryā yaṃ ca hṛṣṭā pariṣvajet
GE09ram_02_u:8250: atijīvet sa sarveṣu lokeṣv api puraṃdarāt // Ram_3,32.16
GE09ram_02_u:8252: tavānurūpā bhāryā sā tvaṃ ca tasyās tathā patiḥ // Ram_3,32.17
GE09ram_02_u:8254: bhāryārthe tu tavānetum udyatāhaṃ varānanām // Ram_3,32.18
GE09ram_02_u:8256: manmathasya śarāṇāṃ ca tvaṃ vidheyo bhaviṣyasi // Ram_3,32.19
GE09ram_02_u:8257: yadi tasyām abhiprāyo bhāryārthe tava jāyate
GE09ram_02_u:8258: śīghram uddhriyatāṃ pādo jayārtham iha dakṣiṇaḥ // Ram_3,32.20
GE09ram_02_u:8259: kuru priyaṃ tathā teṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_02_u:8261: taṃ śarair niśitair hatvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_02_u:8262: hatanāthāṃ sukhaṃ sītāṃ yathāvad upabhokṣyase // Ram_3,32.22
GE09ram_02_u:8263: rocate yadi te vākyaṃ mamaitad rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_02_u:8264: kriyatāṃ nirviśaṅkena vacanaṃ mama rāghava // Ram_3,32.23
GE09ram_02_u:8265: niśamya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagair hatāñ janasthānagatān niśācarān
GE09ram_02_u:8266: kharaṃ ca buddhvā nihataṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ tvam adya kṛtyaṃ pratipattum arhasi // Ram_3,32.24
GE09ram_02_u:8268: sacivān abhyanujñāya kāryaṃ buddhvā jagāma ha // Ram_3,33.1
GE09ram_02_u:8269: tat kāryam anugamyātha yathāvad upalabhya ca
GE09ram_02_u:8270: doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca sampradhārya balābalam // Ram_3,33.2
GE09ram_02_u:8271: iti kartavyam ity eva kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8272: sthirabuddhis tato ramyāṃ yānaśālāṃ jagāma ha // Ram_3,33.3
GE09ram_02_u:8274: sūtaṃ saṃcodayāmāsa rathaḥ saṃyujyatām iti // Ram_3,33.4
GE09ram_02_u:8292: sālais tālais tamālaiś ca tarubhiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ // Ram_3,33.13
GE09ram_02_u:8294: nāgaiḥ suparṇair gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca sahasraśaḥ // Ram_3,33.14
GE09ram_02_u:8295: jitakāmaiś ca siddhaiś ca cāraṇaiś copaśobhitam
GE09ram_02_u:8296: ājair vaikhānasair māṣair vālakhilyair marīcipaiḥ // Ram_3,33.15
GE09ram_02_u:8300: devadānavasaṃghaiś ca caritaṃ tv amṛtāśibhiḥ // Ram_3,33.17
GE09ram_02_u:8308: vanāni paśyan saumyāni ghrāṇatṛptikarāṇi ca // Ram_3,33.21
GE09ram_02_u:8309: agarūṇāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:8310: takkolānāṃ ca jātyānāṃ phalānāṃ ca sugandhinām // Ram_3,33.22
GE09ram_02_u:8311: puṣpāṇi ca tamālasya gulmāni maricasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:8312: muktānāṃ ca samūhāni śuṣyamāṇāni tīrataḥ // Ram_3,33.23
GE09ram_02_u:8314: kāñcanāni ca śailāni rājatāni ca sarvaśaḥ // Ram_3,33.24
GE09ram_02_u:8318: taṃ samaṃ sarvataḥ snigdhaṃ mṛdusaṃsparśamārutam // Ram_3,33.26
GE09ram_02_u:8320: tatrāpaśyat sa meghābhaṃ nyagrodham ṛṣibhir vṛtam // Ram_3,33.27
GE09ram_02_u:8321: samantād yasya tāḥ śākhāḥ śatayojanam āyatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8322: yasya hastinam ādāya mahākāyaṃ ca kacchapam
GE09ram_02_u:8323: bhakṣārthaṃ garuḍaḥ śākhām ājagāma mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,33.28
GE09ram_02_u:8324: tasya tāṃ sahasā śākhāṃ bhāreṇa patagottamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8327: ajā babhūvur dhūmrāś ca saṃgatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ // Ram_3,33.30
GE09ram_02_u:8328: teṣāṃ dayārthaṃ garuḍas tāṃ śākhāṃ śatayojanām
GE09ram_02_u:8329: jagāmādāya vegena tau cobhau gajakacchapau // Ram_3,33.31
GE09ram_02_u:8332: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe mokṣayitvā mahāmunīn // Ram_3,33.32
GE09ram_02_u:8334: amṛtānayanārthaṃ vai cakāra matimān matim // Ram_3,33.33
GE09ram_02_u:8338: nāmnā subhadraṃ nyagrodhaṃ dadarśa dhanadānujaḥ // Ram_3,33.35
GE09ram_02_u:8339: taṃ tu gatvā paraṃ pāraṃ samudrasya nadīpateḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8340: dadarśāśramam ekānte puṇye ramye vanāntare // Ram_3,33.36
GE09ram_02_u:8342: dadarśa niyatāhāraṃ mārīcaṃ nāma rākṣasam // Ram_3,33.37
GE09ram_02_u:8343: sa rāvaṇaḥ samāgamya vidhivat tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_02_u:8344: tataḥ paścād idaṃ vākyam abravīd vākyakovidaḥ // Ram_3,33.38
GE09ram_02_u:8345: mārīca śrūyatāṃ tāta vacanaṃ mama bhāṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8346: ārto 'smi mama cārtasya bhavān hi paramā gatiḥ // Ram_3,34.1
GE09ram_02_u:8347: jānīṣe tvaṃ janasthānaṃ bhrātā yatra kharo mama
GE09ram_02_u:8348: dūṣaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ svasā śūrpaṇakhā ca me // Ram_3,34.2
GE09ram_02_u:8350: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā labdhalakṣā niśācarāḥ // Ram_3,34.3
GE09ram_02_u:8352: bādhamānā mahāraṇye munīn ye dharmacāriṇaḥ // Ram_3,34.4
GE09ram_02_u:8355: te tv idānīṃ janasthāne vasamānā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8356: saṃgatāḥ param āyattā rāmeṇa saha saṃyuge // Ram_3,34.6
GE09ram_02_u:8358: anuktvā paruṣaṃ kiṃcic charair vyāpāritaṃ dhanuḥ // Ram_3,34.7
GE09ram_02_u:8360: nihatāni śarais tīkṣṇair mānuṣeṇa padātinā // Ram_3,34.8
GE09ram_02_u:8361: kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8362: hatvā triśirasaṃ cāpi nirbhayā daṇḍakāḥ kṛtāḥ // Ram_3,34.9
GE09ram_02_u:8364: sa hantā tasya sainyasya rāmaḥ kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ // Ram_3,34.10
GE09ram_02_u:8366: tyaktadharmas tv adharmātmā bhūtānām ahite rataḥ // Ram_3,34.11
GE09ram_02_u:8367: yena vairaṃ vināraṇye sattvam āśritya kevalam
GE09ram_02_u:8370: ānayiṣyāmi vikramya sahāyas tatra me bhava // Ram_3,34.13
GE09ram_02_u:8371: tvayā hy ahaṃ sahāyena pārśvasthena mahābala
GE09ram_02_u:8372: bhrātṛbhiś ca surān yuddhe samagrān nābhicintaye // Ram_3,34.14
GE09ram_02_u:8373: tat sahāyo bhava tvaṃ me samartho hy asi rākṣasa
GE09ram_02_u:8374: vīrye yuddhe ca darpe ca na hy asti sadṛśas tava // Ram_3,34.15
GE09ram_02_u:8376: śṛṇu tat karma sāhāyye yat kāryaṃ vacanān mama // Ram_3,34.16
GE09ram_02_u:8377: sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8378: āśrame tasya rāmasya sītāyāḥ pramukhe cara // Ram_3,34.17
GE09ram_02_u:8379: tvāṃ tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ sītā dṛṣṭvā tu mṛgarūpiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:8380: gṛhyatām iti bhartāraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ cābhidhāsyati // Ram_3,34.18
GE09ram_02_u:8381: tatas tayor apāye tu śūnye sītāṃ yathāsukham
GE09ram_02_u:8382: nirābādho hariṣyāmi rāhuś candraprabhām iva // Ram_3,34.19
GE09ram_02_u:8386: śuṣkaṃ samabhavad vaktraṃ paritrasto babhūva ca // Ram_3,34.21
GE09ram_02_u:8388: kṛtāñjalis tattvam uvāca vākyaṃ hitaṃ ca tasmai hitam ātmanaś ca // Ram_3,34.22
GE09ram_02_u:8392: apriyasya ca pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ // Ram_3,35.2
GE09ram_02_u:8393: na nūnaṃ budhyase rāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ guṇonnatam
GE09ram_02_u:8395: api svasti bhavet tāta sarveṣāṃ bhuvi rakṣasām
GE09ram_02_u:8396: api rāmo na saṃkruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasam // Ram_3,35.4
GE09ram_02_u:8398: api sītā nimittaṃ ca na bhaved vyasanaṃ mahat // Ram_3,35.5
GE09ram_02_u:8399: api tvām īśvaraṃ prāpya kāmavṛttaṃ niraṅkuśam
GE09ram_02_u:8400: na vinaśyet purī laṅkā tvayā saha sarākṣasā // Ram_3,35.6
GE09ram_02_u:8402: ātmānaṃ svajanaṃ rāṣṭraṃ sa rājā hanti durmatiḥ // Ram_3,35.7
GE09ram_02_u:8403: na ca pitrā parityakto nāmaryādaḥ kathaṃcana
GE09ram_02_u:8404: na lubdho na ca duḥśīlo na ca kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ // Ram_3,35.8
GE09ram_02_u:8406: na ca tīkṣṇo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥ // Ram_3,35.9
GE09ram_02_u:8408: kariṣyāmīti dharmātmā tataḥ pravrajito vanam // Ram_3,35.10
GE09ram_02_u:8410: hitvā rājyaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam // Ram_3,35.11
GE09ram_02_u:8411: na rāmaḥ karkaśas tāta nāvidvān nājitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8412: anṛtaṃ na śrutaṃ caiva naiva tvaṃ vaktum arhasi // Ram_3,35.12
GE09ram_02_u:8414: rājā sarvasya lokasya devānām iva vāsavaḥ // Ram_3,35.13
GE09ram_02_u:8415: kathaṃ tvaṃ tasya vaidehīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā
GE09ram_02_u:8416: icchasi prasabhaṃ hartuṃ prabhām iva vivasvataḥ // Ram_3,35.14
GE09ram_02_u:8418: rāmāgniṃ sahasā dīptaṃ na praveṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_3,35.15
GE09ram_02_u:8421: rājyaṃ sukhaṃ ca saṃtyajya jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8423: aprameyaṃ hi tattejo yasya sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_02_u:8424: na tvaṃ samarthas tāṃ hartuṃ rāmacāpāśrayāṃ vane // Ram_3,35.18
GE09ram_02_u:8426: dīptasyeva hutāśasya śikhā sītā sumadhyamā // Ram_3,35.19
GE09ram_02_u:8427: kim udyamaṃ vyartham imaṃ kṛtvā te rākṣasādhipa
GE09ram_02_u:8428: dṛṣṭaś cet tvaṃ raṇe tena tadantaṃ tava jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:8429: jīvitaṃ ca sukhaṃ caiva rājyaṃ caiva sudurlabham // Ram_3,35.20
GE09ram_02_u:8431: mantrayitvā tu dharmiṣṭhaiḥ kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,35.21
GE09ram_02_u:8432: doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca sampradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_02_u:8433: ātmanaś ca balaṃ jñātvā rāghavasya ca tattvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8434: hitaṃ hi tava niścitya kṣamaṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_3,35.22
GE09ram_02_u:8435: ahaṃ tu manye tava na kṣamaṃ raṇe samāgamaṃ kosalarājasūnunā
GE09ram_02_u:8436: idaṃ hi bhūyaḥ śṛṇu vākyam uttamaṃ kṣamaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca niśācarādhipa // Ram_3,35.23
GE09ram_02_u:8437: kadācid apy ahaṃ vīryāt paryaṭan pṛthivīm imām
GE09ram_02_u:8443: svayaṃ gatvā daśarathaṃ narendram idam abravīt // Ram_3,36.3
GE09ram_02_u:8444: ayaṃ rakṣatu māṃ rāmaḥ parvakāle samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8445: mārīcān me bhayaṃ ghoraṃ samutpannaṃ nareśvara // Ram_3,36.4
GE09ram_02_u:8446: ity evam ukto dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:8449: kāmaṃ tu mama yat sainyaṃ mayā saha gamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:8450: vadhiṣyāmi muniśreṣṭha śatruṃ tava yathepsitam // Ram_3,36.6
GE09ram_02_u:8451: ity evam uktaḥ sa munī rājānaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:8452: rāmān nānyad balaṃ loke paryāptaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ // Ram_3,36.7
GE09ram_02_u:8453: bālo 'py eṣa mahātejāḥ samarthas tasya nigrahe
GE09ram_02_u:8454: gamiṣye rāmam ādāya svasti te 'stu paraṃtapa // Ram_3,36.8
GE09ram_02_u:8455: ity evam uktvā sa munis tam ādāya nṛpātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:8456: jagāma paramaprīto viśvāmitraḥ svam āśramam // Ram_3,36.9
GE09ram_02_u:8457: taṃ tadā daṇḍakāraṇye yajñam uddiśya dīkṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:8458: babhūvāvasthito rāmaś citraṃ visphārayan dhanuḥ // Ram_3,36.10
GE09ram_02_u:8462: adṛśyata tadā rāmo bālacandra ivoditaḥ // Ram_3,36.12
GE09ram_02_u:8464: balī dattavaro darpād ājagāma tadāśramam // Ram_3,36.13
GE09ram_02_u:8466: māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥ sajyam asambhrāntaś cakāra ha // Ram_3,36.14
GE09ram_02_u:8467: avajānann ahaṃ mohād bālo 'yam iti rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:8468: viśvāmitrasya tāṃ vedim adhyadhāvaṃ kṛtatvaraḥ // Ram_3,36.15
GE09ram_02_u:8469: tena muktas tato bāṇaḥ śitaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8470: tenāhaṃ tāḍitaḥ kṣiptaḥ samudre śatayojane // Ram_3,36.16
GE09ram_02_u:8473: prāpya saṃjñāṃ cirāt tāta laṅkāṃ prati gataḥ purīm // Ram_3,36.17
GE09ram_02_u:8474: evam asmi tadā muktaḥ sahāyās te nipātitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8476: tan mayā vāryamāṇas tvaṃ yadi rāmeṇa vigraham
GE09ram_02_u:8477: kariṣyasy āpadaṃ ghorāṃ kṣipraṃ prāpya naśiṣyasi // Ram_3,36.19
GE09ram_02_u:8479: rakṣasāṃ caiva saṃtāpam anarthaṃ cāhariṣyasi // Ram_3,36.20
GE09ram_02_u:8481: drakṣyasi tvaṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vinaṣṭāṃ maithilīkṛte // Ram_3,36.21
GE09ram_02_u:8483: parapāpair vinaśyanti matsyā nāgahrade yathā // Ram_3,36.22
GE09ram_02_u:8485: drakṣyasy abhihatān bhūmau tava doṣāt tu rākṣasān // Ram_3,36.23
GE09ram_02_u:8486: hṛtadārān sadārāṃś ca daśa vidravato diśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8487: hataśeṣān aśaraṇān drakṣyasi tvaṃ niśācarān // Ram_3,36.24
GE09ram_02_u:8489: pradagdhabhavanāṃ laṅkāṃ drakṣyasi tvam asaṃśayam // Ram_3,36.25
GE09ram_02_u:8491: bhava svadāranirataḥ svakulaṃ rakṣa rākṣasa // Ram_3,36.26
GE09ram_02_u:8492: mānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8493: yadīcchasi ciraṃ bhoktuṃ mā kṛthā rāmavipriyam // Ram_3,36.27
GE09ram_02_u:8494: nivāryamāṇaḥ suhṛdā mayā bhṛśaṃ prasahya sītāṃ yadi dharṣayiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:8495: gamiṣyasi kṣīṇabalaḥ sabāndhavo yamakṣayaṃ rāmaśarāttajīvitaḥ // Ram_3,36.28
GE09ram_02_u:8496: evam asmi tadā muktaḥ kathaṃcit tena saṃyuge
GE09ram_02_u:8497: idānīm api yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva yad uttaram // Ram_3,37.1
GE09ram_02_u:8498: rākṣasābhyām ahaṃ dvābhyām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8503: atyantaghoro vyacaraṃ tāpasāṃs tān pradharṣayan // Ram_3,37.4
GE09ram_02_u:8505: rudhirāṇi pibaṃs teṣāṃ tathā māṃsāni bhakṣayan // Ram_3,37.5
GE09ram_02_u:8509: āsādayaṃ tadā rāmaṃ tāpasaṃ dharmam āśritam // Ram_3,37.7
GE09ram_02_u:8510: vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_02_u:8513: tāpaso 'yam iti jñātvā pūrvavairam anusmaran // Ram_3,37.9
GE09ram_02_u:8515: jighāṃsur akṛtaprajñas taṃ prahāram anusmaran // Ram_3,37.10
GE09ram_02_u:8516: tena muktās trayo bāṇāḥ śitāḥ śatrunibarhaṇāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8519: ājagmuḥ sahitāḥ sarve trayaḥ saṃnataparvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,37.12
GE09ram_02_u:8521: samutkrāntas tato muktas tāv ubhau rākṣasau hatau // Ram_3,37.13
GE09ram_02_u:8522: śareṇa mukto rāmasya kathaṃcit prāpya jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:8523: iha pravrājito yuktas tāpaso 'haṃ samāhitaḥ // Ram_3,37.14
GE09ram_02_u:8527: rāmabhūtam idaṃ sarvam araṇyaṃ pratibhāti me // Ram_3,37.16
GE09ram_02_u:8528: rāmam eva hi paśyāmi rahite rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_02_u:8529: dṛṣṭvā svapnagataṃ rāmam udbhramāmi vicetanaḥ // Ram_3,37.17
GE09ram_02_u:8531: ratnāni ca rathāś caiva trāsaṃ saṃjanayanti me // Ram_3,37.18
GE09ram_02_u:8532: ahaṃ tasya prabhāvajño na yuddhaṃ tena te kṣamam
GE09ram_02_u:8533: raṇe rāmeṇa yudhyasva kṣamāṃ vā kuru rākṣasa
GE09ram_02_u:8534: na te rāmakathā kāryā yadi māṃ draṣṭum icchasi // Ram_3,37.19
GE09ram_02_u:8535: idaṃ vaco bandhuhitārthinā mayā yathocyamānaṃ yadi nābhipatsyase
GE09ram_02_u:8536: sabāndhavas tyakṣyasi jīvitaṃ raṇe hato 'dya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagaiḥ // Ram_3,37.20
GE09ram_02_u:8537: mārīcena tu tad vākyaṃ kṣamaṃ yuktaṃ ca rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8538: ukto na pratijagrāha martukāma ivauṣadham // Ram_3,38.1
GE09ram_02_u:8540: abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyam ayuktaṃ kālacoditaḥ // Ram_3,38.2
GE09ram_02_u:8541: yat kilaitad ayuktārthaṃ mārīca mayi kathyate
GE09ram_02_u:8542: vākyaṃ niṣphalam atyarthaṃ bījam uptam ivoṣare // Ram_3,38.3
GE09ram_02_u:8543: tvadvākyair na tu māṃ śakyaṃ bhettuṃ rāmasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_02_u:8545: yas tyaktvā suhṛdo rājyaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:8546: strīvākyaṃ prākṛtaṃ śrutvā vanam ekapade gataḥ // Ram_3,38.5
GE09ram_02_u:8547: avaśyaṃ tu mayā tasya saṃyuge kharaghātinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8548: prāṇaiḥ priyatarā sītā hartavyā tava saṃnidhau // Ram_3,38.6
GE09ram_02_u:8549: evaṃ me niścitā buddhir hṛdi mārīca vartate
GE09ram_02_u:8550: na vyāvartayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ // Ram_3,38.7
GE09ram_02_u:8551: doṣaṃ guṇaṃ vā saṃpṛṣṭas tvam evaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:8552: apāyaṃ vāpy upāyaṃ vā kāryasyāsya viniścaye // Ram_3,38.8
GE09ram_02_u:8554: udyatāñjalinā rājño ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,38.9
GE09ram_02_u:8555: vākyam apratikūlaṃ tu mṛdupūrvaṃ śubhaṃ hitam
GE09ram_02_u:8556: upacāreṇa yuktaṃ ca vaktavyo vasudhādhipaḥ // Ram_3,38.10
GE09ram_02_u:8557: sāvamardaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ mārīca hitam ucyate
GE09ram_02_u:8558: nābhinandati tad rājā mānārho mānavarjitam // Ram_3,38.11
GE09ram_02_u:8560: agner indrasya somasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:8561: auṣṇyaṃ tathā vikramaṃ ca saumyaṃ daṇḍaṃ prasannatām // Ram_3,38.12
GE09ram_02_u:8562: tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāś ca pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8563: tvaṃ tu dharmam avijñāya kevalaṃ moham āsthitaḥ // Ram_3,38.13
GE09ram_02_u:8565: guṇadoṣau na pṛcchāmi kṣamaṃ cātmani rākṣasa
GE09ram_02_u:8566: asmiṃs tu sa bhavān kṛtye sāhāyyaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_3,38.14
GE09ram_02_u:8567: sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8568: pralobhayitvā vaidehīṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gantum arhasi // Ram_3,38.15
GE09ram_02_u:8569: tvāṃ tu māyāmṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāñcanaṃ jātavismayā
GE09ram_02_u:8570: ānayainam iti kṣipraṃ rāmaṃ vakṣyati maithilī // Ram_3,38.16
GE09ram_02_u:8571: apakrānte ca kākutsthe lakṣmaṇe ca yathāsukham
GE09ram_02_u:8572: ānayiṣyāmi vaidehīṃ sahasrākṣaḥ śacīm iva // Ram_3,38.17
GE09ram_02_u:8573: evaṃ kṛtvā tv idaṃ kāryaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha rākṣasa
GE09ram_02_u:8574: rājyasyārdhaṃ pradāsyāmi mārīca tava suvrata // Ram_3,38.18
GE09ram_02_u:8575: gaccha saumya śivaṃ mārgaṃ kāryasyāsya vivṛddhaye
GE09ram_02_u:8576: prāpya sītām ayuddhena vañcayitvā tu rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:8577: laṅkāṃ prati gamiṣyāmi kṛtakāryaḥ saha tvayā // Ram_3,38.19
GE09ram_02_u:8578: etat kāryam avaśyaṃ me balād api kariṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:8579: rājño hi pratikūlastho na jātu sukham edhate // Ram_3,38.20
GE09ram_02_u:8580: āsādya taṃ jīvitasaṃśayas te mṛtyur dhruvo hy adya mayā virudhya
GE09ram_02_u:8581: etad yathāvat parigṛhya buddhyā yad atra pathyaṃ kuru tat tathā tvam // Ram_3,38.21
GE09ram_02_u:8583: abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ mārīco rākṣasādhipam // Ram_3,39.1
GE09ram_02_u:8586: kas tvayā sukhinā rājan nābhinandati pāpakṛt
GE09ram_02_u:8587: kenedam upadiṣṭaṃ te mṛtyudvāram upāyataḥ // Ram_3,39.3
GE09ram_02_u:8589: icchanti tvāṃ vinaśyantam uparuddhaṃ balīyasā // Ram_3,39.4
GE09ram_02_u:8591: yas tvām icchati naśyantaṃ svakṛtena niśācara // Ram_3,39.5
GE09ram_02_u:8592: vadhyāḥ khalu na hanyante sacivās tava rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:8593: ye tvām utpatham ārūḍhaṃ na nigṛhṇanti sarvaśaḥ // Ram_3,39.6
GE09ram_02_u:8594: amātyaiḥ kāmavṛtto hi rājā kāpatham āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8595: nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhir na nigrāhyo nigṛhyase // Ram_3,39.7
GE09ram_02_u:8596: dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yaśaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:8598: viparyaye tu tat sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ bhavati rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:8600: rājamūlo hi dharmaś ca jayaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:8601: tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu rakṣitavyo narādhipaḥ // Ram_3,39.10
GE09ram_02_u:8602: rājyaṃ pālayituṃ śakyaṃ na tīkṣṇena niśācara
GE09ram_02_u:8603: na cāpi pratikūlena nāvinītena rākṣasa // Ram_3,39.11
GE09ram_02_u:8604: ye tīkṣṇamantrāḥ sacivā bhajyante saha tena vai
GE09ram_02_u:8605: viṣameṣu rathāḥ śīghraṃ mandasārathayo yathā // Ram_3,39.12
GE09ram_02_u:8609: rakṣyamāṇā na vardhante meṣā gomāyunā yathā // Ram_3,39.14
GE09ram_02_u:8611: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ // Ram_3,39.15
GE09ram_02_u:8612: tad idaṃ kākatālīyaṃ ghoram āsāditaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:8613: atra kiṃ śobhanaṃ yat tvaṃ sasainyo vinaśiṣyasi // Ram_3,39.16
GE09ram_02_u:8614: māṃ nihatya tu rāmo 'sau nacirāt tvāṃ vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:8615: anena kṛtakṛtyo 'smi mriye yad ariṇā hataḥ // Ram_3,39.17
GE09ram_02_u:8616: darśanād eva rāmasya hataṃ mām upadhāraya
GE09ram_02_u:8617: ātmānaṃ ca hataṃ viddhi hṛtvā sītāṃ sabāndhavam // Ram_3,39.18
GE09ram_02_u:8618: ānayiṣyāmi cet sītām āśramāt sahito mayā
GE09ram_02_u:8619: naiva tvam asi naivāhaṃ naiva laṅkā na rākṣasāḥ // Ram_3,39.19
GE09ram_02_u:8620: nivāryamāṇas tu mayā hitaiṣiṇā na mṛṣyase vākyam idaṃ niśācara
GE09ram_02_u:8621: paretakalpā hi gatāyuṣo narā hitaṃ na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhir īritam // Ram_3,39.20
GE09ram_02_u:8622: evam uktvā tu paruṣaṃ mārīco rāvaṇaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8623: gacchāvety abravīd dīno bhayād rātriṃcaraprabhoḥ // Ram_3,40.1
GE09ram_02_u:8625: madvidhodyataśastreṇa vinaṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me // Ram_3,40.2
GE09ram_02_u:8626: kiṃ tu kartuṃ mayā śakyam evaṃ tvayi durātmani
GE09ram_02_u:8627: eṣa gacchāmy ahaṃ tāta svasti te 'stu niśācara // Ram_3,40.3
GE09ram_02_u:8628: prahṛṣṭas tv abhavat tena vacanena sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8629: pariṣvajya susaṃśliṣṭam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,40.4
GE09ram_02_u:8630: etac chauṇḍīryayuktaṃ te macchabdād iva bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:8631: idānīm asi mārīcaḥ pūrvam anyo niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,40.5
GE09ram_02_u:8633: mayā saha ratho yuktaḥ piśācavadanaiḥ kharaiḥ // Ram_3,40.6
GE09ram_02_u:8634: tato rāvaṇamārīcau vimānam iva taṃ ratham
GE09ram_02_u:8635: āruhya yayatuḥ śīghraṃ tasmād āśramamaṇḍalāt // Ram_3,40.7
GE09ram_02_u:8636: tathaiva tatra paśyantau pattanāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:8637: girīṃś ca saritaḥ sarvā rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca // Ram_3,40.8
GE09ram_02_u:8641: haste gṛhītvā mārīcaṃ rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,40.10
GE09ram_02_u:8643: kriyatāṃ tat sakhe śīghraṃ yadarthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ // Ram_3,40.11
GE09ram_02_u:8644: sa rāvaṇavacaḥ śrutvā mārīco rākṣasas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:8645: mṛgo bhūtvāśramadvāri rāmasya vicacāra ha // Ram_3,40.12
GE09ram_02_u:8653: kṣaṇena rākṣaso jāto mṛgaḥ paramaśobhanaḥ // Ram_3,40.16
GE09ram_02_u:8654: vanaṃ prajvalayan ramyaṃ rāmāśramapadaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_02_u:8655: manoharaṃ darśanīyaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā sa rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,40.17
GE09ram_02_u:8657: vicaran gacchate samyak śādvalāni samantataḥ // Ram_3,40.18
GE09ram_02_u:8659: viṭapīnāṃ kisalayān bhaṅktvādan vicacāra ha // Ram_3,40.19
GE09ram_02_u:8664: punar gatvā nivṛttaś ca vicacāra mṛgottamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8665: gatvā muhūrtaṃ tvarayā punaḥ pratinivartate // Ram_3,40.22
GE09ram_02_u:8666: vikrīḍaṃś ca punar bhūmau punar eva niṣīdati
GE09ram_02_u:8669: sītādarśanam ākāṅkṣan rākṣaso mṛgatāṃ gataḥ // Ram_3,40.24
GE09ram_02_u:8671: samudvīkṣya ca sarve taṃ mṛgā ye 'nye vanecarāḥ // Ram_3,40.25
GE09ram_02_u:8673: rākṣasaḥ so 'pi tān vanyān mṛgān mṛgavadhe rataḥ // Ram_3,40.26
GE09ram_02_u:8675: tasminn eva tataḥ kāle vaidehī śubhalocanā // Ram_3,40.27
GE09ram_02_u:8677: karṇikārān aśokāṃś ca cūtāṃś ca madirekṣaṇā // Ram_3,40.28
GE09ram_02_u:8683: sa ca tāṃ rāmadayitāṃ paśyan māyāmayo mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8684: vicacāra tatas tatra dīpayann iva tad vanam // Ram_3,40.31
GE09ram_02_u:8686: vismayaṃ paramaṃ sītā jagāma janakātmajā // Ram_3,40.32
GE09ram_02_u:8687: sā taṃ samprekṣya suśroṇī kusumāni vicinvatī
GE09ram_02_u:8690: bhartāram api cākrandal lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sāyudham // Ram_3,41.2
GE09ram_02_u:8692: vīkṣamāṇau tu taṃ deśaṃ tadā dadṛśatur mṛgam // Ram_3,41.3
GE09ram_02_u:8693: śaṅkamānas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:8694: tam evainam ahaṃ manye mārīcaṃ rākṣasaṃ mṛgam // Ram_3,41.4
GE09ram_02_u:8696: anena nihatā rāma rājānaḥ kāmarūpiṇā // Ram_3,41.5
GE09ram_02_u:8699: mṛgo hy evaṃvidho ratnavicitro nāsti rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:8700: jagatyāṃ jagatīnātha māyaiṣā hi na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_3,41.7
GE09ram_02_u:8702: uvāca sītā saṃhṛṣṭā chadmanā hṛtacetanā // Ram_3,41.8
GE09ram_02_u:8704: ānayainaṃ mahābāho krīḍārthaṃ no bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,41.9
GE09ram_02_u:8706: mṛgāś caranti sahitāś camarāḥ sṛmarās tathā // Ram_3,41.10
GE09ram_02_u:8707: ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca vānarāḥ kiṃnarās tathā
GE09ram_02_u:8709: na cāsya sadṛśo rājan dṛṣṭapūrvo mṛgaḥ purā
GE09ram_02_u:8710: tejasā kṣamayā dīptyā yathāyaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ // Ram_3,41.12
GE09ram_02_u:8712: dyotayan vanam avyagraṃ śobhate śaśisaṃnibhaḥ // Ram_3,41.13
GE09ram_02_u:8713: aho rūpam aho lakṣmīḥ svarasampac ca śobhanā
GE09ram_02_u:8714: mṛgo 'dbhuto vicitro 'sau hṛdayaṃ haratīva me // Ram_3,41.14
GE09ram_02_u:8715: yadi grahaṇam abhyeti jīvann eva mṛgas tava
GE09ram_02_u:8720: mṛgarūpam idaṃ divyaṃ vismayaṃ janayiṣyati // Ram_3,41.17
GE09ram_02_u:8721: jīvan na yadi te 'bhyeti grahaṇaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8722: ajinaṃ naraśārdūla ruciraṃ me bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,41.18
GE09ram_02_u:8724: śaṣpabṛsyāṃ vinītāyām icchāmy aham upāsitum // Ram_3,41.19
GE09ram_02_u:8725: kāmavṛttam idaṃ raudraṃ strīṇām asadṛśaṃ matam
GE09ram_02_u:8726: vapuṣā tv asya sattvasya vismayo janito mama // Ram_3,41.20
GE09ram_02_u:8729: babhūva rāghavasyāpi mano vismayam āgatam // Ram_3,41.21
GE09ram_02_u:8730: evaṃ sītāvacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca mṛgam adbhutam
GE09ram_02_u:8731: uvāca rāghavo hṛṣṭo bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,41.22
GE09ram_02_u:8732: paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ spṛhāṃ mṛgagatām imām
GE09ram_02_u:8733: rūpaśreṣṭhatayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,41.23
GE09ram_02_u:8735: kutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ saumitre yo 'sya kaścit samo mṛgaḥ // Ram_3,41.24
GE09ram_02_u:8737: śobhante mṛgam āśritya citrāḥ kanakabindubhiḥ // Ram_3,41.25
GE09ram_02_u:8739: jihvāṃ mukhān niḥsarantīṃ meghād iva śatahradām // Ram_3,41.26
GE09ram_02_u:8741: kasya nāmābhirūpo 'sau na mano lobhayen mṛgaḥ // Ram_3,41.27
GE09ram_02_u:8743: nānāratnamayaṃ divyaṃ na mano vismayaṃ vrajet // Ram_3,41.28
GE09ram_02_u:8744: māṃsahetor api mṛgān vihārārthaṃ ca dhanvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8745: ghnanti lakṣmaṇa rājāno mṛgayāyāṃ mahāvane // Ram_3,41.29
GE09ram_02_u:8748: tat sāram akhilaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanaṃ nicayavardhanam
GE09ram_02_u:8749: manasā cintitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā śukrasya lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,41.31
GE09ram_02_u:8751: tam artham arthaśāstrajñaḥ prāhur arthyāś ca lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,41.32
GE09ram_02_u:8753: upavekṣyati vaidehī mayā saha sumadhyamā // Ram_3,41.33
GE09ram_02_u:8754: na kādalī na priyakī na praveṇī na cāvikī
GE09ram_02_u:8755: bhaved etasya sadṛśī sparśaneneti me matiḥ // Ram_3,41.34
GE09ram_02_u:8756: eṣa caiva mṛgaḥ śrīmān yaś ca divyo nabhaścaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8757: ubhāv etau mṛgau divyau tārāmṛgamahīmṛgau // Ram_3,41.35
GE09ram_02_u:8758: yadi vāyaṃ tathā yan māṃ bhaved vadasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:8759: māyaiṣā rākṣasasyeti kartavyo 'sya vadho mayā // Ram_3,41.36
GE09ram_02_u:8761: vane vicaratā pūrvaṃ hiṃsitā munipuṃgavāḥ // Ram_3,41.37
GE09ram_02_u:8763: nihatāḥ parameṣvāsās tasmād vadhyas tv ayaṃ mṛgaḥ // Ram_3,41.38
GE09ram_02_u:8765: udarastho dvijān hanti svagarbho 'śvatarīm iva // Ram_3,41.39
GE09ram_02_u:8766: sa kadācic cirāl loke āsasāda mahāmunim
GE09ram_02_u:8767: agastyaṃ tejasā yuktaṃ bhakṣyas tasya babhūva ha // Ram_3,41.40
GE09ram_02_u:8768: samutthāne ca tadrūpaṃ kartukāmaṃ samīkṣya tam
GE09ram_02_u:8769: utsmayitvā tu bhagavān vātāpim idam abravīt // Ram_3,41.41
GE09ram_02_u:8771: jīvaloke dvijaśreṣṭhās tasmād asi jarāṃ gataḥ // Ram_3,41.42
GE09ram_02_u:8772: evaṃ tan na bhaved rakṣo vātāpir iva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:8775: iha tvaṃ bhava saṃnaddho yantrito rakṣa maithilīm // Ram_3,41.44
GE09ram_02_u:8776: asyām āyattam asmākaṃ yat kṛtyaṃ raghunandana
GE09ram_02_u:8777: aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi grahīṣyāmy athavā mṛgam // Ram_3,41.45
GE09ram_02_u:8778: yāvad gacchāmi saumitre mṛgam ānayituṃ drutam
GE09ram_02_u:8779: paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehīṃ mṛgatvaci gataspṛhām // Ram_3,41.46
GE09ram_02_u:8780: tvacā pradhānayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:8781: apramattena te bhāvyam āśramasthena sītayā // Ram_3,41.47
GE09ram_02_u:8782: yāvat pṛṣatam ekena sāyakena nihanmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:8783: hatvaitac carma ādāya śīghram eṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,41.48
GE09ram_02_u:8784: pradakṣiṇenātibalena pakṣiṇā jaṭāyuṣā buddhimatā ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:8785: bhavāpramattaḥ pratigṛhya maithilīṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvata eva śaṅkitaḥ // Ram_3,41.49
GE09ram_02_u:8786: tathā tu taṃ samādiśya bhrātaraṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8789: ābadhya ca kalāpau dvau jagāmodagravikramaḥ // Ram_3,42.2
GE09ram_02_u:8790: taṃ vañcayāno rājendram āpatantaṃ nirīkṣya vai
GE09ram_02_u:8792: baddhāsir dhanur ādāya pradudrāva yato mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8793: taṃ sa paśyati rūpeṇa dyotamānam ivāgrataḥ // Ram_3,42.4
GE09ram_02_u:8795: ativṛttam iṣoḥ pātāl lobhayānaṃ kadācana // Ram_3,42.5
GE09ram_02_u:8797: daśyamānam adṛśyaṃ ca navoddeśeṣu keṣucit // Ram_3,42.6
GE09ram_02_u:8799: muhūrtād eva dadṛśe muhur dūrāt prakāśate // Ram_3,42.7
GE09ram_02_u:8801: āsīt kruddhas tu kākutstho vivaśas tena mohitaḥ // Ram_3,42.8
GE09ram_02_u:8803: mṛgaiḥ parivṛto vanyair adūrāt pratyadṛśyata // Ram_3,42.9
GE09ram_02_u:8804: dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahātejās taṃ hantuṃ kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8805: saṃdhāya sudṛḍhe cāpe vikṛṣya balavad balī // Ram_3,42.10
GE09ram_02_u:8806: tam eva mṛgam uddiśya jvalantam iva pannagam
GE09ram_02_u:8812: mriyamāṇas tu mārīco jahau tāṃ kṛtrimāṃ tanum // Ram_3,42.13
GE09ram_02_u:8813: samprāptakālam ājñāya cakāra ca tataḥ svaram
GE09ram_02_u:8814: sadṛśaṃ rāghavasyaiva hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca // Ram_3,42.14
GE09ram_02_u:8816: mṛgarūpaṃ tu tat tyaktvā rākṣasaṃ rūpam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8817: cakre sa sumahākāyo mārīco jīvitaṃ tyajan // Ram_3,42.15
GE09ram_02_u:8820: taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau rākṣasaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_02_u:8821: jagāma manasā sītāṃ lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ smaran // Ram_3,42.17
GE09ram_02_u:8822: hā sīte lakṣmaṇety evam ākruśya tu mahāsvaram
GE09ram_02_u:8823: mamāra rākṣasaḥ so 'yaṃ śrutvā sītā kathaṃ bhavet // Ram_3,42.18
GE09ram_02_u:8824: lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ kām avasthāṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:8825: iti saṃcintya dharmātmā rāmo hṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ // Ram_3,42.19
GE09ram_02_u:8826: tatra rāmaṃ bhayaṃ tīvram āviveśa viṣādajam
GE09ram_02_u:8827: rākṣasaṃ mṛgarūpaṃ taṃ hatvā śrutvā ca tatsvaram // Ram_3,42.20
GE09ram_02_u:8828: nihatya pṛṣataṃ cānyaṃ māṃsam ādāya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8830: ārtasvaraṃ tu taṃ bhartur vijñāya sadṛśaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:8831: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ sītā gaccha jānīhi rāghavam // Ram_3,43.1
GE09ram_02_u:8832: na hi me jīvitaṃ sthāne hṛdayaṃ vāvatiṣṭhate
GE09ram_02_u:8833: krośataḥ paramārtasya śrutaḥ śabdo mayā bhṛśam // Ram_3,43.2
GE09ram_02_u:8834: ākrandamānaṃ tu vane bhrātaraṃ trātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:8835: taṃ kṣipram abhidhāva tvaṃ bhrātaraṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇam // Ram_3,43.3
GE09ram_02_u:8836: rakṣasāṃ vaśam āpannaṃ siṃhānām iva govṛṣam
GE09ram_02_u:8837: na jagāma tathoktas tu bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam // Ram_3,43.4
GE09ram_02_u:8838: tam uvāca tatas tatra kupitā janakātmajā
GE09ram_02_u:8839: saumitre mitrarūpeṇa bhrātus tvam asi śatruvat // Ram_3,43.5
GE09ram_02_u:8840: yas tvam asyām avasthāyāṃ bhrātaraṃ nābhipadyase
GE09ram_02_u:8841: icchasi tvaṃ vinaśyantaṃ rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇa matkṛte // Ram_3,43.6
GE09ram_02_u:8842: vyasanaṃ te priyaṃ manye sneho bhrātari nāsti te
GE09ram_02_u:8843: tena tiṣṭhasi viśrabdhas tam apaśyan mahādyutim // Ram_3,43.7
GE09ram_02_u:8844: kiṃ hi saṃśayam āpanne tasminn iha mayā bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:8845: kartavyam iha tiṣṭhantyā yat pradhānas tvam āgataḥ // Ram_3,43.8
GE09ram_02_u:8847: abravīl lakṣmaṇas trastāṃ sītāṃ mṛgavadhūm iva // Ram_3,43.9
GE09ram_02_u:8849: rākṣaseṣu piśāceṣu kiṃnareṣu mṛgeṣu ca // Ram_3,43.10
GE09ram_02_u:8850: dānaveṣu ca ghoreṣu na sa vidyeta śobhane
GE09ram_02_u:8851: yo rāmaṃ pratiyudhyeta samare vāsavopamam // Ram_3,43.11
GE09ram_02_u:8852: avadhyaḥ samare rāmo naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:8853: na tvām asmin vane hātum utsahe rāghavaṃ vinā // Ram_3,43.12
GE09ram_02_u:8854: anivāryaṃ balaṃ tasya balair balavatām api
GE09ram_02_u:8855: tribhir lokaiḥ samudyuktaiḥ seśvaraiḥ sāmarair api // Ram_3,43.13
GE09ram_02_u:8856: hṛdayaṃ nirvṛtaṃ te 'stu saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam
GE09ram_02_u:8857: āgamiṣyati te bhartā śīghraṃ hatvā mṛgottamam // Ram_3,43.14
GE09ram_02_u:8858: na sa tasya svaro vyaktaṃ na kaścid api daivataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8859: gandharvanagaraprakhyā māyā sā tasya rakṣasaḥ // Ram_3,43.15
GE09ram_02_u:8861: rāmeṇa tvaṃ varārohe na tvāṃ tyaktum ihotsahe // Ram_3,43.16
GE09ram_02_u:8862: kṛtavairāś ca kalyāṇi vayam etair niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8863: kharasya nidhane devi janasthānavadhaṃ prati // Ram_3,43.17
GE09ram_02_u:8865: hiṃsāvihārā vaidehi na cintayitum arhasi // Ram_3,43.18
GE09ram_02_u:8867: abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavādinam // Ram_3,43.19
GE09ram_02_u:8869: ahaṃ tava priyaṃ manye tenaitāni prabhāṣase // Ram_3,43.20
GE09ram_02_u:8870: naitac citraṃ sapatneṣu pāpaṃ lakṣmaṇa yad bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:8872: suduṣṭas tvaṃ vane rāmam ekam eko 'nugacchasi
GE09ram_02_u:8873: mama hetoḥ praticchannaḥ prayukto bharatena vā // Ram_3,43.22
GE09ram_02_u:8875: upasaṃśritya bhartāraṃ kāmayeyaṃ pṛthag janam // Ram_3,43.23
GE09ram_02_u:8876: samakṣaṃ tava saumitre prāṇāṃs tyakṣye na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8877: rāmaṃ vinā kṣaṇam api na hi jīvāmi bhūtale // Ram_3,43.24
GE09ram_02_u:8878: ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ sītayā romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:8879: abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ sītāṃ prāñjalir vijitendriyaḥ // Ram_3,43.25
GE09ram_02_u:8880: uttaraṃ notsahe vaktuṃ daivataṃ bhavatī mama
GE09ram_02_u:8881: vākyam apratirūpaṃ tu na citraṃ strīṣu maithili // Ram_3,43.26
GE09ram_02_u:8882: svabhāvas tv eṣa nārīṇām eṣu lokeṣu dṛśyate
GE09ram_02_u:8883: vimuktadharmāś capalās tīkṣṇā bhedakarāḥ striyaḥ // Ram_3,43.27
GE09ram_02_u:8885: nyāyavādī yathā vākyam ukto 'haṃ paruṣaṃ tvayā // Ram_3,43.28
GE09ram_02_u:8886: dhik tvām adya praṇaśya tvaṃ yan mām evaṃ viśaṅkase
GE09ram_02_u:8888: gamiṣye yatra kākutsthaḥ svasti te 'stu varānane
GE09ram_02_u:8889: rakṣantu tvāṃ viśālākṣi samagrā vanadevatāḥ // Ram_3,43.30
GE09ram_02_u:8890: nimittāni hi ghorāṇi yāni prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_02_u:8891: api tvāṃ saha rāmeṇa paśyeyaṃ punar āgataḥ // Ram_3,43.31
GE09ram_02_u:8893: pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ tīvraṃ bāṣpapariplutā // Ram_3,43.32
GE09ram_02_u:8895: ābandhiṣye 'thavā tyakṣye viṣame deham ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,43.33
GE09ram_02_u:8896: pibāmi vā viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam
GE09ram_02_u:8897: na tv ahaṃ rāghavād anyaṃ padāpi puruṣaṃ spṛśe // Ram_3,43.34
GE09ram_02_u:8899: pāṇibhyāṃ rudatī duḥkhād udaraṃ prajaghāna ha // Ram_3,43.35
GE09ram_02_u:8900: tām ārtarūpāṃ vimanā rudantīṃ saumitrir ālokya viśālanetrām
GE09ram_02_u:8901: āśvāsayāmāsa na caiva bhartus taṃ bhrātaraṃ kiṃcid uvāca sītā // Ram_3,43.36
GE09ram_02_u:8902: tatas tu sītām abhivādya lakṣmaṇaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ kiṃcid abhipraṇamya
GE09ram_02_u:8903: avekṣamāṇo bahuśaś ca maithilīṃ jagāma rāmasya samīpam ātmavān // Ram_3,43.37
GE09ram_02_u:8904: tayā paruṣam uktas tu kupito rāghavānujaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8905: sa vikāṅkṣan bhṛśaṃ rāmaṃ pratasthe nacirād iva // Ram_3,44.1
GE09ram_02_u:8912: rahitāṃ sūryacandrābhyāṃ saṃdhyām iva mahattamaḥ // Ram_3,44.4
GE09ram_02_u:8913: tām apaśyat tato bālāṃ rājaputrīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:8914: rohiṇīṃ śaśinā hīnāṃ grahavad bhṛśadāruṇaḥ // Ram_3,44.5
GE09ram_02_u:8916: samīkṣya na prakampante na pravāti ca mārutaḥ // Ram_3,44.6
GE09ram_02_u:8917: śīghrasrotāś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā vīkṣantaṃ raktalocanam
GE09ram_02_u:8918: stimitaṃ gantum ārebhe bhayād godāvarī nadī // Ram_3,44.7
GE09ram_02_u:8919: rāmasya tv antaraṃ prepsur daśagrīvas tadantare
GE09ram_02_u:8920: upatasthe ca vaidehīṃ bhikṣurūpeṇa rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,44.8
GE09ram_02_u:8922: abhyavartata vaidehīṃ citrām iva śanaiścaraḥ // Ram_3,44.9
GE09ram_02_u:8923: sa pāpo bhavyarūpeṇa tṛṇaiḥ kūpa ivāvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8924: atiṣṭhat prekṣya vaidehīṃ rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm // Ram_3,44.10
GE09ram_02_u:8930: abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ rahite rākṣasādhipaḥ // Ram_3,44.13
GE09ram_02_u:8931: tām uttamāṃ trilokānāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam
GE09ram_02_u:8932: vibhrājamānāṃ vapuṣā rāvaṇaḥ praśaśaṃsa ha // Ram_3,44.14
GE09ram_02_u:8934: kamalānāṃ śubhāṃ mālāṃ padminīva ca bibhratī // Ram_3,44.15
GE09ram_02_u:8935: hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ śubhā lakṣmīr apsarā vā śubhānane
GE09ram_02_u:8936: bhūtir vā tvaṃ varārohe ratir vā svairacāriṇī // Ram_3,44.16
GE09ram_02_u:8937: samāḥ śikhariṇaḥ snigdhāḥ pāṇḍurā daśanās tava
GE09ram_02_u:8938: viśāle vimale netre raktānte kṛṣṇatārake // Ram_3,44.17
GE09ram_02_u:8940: etāv upacitau vṛttau sahitau saṃpragalbhitau // Ram_3,44.18
GE09ram_02_u:8944: mano harasi me rāme nadīkūlam ivāmbhasā // Ram_3,44.20
GE09ram_02_u:8946: naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī // Ram_3,44.21
GE09ram_02_u:8948: iha vāsaś ca kāntāre cittam unmādayanti me // Ram_3,44.22
GE09ram_02_u:8949: sā pratikrāma bhadraṃ te na tvaṃ vastum ihārhasi
GE09ram_02_u:8950: rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāso ghorāṇāṃ kāmarūpiṇām // Ram_3,44.23
GE09ram_02_u:8952: sampannāni sugandhīni yuktāny ācarituṃ tvayā // Ram_3,44.24
GE09ram_02_u:8953: varaṃ mālyaṃ varaṃ pānaṃ varaṃ vastraṃ ca śobhane
GE09ram_02_u:8954: bhartāraṃ ca varaṃ manye tvadyuktam asitekṣaṇe // Ram_3,44.25
GE09ram_02_u:8955: kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā śucismite
GE09ram_02_u:8956: vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me // Ram_3,44.26
GE09ram_02_u:8957: neha gacchanti gandharvā na devā na ca kiṃnarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8958: rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāsaḥ kathaṃ nu tvam ihāgatā // Ram_3,44.27
GE09ram_02_u:8960: ṛkṣās tarakṣavaḥ kaṅkāḥ kathaṃ tebhyo na bibhyasi // Ram_3,44.28
GE09ram_02_u:8962: katham ekā mahāraṇye na bibheṣi varānane // Ram_3,44.29
GE09ram_02_u:8963: kāsi kasya kutaś ca tvaṃ kiṃnimittaṃ ca daṇḍakān
GE09ram_02_u:8964: ekā carasi kalyāṇi ghorān rākṣasasevitān // Ram_3,44.30
GE09ram_02_u:8966: dvijātiveṣeṇa hi taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:8969: abravīt siddham ity eva tadā taṃ saumyadarśanam // Ram_3,44.32
GE09ram_02_u:8970: dvijātiveṣeṇa samīkṣya maithilī tam āgataṃ pātrakusumbhadhāriṇam
GE09ram_02_u:8971: aśakyam udveṣṭum upāyadarśanān nyamantrayad brāhmaṇavad yathāgatam // Ram_3,44.33
GE09ram_02_u:8972: iyaṃ bṛsī brāhmaṇa kāmam āsyatām idaṃ ca pādyaṃ pratigṛhyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:8973: idaṃ ca siddhaṃ vanajātam uttamaṃ tvadartham avyagram ihopabhujyatām // Ram_3,44.34
GE09ram_02_u:8975: prahasya tasyā haraṇe dhṛtaṃ manaḥ samarpayāmāsa vadhāya rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,44.35
GE09ram_02_u:8976: tataḥ suveṣaṃ mṛgayāgataṃ patiṃ pratīkṣamāṇā sahalakṣmaṇaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:8977: nirīkṣamāṇā haritaṃ dadarśa tan mahad vanaṃ naiva tu rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_3,44.36
GE09ram_02_u:8978: rāvaṇena tu vaidehī tadā pṛṣṭā jihīrṣuṇā
GE09ram_02_u:8980: brāhmaṇaś cātithiś caiṣa anukto hi śapeta mām
GE09ram_02_u:8981: iti dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu sītā vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,45.2
GE09ram_02_u:8983: sītā nāmnāsmi bhadraṃ te rāmabhāryā dvijottama // Ram_3,45.3
GE09ram_02_u:8986: tataḥ saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ samamanyata me patim
GE09ram_02_u:8989: kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ mamāryā yācate varam // Ram_3,45.6
GE09ram_02_u:8990: pratigṛhya tu kaikeyī śvaśuraṃ sukṛtena me
GE09ram_02_u:8992: dvāv ayācata bhartāraṃ satyasaṃdhaṃ nṛpottamam // Ram_3,45.7
GE09ram_02_u:8993: nādya bhokṣye na ca svapsye na pāsye 'haṃ kadācana
GE09ram_02_u:8994: eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate // Ram_3,45.8
GE09ram_02_u:8995: iti bruvāṇāṃ kaikeyīṃ śvaśuro me sa mānadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8996: ayācatārthair anvarthair na ca yācñāṃ cakāra sā // Ram_3,45.9
GE09ram_02_u:8998: rāmeti prathito loke guṇavān satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9000: abhiṣekāya tu pituḥ samīpaṃ rāmam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:9001: kaikeyī mama bhartāram ity uvāca drutaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,45.11
GE09ram_02_u:9002: tava pitrā samājñaptaṃ mamedaṃ śṛṇu rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:9003: bharatāya pradātavyam idaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam // Ram_3,45.12
GE09ram_02_u:9004: tvayā tu khalu vastavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:9005: vane pravraja kākutstha pitaraṃ mocayānṛtāt // Ram_3,45.13
GE09ram_02_u:9006: tathety uvāca tāṃ rāmaḥ kaikeyīm akutobhayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9007: cakāra tadvacas tasyā mama bhartā dṛḍhavrataḥ // Ram_3,45.14
GE09ram_02_u:9008: dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyāt satyaṃ brūyān na cānṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:9009: etad brāhmaṇa rāmasya vrataṃ dhruvam anuttamam // Ram_3,45.15
GE09ram_02_u:9010: tasya bhrātā tu vaimātro lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:9012: sa bhrātā lakṣmaṇo nāma dharmacārī dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9013: anvagacchad dhanuṣpāṇiḥ pravrajantaṃ mayā saha // Ram_3,45.17
GE09ram_02_u:9014: te vayaṃ pracyutā rājyāt kaikeyyās tu kṛte trayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9015: vicarāma dvijaśreṣṭha vanaṃ gambhīram ojasā // Ram_3,45.18
GE09ram_02_u:9016: samāśvasa muhūrtaṃ tu śakyaṃ vastum iha tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:9017: āgamiṣyati me bhartā vanyam ādāya puṣkalam // Ram_3,45.19
GE09ram_02_u:9018: sa tvaṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca kulam ācakṣva tattvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9019: ekaś ca daṇḍakāraṇye kimarthaṃ carasi dvija // Ram_3,45.20
GE09ram_02_u:9023: ahaṃ sa rāvaṇo nāma sīte rakṣogaṇeśvaraḥ // Ram_3,45.22
GE09ram_02_u:9025: ratiṃ svakeṣu dāreṣu nādhigacchāmy anindite // Ram_3,45.23
GE09ram_02_u:9027: sarvāsām eva bhadraṃ te mamāgramahiṣī bhava // Ram_3,45.24
GE09ram_02_u:9028: laṅkā nāma samudrasya madhye mama mahāpurī
GE09ram_02_u:9030: tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ vaneṣu vicariṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:9033: sīte paricariṣyanti bhāryā bhavasi me yadi // Ram_3,45.27
GE09ram_02_u:9037: mahodadhim ivākṣobhyam ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā // Ram_3,45.29
GE09ram_02_u:9039: nṛsiṃhaṃ siṃhasaṃkāśam ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā // Ram_3,45.30
GE09ram_02_u:9041: pṛthukīrtiṃ mahābāhum ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā // Ram_3,45.31
GE09ram_02_u:9042: tvaṃ punar jambukaḥ siṃhīṃ mām ihecchasi durlabhām
GE09ram_02_u:9043: nāhaṃ śakyā tvayā spraṣṭum ādityasya prabhā yathā // Ram_3,45.32
GE09ram_02_u:9044: pādapān kāñcanān nūnaṃ bahūn paśyasi mandabhāk
GE09ram_02_u:9045: rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ yas tvam icchasi rāvaṇa // Ram_3,45.33
GE09ram_02_u:9047: āśīviṣasya vadanād daṃṣṭrām ādātum icchasi // Ram_3,45.34
GE09ram_02_u:9049: kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ pītvā svastimān gantum icchasi // Ram_3,45.35
GE09ram_02_u:9050: akṣisūcyā pramṛjasi jihvayā lekṣi ca kṣuram
GE09ram_02_u:9051: rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryām adhigantuṃ tvam icchasi // Ram_3,45.36
GE09ram_02_u:9052: avasajya śilāṃ kaṇṭhe samudraṃ tartum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:9054: yo rāmasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ pradharṣayitum icchasi // Ram_3,45.37
GE09ram_02_u:9056: kalyāṇavṛttāṃ rāmasya yo bhāryāṃ hartum icchasi // Ram_3,45.38
GE09ram_02_u:9058: rāmasya sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ yo 'dhigantuṃ tvam icchasi // Ram_3,45.39
GE09ram_02_u:9059: yad antaraṃ siṃhaśṛgālayor vane yad antaraṃ syandanikāsamudrayoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9060: surāgryasauvīrakayor yad antaraṃ tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca // Ram_3,45.40
GE09ram_02_u:9061: yad antaraṃ kāñcanasīsalohayor yad antaraṃ candanavāripaṅkayoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9062: yad antaraṃ hastibiḍālayor vane tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca // Ram_3,45.41
GE09ram_02_u:9063: yad antaraṃ vāyasavainateyayor yad antaraṃ madgumayūrayor api
GE09ram_02_u:9064: yad antaraṃ sārasagṛdhrayor vane tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca // Ram_3,45.42
GE09ram_02_u:9066: hṛtāpi te 'haṃ na jarāṃ gamiṣye vajraṃ yathā makṣikayāvagīrṇam // Ram_3,45.43
GE09ram_02_u:9067: itīva tad vākyam aduṣṭabhāvā sudṛṣṭam uktvā rajanīcaraṃ tam
GE09ram_02_u:9068: gātraprakampād vyathitā babhūva vātoddhatā sā kadalīva tanvī // Ram_3,45.44
GE09ram_02_u:9069: tāṃ vepamānām upalakṣya sītāṃ sa rāvaṇo mṛtyusamaprabhāvaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9070: kulaṃ balaṃ nāma ca karma cātmanaḥ samācacakṣe bhayakāraṇārtham // Ram_3,45.45
GE09ram_02_u:9072: lalāṭe bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ pratyuvāca ha // Ram_3,46.1
GE09ram_02_u:9074: rāvaṇo nāma bhadraṃ te daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān // Ram_3,46.2
GE09ram_02_u:9076: vidravanti bhayād bhītā mṛtyor iva sadā prajāḥ // Ram_3,46.3
GE09ram_02_u:9078: dvaṃdvam āsāditaḥ krodhād raṇe vikramya nirjitaḥ // Ram_3,46.4
GE09ram_02_u:9081: yasya tat puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ kāmagaṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:9082: vīryād āvarjitaṃ bhadre yena yāmi vihāyasam // Ram_3,46.6
GE09ram_02_u:9085: yatra tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ tatra māruto vāti śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9086: tīvrāṃśuḥ śiśirāṃśuś ca bhayāt sampadyate raviḥ // Ram_3,46.8
GE09ram_02_u:9088: bhavanti yatra yatrāhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi ca carāmi ca // Ram_3,46.9
GE09ram_02_u:9089: mama pāre samudrasya laṅkā nāma purī śubhā
GE09ram_02_u:9095: tatra tvaṃ vasatī sīte rājaputri mayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:9096: na smariṣyasi nārīṇāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ manasvini // Ram_3,46.13
GE09ram_02_u:9097: bhuñjānā mānuṣān bhogān divyāṃś ca varavarṇini
GE09ram_02_u:9098: na smariṣyasi rāmasya mānuṣasya gatāyuṣaḥ // Ram_3,46.14
GE09ram_02_u:9099: sthāpayitvā priyaṃ putraṃ rājñā daśarathena yaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9100: mandavīryaḥ suto jyeṣṭhas tataḥ prasthāpito vanam // Ram_3,46.15
GE09ram_02_u:9104: na manmathaśarāviṣṭaṃ pratyākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_3,46.17
GE09ram_02_u:9107: evam uktā tu vaidehī kruddhā saṃraktalocanā
GE09ram_02_u:9108: abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rahite rākṣasādhipam // Ram_3,46.19
GE09ram_02_u:9110: bhrātaraṃ vyapadiśya tvam aśubhaṃ kartum icchasi // Ram_3,46.20
GE09ram_02_u:9112: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ // Ram_3,46.21
GE09ram_02_u:9113: apahṛtya śacīṃ bhāryāṃ śakyam indrasya jīvitum
GE09ram_02_u:9114: na tu rāmasya bhāryāṃ mām apanīyāsti jīvitam // Ram_3,46.22
GE09ram_02_u:9115: jīvec ciraṃ vajradharasya hastāc chacīṃ pradhṛṣyāpratirūparūpām
GE09ram_02_u:9116: na mādṛśīṃ rākṣasa dharṣayitvā pītāmṛtasyāpi tavāsti mokṣaḥ // Ram_3,46.23
GE09ram_02_u:9118: haste hastaṃ samāhatya cakāra sumahad vapuḥ // Ram_3,47.1
GE09ram_02_u:9119: sa maithilīṃ punar vākyaṃ babhāṣe ca tato bhṛśam
GE09ram_02_u:9120: nonmattayā śrutau manye mama vīryaparākramau // Ram_3,47.2
GE09ram_02_u:9121: udvaheyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ tu medinīm ambare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9122: āpibeyaṃ samudraṃ ca mṛtyuṃ hanyāṃ raṇe sthitaḥ // Ram_3,47.3
GE09ram_02_u:9123: arkaṃ rundhyāṃ śarais tīkṣṇair vibhindyāṃ hi mahītalam
GE09ram_02_u:9124: kāmarūpiṇam unmatte paśya māṃ kāmadaṃ patim // Ram_3,47.4
GE09ram_02_u:9126: kruddhasya hariparyante rakte netre babhūvatuḥ // Ram_3,47.5
GE09ram_02_u:9127: sadyaḥ saumyaṃ parityajya bhikṣurūpaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9128: svaṃ rūpaṃ kālarūpābhaṃ bheje vaiśravaṇānujaḥ // Ram_3,47.6
GE09ram_02_u:9130: daśāsyaḥ kārmukī bāṇī babhūva kṣaṇadācaraḥ // Ram_3,47.7
GE09ram_02_u:9132: pratipede svakaṃ rūpaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ // Ram_3,47.8
GE09ram_02_u:9134: raktāmbaradharas tasthau strīratnaṃ prekṣya maithilīm // Ram_3,47.9
GE09ram_02_u:9135: sa tām asitakeśāntāṃ bhāskarasya prabhām iva
GE09ram_02_u:9137: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ yadi bhartāram icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:9138: mām āśraya varārohe tavāhaṃ sadṛśaḥ patiḥ // Ram_3,47.11
GE09ram_02_u:9139: māṃ bhajasva cirāya tvam ahaṃ ślāghyas tava priyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9140: naiva cāhaṃ kvacid bhadre kariṣye tava vipriyam
GE09ram_02_u:9141: tyajyatāṃ mānuṣo bhāvo mayi bhāvaḥ praṇīyatām // Ram_3,47.12
GE09ram_02_u:9143: kair guṇair anuraktāsi mūḍhe paṇḍitamānini // Ram_3,47.13
GE09ram_02_u:9144: yaḥ striyā vacanād rājyaṃ vihāya sasuhṛjjanam
GE09ram_02_u:9145: asmin vyālānucarite vane vasati durmatiḥ // Ram_3,47.14
GE09ram_02_u:9146: ity uktvā maithilīṃ vākyaṃ priyārhāṃ priyavādinīm
GE09ram_02_u:9147: jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ budhaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva // Ram_3,47.15
GE09ram_02_u:9148: vāmena sītāṃ padmākṣīṃ mūrdhajeṣu kareṇa saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9149: ūrvos tu dakṣiṇenaiva parijagrāha pāṇinā // Ram_3,47.16
GE09ram_02_u:9152: sa ca māyāmayo divyaḥ kharayuktaḥ kharasvanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9154: tatas tāṃ paruṣair vākyair abhitarjya mahāsvanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9155: aṅkenādāya vaidehīṃ ratham āropayat tadā // Ram_3,47.19
GE09ram_02_u:9157: rāmeti sītā duḥkhārtā rāmaṃ dūragataṃ vane // Ram_3,47.20
GE09ram_02_u:9158: tām akāmāṃ sa kāmārtaḥ pannagendravadhūm iva
GE09ram_02_u:9161: bhṛśaṃ cukrośa matteva bhrāntacittā yathāturā // Ram_3,47.22
GE09ram_02_u:9163: hriyamāṇāṃ na jānīṣe rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā // Ram_3,47.23
GE09ram_02_u:9164: jīvitaṃ sukham arthāṃś ca dharmahetoḥ parityajan
GE09ram_02_u:9165: hriyamāṇām adharmeṇa māṃ rāghava na paśyasi // Ram_3,47.24
GE09ram_02_u:9167: katham evaṃvidhaṃ pāpaṃ na tvaṃ śādhi hi rāvaṇam // Ram_3,47.25
GE09ram_02_u:9169: kālo 'py aṅgī bhavaty atra sasyānām iva paktaye // Ram_3,47.26
GE09ram_02_u:9171: jīvitāntakaraṃ ghoraṃ rāmād vyasanam āpnuhi // Ram_3,47.27
GE09ram_02_u:9172: hantedānīṃ sakāmā tu kaikeyī bāndhavaiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:9175: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,47.29
GE09ram_02_u:9177: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,47.30
GE09ram_02_u:9179: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,47.31
GE09ram_02_u:9180: daivatāni ca yānty asmin vane vividhapādape
GE09ram_02_u:9181: namaskaromy ahaṃ tebhyo bhartuḥ śaṃsata māṃ hṛtām // Ram_3,47.32
GE09ram_02_u:9182: yāni kānicid apy atra sattvāni nivasanty uta
GE09ram_02_u:9183: sarvāṇi śaraṇaṃ yāmi mṛgapakṣigaṇān api // Ram_3,47.33
GE09ram_02_u:9188: rāmāya tu yathātattvaṃ jaṭāyo haraṇaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:9189: lakṣmaṇāya ca tat sarvam ākhyātavyam aśeṣataḥ // Ram_3,47.36
GE09ram_02_u:9190: taṃ śabdam avasuptasya jaṭāyur atha śuśruve
GE09ram_02_u:9191: niraikṣad rāvaṇaṃ kṣipraṃ vaidehīṃ ca dadarśa saḥ // Ram_3,48.1
GE09ram_02_u:9193: vanaspatigataḥ śrīmān vyājahāra śubhāṃ giram // Ram_3,48.2
GE09ram_02_u:9195: jaṭāyur nāma nāmnāhaṃ gṛdhrarājo mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,48.3
GE09ram_02_u:9197: lokānāṃ ca hite yukto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ // Ram_3,48.4
GE09ram_02_u:9199: sītā nāma varārohā yāṃ tvaṃ hartum ihecchasi // Ram_3,48.5
GE09ram_02_u:9200: kathaṃ rājā sthito dharme paradārān parāmṛśet
GE09ram_02_u:9203: na tat samācared dhīro yat paro 'sya vigarhayet
GE09ram_02_u:9204: yathātmanas tathānyeṣāṃ dārā rakṣyā vimarśanāt // Ram_3,48.7
GE09ram_02_u:9205: arthaṃ vā yadi vā kāmaṃ śiṣṭāḥ śāstreṣvanāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:9206: vyavasyanty anu rājānaṃ dharmaṃ paulastyanandana // Ram_3,48.8
GE09ram_02_u:9207: rājā dharmaś ca kāmaś ca dravyāṇāṃ cottamo nidhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9208: dharmaḥ śubhaṃ vā pāpaṃ vā rājamūlaṃ pravartate // Ram_3,48.9
GE09ram_02_u:9209: pāpasvabhāvaś capalaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:9210: aiśvaryam abhisamprāpto vimānam iva duṣkṛtiḥ // Ram_3,48.10
GE09ram_02_u:9211: kāmasvabhāvo yo yasya na sa śakyaḥ pramārjitum
GE09ram_02_u:9212: na hi duṣṭātmanām āryam āvasaty ālaye ciram // Ram_3,48.11
GE09ram_02_u:9213: viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā rāmo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9217: atra brūhi yathāsatyaṃ ko rāmasya vyatikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9218: yasya tvaṃ lokanāthasya hṛtvā bhāryāṃ gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,48.14
GE09ram_02_u:9219: kṣipraṃ visṛja vaidehīṃ mā tvā ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:9220: dahed dahanabhūtena vṛtram indrāśanir yathā // Ram_3,48.15
GE09ram_02_u:9222: grīvāyāṃ pratimuktaṃ ca kālapāśaṃ na paśyasi // Ram_3,48.16
GE09ram_02_u:9223: sa bhāraḥ saumya bhartavyo yo naraṃ nāvasādayet
GE09ram_02_u:9224: tad annam upabhoktavyaṃ jīryate yad anāmayam // Ram_3,48.17
GE09ram_02_u:9225: yat kṛtvā na bhaved dharmo na kīrtir na yaśo bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:9226: śarīrasya bhavet khedaḥ kas tat karma samācaret // Ram_3,48.18
GE09ram_02_u:9229: vṛddho 'haṃ tvaṃ yuvā dhanvī sarathaḥ kavacī śarī
GE09ram_02_u:9230: tathāpy ādāya vaidehīṃ kuśalī na gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,48.20
GE09ram_02_u:9231: na śaktas tvaṃ balāddhartuṃ vaidehīṃ mama paśyataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9232: hetubhir nyāyasaṃyuktair dhruvāṃ vedaśrutim iva // Ram_3,48.21
GE09ram_02_u:9233: yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:9234: śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathāpūrvaṃ kharas tathā // Ram_3,48.22
GE09ram_02_u:9236: nacirāc cīravāsās tvāṃ rāmo yudhi vadhiṣyati // Ram_3,48.23
GE09ram_02_u:9237: kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ gatau dūraṃ nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_02_u:9238: kṣipraṃ tvaṃ naśyase nīca tayor bhīto na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_3,48.24
GE09ram_02_u:9239: na hi me jīvamānasya nayiṣyasi śubhām imām
GE09ram_02_u:9240: sītāṃ kamalapattrākṣīṃ rāmasya mahiṣīṃ priyām // Ram_3,48.25
GE09ram_02_u:9241: avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaṃ priyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9242: jīvitenāpi rāmasya tathā daśarathasya ca // Ram_3,48.26
GE09ram_02_u:9243: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha daśagrīva muhūrtaṃ paśya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:9245: vṛntād iva phalaṃ tvāṃ tu pātayeyaṃ rathottamāt // Ram_3,48.27
GE09ram_02_u:9250: sa samprahāras tumulas tayos tasmin mahāvane
GE09ram_02_u:9251: babhūva vātoddhatayor meghayor gagane yathā // Ram_3,49.3
GE09ram_02_u:9259: cakāra bahudhā gātre vraṇān patagasattamaḥ // Ram_3,49.7
GE09ram_02_u:9262: sa tair bāṇair mahāvīryaḥ pūrṇamuktair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9263: bibheda niśitais tīkṣṇair gṛdhraṃ ghoraiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ // Ram_3,49.9
GE09ram_02_u:9265: acintayitvā bāṇāṃs tān rākṣasaṃ samabhidravat // Ram_3,49.10
GE09ram_02_u:9269: pakṣābhyāṃ ca mahātejā vyadhunot patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,49.12
GE09ram_02_u:9271: tāṃś cāsya javasampannāñ jaghāna samare balī // Ram_3,49.13
GE09ram_02_u:9274: pūrṇacandrapratīkāśaṃ chattraṃ ca vyajanaiḥ saha // Ram_3,49.14
GE09ram_02_u:9276: aṅkenādāya vaidehīṃ papāta bhuvi rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,49.15
GE09ram_02_u:9278: sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni gṛdhrarājam apūjayan // Ram_3,49.16
GE09ram_02_u:9279: pariśrāntaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā jarayā pakṣiyūthapam
GE09ram_02_u:9280: utpapāta punar hṛṣṭo maithilīṃ gṛhya rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,49.17
GE09ram_02_u:9282: gṛdhrarājaḥ samutpatya jaṭāyur idam abravīt // Ram_3,49.18
GE09ram_02_u:9284: alpabuddhe harasy enāṃ vadhāya khalu rakṣasām // Ram_3,49.19
GE09ram_02_u:9286: viṣapānaṃ pibasy etat pipāsita ivodakam // Ram_3,49.20
GE09ram_02_u:9288: śīghram eva vinaśyanti yathā tvaṃ vinaśiṣyasi // Ram_3,49.21
GE09ram_02_u:9289: baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena kva gatas tasya mokṣyase
GE09ram_02_u:9290: vadhāya baḍiśaṃ gṛhya sāmiṣaṃ jalajo yathā // Ram_3,49.22
GE09ram_02_u:9291: na hi jātu durādharṣau kākutsthau tava rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:9292: dharṣaṇaṃ cāśramasyāsya kṣamiṣyete tu rāghavau // Ram_3,49.23
GE09ram_02_u:9293: yathā tvayā kṛtaṃ karma bhīruṇā lokagarhitam
GE09ram_02_u:9295: yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:9296: śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathā bhrātā kharas tathā // Ram_3,49.25
GE09ram_02_u:9299: pāpānubandho vai yasya karmaṇaḥ ko nu tat pumān
GE09ram_02_u:9300: kurvīta lokādhipatiḥ svayambhūr bhagavān api // Ram_3,49.27
GE09ram_02_u:9301: evam uktvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ jaṭāyus tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9302: nipapāta bhṛśaṃ pṛṣṭhe daśagrīvasya vīryavān // Ram_3,49.28
GE09ram_02_u:9303: taṃ gṛhītvā nakhais tīkṣṇair virarāda samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9304: adhirūḍho gajāroho yathā syād duṣṭavāraṇam // Ram_3,49.29
GE09ram_02_u:9305: virarāda nakhair asya tuṇḍaṃ pṛṣṭhe samarpayan
GE09ram_02_u:9307: sa tathā gṛdhrarājena kliśyamāno muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9308: amarṣasphuritauṣṭhaḥ san prākampata sa rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,49.31
GE09ram_02_u:9312: vāmabāhūn daśa tadā vyapāharad ariṃdamaḥ // Ram_3,49.33
GE09ram_02_u:9313: tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ sītām utsṛjya vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:9314: muṣṭibhyāṃ caraṇābhyāṃ ca gṛdhrarājam apothayat // Ram_3,49.34
GE09ram_02_u:9316: rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pakṣiṇāṃ pravarasya ca // Ram_3,49.35
GE09ram_02_u:9318: pakṣau pādau ca pārśvau ca khaḍgam uddhṛtya socchinat // Ram_3,49.36
GE09ram_02_u:9320: nipapāta hato gṛdhro dharaṇyām alpajīvitaḥ // Ram_3,49.37
GE09ram_02_u:9321: taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau kṣatajārdraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_02_u:9322: abhyadhāvata vaidehī svabandhum iva duḥkhitā // Ram_3,49.38
GE09ram_02_u:9324: dadarśa laṅkādhipatiḥ pṛthivyāṃ jaṭāyuṣaṃ śāntam ivāgnidāvam // Ram_3,49.39
GE09ram_02_u:9325: tatas tu taṃ pattrarathaṃ mahītale nipātitaṃ rāvaṇavegamarditam
GE09ram_02_u:9326: punaḥ pariṣvajya śaśiprabhānanā ruroda sītā janakātmajā tadā // Ram_3,49.40
GE09ram_02_u:9328: dadarśa gṛdhraṃ patitaṃ samīpe rāghavāśramāt // Ram_3,50.1
GE09ram_02_u:9329: sā tu tārādhipamukhī rāvaṇena samīkṣya tam
GE09ram_02_u:9333: na nūnaṃ rāma jānāsi mahad vyasanam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9334: dhāvanti nūnaṃ kākutstha madarthaṃ mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // Ram_3,50.4
GE09ram_02_u:9335: trāhi mām adya kākutstha lakṣmaṇeti varāṅganā
GE09ram_02_u:9336: susaṃtrastā samākrandac chṛṇvatāṃ tu yathāntike // Ram_3,50.5
GE09ram_02_u:9339: tāṃ latām iva veṣṭantīm āliṅgantīṃ mahādrumān
GE09ram_02_u:9340: muñca muñceti bahuśaḥ pravadan rākṣasādhipaḥ // Ram_3,50.7
GE09ram_02_u:9341: krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti rāmeṇa rahitāṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:9344: jagat sarvam amaryādaṃ tamasāndhena saṃvṛtam // Ram_3,50.9
GE09ram_02_u:9345: dṛṣṭvā sītāṃ parāmṛṣṭāṃ dīnāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:9346: kṛtaṃ kāryam iti śrīmān vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ // Ram_3,50.10
GE09ram_02_u:9347: prahṛṣṭā vyathitāś cāsan sarve te paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9349: sa tu tāṃ rāma rāmeti rudantīṃ lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_02_u:9352: rarāja rājaputrī tu vidyut saudāmanī yathā // Ram_3,50.13
GE09ram_02_u:9353: uddhūtena ca vastreṇa tasyāḥ pītena rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9354: adhikaṃ paribabhrāja girir dīpta ivāgninā // Ram_3,50.14
GE09ram_02_u:9358: babhau cādityarāgeṇa tāmram abhram ivātape // Ram_3,50.16
GE09ram_02_u:9359: tasyās tad vimalaṃ vaktram ākāśe rāvaṇāṅkagam
GE09ram_02_u:9360: na rarāja vinā rāmaṃ vinālam iva paṅkajam // Ram_3,50.17
GE09ram_02_u:9361: babhūva jaladaṃ nīlaṃ bhittvā candra ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9363: śuklaiḥ suvimalair dantaiḥ prabhāvadbhir alaṃkṛtam // Ram_3,50.18
GE09ram_02_u:9367: śuśubhe na vinā rāmaṃ divā candra ivoditaḥ // Ram_3,50.20
GE09ram_02_u:9369: śuśubhe kāñcanī kāñcī nīlaṃ maṇim ivāśritā // Ram_3,50.21
GE09ram_02_u:9373: babhūva vimalo nīlaḥ saghoṣa iva toyadaḥ // Ram_3,50.23
GE09ram_02_u:9383: prāśobhayata vaidehī gajaṃ kaṣyeva kāñcanī // Ram_3,50.28
GE09ram_02_u:9387: saghoṣāṇy avakīryanta kṣīṇās tārā ivāmbarāt // Ram_3,50.30
GE09ram_02_u:9389: vaidehyā nipatan bhāti gaṅgeva gaganāc cyutā // Ram_3,50.31
GE09ram_02_u:9391: mā bhair iti vidhūtāgrā vyājahrur iva pādapāḥ // Ram_3,50.32
GE09ram_02_u:9393: sakhīm iva gatotsāhāṃ śocantīva sma maithilīm // Ram_3,50.33
GE09ram_02_u:9398: hriyamāṇāṃ tu vaidehīṃ dṛṣṭvā dīno divākaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9400: nāsti dharmaḥ kutaḥ satyaṃ nārjavaṃ nānṛśaṃsatā
GE09ram_02_u:9401: yatra rāmasya vaidehīṃ bhāryāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,50.37
GE09ram_02_u:9406: vikrośantīṃ dṛḍhaṃ sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ tathā gatām
GE09ram_02_u:9407: tāṃ tu lakṣmaṇa rāmeti krośantīṃ madhurasvarām // Ram_3,50.40
GE09ram_02_u:9411: tatas tu sā cārudatī śucismitā vinākṛtā bandhujanena maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:9412: apaśyatī rāghavalakṣmaṇāv ubhau vivarṇavaktrā bhayabhārapīḍitā // Ram_3,50.42
GE09ram_02_u:9413: kham utpatantaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā maithilī janakātmajā
GE09ram_02_u:9414: duḥkhitā paramodvignā bhaye mahati vartinī // Ram_3,51.1
GE09ram_02_u:9416: rudatī karuṇaṃ sītā hriyamāṇedam abravīt // Ram_3,51.2
