GE09ram_02_u:9418: jñātvā virahitāṃ yo māṃ corayitvā palāyase // Ram_3,51.3
GE09ram_02_u:9419: tvayaiva nūnaṃ duṣṭātman bhīruṇā hartum icchatā
GE09ram_02_u:9421: yo hi mām udyatas trātuṃ so 'py ayaṃ vinipātitaḥ // Ram_3,51.4
GE09ram_02_u:9422: paramaṃ khalu te vīryaṃ dṛśyate rākṣasādhama
GE09ram_02_u:9423: viśrāvya nāmadheyaṃ hi yuddhe nāsti jitā tvayā // Ram_3,51.5
GE09ram_02_u:9424: īdṛśaṃ garhitaṃ karma kathaṃ kṛtvā na lajjase
GE09ram_02_u:9425: striyāś ca haraṇaṃ nīca rahite ca parasya ca // Ram_3,51.6
GE09ram_02_u:9428: dhik te śauryaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca yat tvayā kathitaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:9429: kulākrośakaraṃ loke dhik te cāritram īdṛśam // Ram_3,51.8
GE09ram_02_u:9430: kiṃ śakyaṃ kartum evaṃ hi yaj javenaiva dhāvasi
GE09ram_02_u:9431: muhūrtam api tiṣṭhasva na jīvan pratiyāsyasi // Ram_3,51.9
GE09ram_02_u:9432: na hi cakṣuḥpathaṃ prāpya tayoḥ pārthivaputrayoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9433: sasainyo 'pi samarthas tvaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum // Ram_3,51.10
GE09ram_02_u:9434: na tvaṃ tayoḥ śarasparśaṃ soḍhuṃ śaktaḥ kathaṃcana
GE09ram_02_u:9435: vane prajvalitasyeva sparśam agner vihaṃgamaḥ // Ram_3,51.11
GE09ram_02_u:9436: sādhu kṛtvātmanaḥ pathyaṃ sādhu māṃ muñca rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:9437: matpradharṣaṇaruṣṭo hi bhrātrā saha patir mama
GE09ram_02_u:9438: vidhāsyati vināśāya tvaṃ māṃ yadi na muñcasi // Ram_3,51.12
GE09ram_02_u:9439: yena tvaṃ vyavasāyena balān māṃ hartum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:9440: vyavasāyaḥ sa te nīca bhaviṣyati nirarthakaḥ // Ram_3,51.13
GE09ram_02_u:9441: na hy ahaṃ tam apaśyantī bhartāraṃ vibudhopamam
GE09ram_02_u:9442: utsahe śatruvaśagā prāṇān dhārayituṃ ciram // Ram_3,51.14
GE09ram_02_u:9443: na nūnaṃ cātmanaḥ śreyaḥ pathyaṃ vā samavekṣase
GE09ram_02_u:9444: mṛtyukāle yathā martyo viparītāni sevate // Ram_3,51.15
GE09ram_02_u:9445: mumūrṣūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ yat pathyaṃ tan na rocate
GE09ram_02_u:9446: paśyāmīva hi kaṇṭhe tvāṃ kālapāśāvapāśitam // Ram_3,51.16
GE09ram_02_u:9447: yathā cāsmin bhayasthāne na bibheṣi daśānana
GE09ram_02_u:9448: vyaktaṃ hiraṇmayān hi tvaṃ saṃpaśyasi mahīruhān // Ram_3,51.17
GE09ram_02_u:9450: khaḍgapattravanaṃ caiva bhīmaṃ paśyasi rāvaṇa // Ram_3,51.18
GE09ram_02_u:9452: drakṣyase śālmalīṃ tīkṣṇām āyasaiḥ kaṇṭakaiś citām // Ram_3,51.19
GE09ram_02_u:9453: na hi tvam īdṛśaṃ kṛtvā tasyālīkaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9454: dharituṃ śakṣyasi ciraṃ viṣaṃ pītveva nirghṛṇaḥ // Ram_3,51.20
GE09ram_02_u:9456: kva gato lapsyase śarma bhartur mama mahātmanaḥ // Ram_3,51.21
GE09ram_02_u:9458: rākṣasā nihatā yena sahasrāṇi caturdaśa // Ram_3,51.22
GE09ram_02_u:9459: sa kathaṃ rāghavo vīraḥ sarvāstrakuśalo balī
GE09ram_02_u:9460: na tvāṃ hanyāc charais tīkṣṇair iṣṭabhāryāpahāriṇam // Ram_3,51.23
GE09ram_02_u:9461: etac cānyac ca paruṣaṃ vaidehī rāvaṇāṅkagā
GE09ram_02_u:9463: tathā bhṛśārtāṃ bahu caiva bhāṣiṇīṃ vilalāpa pūrvaṃ karuṇaṃ ca bhāminīm
GE09ram_02_u:9464: jahāra pāpas taruṇīṃ viveṣṭatīṃ nṛpātmajām āgatagātravepathum // Ram_3,51.25
GE09ram_02_u:9465: hriyamāṇā tu vaidehī kaṃcin nātham apaśyatī
GE09ram_02_u:9469: mumoca yadi rāmāya śaṃseyur iti maithilī // Ram_3,52.2
GE09ram_02_u:9471: sambhramāt tu daśagrīvas tat karma na ca buddhavān // Ram_3,52.3
GE09ram_02_u:9472: piṅgākṣās tāṃ viśālākṣīṃ netrair animiṣair iva
GE09ram_02_u:9473: vikrośantīṃ tadā sītāṃ dadṛśur vānararṣabhāḥ // Ram_3,52.4
GE09ram_02_u:9474: sa ca pampām atikramya laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:9475: jagāma rudatīṃ gṛhya maithilīṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ // Ram_3,52.5
GE09ram_02_u:9476: tāṃ jahāra susaṃhṛṣṭo rāvaṇo mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9478: vanāni saritaḥ śailān sarāṃsi ca vihāyasā
GE09ram_02_u:9479: sa kṣipraṃ samatīyāya śaraś cāpād iva cyutaḥ // Ram_3,52.7
GE09ram_02_u:9481: saritāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā samatīyāya sāgaram // Ram_3,52.8
GE09ram_02_u:9485: etadanto daśagrīva iti siddhās tadābruvan // Ram_3,52.10
GE09ram_02_u:9486: sa tu sītāṃ viveṣṭantīm aṅkenādāya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9487: praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ rūpiṇīṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,52.11
GE09ram_02_u:9491: nidadhe rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ mayo māyām ivāsurīm // Ram_3,52.13
GE09ram_02_u:9493: yathā naināṃ pumān strī vā sītāṃ paśyaty asaṃmataḥ // Ram_3,52.14
GE09ram_02_u:9495: yad yad icchet tad evāsyā deyaṃ macchandato yathā // Ram_3,52.15
GE09ram_02_u:9496: yā ca vakṣyati vaidehīṃ vacanaṃ kiṃcid apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:9497: ajñānād yadi vā jñānān na tasyā jīvitaṃ priyam // Ram_3,52.16
GE09ram_02_u:9498: tathoktvā rākṣasīs tās tu rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:9499: niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt kiṃ kṛtyam iti cintayan
GE09ram_02_u:9501: sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahāvīryo varadānena mohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9502: uvācaitān idaṃ vākyaṃ praśasya balavīryataḥ // Ram_3,52.18
GE09ram_02_u:9506: pauruṣaṃ balam āśritya trāsam utsṛjya dūrataḥ // Ram_3,52.20
GE09ram_02_u:9507: balaṃ hi sumahad yan me janasthāne niveśitam
GE09ram_02_u:9508: sadūṣaṇakharaṃ yuddhe hataṃ tad rāmasāyakaiḥ // Ram_3,52.21
GE09ram_02_u:9510: vairaṃ ca sumahajjātaṃ rāmaṃ prati sudāruṇam // Ram_3,52.22
GE09ram_02_u:9511: niryātayitum icchāmi tac ca vairam ahaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9512: na hi lapsyāmy ahaṃ nidrām ahatvā saṃyuge ripum // Ram_3,52.23
GE09ram_02_u:9513: taṃ tv idānīm ahaṃ hatvā kharadūṣaṇaghātinam
GE09ram_02_u:9514: rāmaṃ śarmopalapsyāmi dhanaṃ labdhveva nirdhanaḥ // Ram_3,52.24
GE09ram_02_u:9515: janasthāne vasadbhis tu bhavadbhī rāmam āśritā
GE09ram_02_u:9516: pravṛttir upanetavyā kiṃ karotīti tattvataḥ // Ram_3,52.25
GE09ram_02_u:9517: apramādāc ca gantavyaṃ sarvair eva niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9518: kartavyaś ca sadā yatno rāghavasya vadhaṃ prati // Ram_3,52.26
GE09ram_02_u:9520: ataś cāsmiñ janasthāne mayā yūyaṃ niyojitāḥ // Ram_3,52.27
GE09ram_02_u:9521: tataḥ priyaṃ vākyam upetya rākṣasā mahārtham aṣṭāv abhivādya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:9522: vihāya laṅkāṃ sahitāḥ pratasthire yato janasthānam alakṣyadarśanāḥ // Ram_3,52.28
GE09ram_02_u:9523: tatas tu sītām upalabhya rāvaṇaḥ susamprahṛṣṭaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:9524: prasajya rāmeṇa ca vairam uttamaṃ babhūva mohān muditaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,52.29
GE09ram_02_u:9528: praviveśa gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ sītāṃ draṣṭum abhitvaran // Ram_3,53.2
GE09ram_02_u:9529: sa praviśya tu tadveśma rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9532: vāyuvegair ivākrāntāṃ majjantīṃ nāvam arṇave // Ram_3,53.4
GE09ram_02_u:9534: adhomukhamukhīṃ dīnām abhyetya ca niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,53.5
GE09ram_02_u:9535: tāṃ tu śokavaśāṃ dīnām avaśāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9536: sa balād darśayāmāsa gṛhaṃ devagṛhopamam // Ram_3,53.6
GE09ram_02_u:9539: kāñcanais tāpanīyaiś ca sphāṭikai rājatais tathā
GE09ram_02_u:9542: sopānaṃ kāñcanaṃ citram āruroha tayā saha // Ram_3,53.9
GE09ram_02_u:9549: darśayitvā tu vaidehīṃ kṛtsnaṃ tad bhavanottamam
GE09ram_02_u:9550: uvāca vākyaṃ pāpātmā rāvaṇo janakātmajām // Ram_3,53.13
GE09ram_02_u:9552: varjayitvā jarāvṛddhān bālāṃś ca rajanīcarān // Ram_3,53.14
GE09ram_02_u:9553: teṣāṃ prabhur ahaṃ sīte sarveṣāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām
GE09ram_02_u:9554: sahasram ekam ekasya mama kāryapuraḥsaram // Ram_3,53.15
GE09ram_02_u:9555: yad idaṃ rājyatantraṃ me tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_02_u:9556: jīvitaṃ ca viśālākṣi tvaṃ me prāṇair garīyasī // Ram_3,53.16
GE09ram_02_u:9558: tāsāṃ tvam īśvarī sīte mama bhāryā bhava priye // Ram_3,53.17
GE09ram_02_u:9559: sādhu kiṃ te 'nyayā buddhyā rocayasva vaco mama
GE09ram_02_u:9560: bhajasva mābhitaptasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_3,53.18
GE09ram_02_u:9562: neyaṃ dharṣayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ // Ram_3,53.19
GE09ram_02_u:9563: na deveṣu na yakṣeṣu na gandharveṣu narṣiṣu
GE09ram_02_u:9564: ahaṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu yo me vīryasamo bhavet // Ram_3,53.20
GE09ram_02_u:9567: bhajasva sīte mām eva bhartāhaṃ sadṛśas tava
GE09ram_02_u:9568: yauvanaṃ hy adhruvaṃ bhīru ramasveha mayā saha // Ram_3,53.22
GE09ram_02_u:9569: darśane mā kṛthā buddhiṃ rāghavasya varānane
GE09ram_02_u:9570: kāsya śaktir ihāgantum api sīte manorathaiḥ // Ram_3,53.23
GE09ram_02_u:9571: na śakyo vāyur ākāśe pāśair baddhaṃ mahājavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9572: dīpyamānasya vāpy agner grahītuṃ vimalāṃ śikhām // Ram_3,53.24
GE09ram_02_u:9573: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ na taṃ paśyāmi śobhane
GE09ram_02_u:9574: vikrameṇa nayed yas tvāṃ madbāhuparipālitām // Ram_3,53.25
GE09ram_02_u:9575: laṅkāyāṃ sumahad rājyam idaṃ tvam anupālaya
GE09ram_02_u:9576: abhiṣekodakaklinnā tuṣṭā ca ramayasva mām // Ram_3,53.26
GE09ram_02_u:9577: duṣkṛtaṃ yat purā karma vanavāsena tad gatam
GE09ram_02_u:9578: yaś ca te sukṛto dharmas tasyeha phalam āpnuhi // Ram_3,53.27
GE09ram_02_u:9580: bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni tāni seva mayā saha // Ram_3,53.28
GE09ram_02_u:9581: puṣpakaṃ nāma suśroṇi bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya me
GE09ram_02_u:9582: vimānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca tad vimānaṃ manojavam // Ram_3,53.29
GE09ram_02_u:9583: tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ viharasva yathāsukham
GE09ram_02_u:9585: śokārtaṃ tu varārohe na bhrājati varānane
GE09ram_02_u:9586: alaṃ vrīḍena vaidehi dharmalopakṛtena te // Ram_3,53.31
GE09ram_02_u:9588: etau pādau mayā snigdhau śirobhiḥ paripīḍitau // Ram_3,53.32
GE09ram_02_u:9589: prasādaṃ kuru me kṣipraṃ vaśyo dāso 'ham asmi te
GE09ram_02_u:9590: nemāḥ śūnyā mayā vācaḥ śuṣyamāṇena bhāṣitāḥ // Ram_3,53.33
GE09ram_02_u:9591: na cāpi rāvaṇaḥ kāṃcin mūrdhnā strīṃ praṇameta ha
GE09ram_02_u:9592: evam uktvā daśagrīvo maithilīṃ janakātmajām // Ram_3,53.34
GE09ram_02_u:9594: sā tathoktā tu vaidehī nirbhayā śokakarṣitā
GE09ram_02_u:9595: tṛṇam antarataḥ kṛtvā rāvaṇaṃ pratyabhāṣata // Ram_3,54.1
GE09ram_02_u:9597: satyasaṃdhaḥ parijñāto yasya putraḥ sa rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,54.2
GE09ram_02_u:9598: rāmo nāma sa dharmātmā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9599: dīrghabāhur viśālākṣo daivataṃ sa patir mama // Ram_3,54.3
GE09ram_02_u:9601: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā yas te prāṇān hariṣyati // Ram_3,54.4
GE09ram_02_u:9602: pratyakṣaṃ yady ahaṃ tasya tvayā syāṃ dharṣitā balāt
GE09ram_02_u:9603: śayitā tvaṃ hataḥ saṃkhye janasthāne yathā kharaḥ // Ram_3,54.5
GE09ram_02_u:9604: ya ete rākṣasāḥ proktā ghorarūpā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9605: rāghave nirviṣāḥ sarve suparṇe pannagā yathā // Ram_3,54.6
GE09ram_02_u:9608: asurair vā surair vā tvaṃ yady avadho 'si rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:9609: utpādya sumahad vairaṃ jīvaṃs tasya na mokṣyase // Ram_3,54.8
GE09ram_02_u:9611: paśor yūpagatasyeva jīvitaṃ tava durlabham // Ram_3,54.9
GE09ram_02_u:9612: yadi paśyet sa rāmas tvāṃ roṣadīptena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:9613: rakṣas tvam adya nirdagdho gaccheḥ sadyaḥ parābhavam // Ram_3,54.10
GE09ram_02_u:9614: yaś candraṃ nabhaso bhūmau pātayen nāśayeta vā
GE09ram_02_u:9615: sāgaraṃ śoṣayed vāpi sa sītāṃ mocayed iha // Ram_3,54.11
GE09ram_02_u:9618: na te pāpam idaṃ karma sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:9619: yāhaṃ nītā vinā bhāvaṃ patipārśvāt tvayā vanāt // Ram_3,54.13
GE09ram_02_u:9620: sa hi daivatasaṃyukto mama bhartā mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9621: nirbhayo vīryam āśritya śūnye vasati daṇḍake // Ram_3,54.14
GE09ram_02_u:9622: sa te darpaṃ balaṃ vīryam utsekaṃ ca tathāvidham
GE09ram_02_u:9625: tadā kārye pramādyanti narāḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ // Ram_3,54.16
GE09ram_02_u:9626: māṃ pradhṛṣya sa te kālaḥ prāpto 'yaṃ rākṣasādhama
GE09ram_02_u:9627: ātmano rākṣasānāṃ ca vadhāyāntaḥpurasya ca // Ram_3,54.17
GE09ram_02_u:9630: idaṃ śarīraṃ niḥsaṃjñaṃ bandha vā ghātayasva vā
GE09ram_02_u:9631: nedaṃ śarīraṃ rakṣyaṃ me jīvitaṃ vāpi rākṣasa
GE09ram_02_u:9632: na hi śakṣyāmy upakrośaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dātum ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,54.19
GE09ram_02_u:9633: evam uktvā tu vaidehī krodhāt suparuṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9634: rāvaṇaṃ maithilī tatra punar novāca kiṃcana // Ram_3,54.20
GE09ram_02_u:9636: pratyuvāca tataḥ sītāṃ bhayasaṃdarśanaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,54.21
GE09ram_02_u:9637: śṛṇu maithili madvākyaṃ māsān dvādaśa bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:9639: tatas tvāṃ prātarāśārthaṃ sūdāś chetsyanti leśaśaḥ // Ram_3,54.22
GE09ram_02_u:9640: ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9641: rākṣasīś ca tataḥ kruddha idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,54.23
GE09ram_02_u:9642: śīghram evaṃ hi rākṣasyo vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9644: vacanād eva tās tasya vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9646: sa tāḥ provāca rājā tu rāvaṇo ghoradarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9647: pracālya caraṇotkarṣair dārayann iva medinīm // Ram_3,54.26
GE09ram_02_u:9649: tatreyaṃ rakṣyatāṃ gūḍham yuṣmābhiḥ parivāritā // Ram_3,54.27
GE09ram_02_u:9650: tatraināṃ tarjanair ghoraiḥ punaḥ sāntvaiś ca maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:9651: ānayadhvaṃ vaśaṃ sarvā vanyāṃ gajavadhūm iva // Ram_3,54.28
GE09ram_02_u:9653: aśokavanikāṃ jagmur maithilīṃ parigṛhya tām // Ram_3,54.29
GE09ram_02_u:9657: rākṣasīvaśam āpannā vyāghrīṇāṃ hariṇī yathā // Ram_3,54.31
GE09ram_02_u:9658: na vindate tatra tu śarma maithilī virūpanetrābhir atīva tarjitā
GE09ram_02_u:9659: patiṃ smarantī dayitaṃ ca devaraṃ vicetanābhūd bhayaśokapīḍitā // Ram_3,54.32
GE09ram_02_u:9661: nihatya rāmo mārīcaṃ tūrṇaṃ pathi nyavartata // Ram_3,55.1
GE09ram_02_u:9664: sa tasya svaram ājñāya dāruṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:9666: aśubhaṃ bata manye 'haṃ gomāyur vāśyate yathā
GE09ram_02_u:9667: svasti syād api vaidehyā rākṣasair bhakṣaṇaṃ vinā // Ram_3,55.4
GE09ram_02_u:9668: mārīcena tu vijñāya svaram ālakṣya māmakam
GE09ram_02_u:9669: vikruṣṭaṃ mṛgarūpeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ śṛṇuyād yadi // Ram_3,55.5
GE09ram_02_u:9670: sa saumitriḥ svaraṃ śrutvā tāṃ ca hitvātha maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:9671: tayaiva prahitaḥ kṣipraṃ matsakāśam ihaiṣyati // Ram_3,55.6
GE09ram_02_u:9672: rākṣasaiḥ sahitair nūnaṃ sītāyā īpsito vadhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9673: kāñcanaś ca mṛgo bhūtvā vyapanīyāśramāt tu mām // Ram_3,55.7
GE09ram_02_u:9674: dūraṃ nītvā tu mārīco rākṣaso 'bhūc charāhataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9675: hā lakṣmaṇa hato 'smīti yad vākyaṃ vyājahāra ha // Ram_3,55.8
GE09ram_02_u:9676: api svasti bhaved dvābhyāṃ rahitābhyāṃ mayā vane
GE09ram_02_u:9678: nimittāni ca ghorāṇi dṛśyante 'dya bahūni ca // Ram_3,55.9
GE09ram_02_u:9679: ity evaṃ cintayan rāmaḥ śrutvā gomāyuniḥsvanam
GE09ram_02_u:9683: savyaṃ kṛtvā mahātmānaṃ ghorāṃś ca sasṛjuḥ svarān // Ram_3,55.11
GE09ram_02_u:9685: tato lakṣmaṇam āyāntaṃ dadarśa vigataprabham // Ram_3,55.12
GE09ram_02_u:9687: viṣaṇṇaḥ sa viṣaṇṇena duḥkhito duḥkhabhāginā // Ram_3,55.13
GE09ram_02_u:9688: saṃjagarhe 'tha taṃ bhrātā jyeṣṭho lakṣmaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:9689: vihāya sītāṃ vijane vane rākṣasasevite // Ram_3,55.14
GE09ram_02_u:9690: gṛhītvā ca karaṃ savyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9691: uvāca madhurodarkam idaṃ paruṣam ārtavat // Ram_3,55.15
GE09ram_02_u:9692: aho lakṣmaṇa garhyaṃ te kṛtaṃ yat tvaṃ vihāya tām
GE09ram_02_u:9693: sītām ihāgataḥ saumya kaccit svasti bhaved iti // Ram_3,55.16
GE09ram_02_u:9694: na me 'sti saṃśayo vīra sarvathā janakātmajā
GE09ram_02_u:9695: vinaṣṭā bhakṣitā vāpi rākṣasair vanacāribhiḥ // Ram_3,55.17
GE09ram_02_u:9696: aśubhāny eva bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yathā prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_02_u:9697: api lakṣmaṇa sītāyāḥ sāmagryaṃ prāpnuyāvahe // Ram_3,55.18
GE09ram_02_u:9698: idaṃ hi rakṣo mṛgasaṃnikāśaṃ pralobhya māṃ dūram anuprayātam
GE09ram_02_u:9699: hataṃ kathaṃcin mahatā śrameṇa sa rākṣaso 'bhūn mriyamāṇa eva // Ram_3,55.19
GE09ram_02_u:9700: manaś ca me dīnam ihāprahṛṣṭaṃ cakṣuś ca savyaṃ kurute vikāram
GE09ram_02_u:9701: asaṃśayaṃ lakṣmaṇa nāsti sītā hṛtā mṛtā vā pathi vartate vā // Ram_3,55.20
GE09ram_02_u:9702: sa dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnaṃ śūnye daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9703: paryapṛcchata dharmātmā vaidehīm āgataṃ vinā // Ram_3,56.1
GE09ram_02_u:9704: prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ yā mām anujagāma ha
GE09ram_02_u:9705: kva sā lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yāṃ hitvā tvam ihāgataḥ // Ram_3,56.2
GE09ram_02_u:9707: kva sā duḥkhasahāyā me vaidehī tanumadhyamā // Ram_3,56.3
GE09ram_02_u:9708: yāṃ vinā notsahe vīra muhūrtam api jīvitum
GE09ram_02_u:9709: kva sā prāṇasahāyā me sītā surasutopamā // Ram_3,56.4
GE09ram_02_u:9710: patitvam amarāṇāṃ vā pṛthivyāś cāpi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:9711: vinā tāṃ tapanīyābhāṃ neccheyaṃ janakātmajām // Ram_3,56.5
GE09ram_02_u:9712: kaccij jīvati vaidehī prāṇaiḥ priyatarā mama
GE09ram_02_u:9713: kaccit pravrājanaṃ saumya na me mithyā bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,56.6
GE09ram_02_u:9714: sītānimittaṃ saumitre mṛte mayi gate tvayi
GE09ram_02_u:9715: kaccit sakāmā sukhitā kaikeyī sā bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,56.7
GE09ram_02_u:9717: upasthāsyati kausalyā kaccit saumya na kaikayīm // Ram_3,56.8
GE09ram_02_u:9718: yadi jīvati vaidehī gamiṣyāmy āśramaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9719: suvṛttā yadi vṛttā sā prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,56.9
GE09ram_02_u:9721: punaḥ prahasitā sītā vinaśiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,56.10
GE09ram_02_u:9722: brūhi lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā
GE09ram_02_u:9723: tvayi pramatte rakṣobhir bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī // Ram_3,56.11
GE09ram_02_u:9724: sukumārī ca bālā ca nityaṃ cāduḥkhadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:9725: madviyogena vaidehī vyaktaṃ śocati durmanāḥ // Ram_3,56.12
GE09ram_02_u:9727: vadatā lakṣmaṇety uccais tavāpi janitaṃ bhayam // Ram_3,56.13
GE09ram_02_u:9728: śrutaś ca śaṅke vaidehyā sa svaraḥ sadṛśo mama
GE09ram_02_u:9729: trastayā preṣitas tvaṃ ca draṣṭuṃ māṃ śīghram āgataḥ // Ram_3,56.14
GE09ram_02_u:9730: sarvathā tu kṛtaṃ kaṣṭaṃ sītām utsṛjatā vane
GE09ram_02_u:9731: pratikartuṃ nṛśaṃsānāṃ rakṣasāṃ dattam antaram // Ram_3,56.15
GE09ram_02_u:9733: taiḥ sītā nihatā ghorair bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_3,56.16
GE09ram_02_u:9735: kiṃ tv idānīṃ kariṣyāmi śaṅke prāptavyam īdṛśam // Ram_3,56.17
GE09ram_02_u:9736: iti sītāṃ varārohāṃ cintayann eva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9738: vigarhamāṇo 'nujam ārtarūpaṃ kṣudhā śramāc caiva pipāsayā ca
GE09ram_02_u:9739: viniḥśvasañ śuṣkamukho viṣaṇṇaḥ pratiśrayaṃ prāpya samīkṣya śūnyam // Ram_3,56.19
GE09ram_02_u:9740: svam āśramaṃ saṃpravigāhya vīro vihāradeśān anusṛtya kāṃścit
GE09ram_02_u:9741: etat tad ity eva nivāsabhūmau prahṛṣṭaromā vyathito babhūva // Ram_3,56.20
GE09ram_02_u:9743: paripapraccha saumitriṃ rāmo duḥkhārditaḥ punaḥ // Ram_3,57.1
GE09ram_02_u:9744: tam uvāca kimarthaṃ tvam āgato 'pāsya maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:9745: yadā sā tava viśvāsād vane virahitā mayā // Ram_3,57.2
GE09ram_02_u:9746: dṛṣṭvaivābhyāgataṃ tvāṃ me maithilīṃ tyajya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:9747: śaṅkamānaṃ mahat pāpaṃ yat satyaṃ vyathitaṃ manaḥ // Ram_3,57.3
GE09ram_02_u:9748: sphurate nayanaṃ savyaṃ bāhuś ca hṛdayaṃ ca me
GE09ram_02_u:9749: dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇa dūre tvāṃ sītāvirahitaṃ pathi // Ram_3,57.4
GE09ram_02_u:9750: evam uktas tu saumitrir lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9751: bhūyo duḥkhasamāviṣṭo duḥkhitaṃ rāmam abravīt // Ram_3,57.5
GE09ram_02_u:9752: na svayaṃ kāmakāreṇa tāṃ tyaktvāham ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9754: āryeṇeva parikruṣṭaṃ hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_02_u:9755: paritrāhīti yad vākyaṃ maithilyās tac chrutiṃ gatam // Ram_3,57.7
GE09ram_02_u:9756: sā tam ārtasvaraṃ śrutvā tava snehena maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:9757: gaccha gaccheti mām āha rudantī bhayavihvalā // Ram_3,57.8
GE09ram_02_u:9759: pratyuktā maithilī vākyam idaṃ tvatpratyayānvitam // Ram_3,57.9
GE09ram_02_u:9760: na tat paśyāmy ahaṃ rakṣo yad asya bhayam āvahet
GE09ram_02_u:9761: nirvṛtā bhava nāsty etat kenāpy evam udāhṛtam // Ram_3,57.10
GE09ram_02_u:9762: vigarhitaṃ ca nīcaṃ ca katham āryo 'bhidhāsyati
GE09ram_02_u:9763: trāhīti vacanaṃ sīte yas trāyet tridaśān api // Ram_3,57.11
GE09ram_02_u:9764: kiṃnimittaṃ tu kenāpi bhrātur ālambya me svaram
GE09ram_02_u:9765: visvaraṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇa trāhi mām iti
GE09ram_02_u:9766: na bhavatyā vyathā kāryā kunārījanasevitā // Ram_3,57.12
GE09ram_02_u:9767: alaṃ vaiklavyam ālambya svasthā bhava nirutsukā
GE09ram_02_u:9768: na cāsti triṣu lokeṣu pumān yo rāghavaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_02_u:9769: jāto vā jāyamāno vā saṃyuge yaḥ parājayet // Ram_3,57.13
GE09ram_02_u:9771: uvācāśrūṇi muñcantī dāruṇaṃ mām idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,57.14
GE09ram_02_u:9772: bhāvo mayi tavātyarthaṃ pāpa eva niveśitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9773: vinaṣṭe bhrātari prāpte na ca tvaṃ mām avāpsyasi // Ram_3,57.15
GE09ram_02_u:9775: krośantaṃ hi yathātyarthaṃ nainam abhyavapadyase // Ram_3,57.16
GE09ram_02_u:9778: evam ukto hi vaidehyā saṃrabdho raktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9781: abravīd duṣkṛtaṃ saumya tāṃ vinā yat tvam āgataḥ // Ram_3,57.19
GE09ram_02_u:9782: jānann api samarthaṃ māṃ rakṣasāṃ vinivāraṇe
GE09ram_02_u:9783: anena krodhavākyena maithilyā niḥsṛto bhavān // Ram_3,57.20
GE09ram_02_u:9784: na hi te parituṣyāmi tyaktvā yad yāsi maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:9785: kruddhāyāḥ paruṣaṃ śrutvā striyā yat tvam ihāgataḥ // Ram_3,57.21
GE09ram_02_u:9786: sarvathā tv apanītaṃ te sītayā yat pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9787: krodhasya vaśam āgamya nākaroḥ śāsanaṃ mama // Ram_3,57.22
GE09ram_02_u:9788: asau hi rākṣasaḥ śete śareṇābhihato mayā
GE09ram_02_u:9790: vikṛṣya cāpaṃ paridhāya sāyakaṃ salīlabāṇena ca tāḍito mayā
GE09ram_02_u:9791: mārgīṃ tanuṃ tyajya ca viklavasvaro babhūva keyūradharaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,57.24
GE09ram_02_u:9792: śarāhatenaiva tadārtayā girā svaraṃ mamālambya sudūrasaṃśravam
GE09ram_02_u:9793: udāhṛtaṃ tad vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ tvam āgato yena vihāya maithilīm // Ram_3,57.25
GE09ram_02_u:9795: prāsphurac cāskhalad rāmo vepathuś cāsya jāyate // Ram_3,58.1
GE09ram_02_u:9797: api kṣemaṃ tu sītāyā iti vai vyājahāra ha // Ram_3,58.2
GE09ram_02_u:9802: dadarśa parṇaśālāṃ ca rahitāṃ sītayā tadā
GE09ram_02_u:9803: śriyā virahitāṃ dhvastāṃ hemante padminīm iva // Ram_3,58.5
GE09ram_02_u:9807: dṛṣṭvā śūnyoṭajasthānaṃ vilalāpa punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_3,58.7
GE09ram_02_u:9808: hṛtā mṛtā vā naṣṭā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:9809: nilīnāpy atha vā bhīrur atha vā vanam āśritā // Ram_3,58.8
GE09ram_02_u:9810: gatā vicetuṃ puṣpāṇi phalāny api ca vā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9811: atha vā padminīṃ yātā jalārthaṃ vā nadīṃ gatā // Ram_3,58.9
GE09ram_02_u:9812: yatnān mṛgayamāṇas tu nāsasāda vane priyām
GE09ram_02_u:9813: śokaraktekṣaṇaḥ śokād unmatta iva lakṣyate // Ram_3,58.10
GE09ram_02_u:9814: vṛkṣād vṛkṣaṃ pradhāvan sa girīṃś cāpi nadīn nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:9816: asti kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā sā kadambapriyā priyā
GE09ram_02_u:9817: kadamba yadi jānīṣe śaṃsa sītāṃ śubhānanām // Ram_3,58.12
GE09ram_02_u:9819: śaṃsasva yadi vā dṛṣṭā bilva bilvopamastanī // Ram_3,58.13
GE09ram_02_u:9820: atha vārjuna śaṃsa tvaṃ priyāṃ tām arjunapriyām
GE09ram_02_u:9821: janakasya sutā bhīrur yadi jīvati vā na vā // Ram_3,58.14
GE09ram_02_u:9822: kakubhaḥ kakubhoruṃ tāṃ vyaktaṃ jānāti maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:9823: latāpallavapuṣpāḍhyo bhāti hy eṣa vanaspatiḥ // Ram_3,58.15
GE09ram_02_u:9824: bhramarair upagītaś ca yathā drumavaro hy ayam
GE09ram_02_u:9825: eṣa vyaktaṃ vijānāti tilakas tilakapriyām // Ram_3,58.16
GE09ram_02_u:9827: tvannāmānaṃ kuru kṣipraṃ priyāsaṃdarśanena mām // Ram_3,58.17
GE09ram_02_u:9829: kathayasva varārohāṃ kāruṇyaṃ yadi te mayi // Ram_3,58.18
GE09ram_02_u:9830: yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā sītā jambu jāmbūnadaprabhā
GE09ram_02_u:9831: priyāṃ yadi vijānīṣe niḥśaṅkaṃ kathayasva me // Ram_3,58.19
GE09ram_02_u:9832: atha vā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ mṛga jānāsi maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:9833: mṛgaviprekṣaṇī kāntā mṛgībhiḥ sahitā bhavet // Ram_3,58.20
GE09ram_02_u:9834: gaja sā gajanāsorur yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:9835: tāṃ manye viditāṃ tubhyam ākhyāhi varavāraṇa // Ram_3,58.21
GE09ram_02_u:9836: śārdūla yadi sā dṛṣṭā priyā candranibhānanā
GE09ram_02_u:9837: maithilī mama viśrabdhaḥ kathayasva na te bhayam // Ram_3,58.22
GE09ram_02_u:9838: kiṃ dhāvasi priye nūnaṃ dṛṣṭāsi kamalekṣaṇe
GE09ram_02_u:9839: vṛkṣeṇācchādya cātmānaṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase // Ram_3,58.23
GE09ram_02_u:9840: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha varārohe na te 'sti karuṇā mayi
GE09ram_02_u:9841: nātyarthaṃ hāsyaśīlāsi kimarthaṃ mām upekṣase // Ram_3,58.24
GE09ram_02_u:9843: dhāvanty api mayā dṛṣṭā tiṣṭha yady asti sauhṛdam // Ram_3,58.25
GE09ram_02_u:9844: naiva sā nūnam atha vā hiṃsitā cāruhāsinī
GE09ram_02_u:9845: kṛcchraṃ prāptaṃ hi māṃ nūnaṃ yathopekṣitum arhati // Ram_3,58.26
GE09ram_02_u:9846: vyaktaṃ sā bhakṣitā bālā rākṣasaiḥ piśitāśanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9847: vibhajyāṅgāni sarvāṇi mayā virahitā priyā // Ram_3,58.27
GE09ram_02_u:9848: nūnaṃ tac chubhadantauṣṭhaṃ mukhaṃ niṣprabhatāṃ gatam
GE09ram_02_u:9849: sā hi campakavarṇābhā grīvā graiveyaśobhitā // Ram_3,58.28
GE09ram_02_u:9850: komalā vilapantyās tu kāntāyā bhakṣitā śubhā
GE09ram_02_u:9851: nūnaṃ vikṣipyamāṇau tau bāhū pallavakomalau // Ram_3,58.29
GE09ram_02_u:9853: mayā virahitā bālā rakṣasāṃ bhakṣaṇāya vai // Ram_3,58.30
GE09ram_02_u:9855: hā lakṣmaṇa mahābāho paśyasi tvaṃ priyāṃ kvacit // Ram_3,58.31
GE09ram_02_u:9856: hā priye kva gatā bhadre hā sīteti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9857: ity evaṃ vilapan rāmaḥ paridhāvan vanād vanam // Ram_3,58.32
GE09ram_02_u:9858: kvacid udbhramate vegāt kvacid vibhramate balāt
GE09ram_02_u:9860: sa vanāni nadīḥ śailān giriprasravaṇāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:9861: kānanāni ca vegena bhramaty aparisaṃsthitaḥ // Ram_3,58.34
GE09ram_02_u:9862: tathā sa gatvā vipulaṃ mahad vanaṃ parītya sarvaṃ tv atha maithilīṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:9863: aniṣṭhitāśaḥ sa cakāra mārgaṇe punaḥ priyāyāḥ paramaṃ pariśramam // Ram_3,58.35
GE09ram_02_u:9865: rahitāṃ parṇaśālāṃ ca vidhvastāny āsanāni ca // Ram_3,59.1
GE09ram_02_u:9866: adṛṣṭvā tatra vaidehīṃ saṃnirīkṣya ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9867: uvāca rāmaḥ prākruśya pragṛhya rucirau bhujau // Ram_3,59.2
GE09ram_02_u:9868: kva nu lakṣmaṇa vaidehī kaṃ vā deśam ito gatā
GE09ram_02_u:9869: kenāhṛtā vā saumitre bhakṣitā kena vā priyā // Ram_3,59.3
GE09ram_02_u:9870: vṛkṣeṇācchādya yadi māṃ sīte hasitum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:9871: alaṃ te hasitenādya māṃ bhajasva suduḥkhitam // Ram_3,59.4
GE09ram_02_u:9872: yaiḥ saha krīḍase sīte viśvastair mṛgapotakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9873: ete hīnās tvayā saumye dhyāyanty asrāvilekṣaṇāḥ // Ram_3,59.5
GE09ram_02_u:9875: paraloke mahārājo nūnaṃ drakṣyati me pitā // Ram_3,59.6
GE09ram_02_u:9876: kathaṃ pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya mayā tvam abhiyojitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9877: apūrayitvā taṃ kālaṃ matsakāśam ihāgataḥ // Ram_3,59.7
GE09ram_02_u:9878: kāmavṛttam anāryaṃ māṃ mṛṣāvādinam eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:9879: dhik tvām iti pare loke vyaktaṃ vakṣyati me pitā // Ram_3,59.8
GE09ram_02_u:9881: mām ihotsṛjya karuṇaṃ kīrtir naram ivānṛjum // Ram_3,59.9
GE09ram_02_u:9882: kva gacchasi varārohe mām utsṛjya sumadhyame
GE09ram_02_u:9883: tvayā virahitaś cāhaṃ mokṣye jīvitam ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,59.10
GE09ram_02_u:9885: na dadarśa suduḥkhārto rāghavo janakātmajām // Ram_3,59.11
GE09ram_02_u:9887: paṅkam āsādya vipulaṃ sīdantam iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_02_u:9888: lakṣmaṇo rāmam atyartham uvāca hitakāmyayā // Ram_3,59.12
GE09ram_02_u:9889: mā viṣādaṃ mahābāho kuru yatnaṃ mayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:9890: idaṃ ca hi vanaṃ śūra bahukandaraśobhitam // Ram_3,59.13
GE09ram_02_u:9892: sā vanaṃ vā praviṣṭā syān nalinīṃ vā supuṣpitām // Ram_3,59.14
GE09ram_02_u:9894: vitrāsayitukāmā vā līnā syāt kānane kvacit
GE09ram_02_u:9895: jijñāsamānā vaidehī tvāṃ māṃ ca puruṣarṣabha // Ram_3,59.15
GE09ram_02_u:9896: tasyā hy anveṣaṇe śrīman kṣipram eva yatāvahe
GE09ram_02_u:9897: vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicinuvo yatra sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_02_u:9898: manyase yadi kākutstha mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ // Ram_3,59.16
GE09ram_02_u:9899: evam uktas tu sauhārdāl lakṣmaṇena samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9901: tau vanāni girīṃś caiva saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca // Ram_3,59.17
GE09ram_02_u:9903: tasya śailasya sānūni guhāś ca śikharāṇi ca // Ram_3,59.18
GE09ram_02_u:9905: vicitya sarvataḥ śailaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,59.19
GE09ram_02_u:9906: neha paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīṃ parvate śubhe
GE09ram_02_u:9907: tato duḥkhābhisaṃtapto lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,59.20
GE09ram_02_u:9909: prāpsyasi tvaṃ mahāprājña maithilīṃ janakātmajām // Ram_3,59.21
GE09ram_02_u:9910: yathā viṣṇur mahābāhur baliṃ baddhvā mahīm imām
GE09ram_02_u:9911: evam uktas tu vīreṇa lakṣmaṇena sa rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,59.22
GE09ram_02_u:9913: vanaṃ sarvaṃ suvicitaṃ padminyaḥ phullapaṅkajāḥ // Ram_3,59.23
GE09ram_02_u:9915: na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm // Ram_3,59.24
GE09ram_02_u:9920: bahuśaḥ sa tu niḥśvasya rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9921: hā priyeti vicukrośa bahuśo bāṣpagadgadaḥ // Ram_3,59.27
GE09ram_02_u:9925: apaśyaṃs tāṃ priyāṃ sītāṃ prākrośat sa punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_3,59.29
GE09ram_02_u:9926: sa dīno dīnayā vācā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:9927: śīghraṃ lakṣmaṇa jānīhi gatvā godāvarīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:9928: api godāvarīṃ sītā padmāny ānayituṃ gatā // Ram_3,60.1
GE09ram_02_u:9929: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ punar eva hi
GE09ram_02_u:9930: nadīṃ godāvarīṃ ramyāṃ jagāma laghuvikramaḥ // Ram_3,60.2
GE09ram_02_u:9931: tāṃ lakṣmaṇas tīrthavatīṃ vicitvā rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:9932: naināṃ paśyāmi tīrtheṣu krośato na śṛṇoti me // Ram_3,60.3
GE09ram_02_u:9933: kaṃ nu sā deśam āpannā vaidehī kleśanāśinī
GE09ram_02_u:9934: na hi taṃ vedmi vai rāma yatra sā tanumadhyamā // Ram_3,60.4
GE09ram_02_u:9936: rāmaḥ samabhicakrāma svayaṃ godāvarīṃ nadīm // Ram_3,60.5
GE09ram_02_u:9937: sa tām upasthito rāmaḥ kva sītety evam abravīt // Ram_3,60.6
GE09ram_02_u:9939: na tāṃ śaśaṃsū rāmāya tathā godāvarī nadī // Ram_3,60.7
GE09ram_02_u:9940: tataḥ pracoditā bhūtaiḥ śaṃsāsmai tāṃ priyām iti
GE09ram_02_u:9941: na ca sābhyavadat sītāṃ pṛṣṭā rāmeṇa śocitā // Ram_3,60.8
GE09ram_02_u:9942: rāvaṇasya ca tad rūpaṃ karmāṇi ca durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9943: dhyātvā bhayāt tu vaidehīṃ sā nadī na śaśaṃsa tām // Ram_3,60.9
GE09ram_02_u:9944: nirāśas tu tayā nadyā sītāyā darśane kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9946: kiṃ nu lakṣmaṇa vakṣyāmi sametya janakaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9947: mātaraṃ caiva vaidehyā vinā tām aham apriyam // Ram_3,60.11
GE09ram_02_u:9948: yā me rājyavihīnasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9949: sarvaṃ vyapanayacchokam vaidehī kva nu sā gatā // Ram_3,60.12
GE09ram_02_u:9951: manye dīrghā bhaviṣyanti rātrayo mama jāgrataḥ // Ram_3,60.13
GE09ram_02_u:9953: sarvāṇy anucariṣyāmi yadi sītā hi dṛśyate // Ram_3,60.14
GE09ram_02_u:9954: evaṃ sambhāṣamāṇau tāv anyonyaṃ bhrātarāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:9956: tāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahītale
GE09ram_02_u:9957: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vīro duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,60.16
GE09ram_02_u:9959: apinaddhāni vaidehyā mayā dattāni kānane // Ram_3,60.17
GE09ram_02_u:9961: kruddho 'bravīd giriṃ tatra siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // Ram_3,60.18
GE09ram_02_u:9962: tāṃ hemavarṇāṃ hemābhāṃ sītāṃ darśaya parvata
GE09ram_02_u:9963: yāvat sānūni sarvāṇi na te vidhvaṃsayāmy aham // Ram_3,60.19
GE09ram_02_u:9966: imāṃ vā saritaṃ cādya śoṣayiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:9967: yadi nākhyāti me sītām adya candranibhānanām // Ram_3,60.21
GE09ram_02_u:9968: evaṃ sa ruṣito rāmo didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:9969: dadarśa bhūmau niṣkrāntaṃ rākṣasasya padaṃ mahat // Ram_3,60.22
GE09ram_02_u:9970: sa samīkṣya parikrāntaṃ sītāyā rākṣasasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:9971: saṃbhrāntahṛdayo rāmaḥ śaśaṃsa bhrātaraṃ priyam // Ram_3,60.23
GE09ram_02_u:9973: bhūṣaṇānāṃ hi saumitre mālyāni vividhāni ca // Ram_3,60.24
GE09ram_02_u:9975: āvṛtaṃ paśya saumitre sarvato dharaṇītalam // Ram_3,60.25
GE09ram_02_u:9977: bhittvā bhittvā vibhaktā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,60.26
GE09ram_02_u:9979: babhūva yuddhaṃ saumitre ghoraṃ rākṣasayor iha // Ram_3,60.27
GE09ram_02_u:9981: dharaṇyāṃ patitaṃ saumya kasya bhagnaṃ mahad dhanuḥ // Ram_3,60.28
GE09ram_02_u:9983: viśīrṇaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau kavacaṃ kasya kāñcanam // Ram_3,60.29
GE09ram_02_u:9985: bhagnadaṇḍam idaṃ kasya bhūmau saumya nipātitam // Ram_3,60.30
GE09ram_02_u:9987: bhīmarūpā mahākāyāḥ kasya vā nihatā raṇe // Ram_3,60.31
GE09ram_02_u:9989: apaviddhaś ca bhagnaś ca kasya sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ // Ram_3,60.32
GE09ram_02_u:9994: hṛtā mṛtā vā sītā hi bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:9995: na dharmas trāyate sītāṃ hriyamāṇāṃ mahāvane // Ram_3,60.35
GE09ram_02_u:9996: bhakṣitāyāṃ hi vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:9997: ke hi loke priyaṃ kartuṃ śaktāḥ saumya mameśvarāḥ // Ram_3,60.36
GE09ram_02_u:10001: nirvīrya iti manyante nūnaṃ māṃ tridaśeśvarāḥ // Ram_3,60.38
GE09ram_02_u:10002: māṃ prāpya hi guṇo doṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paśya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:10004: saṃhṛtyaiva śaśijyotsnāṃ mahān sūrya ivoditaḥ // Ram_3,60.39
GE09ram_02_u:10005: naiva yakṣā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10006: kiṃnarā vā manuṣyā vā sukhaṃ prāpsyanti lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,60.40
GE09ram_02_u:10008: niḥsampātaṃ kariṣyāmi hy adya trailokyacāriṇām // Ram_3,60.41
GE09ram_02_u:10013: na tāṃ kuśalinīṃ sītāṃ pradāsyanti mameśvarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10014: asmin muhūrte saumitre mama drakṣyanti vikramam // Ram_3,60.44
GE09ram_02_u:10016: mama cāpaguṇān muktair bāṇajālair nirantaram // Ram_3,60.45
GE09ram_02_u:10018: samākulam amaryādaṃ jagat paśyādya lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,60.46
GE09ram_02_u:10022: drakṣyanty adya vimuktānām amarṣād dūragāminām // Ram_3,60.48
GE09ram_02_u:10023: naiva devā na daiteyā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10024: bhaviṣyanti mama krodhāt trailokye vipraṇāśite // Ram_3,60.49
GE09ram_02_u:10027: nirmaryādān imāṃl lokān kariṣyāmy adya sāyakaiḥ // Ram_3,60.50
GE09ram_02_u:10028: yathā jarā yathā mṛtyur yathā kālo yathā vidhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10030: tathāhaṃ krodhasaṃyukto na nivāryo 'smy asaṃśayam // Ram_3,60.51
GE09ram_02_u:10031: pureva me cārudatīm aninditāṃ diśanti sītāṃ yadi nādya maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:10032: sadevagandharvamanuṣyapannagaṃ jagat saśailaṃ parivartayāmy aham // Ram_3,60.52
GE09ram_02_u:10034: lokānām abhave yuktaṃ saṃvartakam ivānalam // Ram_3,61.1
GE09ram_02_u:10035: vīkṣamāṇaṃ dhanuḥ sajyaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10036: hantukāmaṃ paśuṃ rudraṃ kruddhaṃ dakṣakratau yathā // Ram_3,61.2
GE09ram_02_u:10037: adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10038: abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā // Ram_3,61.3
GE09ram_02_u:10039: purā bhūtvā mṛdur dāntaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10040: na krodhavaśam āpannaḥ prakṛtiṃ hātum arhasi // Ram_3,61.4
GE09ram_02_u:10041: candre lakṣmīḥ prabhā sūrye gatir vāyau bhuvi kṣamā
GE09ram_02_u:10042: etac ca niyataṃ sarvaṃ tvayi cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ // Ram_3,61.5
GE09ram_02_u:10043: na tu jānāmi kasyāyaṃ bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10044: kena vā kasya vā hetoḥ sāyudhaḥ saparicchadaḥ // Ram_3,61.6
GE09ram_02_u:10047: ekasya tu vimardo 'yaṃ na dvayor vadatāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:10048: na hi vṛttaṃ hi paśyāmi balasya mahataḥ padam // Ram_3,61.8
GE09ram_02_u:10049: naikasya tu kṛte lokān vināśayitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:10050: yuktadaṇḍā hi mṛdavaḥ praśāntā vasudhādhipāḥ // Ram_3,61.9
GE09ram_02_u:10051: sadā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śaraṇyaḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10052: ko nu dārapraṇāśaṃ te sādhu manyeta rāghava // Ram_3,61.10
GE09ram_02_u:10054: nālaṃ te vipriyaṃ kartuṃ dīkṣitasyeva sādhavaḥ // Ram_3,61.11
GE09ram_02_u:10055: yena rājan hṛtā sītā tam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:10057: samudraṃ ca viceṣyāmaḥ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:10058: guhāś ca vividhā ghorā nalinīḥ pārvatīś ca ha // Ram_3,61.13
GE09ram_02_u:10061: na cet sāmnā pradāsyanti patnīṃ te tridaśeśvarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10062: kosalendra tataḥ paścāt prāptakālaṃ kariṣyasi // Ram_3,61.15
GE09ram_02_u:10063: śīlena sāmnā vinayena sītāṃ nayena na prāpsyasi cen narendra
GE09ram_02_u:10064: tataḥ samutsādaya hemapuṅkhair mahendravajrapratimaiḥ śaraughaiḥ // Ram_3,61.16
GE09ram_02_u:10067: tataḥ saumitrir āśvāsya muhūrtād iva lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10069: mahatā tapasā rāma mahatā cāpi karmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:10071: tava caiva guṇair baddhas tvadviyogān mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10072: rājā devatvam āpanno bharatasya yathā śrutam // Ram_3,62.4
GE09ram_02_u:10073: yadi duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ kākutstha na sahiṣyase
GE09ram_02_u:10074: prākṛtaś cālpasattvaś ca itaraḥ kaḥ sahiṣyati // Ram_3,62.5
GE09ram_02_u:10075: duḥkhito hi bhavāṃl lokāṃs tejasā yadi dhakṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:10076: ārtāḥ prajā naravyāghra kva nu yāsyanti nirvṛtim // Ram_3,62.6
GE09ram_02_u:10078: gataḥ śakreṇa sālokyam anayas taṃ samaspṛśat // Ram_3,62.7
GE09ram_02_u:10079: maharṣayo vasiṣṭhas tu yaḥ pitur naḥ purohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10080: ahnā putraśataṃ jajñe tathaivāsya punar hatam // Ram_3,62.8
GE09ram_02_u:10081: yā ceyaṃ jagato mātā devī lokanamaskṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:10082: asyāś ca calanaṃ bhūmer dṛśyate satyasaṃśrava // Ram_3,62.9
GE09ram_02_u:10083: yau cemau jagatāṃ netre yatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_02_u:10085: sumahānty api bhūtāni devāś ca puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:10086: na daivasya pramuñcanti sarvabhūtāni dehinaḥ // Ram_3,62.11
GE09ram_02_u:10088: śrūyete naraśārdūla na tvaṃ vyathitum arhasi // Ram_3,62.12
GE09ram_02_u:10089: naṣṭāyām api vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api cānagha
GE09ram_02_u:10090: śocituṃ nārhase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā // Ram_3,62.13
GE09ram_02_u:10091: tvadvidhā hi na śocanti satataṃ satyadarśinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10094: buddhyā yuktā mahāprājñā vijānanti śubhāśubhe // Ram_3,62.15
GE09ram_02_u:10096: nāntareṇa kriyāṃ teṣāṃ phalam iṣṭaṃ pravartate // Ram_3,62.16
GE09ram_02_u:10097: mām eva hi purā vīra tvam eva bahuśo 'nvaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10098: anuśiṣyāddhi ko nu tvām api sākṣād bṛhaspatiḥ // Ram_3,62.17
GE09ram_02_u:10099: buddhiś ca te mahāprājña devair api duranvayā
GE09ram_02_u:10100: śokenābhiprasuptaṃ te jñānaṃ saṃbodhayāmy aham // Ram_3,62.18
GE09ram_02_u:10101: divyaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ caivam ātmanaś ca parākramam
GE09ram_02_u:10104: tam eva tu ripuṃ pāpaṃ vijñāyoddhartum arhasi // Ram_3,62.20
GE09ram_02_u:10108: avaṣṭabhya dhanuś citraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,63.2
GE09ram_02_u:10109: kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vatsa kva vā gacchāva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:10110: kenopāyena paśyeyaṃ sītām iti vicintaya // Ram_3,63.3
GE09ram_02_u:10111: taṃ tathā paritāpārtaṃ lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:10112: idam eva janasthānaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi // Ram_3,63.4
GE09ram_02_u:10114: santīha giridurgāṇi nirdarāḥ kandarāṇi ca // Ram_3,63.5
GE09ram_02_u:10116: āvāsāḥ kiṃnarāṇāṃ ca gandharvabhavanāni ca // Ram_3,63.6
GE09ram_02_u:10117: tāni yukto mayā sārdhaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:10120: ity uktas tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicacāra salakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,63.8
GE09ram_02_u:10121: kruddho rāmaḥ śaraṃ ghoraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
GE09ram_02_u:10124: taṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgābhaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:10125: anena sītā vaidehī bhakṣitā nātra saṃśayaḥ // Ram_3,63.10
GE09ram_02_u:10126: gṛdhrarūpam idaṃ vyaktaṃ rakṣo bhramati kānanam
GE09ram_02_u:10128: enaṃ vadhiṣye dīptāgrair ghorair bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ // Ram_3,63.11
GE09ram_02_u:10129: ity uktvābhyapatad gṛdhraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
GE09ram_02_u:10130: kruddho rāmaḥ samudrāntāṃ cālayann iva medinīm // Ram_3,63.12
GE09ram_02_u:10131: taṃ dīnadīnayā vācā saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ vaman
GE09ram_02_u:10132: abhyabhāṣata pakṣī tu rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam // Ram_3,63.13
GE09ram_02_u:10134: sā devī mama ca prāṇā rāvaṇenobhayaṃ hṛtam // Ram_3,63.14
GE09ram_02_u:10135: tvayā virahitā devī lakṣmaṇena ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:10136: hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rāvaṇena balīyasā // Ram_3,63.15
GE09ram_02_u:10137: sītām abhyavapanno 'haṃ rāvaṇaś ca raṇe mayā
GE09ram_02_u:10139: etad asya dhanur bhagnam etad asya śarāvaram
GE09ram_02_u:10140: ayam asya raṇe rāma bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ // Ram_3,63.17
GE09ram_02_u:10141: pariśrāntasya me pakṣau chittvā khaḍgena rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10143: rakṣasā nihataṃ pūrvaṃ na māṃ hantuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_3,63.18
GE09ram_02_u:10144: rāmas tasya tu vijñāya sītāsaktāṃ priyāṃ kathām
GE09ram_02_u:10147: samīkṣya duḥkhito rāmaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt // Ram_3,63.20
GE09ram_02_u:10148: rājyād bhraṃśo vane vāsaḥ sītā naṣṭā hato dvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10149: īdṛśīyaṃ mamālakṣmīr nirdahed api pāvakam // Ram_3,63.21
GE09ram_02_u:10150: sampūrṇam api ced adya pratareyaṃ mahodadhim
GE09ram_02_u:10151: so 'pi nūnaṃ mamālakṣmyā viśuṣyet saritāṃ patiḥ // Ram_3,63.22
GE09ram_02_u:10153: yeneyaṃ mahatī prāptā mayā vyasanavāgurā // Ram_3,63.23
GE09ram_02_u:10155: śete vinihato bhūmau mama bhāgyaviparyayāt // Ram_3,63.24
GE09ram_02_u:10156: ity evam uktvā bahuśo rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10157: jaṭāyuṣaṃ ca pasparśa pitṛsnehaṃ nidarśayan // Ram_3,63.25
GE09ram_02_u:10158: nikṛttapakṣaṃ rudhirāvasiktaṃ taṃ gṛdhrarājaṃ parirabhya rāmaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10159: kva maithili prāṇasamā mameti vimucya vācaṃ nipapāta bhūmau // Ram_3,63.26
GE09ram_02_u:10160: rāmaḥ prekṣya tu taṃ gṛdhraṃ bhuvi raudreṇa pātitam
GE09ram_02_u:10161: saumitriṃ mitrasampannam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,64.1
GE09ram_02_u:10163: rākṣasena hataḥ saṃkhye prāṇāṃs tyajati dustyajān // Ram_3,64.2
GE09ram_02_u:10164: ayam asya śarīre 'smin prāṇo lakṣmaṇa vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:10166: jaṭāyo yadi śaknoṣi vākyaṃ vyāharituṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10167: sītām ākhyāhi bhadraṃ te vadham ākhyāhi cātmanaḥ // Ram_3,64.4
GE09ram_02_u:10168: kiṃnimitto 'harat sītāṃ rāvaṇas tasya kiṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:10169: aparāddhaṃ tu yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena hṛtā priyā // Ram_3,64.5
GE09ram_02_u:10170: kathaṃ tac candrasaṃkāśaṃ mukham āsīn manoharam
GE09ram_02_u:10171: sītayā kāni coktāni tasmin kāle dvijottama // Ram_3,64.6
GE09ram_02_u:10172: kathaṃvīryaḥ kathaṃrūpaḥ kiṃkarmā sa ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10173: kva cāsya bhavanaṃ tāta brūhi me paripṛcchataḥ // Ram_3,64.7
GE09ram_02_u:10175: vācātisannayā rāmaṃ jaṭāyur idam abravīt // Ram_3,64.8
GE09ram_02_u:10178: pariśrāntasya me tāta pakṣau chittvā niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10179: sītām ādāya vaidehīṃ prayāto dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // Ram_3,64.10
GE09ram_02_u:10180: uparudhyanti me prāṇā dṛṣṭir bhramati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:10182: yena yāti muhūrtena sītām ādāya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10183: vipraṇaṣṭaṃ dhanaṃ kṣipraṃ tatsvāmī pratipadyate // Ram_3,64.12
GE09ram_02_u:10184: vindo nāma muhūrto 'sau sa ca kākutstha nābudhat
GE09ram_02_u:10185: jhaṣavad baḍiśaṃ gṛhya kṣipram eva vinaśyati // Ram_3,64.13
GE09ram_02_u:10186: na ca tvayā vyathā kāryā janakasya sutāṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:10187: vaidehyā raṃsyase kṣipraṃ hatvā taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe // Ram_3,64.14
GE09ram_02_u:10189: āsyāt susrāva rudhiraṃ mriyamāṇasya sāmiṣam // Ram_3,64.15
GE09ram_02_u:10190: putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:10191: ity uktvā durlabhān prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,64.16
GE09ram_02_u:10193: tyaktvā śarīraṃ gṛdhrasya jagmuḥ prāṇā vihāyasam // Ram_3,64.17
GE09ram_02_u:10194: sa nikṣipya śiro bhūmau prasārya caraṇau tadā
GE09ram_02_u:10195: vikṣipya ca śarīraṃ svaṃ papāta dharaṇītale // Ram_3,64.18
GE09ram_02_u:10196: taṃ gṛdhraṃ prekṣya tāmrākṣaṃ gatāsum acalopamam
GE09ram_02_u:10197: rāmaḥ subahubhir duḥkhair dīnaḥ saumitrim abravīt // Ram_3,64.19
GE09ram_02_u:10198: bahūni rakṣasāṃ vāse varṣāṇi vasatā sukham
GE09ram_02_u:10199: anena daṇḍakāraṇye vicīrṇam iha pakṣiṇā // Ram_3,64.20
GE09ram_02_u:10201: so 'yam adya hataḥ śete kālo hi duratikramaḥ // Ram_3,64.21
GE09ram_02_u:10202: paśya lakṣmaṇa gṛdhro 'yam upakārī hataś ca me
GE09ram_02_u:10203: sītām abhyavapan no vai rāvaṇena balīyasā // Ram_3,64.22
GE09ram_02_u:10205: mama hetor ayaṃ prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,64.23
GE09ram_02_u:10207: śūrāḥ śaraṇyāḥ saumitre tiryagyonigateṣv api // Ram_3,64.24
GE09ram_02_u:10208: sītāharaṇajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na me saumya tathāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:10209: yathā vināśo gṛdhrasya matkṛte ca paraṃtapa // Ram_3,64.25
GE09ram_02_u:10210: rājā daśarathaḥ śrīmān yathā mama mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10211: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca tathāyaṃ patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,64.26
GE09ram_02_u:10213: gṛdhrarājaṃ didhakṣāmi matkṛte nidhanaṃ gatam // Ram_3,64.27
GE09ram_02_u:10215: imaṃ dhakṣyāmi saumitre hataṃ raudreṇa rakṣasā // Ram_3,64.28
GE09ram_02_u:10216: yā gatir yajñaśīlānām āhitāgneś ca yā gatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10217: aparāvartināṃ yā ca yā ca bhūmipradāyinām // Ram_3,64.29
GE09ram_02_u:10218: mayā tvaṃ samanujñāto gaccha lokān anuttamān
GE09ram_02_u:10219: gṛdhrarāja mahāsattva saṃskṛtaś ca mayā vraja // Ram_3,64.30
GE09ram_02_u:10220: evam uktvā citāṃ dīptām āropya patageśvaram
GE09ram_02_u:10221: dadāha rāmo dharmātmā svabandhum iva duḥkhitaḥ // Ram_3,64.31
GE09ram_02_u:10222: rāmo 'tha sahasaumitrir vanaṃ yātvā sa vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:10223: sthūlān hatvā mahārohīn anu tastāra taṃ dvijam // Ram_3,64.32
GE09ram_02_u:10225: śakunāya dadau rāmo ramye haritaśādvale // Ram_3,64.33
GE09ram_02_u:10226: yat tat pretasya martyasya kathayanti dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10227: tat svargagamanaṃ tasya kṣipraṃ rāmo jajāpa ha // Ram_3,64.34
GE09ram_02_u:10229: udakaṃ cakratus tasmai gṛdhrarājāya tāv ubhau // Ram_3,64.35
GE09ram_02_u:10230: sa gṛdhrarājaḥ kṛtavān yaśaskaraṃ suduṣkaraṃ karma raṇe nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10231: maharṣikalpena ca saṃskṛtas tadā jagāma puṇyāṃ gatim ātmanaḥ śubhām // Ram_3,64.36
GE09ram_02_u:10232: kṛtvaivam udakaṃ tasmai prasthitau rāghavau tadā
GE09ram_02_u:10233: avekṣantau vane sītāṃ paścimāṃ jagmatur diśam // Ram_3,65.1
GE09ram_02_u:10236: gulmair vṛkṣaiś ca bahubhir latābhiś ca praveṣṭitam
GE09ram_02_u:10237: āvṛtaṃ sarvato durgaṃ gahanaṃ ghoradarśanam // Ram_3,65.3
GE09ram_02_u:10238: vyatikramya tu vegena gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_02_u:10239: subhīmaṃ tan mahāraṇyaṃ vyatiyātau mahābalau // Ram_3,65.4
GE09ram_02_u:10240: tataḥ paraṃ janasthānāt trikrośaṃ gamya rāghavau
GE09ram_02_u:10241: krauñcāraṇyaṃ viviśatur gahanaṃ tau mahaujasau // Ram_3,65.5
GE09ram_02_u:10243: nānāvarṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ puṣpair mṛgapakṣigaṇair yutam // Ram_3,65.6
GE09ram_02_u:10244: didṛkṣamāṇau vaidehīṃ tad vanaṃ tau vicikyatuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10246: lakṣmaṇas tu mahātejāḥ sattvavāñ śīlavāñ śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10247: abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_3,65.8
GE09ram_02_u:10248: spandate me dṛḍhaṃ bāhur udvignam iva me manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10249: prāyaśaś cāpy aniṣṭāni nimittāny upalakṣaye // Ram_3,65.9
GE09ram_02_u:10250: tasmāt sajjībhavārya tvaṃ kuruṣva vacanaṃ hitam
GE09ram_02_u:10251: mamaiva hi nimittāni sadyaḥ śaṃsanti sambhramam // Ram_3,65.10
GE09ram_02_u:10253: āvayor vijayaṃ yuddhe śaṃsann iva vinardati // Ram_3,65.11
GE09ram_02_u:10254: tayor anveṣator evaṃ sarvaṃ tad vanam ojasā
GE09ram_02_u:10255: saṃjajñe vipulaḥ śabdaḥ prabhañjann iva tad vanam // Ram_3,65.12
GE09ram_02_u:10257: vanasya tasya śabdo 'bhūd divam āpūrayann iva // Ram_3,65.13
GE09ram_02_u:10258: taṃ śabdaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇas tu rāmaḥ kakṣe sahānujaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10260: āsedatus tatas tatra tāv ubhau pramukhe sthitam
GE09ram_02_u:10261: vivṛddham aśirogrīvaṃ kabandham udare mukham // Ram_3,65.15
GE09ram_02_u:10268: ghorau bhujau vikurvāṇam ubhau yojanam āyatau
GE09ram_02_u:10269: karābhyāṃ vividhān gṛhya ṛkṣān pakṣigaṇān mṛgān // Ram_3,65.19
GE09ram_02_u:10271: sthitam āvṛtya panthānaṃ tayor bhrātroḥ prapannayoḥ // Ram_3,65.20
GE09ram_02_u:10273: mahāntaṃ dāruṇaṃ bhīmaṃ kabandhaṃ bhujasaṃvṛtam // Ram_3,65.21
GE09ram_02_u:10274: sa mahābāhur atyarthaṃ prasārya vipulau bhujau
GE09ram_02_u:10275: jagrāha sahitāv eva rāghavau pīḍayan balāt // Ram_3,65.22
GE09ram_02_u:10277: bhrātarau vivaśaṃ prāptau kṛṣyamāṇau mahābalau // Ram_3,65.23
GE09ram_02_u:10280: ghoraṃ deśam imaṃ prāptau mama bhakṣāv upasthitau
GE09ram_02_u:10281: vadataṃ kāryam iha vāṃ kimarthaṃ cāgatau yuvām // Ram_3,65.25
GE09ram_02_u:10284: mamāsyam anusaṃprāptau durlabhaṃ jīvitaṃ punaḥ // Ram_3,65.26
GE09ram_02_u:10286: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mukhena pariśuṣyatā // Ram_3,65.27
GE09ram_02_u:10288: vyasanaṃ jīvitāntāya prāptam aprāpya tāṃ priyām // Ram_3,65.28
GE09ram_02_u:10290: tvāṃ ca māṃ ca naravyāghra vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitau
GE09ram_02_u:10292: śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire
GE09ram_02_u:10294: iti bruvāṇo dṛḍhasatyavikramo mahāyaśā dāśarathiḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:10295: avekṣya saumitrim udagravikramaṃ sthirāṃ tadā svāṃ matim ātmanākarot // Ram_3,65.31
GE09ram_02_u:10296: tau tu tatra sthitau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:10298: tiṣṭhataḥ kiṃ nu māṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudhārtaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhau
GE09ram_02_u:10299: āhārārthaṃ tu saṃdiṣṭau daivena gatacetasau // Ram_3,66.2
GE09ram_02_u:10300: tac chrutvā lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ prāptakālaṃ hitaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:10302: tvāṃ ca māṃ ca purā tūrṇam ādatte rākṣasādhamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10303: tasmād asibhyām asyāśu bāhū chindāvahai gurū // Ram_3,66.4
GE09ram_02_u:10304: tatas tau deśakālajñau khaḍgābhyām eva rāghavau
GE09ram_02_u:10306: dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum asaktam asinā tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10307: cicheda rāmo vegena savyaṃ vīras tu lakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,66.6
GE09ram_02_u:10309: khaṃ ca gāṃ ca diśaś caiva nādayañ jalado yathā // Ram_3,66.7
GE09ram_02_u:10311: dīnaḥ papraccha tau vīrau kau yuvām iti dānavaḥ // Ram_3,66.8
GE09ram_02_u:10313: śaśaṃsa tasya kākutsthaṃ kabandhasya mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,66.9
GE09ram_02_u:10314: ayam ikṣvākudāyādo rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10315: asyaivāvarajaṃ viddhi bhrātaraṃ māṃ ca lakṣmaṇam // Ram_3,66.10
GE09ram_02_u:10317: rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā yām icchantāv ihāgatau // Ram_3,66.11
GE09ram_02_u:10318: tvaṃ tu ko vā kimarthaṃ vā kabandha sadṛśo vane
GE09ram_02_u:10320: evam uktaḥ kabandhas tu lakṣmaṇenottaraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10321: uvāca paramaprītas tad indravacanaṃ smaran // Ram_3,66.13
GE09ram_02_u:10322: svāgataṃ vāṃ naravyāghrau diṣṭyā paśyāmi cāpy aham
GE09ram_02_u:10323: diṣṭyā cemau nikṛttau me yuvābhyāṃ bāhubandhanau // Ram_3,66.14
GE09ram_02_u:10324: virūpaṃ yac ca me rūpaṃ prāptaṃ hy avinayād yathā
GE09ram_02_u:10325: tan me śṛṇu naravyāghra tattvataḥ śaṃsatas tava // Ram_3,66.15
GE09ram_02_u:10327: rūpam āsīn mamācintyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:10328: yathā somasya śakrasya sūryasya ca yathā vapuḥ // Ram_3,67.1
GE09ram_02_u:10329: so 'haṃ rūpam idaṃ kṛtvā lokavitrāsanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:10330: ṛṣīn vanagatān rāma trāsayāmi tatas tataḥ // Ram_3,67.2
GE09ram_02_u:10331: tataḥ sthūlaśirā nāma maharṣiḥ kopito mayā
GE09ram_02_u:10332: saṃcinvan vividhaṃ vanyaṃ rūpeṇānena dharṣitaḥ // Ram_3,67.3
GE09ram_02_u:10334: etad eva nṛśaṃsaṃ te rūpam astu vigarhitam // Ram_3,67.4
GE09ram_02_u:10335: sa mayā yācitaḥ kruddhaḥ śāpasyānto bhaved iti
GE09ram_02_u:10337: yadā chittvā bhujau rāmas tvāṃ dahed vijane vane
GE09ram_02_u:10338: tadā tvaṃ prāpsyase rūpaṃ svam eva vipulaṃ śubham // Ram_3,67.6
GE09ram_02_u:10339: śriyā virājitaṃ putraṃ danos tvaṃ viddhi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:10340: indrakopād idaṃ rūpaṃ prāptam evaṃ raṇājire // Ram_3,67.7
GE09ram_02_u:10342: dīrgham āyuḥ sa me prādāt tato māṃ vibhramo 'spṛśat // Ram_3,67.8
GE09ram_02_u:10343: dīrgham āyur mayā prāptaṃ kiṃ me śakraḥ kariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:10344: ity evaṃ buddhim āsthāya raṇe śakram adharṣayam // Ram_3,67.9
GE09ram_02_u:10346: sakthinī ca śiraś caiva śarīre saṃpraveśitam // Ram_3,67.10
GE09ram_02_u:10347: sa mayā yācyamānaḥ sann ānayad yamasādanam
GE09ram_02_u:10348: pitāmahavacaḥ satyaṃ tad astv iti mamābravīt // Ram_3,67.11
GE09ram_02_u:10350: vajreṇābhihataḥ kālaṃ sudīrgham api jīvitum // Ram_3,67.12
GE09ram_02_u:10351: evam uktas tu me śakro bāhū yojanam āyatau
GE09ram_02_u:10352: prādād āsyaṃ ca me kukṣau tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭram akalpayat // Ram_3,67.13
GE09ram_02_u:10355: sa tu mām abravīd indro yadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10356: chetsyate samare bāhū tadā svargaṃ gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,67.15
GE09ram_02_u:10357: sa tvaṃ rāmo 'si bhadraṃ te nāham anyena rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:10358: śakyo hantuṃ yathātattvam evam uktaṃ maharṣiṇā // Ram_3,67.16
GE09ram_02_u:10361: evam uktas tu dharmātmā danunā tena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10363: rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā mama bhāryā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:10364: niṣkrāntasya janasthānāt saha bhrātrā yathāsukham // Ram_3,67.19
GE09ram_02_u:10365: nāmamātraṃ tu jānāmi na rūpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10366: nivāsaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vā vayaṃ tasya na vidmahe // Ram_3,67.20
GE09ram_02_u:10368: kāruṇyaṃ sadṛśaṃ kartum upakāre ca vartatām // Ram_3,67.21
GE09ram_02_u:10369: kāṣṭhāny ānīya śuṣkāṇi kāle bhagnāni kuñjaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10370: bhakṣyāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ vīra śvabhre mahati kalpite // Ram_3,67.22
GE09ram_02_u:10371: sa tvaṃ sītāṃ samācakṣva yena vā yatra vā hṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:10372: kuru kalyāṇam atyarthaṃ yadi jānāsi tattvataḥ // Ram_3,67.23
GE09ram_02_u:10373: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vākyaṃ danur anuttamam
GE09ram_02_u:10374: provāca kuśalo vaktuṃ vaktāram api rāghavam // Ram_3,67.24
GE09ram_02_u:10375: divyam asti na me jñānaṃ nābhijānāmi maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:10376: yas tāṃ jñāsyati taṃ vakṣye dagdhaḥ svaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ // Ram_3,67.25
GE09ram_02_u:10377: adagdhasya hi vijñātuṃ śaktir asti na me prabho
GE09ram_02_u:10378: rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahāvīryaṃ sītā yena hṛtā tava // Ram_3,67.26
GE09ram_02_u:10379: vijñānaṃ hi mahad bhraṣṭaṃ śāpadoṣeṇa rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:10380: svakṛtena mayā prāptaṃ rūpaṃ lokavigarhitam // Ram_3,67.27
GE09ram_02_u:10381: kiṃ tu yāvan na yāty astaṃ savitā śrāntavāhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10382: tāvan mām avaṭe kṣiptvā daha rāma yathāvidhi // Ram_3,67.28
GE09ram_02_u:10384: vakṣyāmi tam ahaṃ vīra yas taṃ jñāsyati rākṣasam // Ram_3,67.29
GE09ram_02_u:10385: tena sakhyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ nyāyyavṛttena rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:10386: kalpayiṣyati te prītaḥ sāhāyyaṃ laghuvikramaḥ // Ram_3,67.30
GE09ram_02_u:10387: na hi tasyāsty avijñātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:10388: sarvān parisṛto lokān purā vai kāraṇāntare // Ram_3,67.31
GE09ram_02_u:10389: evam uktau tu tau vīrau kabandhena nareśvarau
GE09ram_02_u:10392: citām ādīpayāmāsa sā prajajvāla sarvataḥ // Ram_3,68.2
GE09ram_02_u:10394: medasā pacyamānasya mandaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ // Ram_3,68.3
GE09ram_02_u:10395: sa vidhūya citām āśu vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10396: araje vāsasī bibhran mālāṃ divyāṃ mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,68.4
GE09ram_02_u:10400: prabhayā ca mahātejā diśo daśa virājayan // Ram_3,68.6
GE09ram_02_u:10402: śṛṇu rāghava tattvena yathā sīmām avāpsyasi // Ram_3,68.7
GE09ram_02_u:10403: rāma ṣaḍ yuktayo loke yābhiḥ sarvaṃ vimṛśyate
GE09ram_02_u:10406: yat kṛte vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ tvayā dārapradharṣaṇam // Ram_3,68.9
GE09ram_02_u:10407: tad avaśyaṃ tvayā kāryaḥ sa suhṛt suhṛdāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:10408: akṛtvā na hi te siddhim ahaṃ paśyāmi cintayan // Ram_3,68.10
GE09ram_02_u:10409: śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10410: bhrātrā nirastaḥ kruddhena vālinā śakrasūnunā // Ram_3,68.11
GE09ram_02_u:10412: nivasaty ātmavān vīraś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ // Ram_3,68.12
GE09ram_02_u:10413: vayasyaṃ taṃ kuru kṣipram ito gatvādya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:10415: na ca te so 'vamantavyaḥ sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10416: kṛtajñaḥ kāmarūpī ca sahāyārthī ca vīryavān // Ram_3,68.14
GE09ram_02_u:10417: śaktau hy adya yuvāṃ kartuṃ kāryaṃ tasya cikīrṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:10418: kṛtārtho vākṛtārtho vā kṛtyaṃ tava kariṣyati // Ram_3,68.15
GE09ram_02_u:10419: sa ṛkṣarajasaḥ putraḥ pampām aṭati śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10422: kuru rāghava satyena vayasyaṃ vanacāriṇam // Ram_3,68.17
GE09ram_02_u:10423: sa hi sthānāni sarvāṇi kārtsnyena kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10425: na tasyāviditaṃ loke kiṃcid asti hi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:10426: yāvat sūryaḥ pratapati sahasrāṃśur ariṃdama // Ram_3,68.19
GE09ram_02_u:10427: sa nadīr vipulāñ śailān giridurgāṇi kandarān
GE09ram_02_u:10428: anviṣya vānaraiḥ sārdhaṃ patnīṃ te 'dhigamiṣyati // Ram_3,68.20
GE09ram_02_u:10430: diśo vicetuṃ tāṃ sītāṃ tvadviyogena śocatīm // Ram_3,68.21
GE09ram_02_u:10431: sa meruśṛṅgāgragatām aninditāṃ praviśya pātālatale 'pi vāśritām
GE09ram_02_u:10432: plavaṃgamānāṃ pravaras tava priyāṃ nihatya rakṣāṃsi punaḥ pradāsyati // Ram_3,68.22
GE09ram_02_u:10434: vākyam anvartham arthajñaḥ kabandhaḥ punar abravīt // Ram_3,69.1
GE09ram_02_u:10435: eṣa rāma śivaḥ panthā yatraite puṣpitā drumāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10436: pratīcīṃ diśam āśritya prakāśante manoramāḥ // Ram_3,69.2
GE09ram_02_u:10438: aśvatthāḥ karṇikārāś ca cūtāś cānye ca pādapāḥ // Ram_3,69.3
GE09ram_02_u:10439: tān āruhyāthavā bhūmau pātayitvā ca tān balāt
GE09ram_02_u:10441: caṅkramantau varān deśāñ śailāc chailaṃ vanād vanam
GE09ram_02_u:10442: tataḥ puṣkariṇīṃ vīrau pampāṃ nāma gamiṣyathaḥ // Ram_3,69.5
GE09ram_02_u:10445: tatra haṃsāḥ plavāḥ krauñcāḥ kurarāś caiva rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:10448: ghṛtapiṇḍopamān sthūlāṃs tān dvijān bhakṣayiṣyathaḥ // Ram_3,69.8
GE09ram_02_u:10449: rohitān vakratuṇḍāṃś ca nalamīnāṃś ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:10450: pampāyām iṣubhir matsyāṃs tatra rāma varān hatān // Ram_3,69.9
GE09ram_02_u:10452: tava bhaktyā samāyukto lakṣmaṇaḥ sampradāsyati // Ram_3,69.10
GE09ram_02_u:10453: bhṛśaṃ te khādato matsyān pampāyāḥ puṣpasaṃcaye
GE09ram_02_u:10454: padmagandhi śivaṃ vāri sukhaśītam anāmayam // Ram_3,69.11
GE09ram_02_u:10458: apāṃ lobhād upāvṛttān vṛṣabhān iva nardataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10459: rūpānvitāṃś ca pampāyāṃ drakṣyasi tvaṃ narottama // Ram_3,69.13
GE09ram_02_u:10461: śītodakaṃ ca pampāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokaṃ vihāsyasi // Ram_3,69.14
GE09ram_02_u:10463: utpalāni ca phullāni paṅkajāni ca rāghava // Ram_3,69.15
GE09ram_02_u:10464: na tāni kaścin mālyāni tatrāropayitā naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10467: ye prapetur mahīṃ tūrṇaṃ śarīrāt svedabindavaḥ // Ram_3,69.17
GE09ram_02_u:10468: tāni mālyāni jātāni munīnāṃ tapasā tadā
GE09ram_02_u:10471: śramaṇī śabarī nāma kākutstha cirajīvinī // Ram_3,69.19
GE09ram_02_u:10472: tvāṃ tu dharme sthitā nityaṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:10473: dṛṣṭvā devopamaṃ rāma svargalokaṃ gamiṣyati // Ram_3,69.20
GE09ram_02_u:10474: tatas tad rāma pampāyās tīram āśritya paścimam
GE09ram_02_u:10475: āśramasthānam atulaṃ guhyaṃ kākutstha paśyasi // Ram_3,69.21
GE09ram_02_u:10476: na tatrākramituṃ nāgāḥ śaknuvanti tam āśramam
GE09ram_02_u:10477: ṛṣes tasya mataṃgasya vidhānāt tac ca kānanam // Ram_3,69.22
GE09ram_02_u:10482: udāro brahmaṇā caiva pūrvakāle vinirmitaḥ // Ram_3,69.24
GE09ram_02_u:10483: śayānaḥ puruṣo rāma tasya śailasya mūrdhani
GE09ram_02_u:10484: yat svapne labhate vittaṃ tat prabuddho 'dhigacchati // Ram_3,69.25
GE09ram_02_u:10486: tatraiva praharanty enaṃ suptam ādāya rākṣasāḥ // Ram_3,69.26
GE09ram_02_u:10490: pracaranti pṛthak kīrṇā meghavarṇās tarasvinaḥ // Ram_3,69.28
GE09ram_02_u:10491: te tatra pītvā pānīyaṃ vimalaṃ śītam avyayam
GE09ram_02_u:10493: rāma tasya tu śailasya mahatī śobhate guhā
GE09ram_02_u:10494: śilāpidhānā kākutstha duḥkhaṃ cāsyāḥ praveśanam // Ram_3,69.30
GE09ram_02_u:10495: tasyā guhāyāḥ prāgdvāre mahāñ śītodako hradaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10497: tasyāṃ vasati sugrīvaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10499: kabandhas tv anuśāsyaivaṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:10500: sragvī bhāskaravarṇābhaḥ khe vyarocata vīryavān // Ram_3,69.33
GE09ram_02_u:10501: taṃ tu khasthaṃ mahābhāgaṃ kabandhaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:10502: prasthitau tvaṃ vrajasveti vākyam ūcatur antikāt // Ram_3,69.34
GE09ram_02_u:10503: gamyatāṃ kāryasiddhyartham iti tāv abravīc ca saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10504: suprītau tāv anujñāpya kabandhaḥ prasthitas tadā // Ram_3,69.35
GE09ram_02_u:10505: sa tat kabandhaḥ pratipadya rūpaṃ vṛtaḥ śriyā bhāskaratulyadehaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10506: nidarśayan rāmam avekṣya khasthaḥ sakhyaṃ kuruṣveti tadābhyuvāca // Ram_3,69.36
GE09ram_02_u:10507: tau kabandhena taṃ mārgaṃ pampāyā darśitaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:10508: ātasthatur diśaṃ gṛhya pratīcīṃ nṛvarātmajau // Ram_3,70.1
GE09ram_02_u:10510: vīkṣantau jagmatur draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_3,70.2
GE09ram_02_u:10511: kṛtvā ca śailapṛṣṭhe tu tau vāsaṃ raghunandanau
GE09ram_02_u:10512: pampāyāḥ paścimaṃ tīraṃ rāghavāv upatasthatuḥ // Ram_3,70.3
GE09ram_02_u:10513: tau puṣkariṇyāḥ pampāyās tīram āsādya paścimam
GE09ram_02_u:10514: apaśyatāṃ tatas tatra śabaryā ramyam āśramam // Ram_3,70.4
GE09ram_02_u:10515: tau tam āśramam āsādya drumair bahubhir āvṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:10517: tau tu dṛṣṭvā tadā siddhā samutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10518: pādau jagrāha rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ // Ram_3,70.6
GE09ram_02_u:10519: tām uvāca tato rāmaḥ śramaṇīṃ saṃśitavratām
GE09ram_02_u:10520: kaccit te nirjitā vighnāḥ kaccit te vardhate tapaḥ // Ram_3,70.7
GE09ram_02_u:10521: kaccit te niyataḥ kopa āhāraś ca tapodhane
GE09ram_02_u:10522: kaccit te niyamāḥ prāptāḥ kaccit te manasaḥ sukham
GE09ram_02_u:10523: kaccit te guruśuśrūṣā saphalā cārubhāṣiṇi // Ram_3,70.8
GE09ram_02_u:10524: rāmeṇa tāpasī pṛṣṭā sā siddhā siddhasaṃmatā
GE09ram_02_u:10525: śaśaṃsa śabarī vṛddhā rāmāya pratyupasthitā // Ram_3,70.9
GE09ram_02_u:10527: itas te divam ārūḍhā yān ahaṃ paryacāriṣam // Ram_3,70.10
GE09ram_02_u:10528: taiś cāham uktā dharmajñair mahābhāgair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10529: āgamiṣyati te rāmaḥ supuṇyam imam āśramam // Ram_3,70.11
GE09ram_02_u:10531: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā varāṃl lokān akṣayāṃs tvaṃ gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,70.12
GE09ram_02_u:10532: mayā tu vividhaṃ vanyaṃ saṃcitaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:10534: evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā śabaryā śabarīm idam
GE09ram_02_u:10535: rāghavaḥ prāha vijāne tāṃ nityam abahiṣkṛtām // Ram_3,70.14
GE09ram_02_u:10536: danoḥ sakāśāt tattvena prabhāvaṃ te mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10537: śrutaṃ pratyakṣam icchāmi saṃdraṣṭuṃ yadi manyase // Ram_3,70.15
GE09ram_02_u:10538: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmavaktrād viniḥsṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:10539: śabarī darśayāmāsa tāv ubhau tad vanaṃ mahat // Ram_3,70.16
GE09ram_02_u:10541: mataṃgavanam ity eva viśrutaṃ raghunandana // Ram_3,70.17
GE09ram_02_u:10542: iha te bhāvitātmāno guravo me mahādyute
GE09ram_02_u:10544: iyaṃ pratyaksthalī vedī yatra te me susatkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10545: puṣpopahāraṃ kurvanti śramād udvepibhiḥ karaiḥ // Ram_3,70.19
GE09ram_02_u:10547: dyotayanti diśaḥ sarvāḥ śriyā vedyo 'tulaprabhāḥ // Ram_3,70.20
GE09ram_02_u:10549: cintite 'bhyāgatān paśya sametān sapta sāgarān // Ram_3,70.21
GE09ram_02_u:10550: kṛtābhiṣekais tair nyastā valkalāḥ pādapeṣv iha
GE09ram_02_u:10551: adyāpi na viśuṣyanti pradeśe raghunandana // Ram_3,70.22
GE09ram_02_u:10552: kṛtsnaṃ vanam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca śrutaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:10553: tad icchāmy abhyanujñātā tyaktum etat kalevaram // Ram_3,70.23
GE09ram_02_u:10554: teṣām icchāmy ahaṃ gantuṃ samīpaṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_02_u:10555: munīnām āśramo yeṣām ahaṃ ca paricāriṇī // Ram_3,70.24
GE09ram_02_u:10556: dharmiṣṭhaṃ tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10559: jvalatpāvakasaṃkāśā svargam eva jagāma sā // Ram_3,70.26
GE09ram_02_u:10561: tat puṇyaṃ śabarī sthānaṃ jagāmātmasamādhinā // Ram_3,70.27
GE09ram_02_u:10562: divaṃ tu tasyāṃ yātāyāṃ śabaryāṃ svena karmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:10563: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cintayāmāsa rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,71.1
GE09ram_02_u:10564: cintayitvā tu dharmātmā prabhāvaṃ taṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_02_u:10568: saptānāṃ ca samudrāṇām eṣu tīrtheṣu lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:10569: upaspṛṣṭaṃ ca vidhivat pitaraś cāpi tarpitāḥ // Ram_3,71.4
GE09ram_02_u:10570: pranaṣṭam aśubhaṃ yat tat kalyāṇaṃ samupasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:10571: tena tv etat prahṛṣṭaṃ me mano lakṣmaṇa samprati // Ram_3,71.5
GE09ram_02_u:10573: tad āgaccha gamiṣyāvaḥ pampāṃ tāṃ priyadarśanām // Ram_3,71.6
GE09ram_02_u:10576: nityaṃ vālibhayāt trastaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ // Ram_3,71.77 //
GE09ram_02_u:10577: abhitvare ca taṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham
GE09ram_02_u:10578: tadadhīnaṃ hi me saumya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam // Ram_3,71.8
GE09ram_02_u:10579: iti bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāmaṃ saumitrir idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:10580: gacchāvas tvaritaṃ tatra mamāpi tvarate manaḥ // Ram_3,71.9
GE09ram_02_u:10581: āśramāt tu tatas tasmān niṣkramya sa viśāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10582: ājagāma tataḥ pampāṃ lakṣmaṇena sahābhibhūḥ // Ram_3,71.10
GE09ram_02_u:10585: etaiś cānyaiś ca vividhair nāditaṃ tad vanaṃ mahat // Ram_3,71.11
GE09ram_02_u:10586: sa rāmo vividhān vṛkṣān sarāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:10587: paśyan kāmābhisaṃtapto jagāma paramaṃ hradam // Ram_3,71.12
GE09ram_02_u:10588: sa tām āsādya vai rāmo dūrād udakavāhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:10591: viveśa nalinīṃ pampāṃ paṅkajaiś ca samāvṛtām // Ram_3,71.14
GE09ram_02_u:10600: nīlāṃ kuvalayoddhātair bahuvarṇāṃ kuthām iva // Ram_3,71.18
GE09ram_02_u:10603: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ pampāṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:10604: vilalāpa ca tejasvī kāmād daśarathātmajaḥ // Ram_3,71.20
GE09ram_02_u:10605: tilakair bījapūraiś ca vaṭaiḥ śukladrumais tathā
GE09ram_02_u:10606: puṣpitaiḥ karavīraiś ca puṃnāgaiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ // Ram_3,71.21
GE09ram_02_u:10609: anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣaiḥ pramadevopaśobhitām // Ram_3,71.22
GE09ram_02_u:10610: asyās tīre tu pūrvoktaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10613: adhyāste taṃ mahāvīryaḥ sugrīva iti viśrutaḥ // Ram_3,71.24
GE09ram_02_u:10615: ity uvāca punar vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavikramam // Ram_3,71.25
GE09ram_02_u:10616: tato mahad vartma ca dūrasaṃkramaṃ krameṇa gatvā pravilokayan vanam
